items.arabic: اتَّكِلُ فِى النَّجاةِ مِنْ عِقابِكَ عَلى اعْمالِنا، بَلْ بِفَضْلِكَ عَلَيْنا، لِأَنَّكَ اهْلُ التَّقْوى وَاهْلُ الْمَغْفِرَةِ، تُبْدِئُ بِالْإِحْسانِ نِعَماً، وَتَعْفُو عَنِ الذَّنْبِ كَرَماً، فَما نَدْرى ما نَشْكُرُ اجَميلَ ما تَنْشُرُ، امْ قَبيحَ ما تَسْتُرُ، امْ عَظيمَ ما ابْلَيْتَ وَاوْلَيْتَ، امْ كَثيرَ ما مِنْهُ نَجَّيْتَ وَعافَيْتَ، يا حَبيبَ مَنْ تَحَبَّبَ الَيْكَ، وَيا قُرَّةَ عَيْنِ مَنْ لاذَبِكَ وَانْقَطَعَ الَيْكَ، انْتَ الْمُحْسِنُ وَنَحْنُ الْمُسيئُونَ، فَتَجاوَزْ يا رَبِّ عَنْ قَبيحِ ما عِنْدَنا بِجَميلِ ما عِنْدَكَ، وَاىُّ جَهْلٍ يا رَبِّ لا يَسَعُهُ جُودُكَ، اوْ اىُّ زَمانٍ اطْوَلُ مِنْ اناتِكَ، وَما قَدْرُ اعْمالِنا فى جَنْبِ نِعَمِكَ، وَكَيْفَ نَسْتَكْثِرُ اعْمالًا نُقابِلُ بِها كَرَمَكَ، بَلْ كَيْفَ يَضيقُ عَلَى الْمُذْنِبينَ ما وَسِعَهُمْ مِنْ رَحْمَتِكَ، يا واسِعَ الْمَغْفِرَةِ، يا باسِطَ الْيَدَيْنِ بِالرَّحْمَةِ، فَوَ عِزَّتِكَ يا سَيِّدى لَوْ نَهَرْتَنى ما بَرِحْتُ مِنْ بابِكَ، وَلا كَفَفْتُ عَنْ تَمَلُّقِكَ، لِمَا انْتَهى الَىَّ مِنَ الْمَعْرِفَةِ بِجُودِكَ وَكَرَمِكَ، وَانْتَ الْفاعِلُ لِما تَشآءُ، تُعَذِّبُ مَنْ تَشآءُ بِما تَشآءُ كَيْفَ تَشآءُ، وَتَرْحَمُ مَنْ تَشآءُ بِما تَشآءُ كَيْفَ تَشآءُ، لا تُسْئَلُ عَنْ فِعْلِكَ، وَلا تُنازَعُ فى مُلْكِكَ، وَلا تُشارَكُ فى امْرِكَ، وَلا تُضآدُّ فى حُكْمِكَ، وَلا يَعْتَرِضُ عَلَيْكَ احَدٌ فى تَدْبيرِكَ، لَكَ الْخَلْقُ وَالْأَمْرُ، تَبارَكَ اللَّهُ رَبُّ الْعالَمينَ، يا رَبِّ هذا مَقامُ مَنْ لاذَبِكَ وَاسْتَجارَ بِكَرَمِكَ، وَالِفَ احْسانَكَ وَنِعَمَكَ، وَانْتَ الْجَوادُ الَّذى لايَضيقُ عَفْوُكَ، وَلا يَنْقُصُ فَضْلُكَ، وَلا تَقِلُّ رَحْمَتُكَ، وَقَدْ تَوَثَّقْنا مِنْكَ بِالصَّفْحِ الْقَديمِ، وَالْفَضْلِ الْعَظيمِ، وَالرَّحْمَةِ الْواسِعَةِ، افَتُراكَ يا رَبِّ تُخْلِفُ ظُنُونَنا، اوْ تُخَيِّبُ آمالَنا، كَلّا يا كَريمُ فَلَيْسَ هذا ظَنُّنا بِكَ، وَلا هذا فيكَ طَمَعُنا، يا رَبِّ انَّ لَنا فيكَ امَلًا طَويلًا كَثيراً، انَّ لَنا فيكَ رَجآءً عَظيماً، عَصَيْناكَ وَنَحْنُ نَرْجُو انْ تَسْتُرَ عَلَيْنا، وَدَعَوْناكَ وَنَحْنُ نَرْجُو انْ تَسْتَجيبَ لَنا، فَحَقِّقْ رَجآئَنا مَوْلانا، فَقَدْ عَلِمْنا ما نَسْتَوْجِبُ بِاعْمالِنا، وَلكِنْ عِلْمُكَ فينا وَعِلْمُنا بِانَّكَ لا تَصْرِفُنا عَنْكَ، وَانْ كُنَّا غَيْرَ مُسْتَوْجِبينَ لِرَحْمَتِكَ، فَانْتَ اهْلٌ انْ تَجُودَ عَلَيْنا،
items.english: I do not rely for salvation from Your punishment upon our deeds, but rather upon Your grace towards us; for You are the Source of Piety and the Source of Forgiveness. You initiate blessings through benevolence, and You pardon sin out of generosity. We do not know what to thank: the beauty You spread, or the ugliness You conceal? Or the greatness of what You have tested and bestowed? Or the abundance of that from which You have delivered and granted well-being? O Beloved of him who seeks Your love, and O Delight of the eye of him who seeks refuge in You and devotes himself to You. You are the Beneficent and we are the evildoers; so overlook, O Lord, the ugliness that we have by the beauty that You possess. And what ignorance, O Lord, can Your generosity not encompass? Or what span of time is longer than Your forbearance? And what is the value of our deeds compared to Your blessings? And how can we consider our deeds much, to be set against Your generosity? Rather, how can that which has encompassed the sinners of Your mercy ever be too narrow for them? O Vast in forgiveness, O He who stretches out His hands with mercy. By Your Might, O my Master, even if You were to drive me away, I would not leave Your door, nor would I cease my entreaties to You, because of what has reached me of the knowledge of Your liberality and Your generosity. And You are the Doer of whatever You will. You punish whom You will, with whatever You will, however You will; and You show mercy to whom You will, with whatever You will, however You will. You are not questioned about Your action, nor are You disputed in Your kingdom, nor are You partnered in Your affair, nor are You opposed in Your judgment, and no one objects to Your governance. To You belong the creation and the command; Blessed be Allah, the Lord of the worlds. O Lord, this is the station of one who seeks refuge in You, asks for protection through Your generosity, and is accustomed to Your benevolence and Your blessings. And You are the Munificent whose pardon never narrows, whose grace never diminishes, and whose mercy never lessens. And we have gained confidence from You through the ancient pardon, the great grace, and the vast mercy. Do You then see, O Lord, that You would fail our expectations or disappoint our hopes? Never, O Generous One! For this is not our thought of You, nor is this our craving from You. O Lord, indeed we have in You a long and vast hope; indeed we have in You a magnificent expectation. We disobeyed You while hoping that You would conceal it for us, and we called upon You while hoping that You would respond to us; so fulfill our hope, O our Master. For we know what we deserve by our deeds, but Your knowledge of us and our knowledge that You will not turn us away from You guides us; and though we are not deserving of Your mercy, You are worthy of bestowing Your generosity upon us.
items.transliteration: Attakilu fi al-najati min 'iqabika 'ala a'malina, bal bi-fadlika 'alayna, li-annaka ahlu al-taqwa wa-ahlu al-maghfirah, tubdi'u bi-al-ihsani ni'aman, wa-ta'fu 'an al-dhanbi karaman, fa-ma nadri ma nashkuru a-jamila ma tanshur, am qabiha ma tastur, am 'azima ma ablayta wa-awlayta, am kathira ma minhu najjayta wa-'afayta, ya habiba man tahabbaba ilayka, wa-ya qurrata 'ayni man ladha bika wa-inqata'a ilayka, anta al-muhsinu wa-nahnu al-musi'una, fa-tajawaz ya Rabbi 'an qabihi ma 'indana bi-jamili ma 'indaka, wa-ayyu jahlin ya Rabbi la yasa'uhu juduka, aw ayyu zamanin atwalu min anatika, wa-ma qadru a'malina fi janbi ni'amika, wa-kayfa nastakthiru a'malan nuqabilu biha karamaka, bal kayfa yadiqu 'ala al-mudhnibina ma wasi'ahum min rahmatika, ya wasi'a al-maghfirati, ya basita al-yadayni bi-al-rahmati, fa-wa 'izzatika ya sayyidi law nahartani ma barihtu min babika, wa-la kafaftu 'an tamalluqika, lima intaha ilayya min al-ma'rifati bi-judika wa-karamika, wa-anta al-fa'ilu lima tasha'u, tu'adhdhibu man tasha'u bima tasha'u kayfa tasha'u, wa-tarhamu man tasha'u bima tasha'u kayfa tasha'u, la tus'alu 'an fi'lika, wa-la tunaza'u fi mulkika, wa-la tusharaku fi amrika, wa-la tudaddu fi hukmika, wa-la ya'taridu 'alayka ahadun fi tadbirika, laka al-khalqu wa-al-amru, tabaraka Allahu Rabbu al-'alamina, ya Rabbi hadha maqamu man ladha bika wa-istajara bi-karamika, wa-alifa ihsanaka wa-ni'amaka, wa-anta al-jawadu alladhi la yadiqu 'afwuka, wa-la yanqusu fadluka, wa-la taqillu rahmatuka, wa-qad tawathaqna minka bi-al-safhi al-qadimi, wa-al-fadli al-'azimi, wa-al-rahmati al-wasi'ati, a-faturaka ya Rabbi tukhlifu zununana, aw tukhayyibu amalana, kalla ya Karimu fa-laysa hadha zunnuna bika, wa-la hadha fika tama'una, ya Rabbi inna lana fika amalan tawilan kathiran, inna lana fika raja'an 'aziman, 'asaynaka wa-nahnu narju an tastura 'alayna, wa-da'awnaka wa-nahnu narju an tastajiba lana, fa-haqqiq raja'ana mawlana, fa-qad 'alimna ma nastawjibu bi-a'malina, wa-lakin 'ilmuka fina wa-'ilmuna bi-annaka la tasrifuna 'anka, wa-in kunna ghayra mustawjibina li-rahmatika, fa-anta ahlun an tajuda 'alayna,

مَقامُ مَنْ لاذَبِكَ وَاسْتَجارَ بِكَرَمِكَ، وَالِفَ احْسانَكَ وَنِعَمَكَ، وَانْتَ الْجَوادُ الَّذى لايَضيقُ عَفْوُكَ، وَلا يَنْقُصُ فَضْلُكَ، وَلا تَقِلُّ رَحْمَتُكَ، وَقَدْ تَوَثَّقْنا مِنْكَ بِالصَّفْحِ الْقَديمِ، وَالْفَضْلِ الْعَظيمِ، وَالرَّحْمَةِ الْواسِعَةِ، افَتُراكَ يا رَبِّ تُخْلِفُ ظُنُونَنا، اوْ تُخَيِّبُ آمالَنا، كَلّا يا كَريمُ فَلَيْسَ هذا ظَنُّنا بِكَ، وَلا هذا فيكَ طَمَعُنا، يا رَبِّ انَّ لَنا فيكَ امَلًا طَويلًا كَثيراً، انَّ لَنا فيكَ رَجآءً عَظيماً، عَصَيْناكَ وَنَحْنُ نَرْجُو انْ تَسْتُرَ عَلَيْنا، وَدَعَوْناكَ وَنَحْنُ نَرْجُو انْ تَسْتَجيبَ لَنا، فَحَقِّقْ رَجآئَنا مَوْلانا، فَقَدْ عَلِمْنا ما نَسْتَوْجِبُ بِاعْمالِنا، وَلكِنْ عِلْمُكَ فينا وَعِلْمُنا بِانَّكَ لا تَصْرِفُنا عَنْكَ، وَانْ كُنَّا غَيْرَ مُسْتَوْجِبينَ لِرَحْمَتِكَ، فَانْتَ اهْلٌ انْ تَجُودَ عَلَيْنا،
items.english: I do not rely for salvation from Your punishment upon our deeds, but rather upon Your grace towards us; for You are the Source of Piety and the Source of Forgiveness. You initiate blessings through benevolence, and You pardon sin out of generosity. We do not know what to thank: the beauty You spread, or the ugliness You conceal? Or the greatness with which You have tried and favored us, or the many things from which You have saved and granted us well-being? O Beloved of him who endears himself to You, and O Delight of the eye of him who seeks refuge in You and devotes himself to You. You are the Beneficent and we are the evildoers; so overlook, O Lord, the ugliness of what we have by the beauty of what You possess. And what ignorance, O Lord, cannot be encompassed by Your liberality? Or what time is longer than Your forbearance? What is the worth of our deeds compared to Your blessings? And how can we consider as much the deeds with which we meet Your generosity? Rather, how can that which has encompassed the sinners of Your mercy ever be narrow for them? O Vast in Forgiveness, O Outstretcher of both hands with mercy. By Your Might, O my Master, even if You were to drive me away, I would not leave Your door, nor would I cease my entreaties to You, because of the knowledge I have gained of Your liberality and Your generosity. And You are the Doer of whatever You will; You punish whom You will with what You will as You will, and You have mercy on whom You will with what You will as You will. You are not questioned about Your action, nor are You contended with in Your kingdom, nor are You shared with in Your affair, nor are You opposed in Your judgment; and no one objects to You in Your management. To You belong the creation and the command; blessed be Allah, Lord of the worlds. O Lord, this is the station of one who has sought refuge in You, sought protection in Your generosity, and become accustomed to Your benevolence and Your blessings. And You are the Magnanimous Whose pardon never narrows, Whose grace never diminishes, and Whose mercy never decreases. We have relied upon You through Your ancient forgiveness, great grace, and vast mercy. Would You, O Lord, go against our expectations, or disappoint our hopes? Never, O Generous One! For this is not our expectation of You, nor is this our craving from You. O Lord, we have in You a long and abundant hope; we have in You a great expectation. We have disobeyed You while hoping that You would conceal it for us, and we have called upon You while hoping that You would respond to us. So fulfill our hope, O our Master, for we certainly know what we deserve by our deeds. But Your knowledge of us and our knowledge that You will not turn us away from You—even if we are not deserving of Your mercy—You are worthy of bestowing generosity upon us,
items.transliteration: Attakilu fi al-najati min 'iqabika 'ala a'malina, bal bi-fadlika 'alayna, li-annaka ahlu al-taqwa wa-ahlu al-maghfirah, tubdi'u bi-al-ihsani ni'aman, wa-ta'fu 'an al-dhanbi karaman, fa-ma nadri ma nashkuru: a-jamila ma tanshuru, am qabiha ma tasturu, am 'azima ma ablayta wa-awlayta, am kathira ma minhu najjayta wa-'afayta, ya habiba man tahabbaba ilayka, wa-ya qurrata 'ayni man ladha bika wa-inqata'a ilayka, anta al-muhsinu wa-nahnu al-musi'una, fa-tajawaz ya Rabbi 'an qabihi ma 'indana bi-jamili ma 'indaka, wa-ayyu jahlin ya Rabbi la yasa'uhu juduka, aw ayyu zamanin atwalu min anatika, wa-ma qadru a'malina fi janbi ni'amika, wa-kayfa nastakthiru a'malan nuqabilu biha karamaka, bal kayfa yadiqu 'ala al-mudhnibina ma wasi'ahum min rahmatika, ya واسِعَ al-maghfirati, ya basita al-yadayni bi-al-rahmati, fa-wa-'izzatika ya sayyidi law nahartani ma barihtu min babika, wa-la kaffaftu 'an tamalluqika, lima intaha ilayya min al-ma'rifati bi-judika wa-karamika, wa-anta al-fa'ilu lima tasha'u, tu'adhdhibu man tasha'u bima tasha'u kayfa tasha'u, wa-tarhamu man tasha'u bima tasha'u kayfa tasha'u, la tus'alu 'an fi'lika, wa-la tunaza'u fi mulkika, wa-la tusharaku fi amrika, wa-la tudaddu fi hukmika, wa-la ya'taridu 'alayka ahadun fi tadbirika, laka al-khalqu wa-al-amru, tabaraka Allahu Rabbu al-'alamina, ya Rabbi hadha maqamu man ladha bika wa-istajara bi-karamika, wa-alifa ihsanaka wa-ni'amaka, wa-anta al-jawadu alladhi la yadiqu 'afwuka, wa-la yanqusu fadluka, wa-la taqillu rahmatuka, wa-qad tawathaqna minka bi-al-safhi al-qadimi, wa-al-fadli al-'azimi, wa-al-rahmati al-wasi'ati, afaturaka ya Rabbi tukhlifu zununana, aw tukhayyibu amalana, kalla ya Karimu fa-laysa hadha zannuna bika, wa-la hadha fika tama'una, ya Rabbi inna lana fika amalan tawilan kathiran, inna lana fika raja'an 'aziman, 'asaynaka wa-nahnu narju an tastura 'alayna, wa-da'awnaka wa-nahnu narju an tastajiba lana, fa-haqqiq raja'ana mawlana, fa-qad 'alimna ma nastawjibu bi-a'malina, wa-lakin 'ilmuka fina wa-'ilmuna bi-annaka la tasrifuna 'anka, wa-in kunna ghayra mustawjibina li-rahmatika, fa-anta ahlun an tajuda 'alayna,

items.arabic: وَعَلَى الْمُذْنِبينَ بِفَضْلِ سَعَتِكَ، فَامْنُنْ عَلَيْنا بِما انْتَ اهْلُهُ، وَجُدْ عَلَيْنا فَانَّا مُحْتاجُونَ الى نَيْلِكَ، يا غَفَّارُ بِنُورِكَ اهْتَدَيْنا، وَبِفَضْلِكَ اسْتَغْنَيْنا، وَبِنِعْمَتِكَ اصْبَحْنا وَامْسَيْنا، ذُنُوبُنا بَيْنَ يَدَيْكَ، نَسْتَغْفِرُكَ الَّلهُمَّ مِنْها وَنَتُوبُ الَيْكَ، تَتَحَبَّبُ الَيْنا بِالنِّعَمِ، وَنُعارِضُكَ بِالذُّنُوبِ، خَيْرُكَ الَيْنا نازِلٌ، وَشَرُّنا الَيْكَ صاعِدٌ، وَلَمْ يَزَلْ وَلا يَزالُ مَلَكٌ كَريمٌ يَاْتيكَ عَنَّا بِعَمَلٍ قَبيحٍ، فَلا يَمْنَعُكَ ذلِكَ مِنْ انْ تَحُوطَنا بِنِعَمِكَ، وَتَتَفَضَّلَ عَلَيْنا بِآلآئِكَ، فَسُبْحانَكَ ما احْلَمَكَ وَاعْظَمَكَ وَاكْرَمَكَ مُبْدِئاً وَمُعيداً، تَقَدَّسَتْ اسْمآئُكَ، وَجَلَّ ثَناؤُكَ، وَكَرُمَ صَنائِعُكَ وَفِعالُكَ، انْتَ الهى اوْسَعُ فَضْلًا، وَاعْظَمُ حِلْماً مِنْ انْ تُقايِسَنى بِفِعْلى وَخَطيئَتى فَالْعَفْوَ الْعَفْوَ الْعَفْوَ، سَيِّدى سَيِّدى سَيِّدى اللهُمَّ اشْغَلْنا بِذِكْرِكَ، وَاعِذْنا مِنْ سَخَطِكَ، وَاجِرْنا مِنْ عَذابِكَ، وَارْزُقْنا مِنْ مَواهِبِكَ، وَانْعِمْ عَلَيْنا مِنْ فَضْلِكَ، وَارْزُقْنا حَجَّ بَيْتِكَ، وَزِيارَةَ قَبْرِ نَبِيِّكَ، صَلَواتُكَ وَرَحْمَتُكَ وَمَغْفِرَتُكَ وَرِضْوانُكَ عَلَيْهِ وَعَلى اهْلِ بَيْتِهِ، انَّكَ قَريبٌ مُجيبٌ، وَارْزُقْنا عَمَلًا بِطاعَتِكَ، وَتَوَفَّنا عَلى مِلَّتِكَ، وَسُنَّةِ نَبِيِّكَ صَلَّى اللَّهُ عَلَيْهِ وَآلِهِ، اللهُمَّ اغْفِرْ لى وَلِوالِدَىَّ وَارْحَمْهُما كَما رَبَّيانى صَغيراً، اجْزِهما بِالْإِحسانِ احْساناً، وَبِالسَّيِّئاتِ غُفْراناً، اللهُمَّ اغْفِرْ لِلْمُؤْمِنينَ وَالْمُؤْمِناتِ، الْأَحيآءِ مِنْهُمْ وَالْأَمواتِ، وَتابِعْ بَيْنَنا وَبَيْنَهُمْ بِالْخَيْراتِ، اللهُمَّ اغْفِرْ لِحَيِّنا وَمَيِّتِنا، وَشاهِدِنا وَغآئِبِنا، ذَكَرِنا وَانْثانا، صَغيرِنا وَكَبيرِنا، حُرِّنا وَمَمْلُوكِنا، كَذَبَ الْعادِلُونَ بِاللَّهِ، وَضَلُّوا ضَلالًا بَعيداً، وَخَسِرُوا خُسْراناً مُبيناً، اللهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلى مُحَمَّدٍ وَآلِ مُحَمَّدٍ، وَاخْتِمْ لى بِخَيْرٍ، وَاكْفِنى ما اهَمَّنى مِنْ امْرِ دُنْياىَ وَآخِرَتى وَلا تُسَلِّطْ عَلَىَّ مَنْ لا يَرْحَمُنى وَاجْعَلْ عَلَىَّ مِنْكَ واقِيَةً باقِيَةً، وَلا تَسْلُبْنى صالِحَ ما انْعَمْتَ بِهِ عَلَىَّ، وَارْزُقْنى مِنْ فَضْلِكَ رِزْقاً واسِعاً حَلالًا طَيِّباً، اللهُمَّ احْرُسْنى بِحَراسَتِكَ، وَاحْفَظْنى بِحِفْظِكَ، وَاكْلَأْنى بِكِلائَتِكَ،
items.english: and upon the sinners with the grace of Your abundance; so favor us with what You are worthy of, and be generous to us, for we are in need of Your bestowal. O All-Forgiving, by Your light we have been guided, and by Your grace we have become independent, and by Your blessing we have entered the morning and the evening. Our sins are before You; we seek Your forgiveness, O Allah, for them and we turn to You in repentance. You seek our love through blessings, while we oppose You with sins. Your goodness descends to us, and our evil ascends to You. And there has not ceased, nor does there cease, a noble angel to bring to You from us a base deed; yet that does not prevent You from encompassing us with Your blessings and favoring us with Your bounties. So glory be to You! How Forbearing You are, how Great, and how Generous, as the Originator and the Restorer. Hallowed are Your names, and exalted is Your praise, and noble are Your handiworks and Your actions. You, my Allah, are more extensive in grace and greater in forbearance than to judge me by my action and my mistake. So pardon! Pardon! Pardon! My Master, my Master, my Master! O Allah, occupy us with Your remembrance, and protect us from Your wrath, and grant us refuge from Your punishment, and provide for us from Your gifts, and bestow upon us from Your grace. And grant us the pilgrimage to Your House, and the visitation of the grave of Your Prophet—Your blessings, mercy, forgiveness, and pleasure be upon him and upon the People of his House. Indeed, You are Near, the Answerer. And grant us the success of acting in Your obedience, and take our souls while we are upon Your creed and the Sunnah of Your Prophet, may Allah bless him and his family. O Allah, forgive me and my parents and have mercy on them both just as they raised me when I was small. Reward them with goodness for their benevolence, and with forgiveness for their misdeeds. O Allah, forgive the faithful men and the faithful women, the living among them and the dead, and join us and them with good deeds. O Allah, forgive our living and our dead, our present and our absent, our male and our female, our young and our old, our free and our enslaved. Those who attribute equals to Allah have lied; they have wandered into far-off error and suffered a manifest loss. O Allah, bless Muhammad and the family of Muhammad, and end my life with goodness, and suffice me in what concerns me of the matters of my world and my hereafter. Do not give power over me to one who will not have mercy on me, and appoint over me from Yourself a lasting protection, and do not strip me of the righteous things You have bestowed upon me. And provide me from Your grace with a vast, lawful, and wholesome provision. O Allah, guard me with Your guarding, and protect me with Your protection, and watch over me with Your watchfulness.
items.transliteration: wa-'ala al-mudhnibina bi-fadli sa'atika, fa-amnun 'alayna bima anta ahluhu, wa-jud 'alayna fa-inna muhtajuna ila naylika, ya Ghaffaru bi-nurika ihtadayna, wa-bi-fadlika istaghnayna, wa-bi-ni'matika asbahna wa-amsayna, dhunubuna bayna yadayka, nastaghfiruka Allahumma minha wa-natubu ilayka, tatahabbabu ilayna bi-al-ni'ami, wa-nu'ariduka bi-al-dhunubi, khayruka ilayna nazilun, wa-sharruna ilayka sa'idun, wa-lam yazal wa-la yazalu malakun karimun ya'tika 'anna bi-'amalin qabihin, fa-la yamna'uka dhalika min an tahutana bi-ni'amika, wa-tatafaddala 'alayna bi-ala'ika, fa-subhanaka ma ahlamaka wa-a'zamaka wa-akramaka mubdi'an wa-mu'idan, taqaddasat asma'uka, wa-jalla thana'uka, wa-karuma sana'i'uka wa-fi'aluka, anta Ilahi awsa'u fadlan, wa-a'zamu hilman min an tuqayisani bi-fi'li wa-khati'ati fa-al-'afwa al-'afwa al-'afwa, Sayyidi Sayyidi Sayyidi Allahumma ishghalna bi-dhikrika, wa-a'idhna min sakhatika, wa-ajirna min 'adhabika, wa-arzuqna min mawahibika, wa-an'im 'alayna min fadlika, wa-arzuqna hajja baytika, wa-ziyarata qabri nabiyyika, salawatuka wa-rahmatuka wa-maghfiratuka wa-ridwanuka 'alayhi wa-'ala ahli baytihi, innaka qaribun mujibun, wa-arzuqna 'amalan bi-ta'atika, wa-tawaffana 'ala millatika, wa-sunnati nabiyyika salla Allahu 'alayhi wa-alihi, Allahumma ighfir li wa-li-walidayya wa-irhamhuma kama rabbayani saghiran, ijzihima bi-al-ihsani ihsanan, wa-bi-al-sayyi'ati ghufranan, Allahumma ighfir lil-mu'minina wa-al-mu'minati, al-ahya'i minhum wa-al-amwati, wa-tabi' baynana wa-baynahum bi-al-khayrati, Allahumma ighfir li-hayyina wa-mayyitina, wa-shahidina wa-gha'ibina, dhakarina wa-unthana, saghirina wa-kabirina, hurrina wa-mamlukina, kadhaba al-'adiluna bi-Allahi, wa-dallu dalalan ba'idan, wa-khasiru khusranan mubinan, Allahumma salli 'ala Muhammadin wa-ali Muhammadin, wa-ikhtim li bi-khayrin, wa-ikfini ma ahammani min amri dunyaya wa-akhirati wa-la tusallit 'alayya man la yarhamuni wa-ij'al 'alayya minka waqiyatan baqiyatan, wa-la taslubni saliha ma an'amta bihi 'alayya, wa-arzuqni min fadlika rizqan wasi'an halalan tayyiban, Allahumma uhrusni bi-harasatika, wa-ihfazni bi-hifzika, wa-ikla'ni bi-kila'atika,

مُجيبٌ، وَارْزُقْنا عَمَلًا بِطاعَتِكَ، وَتَوَفَّنا عَلى مِلَّتِكَ، وَسُنَّةِ نَبِيِّكَ صَلَّى اللَّهُ عَلَيْهِ وَآلِهِ، اللهُمَّ اغْفِرْ لى وَلِوالِدَىَّ وَارْحَمْهُما كَما رَبَّيانى صَغيراً، اجْزِهما بِالْإِحسانِ احْساناً، وَبِالسَّيِّئاتِ غُفْراناً، اللهُمَّ اغْفِرْ لِلْمُؤْمِنينَ وَالْمُؤْمِناتِ، الْأَحيآءِ مِنْهُمْ وَالْأَمواتِ، وَتابِعْ بَيْنَنا وَبَيْنَهُمْ بِالْخَيْراتِ، اللهُمَّ اغْفِرْ لِحَيِّنا وَمَيِّتِنا، وَشاهِدِنا وَغآئِبِنا، ذَكَرِنا وَانْثانا، صَغيرِنا وَكَبيرِنا، حُرِّنا وَمَمْلُوكِنا، كَذَبَ الْعادِلُونَ بِاللَّهِ، وَضَلُّوا ضَلالًا بَعيداً، وَخَسِرُوا خُسْراناً مُبيناً، اللهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلى مُحَمَّدٍ وَآلِ مُحَمَّدٍ، وَاخْتِمْ لى بِخَيْرٍ، وَاكْفِنى ما اهَمَّنى مِنْ امْرِ دُنْياىَ وَآخِرَتى وَلا تُسَلِّطْ عَلَىَّ مَنْ لا يَرْحَمُنى وَاجْعَلْ عَلَىَّ مِنْكَ واقِيَةً باقِيَةً، وَلا تَسْلُبْنى صالِحَ ما انْعَمْتَ بِهِ عَلَىَّ، وَارْزُقْنى مِنْ فَضْلِكَ رِزْقاً واسِعاً حَلالًا طَيِّباً، اللهُمَّ احْرُسْنى بِحَراسَتِكَ، وَاحْفَظْنى بِحِفْظِكَ، وَاكْلَأْنى بِكِلائَتِكَ،
items.english: and upon the sinners with the grace of Your abundance; so favor us with what You are worthy of, and be generous to us, for we are in need of Your bestowal. O All-Forgiving, by Your light we have been guided, and by Your grace we have become independent, and by Your blessing we have entered the morning and the evening. Our sins are before You; we ask for Your forgiveness for them, O Allah, and we turn to You in repentance. You endear Yourself to us with blessings, while we oppose You with sins. Your goodness descends to us, while our evil ascends to You. A noble angel has always, and still does, bring to You from us an ugly deed, yet that does not prevent You from encompassing us with Your blessings and favoring us with Your bounties. So glory be to You! How Forbearing You are, how Great, and how Generous, as the Initiator and the Restorer. Sanctified are Your Names, exalted is Your praise, and noble are Your works and Your deeds. You, my Allah, are more expansive in grace and greater in forbearance than to judge me by my action and my mistake. So pardon, pardon, pardon! My Master, my Master, my Master! O Allah, occupy us with Your remembrance, protect us from Your wrath, grant us refuge from Your punishment, provide us from Your gifts, and bestow upon us from Your grace. And grant us the pilgrimage to Your House, and the visitation of the grave of Your Prophet—may Your blessings, mercy, forgiveness, and pleasure be upon him and upon the People of his House; surely You are Near, Responsive. And grant us action in Your obedience, and cause us to die upon Your creed and the sunnah of Your Prophet, may Allah bless him and his family. O Allah, forgive me and my parents and have mercy upon them both as they raised me when I was small; reward them with goodness for their goodness, and with forgiveness for their misdeeds. O Allah, forgive the believing men and the believing women, the living among them and the dead, and join us and them in good deeds. O Allah, forgive our living and our dead, our present and our absent, our male and our female, our young and our old, our free and our enslaved. Liars are those who equate others with Allah, and they have wandered into far-reaching error and have suffered a manifest loss. O Allah, bless Muhammad and the family of Muhammad, and let my end be good, and suffice me in what concerns me of the affairs of my world and my hereafter, and do not give power over me to one who will not have mercy on me. And place over me from Yourself an enduring protection, and do not strip me of the good You have bestowed upon me, and provide me from Your grace with a vast, lawful, and wholesome sustenance. O Allah, guard me with Your guarding, protect me with Your protection, and watch over me with Your watchfulness.
items.transliteration: wa-'ala al-mudhnibina bi-fadli sa'atika, fa-amnun 'alayna bima anta ahluhu, wa-jud 'alayna fa-inna muhtajuna ila naylika, ya Ghaffaru bi-nurika ihtadayna, wa-bi-fadlika istaghnayna, wa-bi-ni'matika asbahna wa-amsayna, dhunubuna bayna yadayka, nastaghfiruka Allahumma minha wa-natubu ilayka, tatahabbabu ilayna bi-al-ni'ami, wa-nu'ariduka bi-al-dhunubi, khayruka ilayna nazilun, wa-sharruna ilayka sa'idun, wa-lam yazal wa-la yazalu malakun karimun ya'tika 'anna bi-'amalin qabihin, fa-la yamna'uka dhalika min an tahutana bi-ni'amika, wa-tatafaddala 'alayna bi-ala'ika, tuqayisani bi-fi'li wa-khati'ati fa-al-'afwa al-'afwa al-'afwa, sayyidi sayyidi sayyidi Allahumma ashghalna bi-dhikrika, wa-a'idhna min sakhatika, wa-ajirna min 'adhabika, wa-arzuqna min mawahibika, bi-al-ihsani ihsanan, wa-bi-al-sayyi'ati ghufranan, Allahumma ighfir lil-mu'minina wa-al-mu'minati, al-ahya'i minhum wa-al-amwati, wa-tabi' baynana wa-baynahum bi-al-khayrati, Allahumma ighfir li-hayyina wa-mayyitina, wa-shahidina wa-gha'ibina, dhakarina wa-unthana, saghirina wa-kabirina, hurrina wa-mamlukina, kadhaba al-'adiluna bi-Allahi, wa-dallu dalalan ba'idan, wa-khasiru khusranan mubinan, Allahumma salli 'ala Muhammadin wa-ali Muhammadin, wa-ikhtim li bi-khayrin, wa-ikfini ma ahammani min amri dunyaya wa-akhirati wa-la tusallit 'alayya man la yarhamuni wa-ij'al 'alayya minka bi-kila'atika,

items.arabic: وَارْزُقْنى حَجَّ بَيْتِكَ الْحَرامِ، فى عامِنا هذا وَفى كُلِّ عامٍ، وَزِيارَةَ قَبْرِ نَبِيِّكَ وَالْأَئِمَّةِ عَلَيْهِمُ السَّلامُ ، وَلا تُخْلِنى يا رَبِّ مِنْ تِلْكَ الْمَشاهِدِ الشَّريفَةِ، وَالْمَواقِفِ الْكَريمَةِ، اللهُمَّ تُبْ عَلَىَّ حَتّى لا اعْصِيَكَ، وَالْهِمْنِى الْخَيْرَ وَالْعَمَلَ بِهِ، وَخَشْيَتَكَ بِاللَّيْلِ وَالنَّهارِ ما ابْقَيْتَنى يا رَبَّ الْعالَمينَ، اللهُمَّ انّى كُلَّما قُلْتُ قَدْ تَهَيَّاْتُ وَتَعَبَّاْتُ، وَقُمْتُ لِلصَّلاةِ بَيْنَ يَدَيْكَ وَناجَيْتُكَ، الْقَيْتَ عَلَىَّ نُعاساً اذا انَا صَلَّيْتُ، وَسَلَبْتَنى مُناجاتَكَ اذا ا نَا ناجَيْتُ، ما لى كُلَّما قُلْتُ قَدْ صَلُحَتْ سَريرَتى وَقَرُبَ مِنْ مَجالِسِ التَّوَّابينَ مَجْلِسى عَرَضَتْ لى بَلِيَّةٌ ازالَتْ قَدَمى وَحالَتْ بَيْنى وَبَيْنَ خِدْمَتِكَ، سَيِّدى لَعَلَّكَ عَنْ بابِكَ طَرَدْتَنى وَعَنْ خِدْمَتِكَ نَحَّيْتَنى اوْ لَعَلَّكَ رَايْتَنى مُسْتَخِفّاً بِحَقِّكَ فَاقْصَيْتَنى اوْ لَعَلَّكَ رَايْتَنى مُعْرِضاً عَنْكَ فَقَلَيْتَنى اوْ لَعَلَّكَ وَجَدْتَنى فى مَقامِ الْكاذِبينَ فَرَفَضْتَنى اوْ لَعَلَّكَ رَايْتَنى غَيْرَ شاكِرٍ لِنَعْمآئِكَ فَحَرَمْتَنى اوْ لَعَلَّكَ فَقَدْتَنى مِنْ مَجالِسِ الْعُلَمآءِ فَخَذَلْتَنى اوْ لَعَلَّكَ رَايْتَنى فِى الْغافِلينَ فَمِنْ رَحْمَتِكَ آيَسْتَنى اوْ لَعَلَّكَ رَايْتَنى آلِفَ مَجالِسِ الْبَطَّالينَ فَبَيْنى وَبَيْنَهُمْ خَلَّيْتَنى اوْ لَعَلَّكَ لَمْ تُحِبَّ انْ تَسْمَعَ دُعآئى فَباعَدْتَنى اوْ لَعَلَّكَ بِجُرْمى وَجَريرَتى كافَيْتَنى اوْ لَعَلَّكَ بِقِلَّةِ حَيآئى مِنْكَ جازَيْتَنى فَانْ عَفَوْتَ يا رَبِّ، فَطالَ ما عَفَوْتَ عَنِ الْمُذْنِبينَ قَبْلى لِأَنَّ كَرَمَكَ اىْ رَبِّ يَجِلُّ عَنْ مُكافاتِ الْمُقَصِّرينَ، وَا نَا عائِذٌ بِفَضْلِكَ، هارِبٌ مِنْكَ الَيْكَ، مُتَنَجِّزٌ ما وَعَدْتَ مِنَ الصَّفْحِ عَمَّنْ احْسَنَ بِكَ ظَنّاً، الهى انْتَ اوْسَعُ فَضْلًا، وَاعْظَمُ حِلْماً مِنْ انْ تُقايِسَنى بِعَمَلى اوْ انْ تَسْتَزِلَّنى بِخَطيئَتى وَما ا نَا يا سَيِّدى وَما خَطَرى هَبْنى بِفَضْلِكَ سَيِّدى وَتَصَدَّقْ عَلَىَّ بِعَفْوِكَ، وَجَلِّلْنى بِسَتْرِكَ، وَاعْفُ عَنْ تَوْبيخى بِكَرَمِ وَجْهِكَ، سَيِّدى ا نَا الصَّغيرُ الَّذى رَبَّيْتَهُ، وَا نَا الْجاهِلُ الَّذى عَلَّمْتَهُ، وَا نَا
items.english: And grant me the pilgrimage to Your Sacred House in this year of ours and in every year, and the visitation of the grave of Your Prophet and the Imams, peace be upon them; and do not deprive me, O Lord, of those noble sanctuaries and honorable stations. O Allah, turn towards me in forgiveness so that I may not disobey You, and inspire me with goodness and the performance of it, and with Your fear during the night and the day as long as You keep me alive, O Lord of the worlds. O Allah, whenever I say, “I have prepared and readied myself, and I have stood for prayer before You and communed with You,” You cast slumber upon me when I pray, and You deprive me of Your intimate communion when I commune. What is the matter with me? Whenever I say, “My inner state has become upright and my assembly has drawn near to the assemblies of the repentant,” an affliction befalls me that causes my foot to slip and stands between me and Your service. My Master, perhaps You have driven me away from Your door and removed me from Your service; or perhaps You saw me belittling Your right, so You distanced me; or perhaps You saw me turning away from You, so You became displeased with me; or perhaps You found me in the station of the liars, so You rejected me; or perhaps You saw me ungrateful for Your blessings, so You deprived me; or perhaps You missed me from the gatherings of the scholars, so You abandoned me; or perhaps You saw me among the heedless, so You made me despair of Your mercy; or perhaps You saw me frequenting the assemblies of the idlers, so You left me to them; or perhaps You did not love to hear my prayer, so You distanced me; or perhaps You requited me for my crime and offense; or perhaps You punished me for my lack of shame before You. Yet if You forgive, O Lord, You have long forgiven the sinners before me, for Your generosity, O Lord, is too great to be compared with the requital of those who fall short. I am a seeker of refuge in Your grace, fleeing from You to You, seeking the fulfillment of what You have promised of pardon for him who thinks well of You. My Allah, You are more expansive in grace and greater in forbearance than to judge me by my deeds or to cause me to stumble because of my sin. And what am I, my Master, and what is my significance? Bestow upon me Your grace, my Master, and be charitable to me with Your pardon, and cover me with Your veil, and pardon me from Your rebuke by the generosity of Your Face. My Master, I am the little one whom You raised, and I am the ignorant one whom You taught, and I am...
items.transliteration: Wa-arzuqni hajja baytika al-harami, fi 'amina hadha wa-fi kulli 'amin, wa-ziyarata qabri nabiyyika wa-al-a'immati 'alayhimu al-salamu, wa-la tukhli-ni ya Rabbi min tilka al-mashahidi al-sharifati, wa-al-mawaqifi al-karimati, Allahumma tub 'alayya hatta la a'siyaka, wa-al-himni al-khayra wa-al-'amala bihi, wa-khashyataka bi-al-layli wa-al-nahari ma abqaytani ya Rabba al-'alamina, Allahumma inni kullama qultu qad tahayya'tu wa-ta'abba'tu, wa-qumtu li-al-salati bayna yadayka wa-najaytuka, alqayta 'alayya nu'asan idha ana sallaytu, wa-salabtani munajataka idha ana najaytu, ma li kullama qultu qad saluhat sarirati wa-qaruba min majalisi al-tawwabina majlisi 'aradat li baliyyatun azalat qadami wa-halat bayni wa-bayna khidmatika, sayyidi la'allaka 'an babika taradtani wa-'an khidmatika nahhaytani aw la'allaka ra'aytani mustakhiffan bi-haqqika fa-aqsaytani aw la'allaka ra'aytani mu'ridan 'anka fa-qalaytani aw la'allaka wajadtani fi maqami al-kadhibina fa-rafadtani aw la'allaka ra'aytani ghayra shakirin li-na'ma'ika fa-haramtani aw la'allaka faqadtani min majalisi al-'ulama'i fa-khadhaltani aw la'allaka ra'aytani fi al-ghafilina fa-min rahmatika ayastani aw la'allaka ra'aytani alifa majalisi al-battalina fa-bayni wa-baynahum khallaytani aw la'allaka lam tuhibba an tasma'a du'a'i fa-ba'adtani aw la'allaka bi-jurmi wa-jarirati kafaytani aw la'allaka bi-qillati haya'i minka jazaytani fa-in 'afawta ya Rabbi, fa-tala ma 'afawta 'an al-mudhnibina qabli li-anna karamaka ay Rabbi yajillu 'an mukafati al-muqassirina, wa-ana 'a'idhun bi-fadlika, haribun minka ilayka, mutanajjizun ma wa'adta min al-safhi 'amman ahsana bika zannan, Ilahi anta awsa'u fadlan, wa-a'zamu hilman min an tuqayisani bi-'amali aw an tastazillani bi-khati'ati wa-ma ana ya sayyidi wa-ma khatari habni bi-fadlika sayyidi wa-tasaddaq 'alayya bi-'afwika, wa-jallilni bi-sitrika, wa-'fu 'an tawbikhi bi-karami wajhika, sayyidi ana al-saghiru alladhi rabbaytahu, wa-ana al-jahilu alladhi 'allamtahu, wa-ana

وَجَريرَتى كافَيْتَنى اوْ لَعَلَّكَ بِقِلَّةِ حَيآئى مِنْكَ جازَيْتَنى فَانْ عَفَوْتَ يا رَبِّ، فَطالَ ما عَفَوْتَ عَنِ الْمُذْنِبينَ قَبْلى لِأَنَّ كَرَمَكَ اىْ رَبِّ يَجِلُّ عَنْ مُكافاتِ الْمُقَصِّرينَ، وَا نَا عائِذٌ بِفَضْلِكَ، هارِبٌ مِنْكَ الَيْكَ، مُتَنَجِّزٌ ما وَعَدْتَ مِنَ الصَّفْحِ عَمَّنْ احْسَنَ بِكَ ظَنّاً، الهى انْتَ اوْسَعُ فَضْلًا، وَاعْظَمُ حِلْماً مِنْ انْ تُقايِسَنى بِعَمَلى اوْ انْ تَسْتَزِلَّنى بِخَطيئَتى وَما ا نَا يا سَيِّدى وَما خَطَرى هَبْنى بِفَضْلِكَ سَيِّدى وَتَصَدَّقْ عَلَىَّ بِعَفْوِكَ، وَجَلِّلْنى بِسَتْرِكَ، وَاعْفُ عَنْ تَوْبيخى بِكَرَمِ وَجْهِكَ، سَيِّدى ا نَا الصَّغيرُ الَّذى رَبَّيْتَهُ، وَا نَا الْجاهِلُ الَّذى عَلَّمْتَهُ، وَا نَا
items.english:
And grant me the pilgrimage to Your Sacred House in this year of ours and in every year, and the visitation of the grave of Your Prophet and the Imams, peace be upon them; and do not deprive me, O Lord, of those noble sanctuaries and honorable stations. O Allah, turn towards me in forgiveness so that I may not disobey You, and inspire me with goodness and the performance of it, and with Your fear during the night and the day as long as You keep me alive, O Lord of the worlds. 

O Allah, whenever I say, "I have prepared and readied myself, and stood for prayer before You and communed with You," You cast slumber upon me when I pray, and You deprive me of Your communion when I commune with You. What is the matter with me that whenever I say, "My inner self has become righteous and my gathering has drawn near to the gatherings of the repentant," an affliction befalls me that causes my foot to slip and stands between me and Your service? 

My Master, perhaps You have expelled me from Your door and removed me from Your service? Or perhaps You saw me making light of Your rights, so You distanced me? Or perhaps You saw me turning away from You, so You loathed me? Or perhaps You found me in the station of the liars, so You rejected me? Or perhaps You saw me ungrateful for Your favors, so You deprived me? Or perhaps You missed me from the gatherings of the scholars, so You abandoned me? Or perhaps You saw me among the heedless, so You made me despair of Your mercy? Or perhaps You saw me frequenting the gatherings of the idlers, so You left me to them? Or perhaps You did not love to hear my prayer, so You distanced me? Or perhaps You have requited me for my crime and my offense? Or perhaps You have punished me for my lack of shame before You? 

So if You forgive, O Lord, for long have You forgiven the sinners before me; because Your generosity, O my Lord, is far too exalted to be measured against the punishment of the negligent. And I am seeking refuge in Your grace, fleeing from You to You, seeking the fulfillment of what You have promised of pardon for those who have a good opinion of You. My Allah, You are more expansive in grace and greater in forbearance than to measure me by my deeds or to cause me to stumble by my sin. And who am I, O my Master, and what is my significance? Grant me [forgiveness] by Your grace, O my Master, and bestow upon me Your pardon, and cover me with Your veil, and overlook my being rebuked by the generosity of Your Countenance. My Master, I am the little one whom You have raised; I am the ignorant one whom You have taught; and I am...
items.transliteration: Wa-arzuqni hajja baytika al-harami, fi 'amina hadha wa-fi kulli 'amin, wa-ziyarata qabri nabiyyika wa-al-a'immati 'alayhimu al-salamu, wa-la tukhli-ni ya Rabbi min tilka al-mashahidi al-sharifati, wa-al-mawaqifi al-karimati, Allahumma tub 'alayya hatta la a'siyaka, wa-alhimni al-khayra wa-al-'amala bihi, wa-khashyataka bi-al-layli wa-al-nahari ma abqaytani ya Rabba al-'alamina, Allahumma inni kullama qultu qad tahayya'tu wa-ta'abba'tu, wa-qumtu li-al-salati bayna yadayka wa-najaytuka, alqayta 'alayya nu'asan idha ana sallaytu, wa-salabtani munajataka idha ana najaytu, ma li kullama qultu qad saluhat sarirati wa-qaruba min majalisi al-tawwabina majlisi 'aradat li baliyyatun azalat qadami wa-halat bayni wa-bayna khidmatika, Sayyidi la'allaka 'an babika taradtani wa-'an khidmatika nahhaytani aw la'allaka ra'aytani mustakhiffan bi-haqqika fa-aqsaytani aw la'allaka ra'aytani mu'ridan 'anka fa-qalaytani aw la'allaka wajadtani fi maqami al-kadhibina ayastani aw la'allaka ra'aytani alifa majalisi al-battalina fa-bayni wa-baynahum khallaytani aw la'allaka lam tuhibba an tasma'a du'a'i fa-ba'adtani aw la'allaka bi-jurmi wa-jarirati kafaytani aw items.arabic: الضَّآلُّ الَّذى هَدَيْتَهُ، وَا نَا الْوَضيعُ الَّذى رَفَعْتَهُ، وَا نَا الْخآئِفُ الَّذى آمَنْتَهُ، وَالْجائِعُ الَّذى اشْبَعْتَهُ، وَالْعَطْشانُ الَّذى ارْوَيْتَهُ، وَالْعارِى الَّذى كَسَوْتَهُ، وَالْفَقيرُ الَّذى اغْنَيْتَهُ، وَالضَّعيفُ الَّذى قَوَّيْتَهُ، وَالذَّليلُ الَّذى اعْزَزْتَهُ، وَالسَّقيمُ الَّذى شَفَيْتَهُ، وَالسَّآئِلُ الَّذى اعْطَيْتَهُ، وَالْمُذْنِبُ الَّذى سَتَرْتَهُ، وَالْخاطِئُ الَّذى اقَلْتَهُ، وَا نَا الْقَليلُ الَّذى كَثَّرْتَهُ، وَالْمُسْتَضْعَفُ الَّذى نَصَرْتَهُ، وَا نَا الطَّريدُ الَّذى آوَيْتَهُ، ا نَا يارَبِّ الَّذى لَمْ اسْتَحْيِكَ فِى الْخَلاءِ، وَلَمْ اراقِبْكَ فِى الْمَلاءِ، ا نَا صاحِبُ الدَّواهِى الْعُظْمى ا نَا الَّذى عَلى سَيِّدِهِ اجْتَرى ا نَا الَّذى عَصَيْتُ جَبَّارَ السَّمآءِ، ا نَا الَّذى اعْطَيْتُ عَلى مَعاصِى الْجَليلِ الرُّشا، ا نَا الَّذى حينَ بُشِّرْتُ بِها خَرَجْتُ الَيْها اسْعى، ا نَا الَّذى امْهَلْتَنى فَمَا ارْعَوَيْتُ، وَسَتَرْتَ عَلىَّ فَمَا اسْتَحْيَيْتُ، وَعَمِلْتُ بِالْمَعاصى فَتَعَدَّيْتُ، وَاسْقَطْتَنى مِنْ عَيْنِكَ فَما بالَيْتُ، فَبِحِلْمِكَ امْهَلْتَنى وَبِسَتْرِكَ سَتَرْتَنى حَتَّى كَانَّكَ اغْفَلْتَنى وَمِنْ عُقُوباتِ الْمَعاصى جَنَّبْتَنى حَتَّى كَانَّكَ اسْتَحْيَيْتَنى الهى لَمْ اعْصِكَ حينَ عَصَيْتُكَ وَا نَا بِرُبُوبِيَّتِكَ جاحِدٌ، وَلا بِامْرِكَ مُسْتَخِفٌّ، وَلا لِعُقُوبَتِكَ مُتَعَرِّضٌ، وَلا لِوَعيدِكَ مُتَهاوِنٌ، لكِنْ خَطيئَةٌ عَرَضَتْ وَسَوَّلَتْ لى نَفْسى وَغَلَبَنى هَواىَ، وَاعانَنى عَلَيْها شِقْوَتى وَغَرَّنى سَتْرُكَ الْمُرْخى عَلَىَّ، فَقَدْ عَصَيْتُكَ وَخالَفْتُكَ بِجُهْدى فَالْانَ مِنْ عَذابِكَ مَنْ يَسْتَنْقِذُنى وَمِنْ ايْدِى الْخُصَمآءِ غَداً مَنْ يُخَلِّصُنى وَبِحَبْلِ مَنْ اتَّصِلُ انْ انْتَ قَطَعْتَ حَبْلَكَ عَنّى فَواسَوْاتا عَلى ما احْصى كِتابُكَ مِنْ عَمَلى الَّذى لَوْلا ما ارْجُو مِنْ كَرَمِكَ وَسَعَةِ رَحْمَتِكَ، وَنَهْيِكَ ايَّاىَ عَنِ الْقُنُوطِ، لَقَنَطْتُ عِنْدَما اتَذَكَّرُها، يا خَيْرَ مَنْ دَعاهُ داعٍ، وَافْضَلَ مَنْ رَجاهُ راجٍ، اللهُمَّ بِذِمَّةِ الْإِسْلامِ اتَوَسَّلُ الَيْكَ، وَبِحُرْمَةِ الْقُرْآنِ اعْتَمِدُ الَيْكَ، وَبِحُبِّى النَّبِىَّ الْأُمِّىَّ الْقُرَشِىَّ الْهاشِمِىَّ الْعَرَبِىَّ التِّهامِىَّ الْمَكِّىَّ الْمَدَنِىَّ، ارْجُو الزُّلْفَةَ لَدَيْكَ، فَلا تُوحِشِ
items.english: The straying one whom You guided; and I am the lowly one whom You elevated; and I am the fearful one whom You gave security; and the hungry one whom You satiated; and the thirsty one whose thirst You quenched; and the naked one whom You clothed; and the poor one whom You enriched; and the weak one whom You strengthened; and the abased one whom You granted honor; and the sick one whom You healed; and the petitioner whom You gave; and the sinner whom You covered; and the wrongdoer whom You pardoned; and I am the few whom You multiplied; and the oppressed one whom You helped; and I am the outcast whom You sheltered. I am the one, O Lord, who did not feel ashamed before You in private, and did not mind You in public. I am the perpetrator of great calamities; I am the one who was audacious toward his Master; I am the one who disobeyed the Compeller of the Heavens; I am the one who gave bribes for committing sins against the Majestic; I am the one who, when given news of them, went forth towards them in haste. I am the one whom You gave respite, yet I did not desist; and You covered for me, yet I was not ashamed; and I committed sins and transgressed; and You dropped me from Your sight, yet I did not care. So by Your forbearance You gave me respite, and by Your covering You shielded me, until it was as if You had overlooked me; and You spared me from the punishments of sins, until it was as if You were ashamed of me. My Allah, I did not disobey You when I disobeyed You while denying Your Lordship, nor out of disregard for Your command, nor seeking to encounter Your punishment, nor belittling Your threat. But it was a mistake that occurred, and my soul enticed me, and my desire overcame me, and my wretchedness assisted me in it, and Your covering let down upon me deceived me. Thus I have disobeyed You and opposed You with my effort. So now, who can rescue me from Your punishment? And from the hands of the adversaries tomorrow, who will deliver me? And to whose rope shall I cling if You cut off Your rope from me? Oh, woe for my shame over what Your book has recorded of my deeds—which, were it not for what I hope from Your generosity and the vastness of Your mercy, and Your forbidding me from despair, I would have despaired whenever I remember them. O Best of those whom a caller calls, and most Excellent of those in whom a hoper hopes! O Allah, by the covenant of Islam, I seek mediation with You; and by the sanctity of the Quran, I rely upon You; and by my love for the unlettered Prophet, the Qurayshite, the Hashimite, the Arabian, the Tihamite, the Meccan, and the Medinan, I hope for proximity to You. So do not cause me to feel desolate...
items.transliteration: Al-dallu alladhi hadaytahu, wa-ana al-wadi'u alladhi rafa'tahu, wa-ana al-kha'ifu alladhi amantahu, wa-al-ja'i'u alladhi ashba'tahu, wa-al-'atshanu alladhi arwaytahu, wa-al-'ari alladhi kasawtahu, wa-al-faqiru alladhi aghnaytahu, wa-al-da'ifu alladhi qawwaytahu, wa-al-dhalilu alladhi a'zaztahu, wa-al-saqimu alladhi shafaytahu, wa-al-sa'ilu alladhi a'taytahu, wa-al-mudhnibu alladhi satartahu, wa-al-khati'u alladhi aqaltahu, wa-ana al-qalilu alladhi kaththartahu, wa-al-mustad'afu alladhi nasartahu, wa-ana al-taridu alladhi awaytahu, ana ya Rabbi alladhi lam astahyika fi al-khala'i, wa-lam araqibka fi al-mala'i, ana sahibu al-dawahi al-'uzma, ana alladhi 'ala sayyidihi ajtara, ana alladhi 'asaytu jabbara al-sama'i, ana alladhi a'taytu 'ala ma'asi al-jalili al-rusha, ana alladhi hina bushshirtu biha kharajtu ilayha as'a, ana alladhi amhaltani fa-ma ar'awaytu, wa-satarta 'alayya fa-ma astahyaytu, wa-'amiltu bi-al-ma'asi fa-ta'addaytu, wa-asqattani min 'aynika fa-ma balaytu, fa-bi-hilmika amhaltani wa-bi-satrika satartani hatta ka'annaka aghfaltani wa-min 'uqubati al-ma'asi jannabtani hatta ka'annaka astahyaytani. Ilahi lam a'sika hina 'asaytuka wa-ana bi-rububiyyatika jahidun, wa-la bi-amrika mustakhiffun, wa-la li-'uqubatika muta'arridun, wa-la li-wa'idika mutahawinun, lakin khati'atun 'aradat wa-sawwalat li nafsi wa-ghalabani hawaya, wa-a'anani 'alayha shiqwati wa-gharrani satruka al-murkha 'alayya, fa-qad 'asaytuka wa-khalaftuka bi-juhdi, fa-al-ana min 'adhabika man yastanqidhu-ni wa-min aydi al-khusama'i ghadan man yukhallisu-ni wa-bi-habli man attasilu in anta qata'ta hablaka 'anni, fa-wa-saw'ata 'ala ma ahsa kitabuka min 'amali alladhi lawla ma arju min karamika wa-sa'ati rahmatika, wa-nahyika iyyaya 'an al-qunuti, la-qanattu 'indama atadhakkaruha, ya khayra man da'ahu da'in, wa-afdala man rajahu rajin. Allahumma bi-dhimmati al-islami atawassalu ilayka, wa-bi-hurmati al-Qur'ani a'tamidu ilayka, wa-bi-hubbi al-nabiyya al-ummiyya al-qurashiyya al-hashimiyya al-'arabiyya al-tihamiyya al-makkiyya al-madaniyya, arju al-zulfata ladayka, fa-la tuhish.

وَاعانَنى عَلَيْها شِقْوَتى وَغَرَّنى سَتْرُكَ الْمُرْخى عَلَىَّ، فَقَدْ عَصَيْتُكَ وَخالَفْتُكَ بِجُهْدى فَالْانَ مِنْ عَذابِكَ مَنْ يَسْتَنْقِذُنى وَمِنْ ايْدِى الْخُصَمآءِ غَداً مَنْ يُخَلِّصُنى وَبِحَبْلِ مَنْ اتَّصِلُ انْ انْتَ قَطَعْتَ حَبْلَكَ عَنّى فَواسَوْاتا عَلى ما احْصى كِتابُكَ مِنْ عَمَلى الَّذى لَوْلا ما ارْجُو مِنْ كَرَمِكَ وَسَعَةِ رَحْمَتِكَ، وَنَهْيِكَ ايَّاىَ عَنِ الْقُنُوطِ، لَقَنَطْتُ عِنْدَما اتَذَكَّرُها، يا خَيْرَ مَنْ دَعاهُ داعٍ، وَافْضَلَ مَنْ رَجاهُ راجٍ، اللهُمَّ بِذِمَّةِ الْإِسْلامِ اتَوَسَّلُ الَيْكَ، وَبِحُرْمَةِ الْقُرْآنِ اعْتَمِدُ الَيْكَ، وَبِحُبِّى النَّبِىَّ الْأُمِّىَّ الْقُرَشِىَّ الْهاشِمِىَّ الْعَرَبِىَّ التِّهامِىَّ الْمَكِّىَّ الْمَدَنِىَّ، ارْجُو الزُّلْفَةَ لَدَيْكَ، فَلا تُوحِشِ
items.english: The straying one whom You guided; and I am the lowly one whom You elevated; and I am the fearful one whom You gave security; and the hungry one whom You satiated; and the thirsty one whose thirst You quenched; and the naked one whom You clothed; and the poor one whom You enriched; and the weak one whom You strengthened; and the abased one whom You granted honor; and the sick one whom You healed; and the requester whom You gave; and the sinner whose sins You concealed; and the wrongdoer whom You excused; and I am the few whom You made many; and the oppressed one whom You supported; and I am the outcast to whom You gave shelter. I am the one, O Lord, who did not feel shame before You in private, and did not mind You in public. I am the committer of great calamities; I am the one who was audacious toward his Master; I am the one who disobeyed the Compeller of the Heavens. I am the one who gave bribes for the sake of disobeying the Majestic; I am the one who, when given tidings of it, went toward it in haste. I am the one to whom You gave respite, yet I did not refrain; and You concealed for me, yet I did not feel ashamed; and I committed sins until I transgressed. You dropped me from Your sight, yet I did not care. So by Your forbearance You gave me respite, and by Your concealment You covered me, until it was as if You were heedless of me, and You kept me away from the punishments of sins until it was as if You were ashamed of me. My Allah, I did not disobey You when I disobeyed You while denying Your Lordship, nor while belittling Your command, nor while seeking Your punishment, nor while disregarding Your threat; but it was a mistake that occurred, and my soul enticed me, and my desire overcame me, and my wretchedness aided me in it, and Your veil drawn over me deluded me. I have disobeyed You and opposed You by my effort; so now, who can rescue me from Your punishment? And from the hands of the adversaries tomorrow, who can save me? And to whose rope shall I cling if You cut Your rope off from me? Oh, how shameful are my deeds which Your Book has recorded! Had it not been for what I hope from Your generosity and the vastness of Your mercy, and Your forbidding me from despair, I would have despaired whenever I remember them. O Best of those whom a caller calls, and most Excellent of those in whom a hoper hopes! O Allah, by the covenant of Islam I seek mediation with You; and by the sanctity of the Qur’an I rely upon You; and by my love for the Unlettered Prophet, the Qurayshite, the Hashimite, the Arabian, the Tihamite, the Meccan, the Medinan, I hope for proximity to You; so do not cause desolation...
items.transliteration: Al-dallu alladhi hadaytahu, wa-ana al-wadi'u alladhi rafa'tahu, wa-ana al-kha'ifu alladhi amantahu, wa-al-ja'i'u alladhi ashba'tahu, wa-al-'atshanu alladhi arwaytahu, wa-al-'ari alladhi kasawtahu, wa-al-faqiru alladhi aghnaytahu, wa-al-da'ifu alladhi qawwaytahu, wa-al-dhalilu alladhi a'zaztahu, wa-al-saqimu alladhi shafaytahu, wa-al-sa'ilu alladhi a'taytahu, wa-al-mudhnibu alladhi satartahu, wa-al-khati'u alladhi aqaltahu, wa-ana al-qalilu alladhi kaththartahu, wa-al-mustad'afu alladhi nasartahu, wa-ana al-taridu alladhi awaytahu, ana ya Rabbi alladhi lam astahyika fi al-khala'i, wa-lam uraqibka fi al-mala'i, ana sahibu al-dawahi al-'uzma, ana alladhi 'ala sayyidihi ajtara, ana alladhi 'asaytu jabbara al-sama'i, ana alladhi a'taytu 'ala ma'asi al-jalili al-rusha, ana alladhi hina bushshirtu biha kharajtu ilayha as'a, ana alladhi amhaltani fa-ma ir'awaytu, wa-satarta 'alayya fa-ma astahyaytu, wa-'amiltu bi-al-ma'asi fa-ta'addaytu, wa-asqattani min 'aynika fa-ma balaytu, fa-bi-hilmika amhaltani wa-bi-sitrika satartani hatta ka-annaka aghfaltani wa-min 'uqubati al-ma'asi jannabtani hatta ka-annaka astahyaytani. Ilahi lam a'sika hina 'asaytuka wa-ana bi-rububiyyatika jahidun, wa-la bi-amrika mustakhiffun, wa-la li-'uqubatika muta'arridun, wa-la li-wa'idika mutahawinun, lakin khati'atun 'aradat wa-sawwalat li nafsi wa-ghalabani hawaya, wa-a'anani 'alayha shiqwati wa-gharrani sitruka al-murkha 'alayya, fa-qad 'asaytuka wa-khalaftuka bi-juhdi, fa-al-ana min 'adhabika man yastanqidhuni wa-min aydi al-khusama'i ghadan man yukhallisuni wa-bi-habli man attasilu in anta qata'ta hablaka 'anni fa-wa-saw'ata 'ala ma ahsa kitabuka min 'amali alladhi lawla ma arju min karamika wa-sa'ati rahmatika, wa-nahyika iyyaya 'an al-qunuti, la-qanattu 'indama atadhakkaruha, ya khayra man da'ahu da'in, wa-afdala man rajahu rajin, Allahumma bi-dhimmati al-islami atawassalu ilayka, wa-bi-hurmati al-qur'ani a'tamidu ilayka, wa-bi-hubbi al-nabiyya al-ummiyya al-qurashiyya al-hashimiyya al-'arabiyya al-tihamiyya al-makkiyya al-madaniyya, arju al-zulfata ladayka, fa-la tuhishi

items.arabic: اسْتيناسَ ايمانى وَلا تَجْعَلْ ثَوابى ثَوابَ مَنْ عَبَدَ سِواكَ، فَانَّ قَوْماً آمَنوُا بِالْسِنَتِهِمْ، لِيَحْقِنُوا بِهِ دِمآئَهُمْ، فَادْرَكُوا ما امَّلُوا، وَانَّا آمَنَّا بِكَ بِالْسِنَتِنا وَقُلُوبِنا لِتَعْفُوَ عَنَّا، فَادْرِكْنا ما امَّلْنا، وَثَبِّتْ رَجائَكَ فى صُدُورِنا، وَلا تُزِغْ قُلُوبَنا بَعْدَ اذْ هَدَيْتَنا، وَهَبْ لَنا مِنْ لَدُنْكَ رَحْمَةً، انَّكَ انْتَ الْوَهَّابُ، فَوَعِزَّتِكَ لَوِ انْتَهَرْتَنى ما بَرِحْتُ مِنْ بابِكَ، وَلا كَفَفْتُ عَنْ تَمَلُّقِكَ، لِما الْهِمَ قَلْبى مِنَ الْمَعْرِفَةِ بِكَرَمِكَ، وَسَعَةِ رَحْمَتِكَ، الى مَنْ يَذْهَبُ الْعَبْدُ الَّا الى مَوْلاهُ، وَالى مَنْ يَلْتَجِئُ الْمَخْلُوقُ الَّا الى خالِقِهِ، الهى لَوْ قَرَنْتَنى بِالْأَصْفادِ، وَمَنَعْتَنى سَيْبَكَ مِنْ بَيْنِ الْأَشْهادِ، وَدَلَلْتَ عَلى فَضايِحى عُيُونَ الْعِبادِ، وَامَرْتَ بى الَى النَّارِ، وَحُلْتَ بَيْنى وَبَيْنَ الْأَبْرارِ، ما قَطَعْتُ رَجآئى مِنْكَ، وَما صَرَفْتُ تَاْميلى لِلْعَفْوِ عَنْكَ، وَلا خَرَجَ حُبُّكَ مِنْ قَلْبى ا نَا لا انْسى ايادِيَكَ عِنْدى وَسَتْرَكَ عَلَىَّ فى دارِ الدُّنْيا، سَيِّدى اخْرِجْ حُبَّ الدُّنْيا مِنْ قَلْبى وَاجْمَعْ بَيْنى وَبَيْنَ الْمُصْطَفى وَآلِهِ خِيَرَتِكَ مِنْ خَلْقِكَ، وَخاتَمِ النَّبِيّينَ مُحَمَّدٍ صَلَّى اللَّهُ عَلَيْهِ وَآلِهِ، وَانْقُلْنى الى دَرَجَةِ التَّوْبَةِ الَيْكَ، وَاعِنّى بِالْبُكآءِ عَلى نَفْسى فَقَدْ افْنَيْتُ بِالتَّسْويفِ وَالْأمالِ عُمْرى وَقَدْ نَزَلْتُ مَنْزِلَةَ الْأيِسينَ مِنْ خَيْرى فَمَنْ يَكُونُ اسْوَءَ حالًا مِنّى انْ ا نَا نُقِلْتُ عَلى مِثْلِ حالى الى قَبْرى لَمْ امَهِّدْهُ لِرَقْدَتى وَلَمْ افْرُشْهُ بِالْعَمَلِ الصَّالِحِ لِضَجْعَتى وَمالى لا ابْكى وَلا ادْرى الى ما يَكُونُ مَصيرى وَارى نَفْسى تُخادِعُنى وَايَّامى تُخاتِلُنى وَقَدْ خَفَقَتْ عِنْدَ رَاْسى اجْنِحَةُ الْمَوْتِ، فَمالى لا ابْكى ابْكى لِخُرُوجِ نَفْسى ابْكى لِظُلْمَةِ قَبْرى ابْكى لِضيقِ لَحَدى ابْكى لِسُؤالِ مُنْكَرٍ وَنَكيرٍ ايَّاىَ، ابْكى لِخُرُوجى مِنْ قَبْرى عُرْياناً ذَليلًا، حامِلًا ثِقْلى عَلى ظَهْرى انْظُرُ مَرَّةً عَنْ يَمينى وَاخْرى عَنْ شِمالى اذِ الْخَلائِقُ فى شَاْنٍ غَيْرِ شَاْنى لِكُلِّ امْرِئٍ مِنْهُمْ يَوْمَئِذٍ شَاْنٌ يُغْنيهِ، وُجُوهٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ مُسْفِرَةٌ، ضاحِكَةٌ مُسْتَبْشِرَةٌ، وَوُجُوهٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ عَلَيْها غَبَرَةٌ، تَرْهَقُها
items.english: the intimacy of my faith, and do not make my reward like the reward of one who worshipped other than You. For indeed, a people believed with their tongues so that they might protect their blood, and they attained what they hoped for. But we have believed in You with our tongues and our hearts so that You may pardon us; so let us attain what we hope for. And establish Your hope in our chests, and do not let our hearts swerve after You have guided us, and grant us mercy from Your presence; indeed, You are the All-Bestower. By Your might, if You were to repel me, I would not leave Your door, nor would I cease my entreaties to You, because of the knowledge of Your generosity and the vastness of Your mercy that has been inspired in my heart. To whom else can a servant go but to his Master? And to whom can a creature seek refuge but in his Creator? My Allah, even if You were to bind me with chains, and deprive me of Your bounty in the presence of witnesses, and point out my scandals to the eyes of Your servants, and order me to the Fire, and separate me from the righteous, I would not sever my hope from You, nor would I turn away my aspiration for Your pardon, nor would Your love leave my heart. I do not forget Your favors towards me and Your concealment of my faults in this world. My Master, remove the love of the world from my heart, and unite me with al-Mustafa and his family, the best of Your creation and the Seal of the Prophets, Muhammad, peace be upon him and his family. And elevate me to the degree of repentance towards You, and assist me in weeping for myself, for I have exhausted my life in procrastination and false hopes, and I have descended to the level of those who are despondent of their own goodness. For who would be in a worse state than me if I were transferred to my grave in such a condition, not having prepared it for my sleep, nor having furnished it with righteous deeds for my resting? Why then should I not weep, when I do not know what will be my fate? And I see my soul deceiving me, and my days betraying me, while the wings of death already flutter over my head. Why then should I not weep? I weep for the departure of my soul; I weep for the darkness of my grave; I weep for the narrowness of my tomb; I weep for the questioning of Munkar and Nakir. I weep for my emergence from my grave, naked and humiliated, carrying my burden upon my back, looking once to my right and once to my left, while the creatures are occupied with affairs other than mine. “Every person among them that day will have an affair to preoccupy him.” Some faces that day will be radiant, laughing and rejoicing; and other faces that day will be covered in dust, overwhelmed by...
items.transliteration: istinasa imani wa-la taj'al thawabi thawaba man 'abada siwaka, fa-inna qawman amanu bi-alsinatihim, li-yahqinu bihi dima'ahum, fa-adraku ma ammalu, wa-inna amanna bika bi-alsinatina wa-qulubina li-ta'fuwa 'anna, fa-adrikna ma ammalna, wa-thabbit raja'aka fi sudurina, wa-la tuzigh qulubana ba'da idh hadaytana, wa-hab lana min ladunka rahmatan, innaka anta al-Wahhabu, fa-wa-'izzatika law intahartani ma barihtu min babika, wa-la kafaftu 'an tamalluqika, lima ulhima qalbi mina al-ma'rifati bi-karamika, wa-sa'ati rahmatika, ila man yadhhabu al-'abdu illa ila mawlahu, wa-ila man yaltaji'u al-makhluqu illa ila khaliqihi, Ilahi law qarantani bi-al-asfadi, wa-mana'tani saybaka min bayni al-ash-hadi, wa-dalalta 'ala fadayihi 'uyuna al-'ibadi, wa-amarta bi ila al-nari, wa-hulta bayni wa-bayna al-abrari, ma qata'tu raja'i minka, wa-ma saraftu ta'mili lil-'afwi 'anka, wa-la kharaja hubbuka min qalbi ana la ansa iyadiyaka 'indi wa-satraka 'alayya fi dari al-dunya, Sayyidi akhrij hubba al-dunya min qalbi wa-ajma' bayni wa-bayna al-Mustafa wa-alihi khiyaratika min khalqika, wa-khatami al-nabiyyina Muhammadin salla Allahu 'alayhi wa-alihi, wa-anqulni ila darajati al-tawbati ilayka, wa-a'inni bi-al-buka'i 'ala nafsi faqad afnaytu bi-al-taswifi wa-al-amali 'umri wa-qad nazaltu manzilata al-ayisina min khayri fa-man yakunu aswa'a halan minni in ana nuqiltu 'ala mithli hali ila qabri lam umahhid-hu li-raqdati wa-lam afrush-hu bi-al-'amali al-salihi li-daj'ati wa-ma li la abki wa-la adri ila ma yakunu masiri wa-ara nafsi tukhadi'uni wa-ayyami tukhatiluni wa-qad khafaqat 'inda ra'si ajnihatu al-mawti, fa-ma li la abki, abki li-khuruji nafsi, abki li-zulmati qabri, abki li-diqi lahadi, abki li-su'ali Munkarin wa-Nakirin iyyaya, abki li-khuruji min qabri 'uryanan dhalilan, hamilan thiqli 'ala zahri anzuru marratan 'an yamini wa-ukhra 'an shimali idhi al-khala'iqu fi sha'nin ghayri sha'ni li-kulli imri'in minhum yawma'idhin sha'nun yughnihi, wujuhun yawma'idhin musfiratun, dahikatun mustabshiratun, wa-wujuhun yawma'idhin 'alayha ghabaratun, tarhaquha

الْأيِسينَ مِنْ خَيْرى فَمَنْ يَكُونُ اسْوَءَ حالًا مِنّى انْ ا نَا نُقِلْتُ عَلى مِثْلِ حالى الى قَبْرى لَمْ امَهِّدْهُ لِرَقْدَتى وَلَمْ افْرُشْهُ بِالْعَمَلِ الصَّالِحِ لِضَجْعَتى وَمالى لا ابْكى وَلا ادْرى الى ما يَكُونُ مَصيرى وَارى نَفْسى تُخادِعُنى وَايَّامى تُخاتِلُنى وَقَدْ خَفَقَتْ عِنْدَ رَاْسى اجْنِحَةُ الْمَوْتِ، فَمالى لا ابْكى ابْكى لِخُرُوجِ نَفْسى ابْكى لِظُلْمَةِ قَبْرى ابْكى لِضيقِ لَحَدى ابْكى لِسُؤالِ مُنْكَرٍ وَنَكيرٍ ايَّاىَ، ابْكى لِخُرُوجى مِنْ قَبْرى عُرْياناً ذَليلًا، حامِلًا ثِقْلى عَلى ظَهْرى انْظُرُ مَرَّةً عَنْ يَمينى وَاخْرى عَنْ شِمالى اذِ الْخَلائِقُ فى شَاْنٍ غَيْرِ شَاْنى لِكُلِّ امْرِئٍ مِنْهُمْ يَوْمَئِذٍ شَاْنٌ يُغْنيهِ، وُجُوهٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ مُسْفِرَةٌ، ضاحِكَةٌ مُسْتَبْشِرَةٌ، وَوُجُوهٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ عَلَيْها غَبَرَةٌ، تَرْهَقُها
items.english: the intimacy of my faith, and do not make my reward like the reward of one who worshipped other than You. For indeed, a people believed with their tongues so that they might protect their blood, and they attained what they hoped for. But we have believed in You with our tongues and our hearts so that You may forgive us; so let us attain what we have hoped for, and firmly establish hope in You within our breasts. Do not let our hearts deviate after You have guided us, and grant us mercy from Yourself; surely You are the Bestower. By Your Might, if You were to rebuff me, I would not depart from Your door, nor would I cease my flattering supplications to You, because of the knowledge of Your generosity and the vastness of Your mercy that has been inspired in my heart. To whom does the servant go except to his Master? And to whom does the creature seek refuge except to his Creator? My Allah, if You were to bind me in chains, and withhold Your bounty from me in the presence of witnesses, and point out my scandals to the eyes of the servants, and order me to the Fire, and separate me from the righteous, I would not cut off my hope in You, nor would I turn away my expectation of Your forgiveness, nor would Your love leave my heart. I do not forget Your favors upon me and Your concealment of my faults over me in the house of this world. My Master, remove the love of the world from my heart, and gather me with the Chosen One and his family, the best of Your creation and the Seal of the Prophets, Muhammad, peace of Allah be upon him and his family. And transfer me to the degree of repentance to You, and help me by weeping over myself, for I have exhausted my life with procrastination and false hopes, and I have descended to the level of those who are despondent of their own goodness. Who then is in a worse state than me if I am transferred to my grave in such a condition, not having prepared it for my sleep, nor having furnished it with righteous deeds for my rest? Why should I not weep when I do not know what my destination will be? I see my soul deceiving me, and my days tricking me, while the wings of death have flapped over my head. Why then should I not weep? I weep for the departure of my soul; I weep for the darkness of my grave; I weep for the narrowness of my burial niche; I weep for the questioning of Munkar and Nakir of me; I weep for my emergence from my grave naked and humiliated, carrying my burden upon my back, looking once to my right and once to my left, while the creatures are in a state other than mine. “Every person among them on that day will have a concern enough for him. Faces on that day will be radiant, laughing, rejoicing; and faces on that day will be covered with dust, overspread with darkness.”
items.transliteration: Istinasa imani wa-la taj'al thawabi thawaba man 'abada siwaka, fa-inna qawman amanu bi-alsinatihim, li-yahqinu bihi dima'ahum, fa-adraku ma ammalu, wa-inna amanna bika bi-alsinatina wa-qulubina li-ta'fuwa 'anna, fa-adrikna ma ammalna, wa-thabbit raja'aka fi sudurina, wa-la tuzigh qulubana ba'da idh hadaytana, wa-hab lana min ladunka rahmatan, innaka anta al-Wahhabu, fa-wa-'izzatika law intahartani ma barihtu min babika, wa-la kafaftu 'an tamalluqika, lima ulhima qalbi mina al-ma'rifati bi-karamika, wa-sa'ati rahmatika, ila man yadhhabu al-'abdu illa ila mawlahu, wa-ila man yaltaji'u al-makhluqu illa ila khaliqihi, Ilahi law qarantani bi-al-asfadi, wa-mana'tani saybaka min bayni al-ashhadi, wa-dalalta 'ala fadayihi 'uyuna al-'ibadi, wa-amarta bi ila al-nari, wa-hulta bayni wa-bayna al-abrari, ma qata'tu raja'i minka, wa-ma saraftu ta'mili lil-'afwi 'anka, wa-la kharaja hubbuka min qalbi ana la ansa iyadiyaka 'indi wa-satraka 'alayya fi dari al-dunya, sayyidi akhrij hubba al-dunya min qalbi wa-ajma' bayni wa-bayna al-Mustafa wa-alihi khiyaratika min khalqika, wa-khatami al-nabiyyina Muhammadin salla Allahu 'alayhi wa-alihi, wa-anqulni ila darajati al-tawbati ilayka, wa-a'inni bi-al-buka'i 'ala nafsi faqad afnaytu bi-al-taswifi wa-al-amali 'umri wa-qad nazaltu manzilata al-ayisina min khayri fa-man yakunu aswa'a halan minni in ana nuqiltu 'ala mithli hali ila qabri lam umahhid-hu li-raqdati wa-lam afrush-hu bi-al-'amali al-salihi li-daj'ati wa-mali la abki wa-la adri ila ma yakunu masiri wa-ara nafsi tukhad-i'uni wa-ayyami tukhatiluni wa-qad khafaqat 'inda ra'si ajnihatu al-mawti, fa-mali la abki abki li-khuruji nafsi abki li-ظُلْمَةِ (dhulmati) qabri abki li-diqi lahadi abki li-su'ali Munkarin wa-Nakirin iyyaya, abki li-khuruji min qabri 'uryanan dhalilan, hamilan thiqli 'ala dhahri anzuru marratan 'an yamini wa-ukhra 'an shimali idhi al-khala'iqu fi sha'nin ghayri sha'ni li-kulli imri'in minhum yawma'idhin sha'nun yughnihi, wujuhun yawma'idhin musfiratun, dahikatun mustabshiratun, wa-wujuhun yawma'idhin 'alayha ghabaratun, tarhaquha.

items.arabic: قَتَرَةٌ وَذِلَّةٌ، سَيِّدى عَلَيْكَ مُعَوَّلى وَمُعْتَمَدى وَرَجآئى وَتَوَكُّلى وَبِرَحْمَتِكَ تَعَلُّقى تُصيبُ بِرَحْمَتِكَ مَنْ تَشآءُ، وَتَهْدى بِكَرامَتِكَ مَنْ تُحِبُّ، فَلَكَ الْحَمْدُ عَلى ما نَقَّيْتَ مِنَ الشِّرْكِ قَلْبى وَلَكَ الْحَمْدُ عَلى بَسْطِ لِسانى افَبِلِسانى هذَا الْكالِّ اشْكُرُكَ، امْ بِغايَةِ جُهْدى فى عَمَلى ارْضيكَ، وَما قَدْرُ لِسانى يا رَبِّ فى جَنْبِ شُكْرِكَ، وَما قَدْرُ عَمَلى فى جَنْبِ نِعَمِكَ وَاحْسانِكَ الَىَّ، الهى انَّ جُودَكَ بَسَطَ امَلى وَشُكْرَكَ قَبِلَ عَمَلى سَيِّدى الَيْكَ رَغْبَتى وَالَيْكَ رَهْبَتى وَالَيْكَ تَاْميلى وَقَدْ ساقَنى الَيْكَ امَلى وَعَلَيْكَ يا واحِدى عَكَفَتْ هِمَّتى وَفيما عِنْدَكَ انْبَسَطَتْ رَغْبَتى وَلَكَ خالِصُ رَجآئى وَخَوْفى وَبِكَ انِسَتْ مَحَبَّتى وَالَيْكَ الْقَيْتُ بِيَدى وَبِحَبْلِ طاعَتِكَ مَدَدْتُ رَهْبَتى [يا] مَوْلاىَ بِذِكْرِكَ عاشَ قَلْبى وَبِمُناجاتِكَ بَرَّدْتُ ا لَمَ الْخَوْفِ عَنّى فَيا مَوْلاىَ وَيا مُؤَمَّلى وَيا مُنْتَهى سُؤْلى فَرِّقْ بَيْنى وَبَيْنَ ذَنْبِىَ الْمانِعِ لى مِنْ لُزُومِ طاعَتِكَ، فَانَّما اسْئَلُكَ لِقَديمِ الرَّجآءِ فيكَ، وَعَظيمِ الطَّمَعِ مِنْكَ، الَّذى اوْجَبْتَهُ عَلى نَفْسِكَ مِنَ الرَّاْفَةِ وَالرَّحْمَةِ، فَالْأَمْرُ لَكَ، وَحْدَكَ لا شَريكَ لَكَ ، وَالْخَلْقُ كُلُّهُمْ عِيالُكَ وَفى قَبْضَتِكَ، وَكُلُّ شَىْ ءٍ خاضِعٌ لَكَ، تَبارَكْتَ يا رَبَّ الْعالَمينَ، الهى ارْحَمْنى اذَا انْقَطَعَتْ حُجَّتى وَكَلَّ عَنْ جَوابِكَ لِسانى وَطاشَ عِنْدَ سُؤالِكَ ايَّاىَ لُبّى فَيا عَظيمَ رَجآئى لا تُخَيِّبْنى اذَا اشْتَدَّتْ فاقَتى وَلا تَرُدَّنى لِجَهْلى وَلا تَمْنَعْنى لِقِلَّةِ صَبْرى اعْطِنى لِفَقْرى وَارْحَمْنى لِضَعْفى سَيِّدى عَلَيْكَ مُعْتَمَدى وَمُعَوَّلى وَرَجآئى وَتَوَكُّلى وَبِرَحْمَتِكَ تَعَلُّقى وَبِفِنائِكَ احُطُّ رَحْلى وَبِجُودِكَ اقْصِدُ طَلِبَتى وَبِكَرَمِكَ اىْ رَبِّ اسْتَفْتِحُ دُعآئى وَلَدَيْكَ ارْجُو فاقَتى ، وَبِغِناكَ اجْبُرُ عَيْلَتى وَتَحْتَ ظِلِ عَفْوِكَ قِيامى وَالى جُودِكَ وَكَرَمِكَ ارْفَعُ بَصَرى وَالى مَعْرُوفِكَ اديمُ نَظَرى فَلا
items.english: gloom and abasement. My Master, upon You is my reliance, my support, my hope, and my trust; and to Your mercy is my clinging. You reach with Your mercy whom You will, and You guide by Your generosity whom You love. So all praise is due to You for purifying my heart from polytheism. And all praise is due to You for loosening my tongue. Is it then with this weary tongue that I should thank You? Or is it with the utmost of my efforts in my deeds that I should please You? And what is the worth of my tongue, O Lord, in comparison to thanking You? And what is the worth of my deeds in comparison to Your blessings and Your benevolence towards me? My Allah, indeed Your generosity has expanded my hope, and Your appreciation has accepted my deeds. My Master, towards You is my desire, towards You is my fear, and towards You is my aspiration. My hope has driven me towards You, and upon You, O my Only One, my determination is focused, and in what is with You, my desire has expanded. For You is my sincere hope and fear, with You my love has found intimacy, into Your hands I have cast my hand, and toward the rope of Your obedience I have extended my longing. O my Master, by Your remembrance my heart lives, and through whispering prayer to You, I have cooled the pain of fear within me. So O my Master, O my Hope, and O ultimate end of my request, separate between me and my sin which prevents me from adhering to Your obedience. I only ask You because of the long-standing hope in You, and the great longing for You, which You have made incumbent upon Yourself of compassion and mercy. For the command belongs to You, You alone, having no partner. All of creation are Your dependents and are in Your grasp, and everything is humble before You. Blessed are You, O Lord of the worlds. My Allah, have mercy on me when my argument is severed, and my tongue is too weary to answer You, and my mind is bewildered when You question me. O Great Object of my hope, do not disappoint me when my poverty intensifies, and do not turn me away for my ignorance, nor deprive me for my lack of patience. Grant me for my destitution, and have mercy on me for my weakness. My Master, upon You is my support, my reliance, my hope, and my trust; and to Your mercy is my clinging; and at Your courtyard I dismount my caravan. By Your generosity I seek my quest, and by Your nobility, O Lord, I commence my prayer. With You, I hope for the redress of my need, and by Your wealth, mend my poverty. Under the shade of Your pardon is my standing, toward Your liberality and Your generosity I raise my sight, and toward Your favor I sustain my gaze. So do not...
items.transliteration: Qataratun wa-dhillatun, sayyidi 'alayka mu'awwali wa-mu'tamadi wa-raja'i wa-tawakkuli wa-bi-rahmatika ta'alluqi, tusibu bi-rahmatika man tasha'u, wa-tahdi bi-karamatika man tuhibbu, fa-laka al-hamdu 'ala ma naqqayta mina al-shirki qalbi, wa-laka al-hamdu 'ala basti lisani, afa-bi-lisani hadha al-kalli ashkuruka, am bi-ghayati juhdi fi 'amali urdika, wa-ma qadru lisani ya Rabbi fi janbi shukrika, wa-ma qadru 'amali fi janbi ni'amika wa-ihsanika ilayya, Ilahi inna judaka basata amali wa-shukraka qabila 'amali. Sayyidi ilayka raghbati wa-ilayka rahbati wa-ilayka ta'mili, wa-qad saqani ilayka amali, wa-'alayka ya wahidi 'akafat himmati, wa-fima 'indaka inbasatat raghbati, wa-laka khalisu raja'i wa-khawfi, wa-bika anisat mahabbati, wa-ilayka alqaytu bi-yadi, wa-bi-habli ta'atika madadtu rahbati. [Ya] mawlaya bi-dhikrika 'asha qalbi, wa-bi-munajatika barradtu alama al-khawfi 'anni. Fa-ya mawlaya wa-ya mu'ammali wa-ya muntaha su'li, farriq bayni wa-bayna dhanbiya al-mani'i li min luzumi ta'atika, fa-innama as'aluka li-qadimi al-raja'i fika, wa-'azimi al-tama'i minka, alladhi awjabtahu 'ala nafsika mina al-ra'fati wa-al-rahmati, fa-al-amru laka, wahdaka la sharika laka, wa-al-khalqu kulluhum 'iyaluka wa-fi qabdatika, wa-kullu shay'in khadi'un laka, tabarakta ya Rabba al-'alamina. Ilahi irhamni idha inqata'at hujjati wa-kalla 'an jawabika lisani wa-tasha 'inda su'alika iyyaya lubbi. Fa-ya 'azima raja'i la tukhayyibni idha ishtaddat faqati, wa-la taruddani li-jahli, wa-la tamna'ni li-qillati sabri, a'tini li-faqri wa-irhamni li-da'fi. Sayyidi 'alayka mu'tamadi wa-mu'awwali wa-raja'i wa-tawakkuli wa-bi-rahmatika ta'alluqi, wa-bi-fina'ika ahuttu rahli, wa-bi-judika aqsidu talibati, wa-bi-karamika ay Rabbi astaftihu du'a'i, wa-ladayka arju faqati, wa-bi-ghinaka ajburu 'aylati, wa-tahta zilli 'afwika qiyami, wa-ila judika wa-karamika arfa'u basari, wa-ila ma'rufika adimu nazari, fa-la

items.arabic: قَتَرَةٌ وَذِلَّةٌ، سَيِّدى عَلَيْكَ مُعَوَّلى وَمُعْتَمَدى وَرَجآئى وَتَوَكُّلى وَبِرَحْمَتِكَ تَعَلُّقى تُصيبُ بِرَحْمَتِكَ مَنْ تَشآءُ، وَتَهْدى بِكَرامَتِكَ مَنْ تُحِبُّ، فَلَكَ الْحَمْدُ عَلى ما نَقَّيْتَ مِنَ الشِّرْكِ قَلْبى وَلَكَ الْحَمْدُ عَلى بَسْطِ لِسانى افَبِلِسانى هذَا الْكالِّ اشْكُرُكَ، امْ بِغايَةِ جُهْدى فى عَمَلى ارْضيكَ، وَما قَدْرُ لِسانى يا رَبِّ فى جَنْبِ شُكْرِكَ، وَما قَدْرُ عَمَلى فى جَنْبِ نِعَمِكَ وَاحْسانِكَ الَىَّ، الهى انَّ جُودَكَ بَسَطَ امَلى وَشُكْرَكَ قَبِلَ عَمَلى سَيِّدى الَيْكَ رَغْبَتى وَالَيْكَ رَهْبَتى وَالَيْكَ تَاْميلى وَقَدْ ساقَنى الَيْكَ امَلى وَعَلَيْكَ يا واحِدى عَكَفَتْ هِمَّتى وَفيما عِنْدَكَ انْبَسَطَتْ رَغْبَتى وَلَكَ خالِصُ رَجآئى وَخَوْفى وَبِكَ انِسَتْ مَحَبَّتى وَالَيْكَ الْقَيْتُ بِيَدى وَبِحَبْلِ طاعَتِكَ مَدَدْتُ رَهْبَتى [يا] مَوْلاىَ بِذِكْرِكَ عاشَ قَلْبى وَبِمُناجاتِكَ بَرَّدْتُ ا لَمَ الْخَوْفِ عَنّى فَيا مَوْلاىَ وَيا مُؤَمَّلى وَيا مُنْتَهى سُؤْلى فَرِّقْ بَيْنى وَبَيْنَ ذَنْبِىَ الْمانِعِ لى مِنْ لُزُومِ طاعَتِكَ، فَانَّما اسْئَلُكَ لِقَديمِ الرَّجآءِ فيكَ، وَعَظيمِ الطَّمَعِ مِنْكَ، الَّذى اوْجَبْتَهُ عَلى نَفْسِكَ مِنَ الرَّاْفَةِ وَالرَّحْمَةِ، فَالْأَمْرُ لَكَ، وَحْدَكَ لا شَريكَ لَكَ ، وَالْخَلْقُ كُلُّهُمْ عِيالُكَ وَفى قَبْضَتِكَ، وَكُلُّ شَىْ ءٍ خاضِعٌ لَكَ، تَبارَكْتَ يا رَبَّ الْعالَمينَ، الهى ارْحَمْنى اذَا انْقَطَعَتْ حُجَّتى وَكَلَّ عَنْ جَوابِكَ لِسانى وَطاشَ عِنْدَ سُؤالِكَ ايَّاىَ لُبّى فَيا عَظيمَ رَجآئى لا تُخَيِّبْنى اذَا اشْتَدَّتْ فاقَتى وَلا تَرُدَّنى لِجَهْلى وَلا تَمْنَعْنى لِقِلَّةِ صَبْرى اعْطِنى لِفَقْرى وَارْحَمْنى لِضَعْفى سَيِّدى عَلَيْكَ مُعْتَمَدى وَمُعَوَّلى وَرَجآئى وَتَوَكُّلى وَبِرَحْمَتِكَ تَعَلُّقى وَبِفِنائِكَ احُطُّ رَحْلى وَبِجُودِكَ اقْصِدُ طَلِبَتى وَبِكَرَمِكَ اىْ رَبِّ اسْتَفْتِحُ دُعآئى وَلَدَيْكَ ارْجُو فاقَتى ، وَبِغِناكَ اجْبُرُ عَيْلَتى وَتَحْتَ ظِلِ عَفْوِكَ قِيامى وَالى جُودِكَ وَكَرَمِكَ ارْفَعُ بَصَرى وَالى مَعْرُوفِكَ اديمُ نَظَرى فَلا
items.english: gloom and abasement. My Master, upon You is my reliance, my support, my hope, and my trust; and to Your mercy is my clinging. You reach with Your mercy whom You will, and You guide by Your generosity whom You love. So all praise is due to You for purifying my heart from polytheism. And all praise is due to You for enabling my tongue to speak. Should I thank You with this weary tongue of mine, or should I please You with the utmost of my efforts in my deeds? What is the worth of my tongue, O Lord, compared to the gratitude due to You? And what is the worth of my deed compared to Your blessings and Your benevolence towards me? My Allah, indeed Your liberality has expanded my hope, and Your appreciation has accepted my deed. My Master, toward You is my desire, toward You is my awe, and toward You is my aspiration; my hope has driven me toward You. Upon You, O my One and Only, my determination is focused, and toward what is with You, my desire has expanded. To You belong my sincere hope and fear; with You my love has found intimacy; into Your hands I have cast myself; and toward the rope of Your obedience I have extended my awe. O my Master, by Your remembrance my heart lives, and through intimate conversation with You, I have cooled the pain of fear within me. So O my Master, O my Hope, and O the ultimate end of my request, separate me from my sin that prevents me from adhering to Your obedience. For I only ask You because of my long-standing hope in You and my great expectation of You, which You have made incumbent upon Yourself out of compassion and mercy. So the command is Yours, alone without any partner; and all of creation are Your dependents and within Your grasp, and everything is humble before You. Blessed are You, O Lord of the worlds. My Allah, have mercy on me when my proof is severed, my tongue fails to answer You, and my mind wanders in confusion when You question me. O my Great Hope, do not disappoint me when my destitution becomes severe; do not turn me away for my ignorance, and do not deprive me for my lack of patience. Grant me because of my poverty, and have mercy on me because of my weakness. My Master, upon You is my support, my reliance, my hope, and my trust; and to Your mercy is my clinging. At Your courtyard, I halt my mount; by Your liberality, I seek my objective; and by Your generosity, O Lord, I begin my prayer. With You, I hope for relief from my destitution; by Your wealth, mend my poverty; under the shade of Your pardon is my standing; toward Your liberality and generosity I raise my sight; and toward Your kindness I prolong my gaze. So do not...
items.transliteration: Qataratun wa-dhillatun, sayyidi 'alayka mu'awwali wa-mu'tamadi wa-raja'i wa-tawakkuli, wa-bi-rahmatika ta'alluqi, tusibu bi-rahmatika man tasha'u, wa-tahdi bi-karamatika man tuhibbu, fa-laka al-hamdu 'ala ma naqqayta min al-shirki qalbi, wa-laka al-hamdu 'ala basti lisani, a-fa-bi-lisani hadha al-kalli ashkuruka, am bi-ghayati juhdi fi 'amali ardika, wa-ma qadru lisani ya Rabbi fi janbi shukrika, wa-ma qadru 'amali fi janbi ni'amika wa-ihsanika ilayya, Ilahi inna judaka basata amali, wa-shukraka qabila 'amali, sayyidi ilayka raghbati wa-ilayka rahbati wa-ilayka ta'mili, wa-qad saqani ilayka amali, wa-'alayka ya Wahidi 'akafat himmati, wa-fima 'indaka inbasatat raghbati, wa-laka khalisu raja'i wa-khawfi, wa-bika anisat mahabbati, wa-ilayka alqaytu bi-yadi, wa-bi-habli ta'atika madadtu rahbati, [ya] Mawlaya bi-dhikrika 'asha qalbi, wa-bi-munajatika barradtu alama al-khawfi 'anni, fa-ya Mawlaya wa-ya mu'ammali wa-ya muntaha su'li farriq bayni wa-bayna dhanbiya al-mani'i li min luzumi ta'atika, fa-innama as'aluka li-qadimi al-raja'i fika, wa-'adhimi al-tama'i minka, alladhi awjabtahu 'ala nafsika min al-ra'fati wa-al-rahmati, fa-al-amru laka, wahdaka la sharika laka, wa-al-khalqu kulluhum 'iyaluka wa-fi qabdatika, wa-kullu shay'in khadi'un laka, tabarakta ya Rabba al-'alamina, Ilahi irhamni idha inqata'at hujjati wa-kalla 'an jawabika lisani, wa-tasha 'inda su'alika iyyaya lubbi, fa-ya 'adhima raja'i la tukhayyibni idha ishtaddat faqati, wa-la taruddani li-jahli, wa-la tamna'ni li-qillati sabri, a'tini li-faqri wa-irhamni li-da'fi, sayyidi 'alayka mu'tamadi wa-mu'awwali wa-raja'i wa-tawakkuli, wa-bi-rahmatika ta'alluqi, wa-bi-fina'ika ahuttu rahli, wa-bi-judika aqsidu talibati, wa-bi-karamika ay Rabbi astaftihu du'a'i, wa-ladayka arju faqati, wa-bi-ghinaka ajburu 'aylati, wa-tahta dhilli 'afwika qiyami, wa-ila judika wa-karamika arfa'u basari, wa-ila ma'rufika adimu nadhari fa-la...
