items.arabic: تُحْرِقْنى بِالنَّارِ وَانْتَ مَوْضِعُ امَلى وَلا تُسْكِنِّى الْهاوِيَةَ فَانَّكَ قُرَّةُ عَيْنى يا سَيِّدى لا تُكَذِّبْ ظَنّى بِاحْسانِكَ وَمَعْرُوفِكَ فَانَّكَ ثِقَتى وَلا تَحْرِمْنى ثَوابَكَ فَانَّكَ الْعارِفُ بِفَقْرى الهى انْ كانَ قَدْ دَنا اجَلى وَلَمْ يُقَرِّبْنى مِنْكَ عَمَلى فَقَدْ جَعَلْتُ الْإِعْتِرافَ الَيْكَ بِذَنْبى وَسآئِلَ عِلَلى الهى انْ عَفَوْتَ فَمَنْ اوْلى مِنْكَ بِالْعَفْوِ ، وَانْ عَذَّبْتَ فَمَنْ اعْدَلُ مِنْكَ فِى الْحُكْمِ، ارْحَمْ فى هذِهِ الدُّنْيا غُرْبَتى وَعِنْدَ الْمَوْتِ كُرْبَتى وَفِى الْقَبْرِ وَحْدَتى وَفِى اللَّحْدِ وَحْشَتى وَاذا نُشِرْتُ لِلْحِسابِ بَيْنَ يَدَيْكَ ذُلَّ مَوْقِفى وَاغْفِرْ لى ما خَفِىَ عَلَى الْآدَمِيّينَ مِنْ عَمَلى وَادِمْ لى ما بِهِ سَتَرْتَنى وَارْحَمْنى صَريعاً عَلَى الْفِراشِ تُقَلِّبُنى ايْدى احِبَّتى وَتَفَضَّلْ عَلَىَّ مَمْدُوداً عَلَى الْمُغْتَسَلِ يُقَلِّبُنى صالِحُ جيرَتى وَتَحَنَّنْ عَلَىَّ مَحْمُولًا قَدْ تَناوَلَ الْأَقْرِبآءُ اطْرافَ جَنازَتى وَجُدْ عَلَىَّ مَنْقُولًا قَدْ نَزَلْتُ بِكَ وَحيداً فى حُفْرَتى وَارْحَمْ فى ذلِكَ الْبَيْتِ الْجَديدِ غُرْبَتى حَتّى لا اسْتَاْنِسَ بِغَيْرِكَ، يا سَيِّدى انْ وَكَلْتَنى الى نَفْسى هَلَكْتُ، سَيِّدى فَبِمَنْ اسْتَغيثُ انْ لَمْ تُقِلْنى عَثْرَتى فَالى مَنْ افْزَعُ انْ فَقَدْتُ عِنايَتَكَ فى ضَجْعَتى وَالى مَنْ الْتَجِئُ انْ لَمْ تُنَفِّسْ كُرْبَتى سَيِّدى مَنْ لى وَمَنْ يَرْحَمُنى انْ لَمْ تَرْحَمْنى وَفَضْلَ مَنْ اؤَمِّلُ انْ عَدِمْتُ فَضْلَكَ يَوْمَ فاقَتى وَالى مَنِ الْفِرارُ مِنَ الذُّنُوبِ اذَا انْقَضى اجَلى سَيِّدى لا تُعَذِّبْنى وَا نَا ارْجُوكَ، الهى حَقِّقْ رَجآئى وَآمِنْ خَوْفى فَانَّ كَثْرَةَ ذُنُوبى لا ارْجُو فيها الَّا عَفْوَكَ، سَيِّدى ا نَا اسْئَلُكَ ما لا اسْتَحِقُّ، وَانْتَ اهْلُ التَّقْوى وَاهْلُ الْمَغْفِرَةِ، فَاغْفِرْ لى وَالْبِسْنى مِنْ نَظَرِكَ ثَوْباً يُغَطّى عَلَىَّ التَّبِعاتِ، وَتَغْفِرُها لى وَلا اطالَبُ بِها، انَّكَ ذُو مَنٍّ قَديمٍ، وَصَفْحٍ عَظيمٍ، وَتَجاوُزٍ كَريمٍ، الهى انْتَ الَّذى تُفيضُ سَيْبَكَ عَلى مَنْ لا يَسْئَلُكَ، وَعَلَى الْجاحِدينَ بِرُبُوبِيَّتِكَ،
items.english: Do not burn me with the Fire while You are the object of my hope, and do not settle me in the Abyss, for You are the delight of my eye. O my Master, do not prove false my expectation of Your benevolence and Your kindness, for You are my trust; and do not deprive me of Your reward, for You are the Knower of my poverty. My Allah, if my term has approached and my deeds have not brought me close to You, then I have made the confession of my sin to You the means of my excuse. My Allah, if You pardon, then who is more worthy of pardoning than You? And if You punish, then who is more just than You in judgment? Have mercy in this world on my estrangement, and at the time of death on my distress, and in the grave on my loneliness, and in the niche on my desolation; and when I am raised for the reckoning before You, have mercy on the humility of my standing. Forgive me for that of my deeds which was hidden from human beings, and continue for me that with which You have covered me. Have mercy on me when I am fallen upon the bed, being turned by the hands of my loved ones; and favor me when I am stretched out on the washing table, being turned by my righteous neighbors; and be compassionate towards me when I am carried, with my relatives holding the edges of my bier; and be generous to me when I am transported, having alighted with You alone in my grave; and have mercy in that new house on my estrangement, so that I may seek intimacy with none other than You. O my Master, if You entrust me to myself, I shall perish. My Master, then to whom shall I cry for help if You do not cancel my stumble? To whom shall I flee if I lose Your care in my place of rest? And to whom shall I take refuge if You do not relieve my distress? My Master, who is there for me and who will have mercy on me if You do not have mercy on me? And whose grace shall I hope for if I am deprived of Your grace on the day of my need? And to whom is the flight from sins when my term has ended? My Master, do not punish me while I place my hope in You. My Allah, fulfill my hope and secure my fear, for regarding the abundance of my sins, I hope for nothing but Your pardon. My Master, I ask You for that which I do not deserve, and You are the Source of Piety and the Source of Forgiveness. So forgive me, and clothe me from Your gaze with a garment that covers my wrongdoings, and forgive them for me so that I am not held accountable for them; for indeed, You are the Possessor of ancient favor, great pardon, and noble forgiveness. My Allah, You are the One Who pours Your bounty upon those who do not ask You, and upon those who deny Your Lordship,
items.transliteration: tuhriqni bi-al-nari wa-anta mawdi'u amali wa-la tuskini al-hawiyata fa-innaka qurratu 'ayni ya sayyidi la tukadhdhib zanni bi-ihsanika wa-ma'rufika fa-innaka thiqati wa-la tahrimni thawabaka fa-innaka al-'arifu bi-faqri Ilahi in kana qad dana ajali wa-lam yuqarribni minka 'amali fa-qad ja'altu al-i'tirafa ilayka bi-dhanbi wasa'ila 'ilali Ilahi in 'afawta faman awla minka bi-al-'afwi, wa-in 'adhdhabta faman a'dalu minka fi al-hukmi, irham fi hadhihi al-dunya ghurbati wa-'inda al-mawti kurbati wa-fi al-qabri wahdati wa-fi al-lahdi wahshati wa-idha nushirtu lil-hisabi bayna yadayka dhulla mawqifi wa-aghfir li ma khafiya 'ala al-adamiyyina min 'amali wa-adim li ma bihi satartani wa-irhamni sari'an 'ala al-firashi tuqallibuni aydi ahibbati wa-tafaddal 'alayya mamdudan 'ala al-mughtasali yuqallibuni salihu jirati wa-tahannan 'alayya mahmulan qad tanawala al-aqriba'u atrafa janazati wa-jud 'alayya manqulan qad nazaltu bika wahidan fi hufrati wa-irham fi dhalika al-bayti al-jadidi ghurbati hatta la asta'nisa bi-ghayrika, ya sayyidi in wakaltani ila nafsi halaktu, sayyidi fa-bi-man astaghithu in lam tuqilni 'athrati fa-ila man afza'u in faqadtu 'inayataka fi daj'ati wa-ila man altaji'u in lam tunaffis kurbati sayyidi man li wa-man yarhamuni in lam tarhamni wa-fadla man u'ammilu in 'adimtu fadlaka yawma faqati wa-ila mani al-firaru mina al-dhunubi idha inqada ajali sayyidi la tu'adhdhibni wa-ana arjuka, Ilahi haqqiq raja'i wa-amin khawfi fa-inna kathrata dhunubi la arju fiha illa 'afwaka, sayyidi ana as'aluka ma la astahiqqu, wa-anta ahlu al-taqwa wa-ahlu al-maghfirah, fa-aghfir li wa-albisni min nazarika thawban yughatti 'alayya al-tabi'ati, wa-taghfiruha li wa-la utalabu biha, innaka dhu mannin qadimin, wa-safhin 'azimin, wa-tajawuzin karimin, Ilahi anta alladhi tufidu saybaka 'ala man la yas'aluka, wa-'ala al-jahidina bi-rububiyyatika,

items.arabic: تُحْرِقْنى بِالنَّارِ وَانْتَ مَوْضِعُ امَلى وَلا تُسْكِنِّى الْهاوِيَةَ فَانَّكَ قُرَّةُ عَيْنى يا سَيِّدى لا تُكَذِّبْ ظَنّى بِاحْسانِكَ وَمَعْرُوفِكَ فَانَّكَ ثِقَتى وَلا تَحْرِمْنى ثَوابَكَ فَانَّكَ الْعارِفُ بِفَقْرى الهى انْ كانَ قَدْ دَنا اجَلى وَلَمْ يُقَرِّبْنى مِنْكَ عَمَلى فَقَدْ جَعَلْتُ الْإِعْتِرافَ الَيْكَ بِذَنْبى وَسآئِلَ عِلَلى الهى انْ عَفَوْتَ فَمَنْ اوْلى مِنْكَ بِالْعَفْوِ ، وَانْ عَذَّبْتَ فَمَنْ اعْدَلُ مِنْكَ فِى الْحُكْمِ، ارْحَمْ فى هذِهِ الدُّنْيا غُرْبَتى وَعِنْدَ الْمَوْتِ كُرْبَتى وَفِى الْقَبْرِ وَحْدَتى وَفِى اللَّحْدِ وَحْشَتى وَاذا نُشِرْتُ لِلْحِسابِ بَيْنَ يَدَيْكَ ذُلَّ مَوْقِفى وَاغْفِرْ لى ما خَفِىَ عَلَى الْآدَمِيّينَ مِنْ عَمَلى وَادِمْ لى ما بِهِ سَتَرْتَنى وَارْحَمْنى صَريعاً عَلَى الْفِراشِ تُقَلِّبُنى ايْدى احِبَّتى وَتَفَضَّلْ عَلَىَّ مَمْدُوداً عَلَى الْمُغْتَسَلِ يُقَلِّبُنى صالِحُ جيرَتى وَتَحَنَّنْ عَلَىَّ مَحْمُولًا قَدْ تَناوَلَ الْأَقْرِبآءُ اطْرافَ جَنازَتى وَجُدْ عَلَىَّ مَنْقُولًا قَدْ نَزَلْتُ بِكَ وَحيداً فى حُفْرَتى وَارْحَمْ فى ذلِكَ الْبَيْتِ الْجَديدِ غُرْبَتى حَتّى لا اسْتَاْنِسَ بِغَيْرِكَ، يا سَيِّدى انْ وَكَلْتَنى الى نَفْسى هَلَكْتُ، سَيِّدى فَبِمَنْ اسْتَغيثُ انْ لَمْ تُقِلْنى عَثْرَتى فَالى مَنْ افْزَعُ انْ فَقَدْتُ عِنايَتَكَ فى ضَجْعَتى وَالى مَنْ الْتَجِئُ انْ لَمْ تُنَفِّسْ كُرْبَتى سَيِّدى مَنْ لى وَمَنْ يَرْحَمُنى انْ لَمْ تَرْحَمْنى وَفَضْلَ مَنْ اؤَمِّلُ انْ عَدِمْتُ فَضْلَكَ يَوْمَ فاقَتى وَالى مَنِ الْفِرارُ مِنَ الذُّنُوبِ اذَا انْقَضى اجَلى سَيِّدى لا تُعَذِّبْنى وَا نَا ارْجُوكَ، الهى حَقِّقْ رَجآئى وَآمِنْ خَوْفى فَانَّ كَثْرَةَ ذُنُوبى لا ارْجُو فيها الَّا عَفْوَكَ، سَيِّدى ا نَا اسْئَلُكَ ما لا اسْتَحِقُّ، وَانْتَ اهْلُ التَّقْوى وَاهْلُ الْمَغْفِرَةِ، فَاغْفِرْ لى وَالْبِسْنى مِنْ نَظَرِكَ ثَوْباً يُغَطّى عَلَىَّ التَّبِعاتِ، وَتَغْفِرُها لى وَلا اطالَبُ بِها، انَّكَ ذُو مَنٍّ قَديمٍ، وَصَفْحٍ عَظيمٍ، وَتَجاوُزٍ كَريمٍ، الهى انْتَ الَّذى تُفيضُ سَيْبَكَ عَلى مَنْ لا يَسْئَلُكَ، وَعَلَى الْجاحِدينَ بِرُبُوبِيَّتِكَ،
items.english: Do not burn me with the Fire while You are the object of my hope, and do not settle me in the Abyss, for You are the delight of my eye. O my Master, do not prove false my expectation of Your benevolence and Your kindness, for You are my trust; and do not deprive me of Your reward, for You are the Knower of my poverty. My Allah, if my end has drawn near and my deeds have not brought me close to You, then I have made the confession of my sin to You the means of my excuse. My Allah, if You pardon, then who is more worthy of pardoning than You? And if You punish, then who is more just than You in judgment? Have mercy on my estrangement in this world, and on my distress at the time of death, and on my loneliness in the grave, and on my isolation in the tomb. And when I am resurrected for the reckoning before You, have mercy on the lowliness of my station. And forgive me for what was hidden from human beings of my deeds, and continue for me that with which You have covered me. And have mercy on me when I am lying prostrate on the bed, my loved ones' hands turning me over; and favor me when I am stretched out on the washing place, my righteous neighbors turning me over; and show me compassion when I am being carried, my relatives having taken up the corners of my funeral bier; and be generous to me when I am being transported, having descended unto You alone in my pit. And have mercy in that new house on my estrangement, so that I may not seek intimacy with any other than You. O my Master, if You entrust me to myself, I shall perish. My Master, to whom shall I cry for help if You do not release me from my stumble? To whom shall I flee if I lose Your care in my place of rest? And to whom shall I take refuge if You do not relieve my distress? My Master, who is there for me and who will have mercy on me if You do not have mercy on me? And whose grace shall I hope for if I am deprived of Your grace on the day of my destitution? And to whom is the flight from sins when my end has come? My Master, do not punish me while I place my hope in You. My Allah, fulfill my hope and secure my fear; for indeed, concerning the multitude of my sins, I hope for nothing but Your pardon. My Master, I ask You for that which I do not deserve, while You are the Source of Piety and the Source of Forgiveness. So forgive me, and clothe me with a garment from Your gaze that covers my misdeeds, and forgive them for me so that I am not held accountable for them. Verily, You are the Possessor of ancient favor, great forbearance, and generous pardon. My Allah, You are the One Who pours forth Your bounty upon those who do not ask of You, and upon those who deny Your Lordship.

items.arabic: فَكَيْفَ سَيِّدى بِمَنْ سَئَلَكَ وَايْقَنَ انَّ الْخَلْقَ لَكَ، وَالْأَمْرَ الَيْكَ، تَبارَكْتَ وَتَعالَيْتَ يا رَبَ الْعالَمينَ، سَيِّدى عَبْدُكَ بِبابِكَ، اقامَتْهُ الْخَصاصَةُ بَيْنَ يَدَيْكَ، يَقْرَعُ بابَ احْسانِكَ بِدُعآئِهِ ، فَلا تُعْرِضْ بِوَجْهِكَ الْكَريمِ عَنّى وَاقْبَلْ مِنّى ما اقُولُ، فَقَدْ دَعَوْتُكَ بِهذَا الدُّعاءِ، وَا نَا ارْجُو انْ لا تَرُدَّنى مَعْرِفَةً مِنّى بِرَاْفَتِكَ وَرَحْمَتِكَ، الهى انْتَ الَّذى لا يُحْفيكَ سآئِلٌ، وَلا يَنْقُصُكَ نآئِلٌ، انْتَ كَما تَقُولُ وَفَوْقَ ما نَقُولُ، اللَّهُمَّ انّى اسْئَلُكَ صَبْراً جَميلًا، وَفَرَجاً قَريباً، وَقَوْلًا صادِقاً، وَاجْراً عَظيماً، اسْئَلُكَ يا رَبِّ مِنَ الْخَيْرِ كُلِّهِ، ما عَلِمْتُ مِنْهُ وَما لَمْ اعْلَمْ، اسْئَلُكَ اللَّهُمَّ مِنْ خَيْرِ ما سَئَلَكَ مِنْهُ عِبادُكَ الصَّالِحُونَ، يا خَيْرَ مَنْ سُئِلَ، وَاجْوَدَ مَنْ اعْطى اعْطِنى سُؤْلى فى نَفْسى وَاهْلى وَوالِدىَّ وَوُلْدى وَاهْلِ حُزانَتى وَاخْوانى فيكَ، وَارْغِدْ عَيْشى وَاظْهِرْ مُرُوَّتى وَاصْلِحْ جَميعَ احْوالى وَاجْعَلْنى مِمَّنْ اطَلْتَ عُمْرَهُ، وَحَسَّنْتَ عَمَلَهُ، وَاتْمَمْتَ عَلَيْهِ نِعْمَتَكَ، وَرَضيتَ عَنْهُ، وَاحْيَيْتَهُ حَياةً طَيِّبَةً فى ادْوَمِ السُّرُورِ، وَاسْبَغِ الْكَرامَةِ، وَاتَمِّ الْعَيْشِ، انَّكَ تَفْعَلُ ما تَشآءُ، وَلا يَفْعَلُ ما يَشآءُ غَيْرُكَ، اللهُمَّ خُصَّنى مِنْكَ بِخاصَّةِ ذِكْرِكَ، وَلا تَجْعَلْ شَيْئاً مِمَّا اتَقَرَّبُ بِهِ فى آناءِ اللَّيْلِ وَاطْرافِ النَّهارِ رِيآءً وَلا سُمْعَةً، وَلا اشَراً وَلا بَطَراً، وَاجْعَلْنى لَكَ مِنَ الْخاشِعينَ، اللهُمَّ اعْطِنى السِّعَةَ فِى الرِّزْقِ، وَالْأَمْنَ فِى الْوَطَنِ، وَقُرَّةَ الْعَيْنِ فِى الْأَهْلِ وَالْمالِ وَالْوَلَدِ، وَالْمُقامَ فى نِعَمِكَ عِنْدى وَالصِّحَّةَ فِى الْجِسْمِ، وَالْقُوَّةَ فِى الْبَدَنِ، وَالسَّلامَةَ فِى الدّينِ، وَاسْتَعْمِلْنى بِطاعَتِكَ وَطاعَةِ رَسُولِكَ، مُحَمَّدٍ صَلَّى اللَّهُ عَلَيْهِ وَآلِهِ ابَداً مَا اسْتَعْمَرْتَنى وَاجْعَلْنى مِنْ اوْفَرِ عِبادِكَ عِنْدَكَ نَصيباً فى كُلِّ خَيْرٍ انْزَلْتَهُ، وَتُنْزِلُهُ فى شَهْرِ رَمَضانَ، فى لَيْلَةِ الْقَدْرِ، وَما انْتَ مُنْزِلُهُ فى كُلِّ سَنَةٍ مِنْ رَحْمَةٍ تَنْشُرُها، وَعافِيَةٍ تُلْبِسُها، وَبَلِيَّةٍ تَدْفَعُها، وَحَسَناتٍ تَتَقَبَّلُها،
items.english: So how is it, my Master, for one who asks of You and is certain that the creation belongs to You and the command is Yours? Blessed and Exalted are You, O Lord of the worlds. My Master, Your servant is at Your door; poverty has made him stand before You; he knocks at the door of Your benevolence with his supplication. So do not turn Your Noble Countenance away from me, and accept from me what I say, for I have called upon You with this prayer, and I hope that You will not turn me back, based on my knowledge of Your compassion and Your mercy. My Allah, You are the One who is not burdened by a petitioner, nor does a recipient's gain diminish You. You are as You say, and beyond what we say. O Allah, I ask You for a beautiful patience, a near relief, a truthful speech, and a great reward. I ask You, O Lord, for all goodness, that which I know of it and that which I do not know. I ask You, O Allah, for the best of what Your righteous servants have asked of You. O Best of those who are asked, and most Generous of those who give, grant me my request regarding myself, my family, my parents, my children, those I care for, and my brothers in You. Make my life prosperous, make my chivalry manifest, set right all my affairs, and make me among those whose lives You have prolonged, whose deeds You have made good, whose blessings You have completed, with whom You are well-pleased, and whom You have granted a good life in the most enduring joy, the most abundant honor, and the most perfect living. Indeed, You do whatever You will, and none other than You does whatever he wills. O Allah, single me out for a special mention from You, and do not make any of that by which I seek nearness during the hours of the night and the ends of the day be for show, or for reputation, or for arrogance, or for vanity; and make me among the humble before You. O Allah, grant me abundance in provision, security in the homeland, the delight of the eye in family, wealth, and children, permanence in the blessings I have from You, health in the body, strength in the physique, and soundness in religion. Employ me in Your obedience and the obedience of Your Messenger, Muhammad, may the blessings of Allah be upon him and his family, forever as long as You grant me life. And make me among those of Your servants who receive the most abundant share from You of every good You have sent down or send down in the month of Ramadan, during the Night of Decree, and what You send down every year of mercy You spread, well-being You bestow, affliction You repel, and good deeds You accept.
items.transliteration: Fa-kayfa sayyidi bi-man sa'alaka wa-ayqana anna al-khalqa laka, wa-al-amra ilayka, tabarakta wa-ta'alayta ya Rabba al-'alamina, sayyidi 'abduka bi-babika, aqamathu al-khasasatu bayna yadayka, yaqra'u baba ihsanika bi-du'a'ihi, fa-la tu'rid bi-wajhika al-karimi 'anni wa-aqbal minni ma aqulu, fa-qad da'awtuka bi-hadha al-du'a'i, wa-ana arju an la taruddani ma'rifatan minni bi-ra'fatika wa-rahmatika, Ilahi anta alladhi la yuhfika sa'ilun, wa-la yanqusuka na'ilun, anta kama taqulu wa-fawqa ma naqulu, Allahumma inni as'aluka sabran jamilan, wa-farajan qariban, wa-qawlan sadiqan, wa-ajran 'aziman, as'aluka ya Rabbi min al-khayri kullihi, ma 'alimtu minhu wa-ma lam a'lam, as'aluka Allahumma min khayri ma sa'alaka minhu 'ibaduka al-salihuna, ya khayra man su'ila, wa-ajwada man a'ta a'tini su'li fi nafsi wa-ahli wa-walidayya wa-wuldi wa-ahli huzanati wa-ikhwani fika, wa-arghid 'ayshi wa-azhir muruwwati wa-aslih jami'a ahwali wa-aj'alni mimman atalta 'umrahu, wa-hassanta 'amalahu, wa-atmamta 'alayhi ni'mataka, wa-radita 'anhu, wa-ahyaytahu hayatan tayyibatan fi adwami al-sururi, wa-asbaghi al-karamati, wa-atammi al-'ayshi, innaka taf'alu ma tasha'u, wa-la yaf'alu ma tasha'u ghayruka, Allahumma khussani minka bi-khassati dhikrika, wa-la taj'al shay'an mimma ataqarrabu bihi fi ana'i al-layli wa-atrafi al-nahari riya'an wa-la sum'atan, wa-la asharan wa-la bataran, wa-aj'alni laka min al-khashi'ina, Allahumma a'tini al-si'ata fi al-rizqi, wa-al-amna fi al-watani, wa-qurrata al-'ayni fi al-ahli wa-al-mali wa-al-waladi, wa-al-muqama fi ni'amika 'indi wa-al-sihhata fi al-jismi, wa-al-quwwata fi al-badani, wa-al-salamata fi al-dini, wa-st'amilni bi-ta'atika wa-ta'ati rasulika, Muhammadin salla Allahu 'alayhi wa-alihi abadan ma ista'martani wa-aj'alni min awfari 'ibadika 'indaka nasiban fi kulli khayrin anzaltahu, wa-tunziluhu fi shahri Ramadana, fi laylati al-qadri, wa-ma anta munziluhu fi kulli sanatin min rahmatin tanshu-ruha, wa-'afiyatin tulbisuha, wa-baliyyatin tadfa'uha, wa-hasanatin tataqabbaluha,

footnote_refs.title: في مصباح المتهجّد« وَيَسْتَعْطِفُ جَميلَ نَظَرِكَ بِمَكْنُونِ رَجائِهِ».

items.arabic: فَكَيْفَ سَيِّدى بِمَنْ سَئَلَكَ وَايْقَنَ انَّ الْخَلْقَ لَكَ، وَالْأَمْرَ الَيْكَ، تَبارَكْتَ وَتَعالَيْتَ يا رَبَ الْعالَمينَ، سَيِّدى عَبْدُكَ بِبابِكَ، اقامَتْهُ الْخَصاصَةُ بَيْنَ يَدَيْكَ، يَقْرَعُ بابَ احْسانِكَ بِدُعآئِهِ ، فَلا تُعْرِضْ بِوَجْهِكَ الْكَريمِ عَنّى وَاقْبَلْ مِنّى ما اقُولُ، فَقَدْ دَعَوْتُكَ بِهذَا الدُّعاءِ، وَا نَا ارْجُو انْ لا تَرُدَّنى مَعْرِفَةً مِنّى بِرَاْفَتِكَ وَرَحْمَتِكَ، الهى انْتَ الَّذى لا يُحْفيكَ سآئِلٌ، وَلا يَنْقُصُكَ نآئِلٌ، انْتَ كَما تَقُولُ وَفَوْقَ ما نَقُولُ، اللَّهُمَّ انّى اسْئَلُكَ صَبْراً جَميلًا، وَفَرَجاً قَريباً، وَقَوْلًا صادِقاً، وَاجْراً عَظيماً، اسْئَلُكَ يا رَبِّ مِنَ الْخَيْرِ كُلِّهِ، ما عَلِمْتُ مِنْهُ وَما لَمْ اعْلَمْ، اسْئَلُكَ اللَّهُمَّ مِنْ خَيْرِ ما سَئَلَكَ مِنْهُ عِبادُكَ الصَّالِحُونَ، يا خَيْرَ مَنْ سُئِلَ، وَاجْوَدَ مَنْ اعْطى اعْطِنى سُؤْلى فى نَفْسى وَاهْلى وَوالِدىَّ وَوُلْدى وَاهْلِ حُزانَتى وَاخْوانى فيكَ، وَارْغِدْ عَيْشى وَاظْهِرْ مُرُوَّتى وَاصْلِحْ جَميعَ احْوالى وَاجْعَلْنى مِمَّنْ اطَلْتَ عُمْرَهُ، وَحَسَّنْتَ عَمَلَهُ، وَاتْمَمْتَ عَلَيْهِ نِعْمَتَكَ، وَرَضيتَ عَنْهُ، وَاحْيَيْتَهُ حَياةً طَيِّبَةً فى ادْوَمِ السُّرُورِ، وَاسْبَغِ الْكَرامَةِ، وَاتَمِّ الْعَيْشِ، انَّكَ تَفْعَلُ ما تَشآءُ، وَلا يَفْعَلُ ما يَشآءُ غَيْرُكَ، اللهُمَّ خُصَّنى مِنْكَ بِخاصَّةِ ذِكْرِكَ، وَلا تَجْعَلْ شَيْئاً مِمَّا اتَقَرَّبُ بِهِ فى آناءِ اللَّيْلِ وَاطْرافِ النَّهارِ رِيآءً وَلا سُمْعَةً، وَلا اشَراً وَلا بَطَراً، وَاجْعَلْنى لَكَ مِنَ الْخاشِعينَ، اللهُمَّ اعْطِنى السِّعَةَ فِى الرِّزْقِ، وَالْأَمْنَ فِى الْوَطَنِ، وَقُرَّةَ الْعَيْنِ فِى الْأَهْلِ وَالْمالِ وَالْوَلَدِ، وَالْمُقامَ فى نِعَمِكَ عِنْدى وَالصِّحَّةَ فِى الْجِسْمِ، وَالْقُوَّةَ فِى الْبَدَنِ، وَالسَّلامَةَ فِى الدّينِ، وَاسْتَعْمِلْنى بِطاعَتِكَ وَطاعَةِ رَسُولِكَ، مُحَمَّدٍ صَلَّى اللَّهُ عَلَيْهِ وَآلِهِ ابَداً مَا اسْتَعْمَرْتَنى وَاجْعَلْنى مِنْ اوْفَرِ عِبادِكَ عِنْدَكَ نَصيباً فى كُلِّ خَيْرٍ انْزَلْتَهُ، وَتُنْزِلُهُ فى شَهْرِ رَمَضانَ، فى لَيْلَةِ الْقَدْرِ، وَما انْتَ مُنْزِلُهُ فى كُلِّ سَنَةٍ مِنْ رَحْمَةٍ تَنْشُرُها، وَعافِيَةٍ تُلْبِسُها، وَبَلِيَّةٍ تَدْفَعُها، وَحَسَناتٍ تَتَقَبَّلُها،
items.english: So how is it, my Master, for one who asks of You and is certain that the creation belongs to You and the command is Yours? Blessed and Exalted are You, O Lord of the worlds. My Master, Your servant is at Your door; poverty has made him stand before You; he knocks at the door of Your benevolence with his prayer. So do not turn Your Noble Face away from me, and accept from me what I say; for I have called upon You with this supplication, and I hope that You will not reject me, knowing as I do Your compassion and Your mercy. My Allah, You are the One Who is not troubled by a petitioner, nor are You diminished by a bestowal. You are as You say, and above what we say. O Allah, I ask You for beautiful patience, a near relief, truthful speech, and a great reward. I ask You, O Lord, for all goodness, that which I know of and that which I do not know. I ask You, O Allah, for the best of what Your righteous servants have asked of You. O Best of those who are asked, and most Generous of those who give; grant me my request regarding myself, my family, my parents, my children, my kin, and my brothers in You. Make my life prosperous, make manifest my virtue, rectify all my conditions, and make me among those whose lives You have lengthened, whose deeds You have made good, upon whom You have perfected Your blessing, with whom You are well-pleased, and whom You have granted a goodly life in the most enduring joy, the most abundant honor, and the most complete living. Indeed, You do whatever You will, and none other than You can do what he wills. O Allah, single me out for a special remembrance from You, and do not let anything by which I seek nearness to You during the hours of the night and the ends of the day be for ostentation or reputation, nor for insolence or pride; and make me among the humble before You. O Allah, grant me abundance in provision, security in the homeland, the delight of the eye in family, wealth, and children, permanence in the blessings I have from You, health in the body, strength in the physique, and safety in religion. And employ me in Your obedience and the obedience of Your Messenger, Muhammad, may Allah bless him and his family, forever, for as long as You grant me life. And make me among those of Your servants who receive the most bountiful share of every good You have sent down and send down in the month of Ramadan, on the Night of Decree, and what You send down every year of mercy that You spread, well-being that You clothe with, affliction that You avert, and good deeds that You accept.
items.transliteration: Fa-kayfa sayyidi bi-man sa'alaka wa-ayqana anna al-khalqa laka, wa-al-amra ilayka, tabarakta wa-ta'alayta ya Rabba al-'alamina, sayyidi 'abduka bi-babika, aqamathu al-khasasatu bayna yadayka, yaqra'u baba ihsanika bi-du'a'ihi, fa-la tu'rid bi-wajhika al-karimi 'anni wa-aqbal minni ma aqulu, fa-qad da'awtuka bi-hadha al-du'a'i, wa-ana arju an la taruddani ma'rifatan minni bi-ra'fatika wa-rahmatika, Ilahi anta alladhi la yuhfika sa'ilun, wa-la yanqusuka na'ilun, anta kama taqulu wa-fawqa ma naqulu, Allahumma inni as'aluka sabran jamilan, wa-farajan qariban, wa-qawlan sadiqan, wa-ajran 'aziman, as'aluka ya Rabbi min al-khayri kullihi, ma 'alimtu minhu wa-ma lam a'lam, as'aluka Allahumma min khayri ma sa'alaka minhu 'ibaduka al-salihuna, ya khayra man su'ila, wa-ajwada man a'ta, a'tini su'li fi nafsi wa-ahli wa-walidayya wa-wuldi wa-ahli huzanati wa-ikhwani fika, wa-arghid 'ayshi wa-azhir muruwwati wa-aslih jami'a ahwali, wa-aj'alni mimman atalta 'umrahu, wa-hassanta 'amalahu, wa-atmamta 'alayhi ni'mataka, wa-radita 'anhu, wa-ahyaytahu hayatan tayyibatan fi adwami al-sururi, wa-asbaghi al-karamati, wa-atammi al-'ayshi, innaka taf'alu ma tasha'u, wa-la yaf'alu ma tasha'u ghayruka, Allahumma khussani minka bi-khassati dhikrika, wa-la taj'al shay'an mimma ataqarrabu bihi fi ana'i al-layli wa-atrafi al-nahari riya'an wa-la sum'atan, wa-la asharan wa-la bataran, wa-aj'alni laka min al-khashi'ina, Allahumma a'tini al-si'ata fi al-rizqi, wa-al-amna fi al-watani, wa-qurrata al-'ayni fi al-ahli wa-al-mali wa-al-waladi, wa-al-muqama fi ni'amika 'indi wa-al-sihhata fi al-jismi, wa-al-quwwata fi al-badani, wa-al-salamata fi al-dini, wa-sta'milni bi-ta'atika wa-ta'ati rasulika, Muhammadin salla Allahu 'alayhi wa-alihi abadan ma-sta'martani, wa-aj'alni min awfari 'ibadika 'indaka nasiban fi kulli khayrin anzaltahu, wa-tunziluhu fi shahri Ramadana, fi laylati al-qadri, wa-ma anta munziluhu fi kulli sanatin min rahmatin tansharuha, wa-'afiyatin tulbisuha, wa-baliyyatin tadfa'uha, wa-hasanatin tataqabbaluha.

footnote_refs.title: في مصباح المتهجّد« وَيَسْتَعْطِفُ جَميلَ نَظَرِكَ بِمَكْنُونِ رَجائِهِ».

items.arabic: وَسَيِّئاتٍ تَتَجاوَزُ عَنْها، وَارْزُقْنى حَجَّ بَيْتِكَ الْحَرامِ، فى عامى هذا وَفى كُلِّ عامٍ، وَارْزُقْنى رِزْقاً واسِعاً مِنْ فَضْلِكَ الْواسِعِ، وَاصْرِفْ عَنّى يا سَيِّدى الْأَسْوآءَ، وَاقْضِ عَنِّى الدَّيْنَ وَالظُّلاماتِ، حَتّى لا اتَاذّى بِشَىْ ءٍ مِنْهُ، وَخُذْ عَنّى بِاسْماعِ وَابْصارِ اعْدائى وَحُسَّادى وَالْباغينَ عَلَىَّ، وَانْصُرْنى عَلَيْهِمْ، وَاقِرَّ عَيْنى وَفَرِّحْ قَلْبى وَاجْعَلْ لى مِنْ هَمّى وَكَرْبى فَرَجاً وَمَخْرَجاً، وَاجْعَلْ مَنْ ارادَنى بِسُوءٍ مِنْ جَميعِ خَلْقِكَ تَحْتَ قَدَمَىَّ، وَاكْفِنى شَرَّ الشَّيْطانِ وَشَرَّ السُّلْطانِ وَسَيِّئاتِ عَمَلى وَطَهِّرْنى مِنَ الذُّنُوبِ كُلِّها، وَاجِرْنى مِنَ النَّارِ بِعَفْوِكَ، وَادْخِلْنِى الْجَنَّةَ بِرَحْمَتِكَ، وَزَوِّجْنى مِنَ الْحُورِ الْعينِ بِفَضْلِكَ، وَالْحِقْنى بِاوْلِيآئِكَ الصَّالِحينَ، مُحَمَّدٍ وَآلِهِ الْأَبْرارِ، الطَّيِّبينَ الطَّاهِرينَ الْأَخْيارِ، صَلَواتُكَ عَلَيْهِمْ وَعَلى اجْسادِهِمْ وَارْواحِهِمْ، وَرَحْمَةُ اللَّهِ وَبَرَكاتُهُ، الهى وَسَيِّدى وَعِزَّتِكَ وَجَلالِكَ لَئِنْ طالَبْتَنى بِذُنُوبى لَأُطالِبَنَّكَ بِعَفْوِكَ، وَلَئِنْ طالَبْتَنى بِلُؤْمى لَأُطالِبَنَّكَ بِكَرَمِكَ، وَلَئِنْ ادْخَلْتَنِى النَّارَ لَأُخْبِرَنَّ اهْلَ النَّارِ بِحُبّى لَكَ، الهى وَسَيِّدى انْ كُنْتَ لا تَغْفِرُ الَّا لِأَوْلِيآئِكَ وَاهْلِ طاعَتِكَ، فَالى مَنْ يَفْزَعُ الْمُذْنِبُونَ، وَانْ كُنْتَ لا تُكْرِمُ الَّا اهْلَ الْوَفآءِ بِكَ، فَبِمَنْ يَسْتَغيثُ الْمُسْيئُونَ، الهى انْ ادْخَلْتَنِى النَّارَ فَفى ذلِكَ سُرُورُ عَدُوِّكَ، وَانْ ادْخَلْتَنِى الْجَنَّةَ فَفى ذلِكَ سُرُورُ نَبِيِّكَ، وَا نَا وَاللَّهِ اعْلَمُ انَّ سُرُورَنَبِيِّكَ احَبُّ الَيْكَ مِنْ سُرُورِ عَدُوِّكَ، اللهُمَّ انّى اسْئَلُكَ انْ تَمْلَأَ قَلْبى حُبّاً لَكَ، وَخَشْيَةً مِنْكَ، وَتَصْديقاً بِكِتابِكَ ، وَايماناً بِكَ، وَفَرَقاً مِنْكَ، وَشَوْقاً الَيْكَ، يا ذَا الْجَلالِ وَالْإِكْرامِ، حَبِّبْ الَىَّ لِقائَكَ وَاحْبِبْ لِقآئى وَاجْعَلْ لى فى لِقآئِكَ الرَّاحَةَ وَالْفَرَجَ وَالْكَرامَةَ، اللهُمَّ الْحِقْنى بِصالِحِ مَنْ مَضى وَاجْعَلْنى مِنْ صالِحِ مَنْ بَقِىَ، وَخُذْ بى سَبيلَ الصَّالِحينَ، وَاعِنّى عَلى نَفْسى بِما تُعينُ بِهِ الصَّالِحينَ عَلى انْفُسِهِمْ،
items.english: and evil deeds that You overlook. And grant me the pilgrimage to Your Sacred House in this year of mine and in every year, and grant me an expansive provision from Your vast grace. O my Master, turn away all evils from me, and settle my debts and grievances on my behalf, so that I am not harmed by any of them. Seize the hearing and sight of my enemies, those who envy me, and those who transgress against me, and grant me victory over them. Comfort my eye and gladden my heart, and grant me from my anxiety and distress a relief and a way out. And place whosoever among all Your creation intends evil for me beneath my feet. Suffice me against the evil of Satan and the evil of the ruler and the evils of my deeds. And purify me from all sins, and protect me from the Fire by Your pardon, and enter me into Paradise by Your mercy, and marry me to the wide-eyed houris by Your grace. Join me with Your righteous close servants, Muhammad and his pious Progeny, the pure, the immaculate, the chosen ones; may Your blessings be upon them, and upon their bodies and their souls, and may the mercy of Allah and His blessings be upon them. My Allah and my Master, by Your Might and Your Majesty, if You demand from me my sins, I shall certainly demand from You Your pardon; and if You demand from me my meanness, I shall certainly demand from You Your generosity; and if You enter me into the Fire, I shall certainly inform the people of the Fire of my love for You. My Allah and my Master, if You do not forgive except Your close servants and the people of Your obedience, then to whom shall the sinners flee for refuge? And if You do not honor except those who are faithful to You, then from whom shall the evildoers seek help? My Allah, if You enter me into the Fire, then in that is the joy of Your enemy; but if You enter me into Paradise, then in that is the joy of Your Prophet. And I, by Allah, know that the joy of Your Prophet is more beloved to You than the joy of Your enemy. O Allah, I ask You to fill my heart with love for You, fear of You, belief in Your Book, faith in You, awe of You, and longing for You. O Lord of Majesty and Honor, make the meeting with You beloved to me and love the meeting with me, and grant me in the meeting with You comfort, relief, and honor. O Allah, join me with the righteous of those who have passed and make me among the righteous of those who remain; lead me to the path of the righteous, and help me against myself with that which You help the righteous against themselves.
items.transliteration: Wa-sayyi'atin tatajawazu 'anha, wa-arzuqni hajja baytika al-harami, fi 'ami hadha wa-fi kulli 'amin, wa-arzuqni rizqan wasi'an min fadlika al-wasi'i, wa-asrif 'anni ya sayyidi al-aswa'a, wa-aqdi 'anni al-dayna wa-al-zulamati, hatta la ata'adhdha bi-shay'in minhu, wa-khudh 'anni bi-asma'i wa-absari a'da'i wa-hussadi wa-al-baghina 'alayya, wa-ansurni 'alayhim, wa-aqirra 'ayni wa-farrih qalbi wa-aj'al li min hammi wa-karbi farajan wa-makhrajan, wa-aj'al man aradani bi-su'in min jami'i khalqika tahta qadamayya, wa-akfini sharra al-shaytani wa-sharra al-sultani wa-sayyi'ati 'amali wa-tahhirni mina al-dhunubi kulliha, wa-ajirni mina al-nari bi-'afwika, wa-adkhilni al-jannata bi-rahmatika, wa-zawwijni mina al-huri al-'ini bi-fadlika, wa-al-hiqni bi-awliya'ika al-salihina, Muhammadin wa-alihi al-abrari, al-tayyibina al-tahirina al-akhyari, salawatuka 'alayhim wa-'ala ajsadihim wa-arwahihim, wa-rahmatu Allahi wa-barakatuhu, Ilahi wa-sayyidi wa-'izzatika wa-jalalika la'in talabtani bi-dhunubi la-utalibannaka bi-'afwika, wa-la'in talabtani bi-lu'mi la-utalibannaka bi-karamika, wa-la'in adkhaltani al-nara la-ukhbiranna ahla al-nari bi-hubbi laka, Ilahi wa-sayyidi in kunta la taghfiru illa li-awliya'ika wa-ahli ta'atika, fa-ila man yafza'u al-mudhnibuna, wa-in kunta la tukrimu illa ahla al-wafa'i bika, fa-bi-man yastaghithu al-musi'una, Ilahi in adkhaltani al-nara fa-fi dhalika sururu 'aduwwika, wa-in adkhaltani al-jannata fa-fi dhalika sururu nabiyyika, wa-ana wallahi a'lamu anna surura nabiyyika ahabbu ilayka min sururi 'aduwwika, Allahumma inni as'aluka an tamla'a qalbi hubban laka, wa-khashyatan minka, wa-tasdiqan bi-kitabika, wa-imanan bika, wa-faraqan minka, wa-shawqan ilayka, ya dha al-jalali wa-al-ikrami, habbib ilayya liqa'aka wa-ahbib liqa'i wa-aj'al li fi liqa'ika al-rahata wa-al-faraja wa-al-karamata, Allahumma al-hiqni bi-salihi man mada wa-aj'alni min salihi man baqiya, wa-khudh bi sabila al-salihina, wa-a'inni 'ala nafsi bima tu'inu bihi al-salihina 'ala anfusihim.

items.arabic: وَسَيِّئاتٍ تَتَجاوَزُ عَنْها، وَارْزُقْنى حَجَّ بَيْتِكَ الْحَرامِ، فى عامى هذا وَفى كُلِّ عامٍ، وَارْزُقْنى رِزْقاً واسِعاً مِنْ فَضْلِكَ الْواسِعِ، وَاصْرِفْ عَنّى يا سَيِّدى الْأَسْوآءَ، وَاقْضِ عَنِّى الدَّيْنَ وَالظُّلاماتِ، حَتّى لا اتَاذّى بِشَىْ ءٍ مِنْهُ، وَخُذْ عَنّى بِاسْماعِ وَابْصارِ اعْدائى وَحُسَّادى وَالْباغينَ عَلَىَّ، وَانْصُرْنى عَلَيْهِمْ، وَاقِرَّ عَيْنى وَفَرِّحْ قَلْبى وَاجْعَلْ لى مِنْ هَمّى وَكَرْبى فَرَجاً وَمَخْرَجاً، وَاجْعَلْ مَنْ ارادَنى بِسُوءٍ مِنْ جَميعِ خَلْقِكَ تَحْتَ قَدَمَىَّ، وَاكْفِنى شَرَّ الشَّيْطانِ وَشَرَّ السُّلْطانِ وَسَيِّئاتِ عَمَلى وَطَهِّرْنى مِنَ الذُّنُوبِ كُلِّها، وَاجِرْنى مِنَ النَّارِ بِعَفْوِكَ، وَادْخِلْنِى الْجَنَّةَ بِرَحْمَتِكَ، وَزَوِّجْنى مِنَ الْحُورِ الْعينِ بِفَضْلِكَ، وَالْحِقْنى بِاوْلِيآئِكَ الصَّالِحينَ، مُحَمَّدٍ وَآلِهِ الْأَبْرارِ، الطَّيِّبينَ الطَّاهِرينَ الْأَخْيارِ، صَلَواتُكَ عَلَيْهِمْ وَعَلى اجْسادِهِمْ وَارْواحِهِمْ، وَرَحْمَةُ اللَّهِ وَبَرَكاتُهُ، الهى وَسَيِّدى وَعِزَّتِكَ وَجَلالِكَ لَئِنْ طالَبْتَنى بِذُنُوبى لَأُطالِبَنَّكَ بِعَفْوِكَ، وَلَئِنْ طالَبْتَنى بِلُؤْمى لَأُطالِبَنَّكَ بِكَرَمِكَ، وَلَئِنْ ادْخَلْتَنِى النَّارَ لَأُخْبِرَنَّ اهْلَ النَّارِ بِحُبّى لَكَ، الهى وَسَيِّدى انْ كُنْتَ لا تَغْفِرُ الَّا لِأَوْلِيآئِكَ وَاهْلِ طاعَتِكَ، فَالى مَنْ يَفْزَعُ الْمُذْنِبُونَ، وَانْ كُنْتَ لا تُكْرِمُ الَّا اهْلَ الْوَفآءِ بِكَ، فَبِمَنْ يَسْتَغيثُ الْمُسْيئُونَ، الهى انْ ادْخَلْتَنِى النَّارَ فَفى ذلِكَ سُرُورُ عَدُوِّكَ، وَانْ ادْخَلْتَنِى الْجَنَّةَ فَفى ذلِكَ سُرُورُ نَبِيِّكَ، وَا نَا وَاللَّهِ اعْلَمُ انَّ سُرُورَنَبِيِّكَ احَبُّ الَيْكَ مِنْ سُرُورِ عَدُوِّكَ، اللهُمَّ انّى اسْئَلُكَ انْ تَمْلَأَ قَلْبى حُبّاً لَكَ، وَخَشْيَةً مِنْكَ، وَتَصْديقاً بِكِتابِكَ ، وَايماناً بِكَ، وَفَرَقاً مِنْكَ، وَشَوْقاً الَيْكَ، يا ذَا الْجَلالِ وَالْإِكْرامِ، حَبِّبْ الَىَّ لِقائَكَ وَاحْبِبْ لِقآئى وَاجْعَلْ لى فى لِقآئِكَ الرَّاحَةَ وَالْفَرَجَ وَالْكَرامَةَ، اللهُمَّ الْحِقْنى بِصالِحِ مَنْ مَضى وَاجْعَلْنى مِنْ صالِحِ مَنْ بَقِىَ، وَخُذْ بى سَبيلَ الصَّالِحينَ، وَاعِنّى عَلى نَفْسى بِما تُعينُ بِهِ الصَّالِحينَ عَلى انْفُسِهِمْ،
items.english: and evil deeds that You overlook. And grant me the pilgrimage to Your Sacred House in this year of mine and in every year, and grant me an expansive provision from Your vast grace. O my Master, turn away all evils from me, and settle my debts and grievances on my behalf, so that I am not harmed by any of them. Divert from me the hearing and sight of my enemies, those who envy me, and those who act wrongfully toward me; and grant me victory over them. Delight my eye, gladden my heart, and grant me relief and a way out from my anxiety and distress. Place whoever among all Your creation intends evil against me under my feet. Protect me from the evil of Satan, the evil of the ruler, and the evils of my deeds. Purify me from all sins and grant me refuge from the Fire by Your pardon. Admit me into Paradise by Your mercy, marry me to the wide-eyed houris by Your grace, and join me with Your righteous intimate servants: Muhammad and his virtuous, pure, immaculate, and chosen family. Your blessings be upon them, their bodies, and their souls; and may the mercy of Allah and His blessings be upon them. My Allah and my Master, by Your might and Your majesty, if You demand from me my sins, I shall surely demand from You Your pardon. And if You demand from me my baseness, I shall surely demand from You Your generosity. And if You enter me into the Fire, I shall surely inform the people of the Fire of my love for You. My Allah and my Master, if You do not forgive except Your intimate servants and those who obey You, then to whom shall the sinners turn for refuge? And if You do not honor except those who are loyal to You, then to whom shall the evildoers cry for help? My Allah, if You enter me into the Fire, in that is the joy of Your enemy; but if You admit me into Paradise, in that is the joy of Your Prophet. And I, by Allah, know that the joy of Your Prophet is more beloved to You than the joy of Your enemy. O Allah, I ask You to fill my heart with love for You, awe of You, belief in Your Book, faith in You, dread of You, and longing for You, O Lord of Majesty and Honor. Make the meeting with You beloved to me and love the meeting with me; and grant me, in the meeting with You, comfort, relief, and honor. O Allah, join me with the righteous of those who have passed and make me among the righteous of those who remain. Guide me on the path of the righteous, and help me against myself with that which You help the righteous against themselves.
items.transliteration: Wa-sayyi'atin tatajawazu 'anha, wa-arzuqni hajja baytika al-harami, fi 'ami hadha wa-fi kulli 'amin, wa-arzuqni rizqan wasi'an min fadlika al-wasi'i, wa-asrif 'anni ya sayyidi al-aswa'a, wa-aqdi 'anni al-dayna wa-al-zullamati, hatta la ata'adh-dha bi-shay'in minhu, wa-khudh 'anni bi-asma'i wa-absari a'da'i wa-hussadi wa-al-baghina 'alayya, wa-ansurni 'alayhim, wa-aqirra 'ayni wa-farrih qalbi wa-aj'al li min hammi wa-karbi farajan wa-makhrajan, wa-aj'al man aradani bi-su'in min jami'i khalqika tahta qadamayya, wa-kfini sharra al-shaytani wa-sharra al-sultani wa-sayyi'ati 'amali wa-tahhirni mina al-dhunubi kulliha, wa-ajirni mina al-nari bi-'afwika, wa-adkhilni al-jannata bi-rahmatika, wa-zawwijni mina al-huri al-'ayni bi-fadlika, wa-alhiqni bi-awliya'ika al-salihina, Muhammadin wa-alihi al-abrari, al-tayyibina al-tahirina al-akhyari, salawatuka 'alayhim wa-'ala ajsadihim wa-arwahihim, wa-rahmatu Allahi wa-barakatuhu, Ilahi wa-sayyidi wa-'izzatika wa-jalalika la'in talabtani bi-dhunubi la-utalibannaka bi-'afwika, wa-la'in talabtani bi-lu'mi la-utalibannaka bi-karamika, wa-la'in adkhaltani al-nara la-ukhbiranna ahla al-nari bi-hubbi laka, Ilahi wa-sayyidi in kunta la taghfiru illa li-awliya'ika wa-ahli ta'atika, fa-ila man yafza'u al-mudhnibuna, wa-in kunta la tukrimu illa ahla al-wafa'i bika, fa-bi-man yastaghithu al-musi'una, Ilahi in adkhaltani al-nara fa-fi dhalika sururu 'aduwwika, wa-in adkhaltani al-jannata fa-fi dhalika sururu nabiyyika, wa-ana wallahi a'lamu anna surura nabiyyika ahabbu ilayka min sururi 'aduwwika, Allahumma inni as'aluka an tamla'a qalbi hubban laka, wa-khashyatan minka, wa-tasdiqan bi-kitabika, wa-imanan bika, wa-faraqan minka, wa-shawqan ilayka, ya dha al-jalali wa-al-ikrami, habbib ilayya liqa'aka wa-ahbib liqa'i wa-aj'al li fi liqa'ika al-rahata wa-al-faraja wa-al-karamata, Allahumma alhiqni bi-salihi man mada wa-aj'alni min salihi man baqiya, wa-khudh bi sabila al-salihina, wa-a'inni 'ala nafsi bima tu'inu bihi al-salihina 'ala anfusihim.

items.arabic: وَاخْتِمْ عَمَلى بِاحْسَنِهِ، وَاجْعَلْ ثَوابى مِنْهُ الْجَنَّةَ بِرَحْمَتِكَ، وَاعِنّى عَلى صالِحِ ما اعْطَيْتَنى وَثَبِّتْنى يا رَبِّ، وَلا تَرُدَّنى فى سُوءٍ اسْتَنْقَذْتَنى مِنْهُ يا رَبَّ الْعالَمينَ، اللَّهُمَّ انّى اسْئَلُكَ ايماناً لا اجَلَ لَهُ دُونَ لِقائِكَ، احْيِنى ما احْيَيْتَنى عَلَيْهِ، وَتَوَفَّنى اذا تَوَفَّيْتَنى عَلَيْهِ، وَابْعَثْنى اذا بَعَثْتَنى عَلَيْهِ، وَابْرِءْ قَلْبى مِنَ الرِّيآءِ وَالشَّكِّ وَالسُّمْعَةِ فى دينِكَ، حَتّى يَكُونَ عَمَلى خالِصاً لَكَ، اللهُمَّ اعْطِنى بَصيرَةً فى دينِكَ، وَفَهْماً فى حُكْمِكَ، وَفِقْهاً فى عِلْمِكَ، وَكِفْلَيْنِ مِنْ رَحْمَتِكَ، وَوَرَعاً يَحْجُزُنى عَنْ مَعاصيكَ، وَبَيِّضْ وَجْهى بِنُورِكَ، وَاجْعَلْ رَغْبَتى فيما عِنْدَكَ، وَتَوَفَّنى فى سَبيلِكَ، وَعَلى مِلَّةِ رَسُولِكَ، صَلَّى اللَّهُ عَلَيْهِ وَآلِهِ، اللهُمَّ انّى اعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الْكَسَلِ وَالْفَشَلِ، وَالْهَمِّ وَالْجُبْنِ وَالْبُخْلِ، وَالْغَفْلَةِ وَالْقَسْوَةِ وَالْمَسْكَنَةِ، وَالْفَقْرِ وَالْفاقَةِ وَكُلِّ بَلِيَّةٍ، وَالْفَواحِشِ ما ظَهَرَ مِنْها وَما بَطَنَ، وَاعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ نَفْسٍ لا تَقْنَعُ، وَبَطْنٍ لا يَشْبَعُ، وَقَلْبٍ لا يَخْشَعُ، وَدُعاءٍ لا يُسْمَعُ، وَعَمَلٍ لا يَنْفَعُ، وَاعُوذُ بِكَ يا رَبِّ عَلى نَفْسى وَدينى وَمالى وَعَلى جَميعِ ما رَزَقْتَنى مِنَ الشَّيْطانِ الرَّجيمِ، انَّكَ انْتَ السَّميعُ الْعَليمُ، اللهُمَّ انَّهُ لا يُجيرُنى مِنْكَ احَدٌ، وَلا اجِدُ مِنْ دُونِكَ مُلْتَحَداً، فَلا تَجْعَلْ نَفْسى فى شَىْ ءٍ مِنْ عَذابِكَ، وَلا تَرُدَّنى بِهَلَكَةٍ، وَلا تَرُدَّنى بِعَذابٍ اليمٍ، اللهُمَّ تَقَبَّلْ مِنّى وَاعْلِ ذِكْرى وَارْفَعْ دَرَجَتى وَحُطَّ وِزْرى وَلا تَذْكُرْنى بِخَطيئَتى وَاجْعَلْ ثَوابَ مَجْلِسى وَثَوابَ مَنْطِقى وَثَوابَ دُعآئى رِضاكَ وَالْجَنَّةَ، وَاعْطِنى يا رَبِّ جَميعَ ما سَالْتُكَ، وَزِدْنى مِنْ فَضْلِكَ، انّى الَيْكَ راغِبٌ يا رَبَّ الْعالَمينَ، اللَّهُمَّ انَّكَ انْزَلْتَ فى كِتابِكَ انْ نَعْفُوَ عَمَّنْ ظَلَمَنا، وَقَدْ ظَلَمْنا انْفُسَنا فَاعْفُ عَنَّا، فَانَّكَ اوْلى بِذلِكَ مِنَّا، وَامَرْتَنا انْ لا نَرُدَّ سائِلًا عَنْ ابْوابِنا، وَقَدْ جِئْتُكَ سائِلًا فَلا تَرُدَّنى الَّا بِقَضآءِ حاجَتى وَامَرْتَنا بِالْإِحْسانِ الى
items.english: And seal my deeds with the best of them, and make my reward for them Paradise by Your mercy. And help me to fulfill the righteous deeds You have granted me and keep me steadfast, O Lord. And do not return me to an evil from which You have rescued me, O Lord of the worlds. O Allah, I ask You for a faith that has no end before meeting You; keep me alive upon it as long as You grant me life, and take my soul upon it when You cause me to die, and raise me upon it when You resurrect me. And free my heart from ostentation, doubt, and seeking reputation in Your religion, so that my deeds may be purely for You. O Allah, grant me insight into Your religion, understanding of Your judgment, comprehension of Your knowledge, a double portion of Your mercy, and a piety that restrains me from disobeying You. And whiten my face with Your light, and make my desire for that which is with You, and cause me to die in Your way and upon the creed of Your Messenger, may Allah bless him and his progeny. O Allah, I seek refuge in You from laziness and failure, from anxiety, cowardice, and stinginess, from heedlessness, hard-heartedness, and humiliation, from poverty and destitution and every affliction, and from indecencies—those that are apparent and those that are hidden. And I seek refuge in You from a soul that is not content, a stomach that is not satisfied, a heart that does not humble itself, a prayer that is not heard, and a deed that does not benefit. And I seek refuge in You, O Lord, for myself, my religion, my wealth, and for everything You have provided me, from the accursed Satan; indeed, You are the All-Hearing, the All-Knowing. O Allah, indeed no one can protect me from You, and I find no shelter besides You. So do not let me be subject to any of Your punishment, and do not cast me into destruction, and do not return me to a painful torment. O Allah, accept from me, exalt my mention, raise my rank, and remove my burden. Do not remember me by my sin, and make the reward of my gathering, the reward of my speech, and the reward of my prayer Your pleasure and Paradise. And grant me, O Lord, all that I have asked of You, and increase for me from Your grace. Indeed, I am a seeker of You, O Lord of the worlds. O Allah, You have revealed in Your Book that we should pardon those who have wronged us; and we have wronged ourselves, so pardon us, for You are more worthy of that than we are. And You have commanded us not to turn away a beggar from our doors; and I have come to You as a beggar, so do not turn me away except with the fulfillment of my need. And You have commanded us to be kind to...
items.transliteration: Wa-akhtim 'amali bi-ahsanihi, wa-ij'al thawabi minhu al-jannata bi-rahmatika, wa-a'inni 'ala salihi ma a'taytani wa-thabbitni ya Rabbi, wa-la taruddani fi su'in istanqadhtani minhu ya Rabba al-'alamina, Allahumma inni as'aluka imanan la ajala lahu duna liqa'ika, ahyini ma ahyaytani 'alayhi, wa-tawaffani idha tawaffaytani 'alayhi, wa-ib'athni idha ba'athtani 'alayhi, wa-abri' qalbi mina al-riya'i wa-al-shakki wa-al-sum'ati fi dinika, hatta yakuna 'amali khalisan laka, Allahumma a'tini basiratan fi dinika, wa-fahman fi hukmika, wa-fiqhan fi 'ilmika, wa-kiflayni min rahmatika, wa-wara'an yahjuzuni 'an ma'asika, wa-bayyid wajhi bi-nurika, wa-ij'al raghbati fima 'indaka, wa-tawaffani fi sabilika, wa-'ala millati Rasulika, salla Allahu 'alayhi wa-alihi, Allahumma inni a'udhu bika mina al-kasali wa-al-fashali, wa-al-hammi wa-al-jubni wa-al-bukhli, wa-al-ghaflati wa-al-qaswati wa-al-maskanati, wa-al-faqri wa-al-faqati wa-kulli baliyyatin, wa-al-fawahishi ma zahara minha wa-ma batana, wa-a'udhu bika min nafsin la taqna'u, wa-batnin la yashba'u, wa-qalbin la yakhsha'u, wa-du'a'in la yusma'u, wa-'amalin la yanfa'u, wa-a'udhu bika ya Rabbi 'ala nafsi wa-dinî wa-mali wa-'ala jami'i ma razaqtani mina al-shaytani al-rajimi, innaka anta al-Sami'u al-'Alimu, Allahumma innahu la yujiruni minka ahadun, wa-la ajidu min dunika multahadan, fa-la taj'al nafsi fi shay'in min 'adhabika, wa-la taruddani bi-halakatin, wa-la taruddani bi-'adhabin alimin, Allahumma taqabbal minni wa-a'li dhikri wa-irfa' darajati wa-hutta wizri wa-la tadhkurni bi-khati'ati wa-ij'al thawaba majlisi wa-thawaba mantiqi wa-thawaba du'a'i ridaka wa-al-jannata, wa-a'tini ya Rabbi jami'a ma sa'altuka, wa-zidni min fadlika, inni ilayka raghibun ya Rabba al-'alamina, Allahumma innaka anzalta fi kitabika an na'fuwa 'amman zalamana, wa-qad zalamna anfusana fa-a'fu 'anna, fa-innaka awla bi-dhalika minna, wa-amartana an la narudda sa'ilan 'an abwabina, wa-qad ji'tuka sa'ilan fa-la taruddani illa bi-qada'i hajati wa-amartana bi-al-ihsani ila

رَبَّ الْعالَمينَ، اللَّهُمَّ انّى اسْئَلُكَ ايماناً لا اجَلَ لَهُ دُونَ لِقائِكَ، احْيِنى ما احْيَيْتَنى عَلَيْهِ، وَتَوَفَّنى اذا تَوَفَّيْتَنى عَلَيْهِ، وَابْعَثْنى اذا بَعَثْتَنى عَلَيْهِ، وَابْرِءْ قَلْبى مِنَ الرِّيآءِ وَالشَّكِّ وَالسُّمْعَةِ فى دينِكَ، حَتّى يَكُونَ عَمَلى خالِصاً لَكَ، اللهُمَّ اعْطِنى بَصيرَةً فى دينِكَ، وَفَهْماً فى حُكْمِكَ، وَفِقْهاً فى عِلْمِكَ، وَكِفْلَيْنِ مِنْ رَحْمَتِكَ، وَوَرَعاً يَحْجُزُنى عَنْ مَعاصيكَ، وَبَيِّضْ وَجْهى بِنُورِكَ، وَاجْعَلْ رَغْبَتى فيما عِنْدَكَ، وَتَوَفَّنى فى سَبيلِكَ، وَعَلى مِلَّةِ رَسُولِكَ، صَلَّى اللَّهُ عَلَيْهِ وَآلِهِ، اللهُمَّ انّى اعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الْكَسَلِ وَالْفَشَلِ، وَالْهَمِّ وَالْجُبْنِ وَالْبُخْلِ، وَالْغَفْلَةِ وَالْقَسْوَةِ وَالْمَسْكَنَةِ، وَالْفَقْرِ وَالْفاقَةِ وَكُلِّ بَلِيَّةٍ، وَالْفَواحِشِ ما ظَهَرَ مِنْها وَما بَطَنَ، وَاعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ نَفْسٍ لا تَقْنَعُ، وَبَطْنٍ لا يَشْبَعُ، وَقَلْبٍ لا يَخْشَعُ، وَدُعاءٍ لا يُسْمَعُ، وَعَمَلٍ لا يَنْفَعُ، وَاعُوذُ بِكَ يا رَبِّ عَلى نَفْسى وَدينى وَمالى وَعَلى جَميعِ ما رَزَقْتَنى مِنَ الشَّيْطانِ الرَّجيمِ، انَّكَ انْتَ السَّميعُ الْعَليمُ، اللهُمَّ انَّهُ لا يُجيرُنى مِنْكَ احَدٌ، وَلا اجِدُ مِنْ دُونِكَ مُلْتَحَداً، فَلا تَجْعَلْ نَفْسى فى شَىْ ءٍ مِنْ عَذابِكَ، وَلا تَرُدَّنى بِهَلَكَةٍ، وَلا تَرُدَّنى بِعَذابٍ اليمٍ، اللهُمَّ تَقَبَّلْ مِنّى وَاعْلِ ذِكْرى وَارْفَعْ دَرَجَتى وَحُطَّ وِزْرى وَلا تَذْكُرْنى بِخَطيئَتى وَاجْعَلْ ثَوابَ مَجْلِسى وَثَوابَ مَنْطِقى وَثَوابَ دُعآئى رِضاكَ وَالْجَنَّةَ، وَاعْطِنى يا رَبِّ جَميعَ ما سَالْتُكَ، وَزِدْنى مِنْ فَضْلِكَ، انّى الَيْكَ راغِبٌ يا رَبَّ الْعالَمينَ، اللَّهُمَّ انَّكَ انْزَلْتَ فى كِتابِكَ انْ نَعْفُوَ عَمَّنْ ظَلَمَنا، وَقَدْ ظَلَمْنا انْفُسَنا فَاعْفُ عَنَّا، فَانَّكَ اوْلى بِذلِكَ مِنَّا، وَامَرْتَنا انْ لا نَرُدَّ سائِلًا عَنْ ابْوابِنا، وَقَدْ جِئْتُكَ سائِلًا فَلا تَرُدَّنى الَّا بِقَضآءِ حاجَتى وَامَرْتَنا بِالْإِحْسانِ الى
items.english: And seal my deeds with the best of them, and make my reward for them Paradise by Your mercy. And help me to fulfill the righteous deeds You have granted me and keep me steadfast, O Lord. And do not return me to an evil from which You have rescued me, O Lord of the worlds. O Allah, I ask You for a faith that has no end prior to meeting You; keep me alive upon it as long as You grant me life, cause me to die upon it when You take me, and resurrect me upon it when You raise me. And free my heart from ostentation, doubt, and seeking reputation in Your religion, so that my deeds may be purely for You. O Allah, grant me insight into Your religion, understanding of Your judgment, comprehension of Your knowledge, a double portion of Your mercy, and a piety that prevents me from disobeying You; and whiten my face with Your light, and make my desire for that which is with You, and cause me to die in Your way and upon the creed of Your Messenger, may Allah bless him and his family. O Allah, I seek refuge in You from laziness and failure, from anxiety, cowardice, and stinginess, from heedlessness, hard-heartedness, and abasement, from poverty, want, and every affliction, and from indecencies—both those that are apparent and those that are hidden. And I seek refuge in You from a soul that is never content, a stomach that is never satisfied, a heart that does not humble itself, a prayer that is not heard, and a deed that does not benefit. And I seek refuge in You, O Lord, for my self, my religion, my wealth, and all that You have provided me, from the accursed Satan; indeed, You are the All-Hearing, the All-Knowing. O Allah, indeed no one can protect me from You, and I find no refuge besides You; so do not let my soul fall into any of Your punishment, and do not return me to destruction, nor return me to a painful torment. O Allah, accept from me, and exalt my mention, and raise my rank, and remove my burden; and do not mention me for my sin, and make the reward of my gathering, the reward of my speech, and the reward of my prayer Your pleasure and Paradise. And grant me, O Lord, all that I have asked of You, and increase for me from Your grace; indeed, I am desirous of You, O Lord of the worlds. O Allah, You have revealed in Your Book that we should pardon those who have wronged us; we have wronged ourselves, so pardon us, for You are more worthy of that than we are. And You commanded us not to turn away a beggar from our doors, and I have come to You as a beggar, so do not turn me away except with the fulfillment of my need. And You commanded us to show benevolence to...
items.transliteration: Wa-akhtim 'amali bi-ahsanihi, wa-ij'al thawabi minhu al-jannata bi-rahmatika, wa-a'inni 'ala salihi ma a'taytani wa-thabbitni ya Rabbi, wa-la taruddani fi su'in istanqadhtani minhu ya Rabba al-'alamina. Allahumma inni as'aluka imanan la ajala lahu duna liqa'ika, ahyini ma ahyaytani 'alayhi, wa-tawaffani idha tawaffaytani 'alayhi, wa-ib'athni idha ba'athtani 'alayhi, wa-abri' qalbi mina al-riya'i wa-al-shakki wa-al-sum'ati fi dinika, hatta yakuna 'amali khalisan laka. Allahumma a'tini basiratan fi dinika, wa-fahman fi hukmika, wa-fiqhan fi 'ilmika, wa-kiflayni min rahmatika, wa-wara'an yahjuzuni 'an ma'asika, wa-bayyid wajhi bi-nurika, wa-ij'al raghbati fima 'indaka, wa-tawaffani fi sabilika, wa-'ala millati rasulika, salla Allahu 'alayhi wa-alihi. Allahumma inni a'udhu bika mina al-kasali wa-al-fashali, wa-al-hammi wa-al-jubni wa-al-bukhli, wa-al-ghaflati wa-al-qaswati wa-al-maskanati, wa-al-faqri wa-al-faqati wa-kulli baliyyatin, wa-al-fawahishi ma zahara minha wa-ma batana. Wa-a'udhu bika min nafsin la taqna'u, wa-batnin la yashba'u, wa-qalbin la yakhsha'u, wa-du'a'in la yusma'u, wa-'amalin la yanfa'u. Wa-a'udhu bika ya Rabbi 'ala nafsi wa-dini wa-mali wa-'ala jami'i ma razaqtani mina al-shaytani al-rajimi, innaka anta al-Sami'u al-'Alimu. Allahumma innahu la yujiruni minka ahadun, wa-la ajidu min dunika multahadan, fa-la taj'al nafsi fi shay'in min 'adhabika, wa-la taruddani bi-halakatin, wa-la taruddani bi-'adhabin alimin. Allahumma taqabbal minni wa-a'li dhikri wa-irfa' darajati wa-hutta wizri wa-la tadhkurni bi-khati'ati wa-ij'al thawaba majlisi wa-thawaba mantiqi wa-thawaba du'a'i ridaka wa-al-jannata. Wa-a'tini ya Rabbi jami'a ma sa'altuka, wa-zidni min fadlika, inni ilayka raghibun ya Rabba al-'alamina. Allahumma innaka anzalta fi kitabika an na'fuwa 'amman zalamana, wa-qad zalamna anfusana fa-fu 'anna, fa-innaka awla bi-dhalika minna. Wa-amartana an la narudda sa'ilan 'an abwabina, wa-qad ji'tuka sa'ilan fa-la taruddani illa bi-qada'i hajati wa-amartana bi-al-ihsani ila...

items.arabic: ما مَلَكَتْ ايْمانُنا، وَنَحْنُ ارِقَّآءُكَ فَاعْتِقْ رِقابَنا مِنَ النَّارِ، يا مَفْزَعى عِنْدَ كُرْبَتى وَيا غَوْثى عِنْدَ شِدَّتى الَيْكَ فَزِعْتُ، وَبِكَ اسْتَغَثْتُ وَلُذْتُ، لا الُوذُ بِسِواكَ، وَلا اطْلُبُ الْفَرَجَ الَّا مِنْكَ ، فَاغِثْنى وَفَرِّجْ عَنّى يا مَنْ يَفُكُّ الْأَسيرَ ، وَيَعْفُو عَنِ الْكَثيرِ، اقْبَلْ مِنِّى الْيَسيرَ، وَاعْفُ عَنِّى الْكَثيرَ، انَّكَ انْتَ الرَّحيمُ الْغَفُورُ، اللهُمَّ انّى اسْئَلُكَ ايماناً تُباشِرُ بِهِ قَلْبى وَيَقيناً صادِقاً حَتّى اعْلَمَ انَّهُ لَنْ يُصيبَنى الَّا ما كَتَبْتَ لى وَرَضِّنى مِنَ الْعَيْشِ بِما قَسَمْتَ لى يا ارْحَمَ الرَّاحِمينَ.
items.english: what our right hands possess, and we are Your bondmen, so free our necks from the Fire. O my Refuge in my distress, and O my Succor in my hardship! To You I flee, and with You I seek aid and take refuge. I do not take refuge in any other than You, nor do I seek relief except from You; so aid me and grant me relief, O He who releases the captive and pardons the much. Accept from me the little and pardon from me the much; indeed, You are the All-Merciful, the All-Forgiving. O Allah, I ask You for a faith that permeates my heart, and a sincere certainty so that I may know that nothing shall befall me except what You have decreed for me, and make me content with the life You have apportioned for me, O Most Merciful of the merciful.
items.transliteration: Ma malakat aymanuna, wa-nahnu ariqqa'uka fa-atiq riqabana min al-nari, ya mafza'i 'inda kurbati wa-ya ghawthi 'inda shiddati ilayka fazi'tu, wa-bika istaghathtu wa-ludhtu, la aludhu bi-siwaka, wa-la atlubu al-faraja illa minka, fa-aghithni wa-farrij 'anni ya man yafukku al-asira, wa-ya'fu 'an al-kathiri, iqbal minni al-yasira, wa-u'fu 'anni al-kathira, innaka anta al-Rahimu al-Ghafuru, Allahumma inni as'aluka imanan tubashiru bihi qalbi wa-yaqinan sadiqan hatta a'lama annahu lan yusibani illa ma katabta li wa-raddini min al-'ayshi bima qasamta li ya arhama al-rahimina.

items.english: O my Refuge in my distress, and O my Succor in my hardship! To You I flee, and with You I seek aid, and with You I take refuge. I do not take refuge in any other than You, nor do I seek relief except from You; so aid me and grant me relief. O He Who accepts the little and pardons the much! Accept from me the little and pardon me the much, for surely You are the All-Forgiving, the All-Merciful. O Allah, I ask You for a faith that touches my heart, and a certainty such that I know that nothing will befall me except what You have decreed for me; and make me content with the livelihood You have apportioned for me, O Most Merciful of the merciful. O my Provision in my distress, and O my Companion in my hardship, and O my Guardian in my blessing, and O my Ultimate Goal in my desire! You are the Concealer of my faults, the Securer of my fear, and the Foregoer of my slips; so forgive me my sin, O Most Merciful of the merciful.
items.transliteration: Ya mafza'i 'inda kurbati wa-ya ghawthi 'inda shiddati ilayka fazi'tu, wa-bika istaghathtu, wa-bika ludhtu, la aludhu bi-siwaka, wa-la atlubu al-faraja illa minka, fa-aghithni wa-farrij 'anni ya man yaqbalu al-yasira, wa-ya'fu 'an al-kathiri, iqbal minni al-yasira, wa-'fu 'anni al-kathira, innaka anta al-Ghafuru al-Rahimu, Allahumma inni as'aluka imanan tubashiru bihi qalbi wa-yaqinan hatta a'lama annahu lan yusibani illa ma katabta li wa-raddini min al-'ayshi bima qasamta li ya arhama al-rahimina, ya 'uddati fi kurbati wa-ya sahibi fi shiddati wa-ya waliyyi fi ni'mati wa-ya ghayati fi raghbati anta al-satiru 'awrati wa-al-aminu raw'ati wa-al-muqilu 'athrati fa-ighfir li khati'ati ya arhama al-rahimina.

O my Provision in my distress, O my Companion in my hardship, O my Guardian in my blessing, and O my Goal in my desire! You are the Concealer of my faults, the Securer of my fear, and the Pardoner of my slip; so forgive me my sin, O Most Merciful of the merciful.
items.transliteration: Ya mafza'i 'inda kurbati wa-ya ghawthi 'inda shiddati ilayka fazi'tu, wa-bika istaghathtu, wa-bika ludhtu, la aludhu bi-siwaka, wa-la atlubu al-faraja illa minka, fa-aghithni wa-farrij 'anni ya man yaqbalu al-yasira, wa-ya'fu 'an al-kathiri, iqbal minni al-yasira, wa-i'fu 'anni al-kathira, innaka anta al-Ghafuru al-Rahimu. Allahumma inni as'aluka imanan tubashiru bihi qalbi wa-yaqinan hatta a'lama annahu lan yusibani illa ma katabta li wa-raddini min al-'ayshi bima qasamta li ya arhama al-rahimina. Ya 'uddati fi kurbati wa-ya sahibi fi shiddati wa-ya waliyyi fi ni'mati wa-ya ghayati fi raghbati anta al-satiru 'awrati wa-al-aminu raw'ati wa-al-muqilu 'athrati fa-ighfir li khati'ati ya arhama al-rahimina.

items.english: the Single, the Unique. Glory be to the Magnificent, the Most Grand. Glory be to Him Who does not treat the inhabitants of His kingdom with injustice. Glory be to Him Who does not seize the people of the earth with various forms of punishment. Glory be to the Compassionate, the All-Bounteous. Glory be to the All-Kind, the All-Merciful. Glory be to the All-Compelling, the All-Generous. Glory be to the Noble, the Forbearing. Glory be to the All-Seeing, the All-Knowing. Glory be to the All-Seeing, the All-Embracing. Glory be to Allah at the arrival of the day. Glory be to Allah at the departure of the day. Glory be to Allah at the departure of the night and the arrival of the day. To Him belong all praise, glory, greatness, and majesty, with every breath, every blink of an eye, and every glance that has preceded in His knowledge. Glory be to You to the fullness of what Your Book has recorded. Glory be to You to the weight of Your Throne. Glory be to You, Glory be to You, Glory be to You. Note: It is better for the intention of fasting to be made after the pre-dawn meal, though it may be made from the beginning of the night until its end; indeed, it is sufficient that one knows and intends to fast the following day. It is preferable, as mentioned previously, not to neglect the nocturnal supererogatory prayer during the dawn hours.
items.transliteration: Al-fardi al-witri, subhana al-'azimi al-a'zami, subhana man la ya'tadi 'ala ahli mamlakatihi, subhana man la yu'akhidhu ahla al-ardi bi-alwani al-'adhabi, subhana al-hannani al-mannani, subhana al-ra'ufi al-rahimi, subhana al-jabbari al-jawadi, subhana al-karimi al-halimi, subhana al-basiri al-'alimi, subhana al-basiri al-wasi'i, subhana Allahi 'ala iqbali al-nahari, subhana Allahi 'ala idbari al-nahari, subhana Allahi 'ala idbari al-layli wa-iqbali al-nahari, wa-lahu al-hamdu wa-al-majdu wa-al-'azamatu wa-al-kibriya'u, ma'a kulli nafasin wa-kulli tarfati 'aynin, wa-kulli lamhatin sabaqa fi 'ilmihi, subhanaka mil'a ma ahsa kitabuka, subhanaka zinata 'arshika, subhanaka subhanaka subhanaka. Tanbih: al-afdalu an takuna niyyatu al-sawmi ba'da tanawuli al-sahari, kama yumkinu 'aqduha min awwali al-layli ila akhirihi, bal yakfi hadha al-miqdaru annahu ya'lamu wa-yaqsidu sawma al-ghadi, wa-al-awla kama aslafna an la yada'a nafilata al-layli fi al-ashari.

items.arabic: وردت عدّة أعمال لأيّام شهر رمضان:
items.english: Several acts have been reported for the days of the month of Ramadan:
items.transliteration: Waradat 'iddatu a'malin li-ayyami shahri Ramadana:

items.arabic: 1. أن يدعو كلّ يوم بهذا الدعاء المرويّ في الكتب المعتبرة:
items.english: 1. To recite every day this supplication reported in the reliable books:
items.transliteration: 1. An yad'uwa kulla yawmin bi-hadha al-du'a'i al-marwiyyi fi al-kutubi al-mu'tabarati:

items.arabic: اللهُمَّ هذا شَهْرُ رَمَضانَ، الَّذى انْزَلْتَ فيهِ الْقُرآنَ، هُدىً لِلنَّاسِ وَبَيِّناتٍ مِنَ الْهُدى وَالْفُرقانِ، وَهذا شَهْرُ الصِّيامِ، وَهذا شَهْرُ الْقِيامِ، وَهذا شَهْرُ الْإِنابَةِ، وَهذا شَهْرُ التَّوْبَةِ، وَهذا شَهْرُ الْمَغْفِرَةِ وَالرَّحْمَةِ، وَهذا شَهْرُ الْعِتْقِ مِنَ النَّارِ، وَالْفَوْزِ
items.english: O Allah, this is the month of Ramadan, in which You sent down the Quran as a guidance for mankind and clear proofs of guidance and the criterion. And this is the month of fasting, and this is the month of standing in prayer, and this is the month of turning in penitence, and this is the month of repentance, and this is the month of forgiveness and mercy, and this is the month of emancipation from the Fire and the attainment of...
items.transliteration: Allahumma hadha shahru Ramadana, alladhi anzalta fihi al-Qur'ana, hudan li-al-nasi wa-bayyinatin min al-huda wa-al-furqani, wa-hadha shahru al-siyami, wa-hadha shahru al-qiyami, wa-hadha shahru al-inabati, wa-hadha shahru al-tawbati, wa-hadha shahru al-maghfirati wa-al-rahmati, wa-hadha shahru al-'itqi min al-nari, wa-al-fawzi

items.arabic: بِالْجَنَّةِ، وَهذا شَهْرٌ فيهِ لَيْلَةُ الْقَدْرِ، الَّتى هِىَ خَيْرٌ مِنْ الْفِ شَهْرٍ، اللهُمَّ فَصَلِّ عَلى مُحَمَّدٍ وَآلِ مُحَمَّدٍ، وَاعِنّى عَلى صِيامِهِ وَقِيامِهِ، وَسَلِّمْهُ لى وَسَلِّمْنى فيهِ، وَاعِنّى عَلَيْهِ بِافْضَلِ عَوْنِكَ، وَوَفِّقْنى فيهِ لِطاعَتِكَ، وَطاعَةِ رَسُولِكَ وَاوْلِيآئِكَ صَلَّى اللَّهُ عَلَيْهِمْ، وَفَرِّغْنى فيهِ لِعِبادَتِكَ وَدُعآئِكَ، وَتِلاوَةِ كِتابِكَ، وَعَظِّمْ لى فيهِ الْبَرَكَةَ، وَاحْسِنْ لى فيهِ الْعافِيَةَ، وَاصِحَّ فيهِ بَدَنى وَاوْسِعْ لى فيهِ رِزْقى وَاكْفِنى فيهِ ما اهَمَّنى وَاسْتَجِبْ فيهِ دُعآئى وَبَلِّغْنى فيهِ رَجآئى اللهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلى مُحَمَّدٍ وَآلِ مُحَمَّدٍ، وَاذْهِبْ عَنّى فيهِ النُّعاسَ وَالْكَسَلَ، وَالسَّاْمَةَ وَالْفَتْرَةَ، وَالْقَسْوَةَ وَالْغَفْلَةَ وَالْغِرَّةَ، وَجَنِّبْنى فيهِ الْعِلَلَ وَالْأَسْقامَ، وَالْهُمُومَ وَالْأَحْزانَ، وَالْأَعْراضَ وَالْأَمْراضَ، وَالْخَطايا وَالذُّنُوبَ، وَاصْرِفْ عَنّى فيهِ السُّوءَ وَالْفَحشآءَ، وَالْجَهْدَ وَالْبَلاءَ، وَالتَّعَبَ وَالْعَنآءَ، انَّكَ سَميعُ الدُّعآءِ، اللهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلى مُحَمَّدٍ وَآلِ مُحَمَّدٍ، وَاعِذْنى فيهِ مِنَ الشَّيْطانِ الرَّجيمِ، وَهَمْزِهِ وَلَمْزِهِ، وَنَفْثِهِ وَنَفْخِهِ، وَوَسْوَسَتِهِ وَتَثْبيطِهِ، وَبَطْشِهِ وَكَيْدِهِ وَمَكْرِهِ، وَحَبآئِلِهِ وَخُدَعِهِ، وَامانِيِّهِ وَغُرُورِهِ، وَفِتْنَتِهِ وَشَرَكِهِ، وَاحْزابِهِ وَاتْباعِهِ، وَاشْياعِهِ وَاوْلِيآئِهِ، وَشُرَكآئِهِ وَجَميعِ مَكائِدِهِ، اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلى مُحَمَّدٍ وَآلِ مُحَمَّدٍ، وَارْزُقْنا قِيامَهُ وَصِيامَهُ، وَبُلُوغَ الْأَمَلِ فيهِ وَفى قِيامِهِ، وَاسْتِكْمالَ ما يُرْضيكَ عَنّى صَبْراً وَاحْتِساباً، وَايماناً وَيَقيناً، ثُمَّ تَقَبَّلْ ذلِكَ مِنّى بِالْأَضْعافِ الْكَثيرَةِ، وَالْأَجْرِ الْعَظيمِ، يا رَبَّ الْعالَمينَ، اللهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلى مُحَمَّدٍ وَآلِ مُحَمَّدٍ، وَارْزُقْنِى الْحَجَّ وَالْعُمْرَةَ، وَالْإِجْتِهادَ وَالْقُوَّةَ وَالنَّشاطَ، وَالْإِنابَةَ وَ التَّوْبَةَ، وَ الْقُرْبَةَ وَ الْخَيْرَ الْمَقْبُولَ، وَ الرَّهْبَةَ وَ الرَّغْبَةَ، وَ التَّضَرُّعَ وَ الْخُشُوعَ، وَ الرِّقَّةَ وَ النِّيَّةَ الصَّادِقَهَ، وَ صِدْقَ اللِّسانِ، وَ الْوَجَلَ مِنْكَ، وَ الرَّجآءَ لَكَ، وَ التَّوَكُّلَ عَلَيْكَ، وَ الثِّقَةَ بِكَ، وَ الْوَرَعَ عَنْ مَحارِمِكَ، مَعَ صالِحِ الْقَوْلِ، وَ مَقْبُولِ السَّعْىِ، وَ items.english: with Paradise; and this is a month in which is the Night of Decree, which is better than a thousand months. O Allah, send blessings upon Muhammad and the progeny of Muhammad, and help me in its fasting and its standing in prayer, and deliver it to me and deliver me within it, and aid me in it with the best of Your aid. And grant me success in it for Your obedience, and the obedience of Your Messenger and Your guardians—may Allah bless them—and free me within it for Your worship and Your supplication, and the recitation of Your Book. And magnify for me the blessing in it, and make good for me my well-being in it, and make my body healthy in it, and expand for me my provision in it, and suffice me in it regarding what concerns me, and answer my supplication in it, and make me attain my hope in it. O Allah, send blessings upon Muhammad and the progeny of Muhammad, and remove from me in it drowsiness and laziness, weariness and languor, hard-heartedness, heedlessness, and delusion; and keep away from me in it ailments and sicknesses, worries and sorrows, afflictions and diseases, faults and sins. And turn away from me in it evil and indecency, hardship and tribulation, and exhaustion and fatigue; indeed, You are the Hearer of supplication. O Allah, send blessings upon Muhammad and the progeny of Muhammad, and protect me in it from the accursed Shaitan, and from his prodding and his slandering, his puffing and his blowing, his whispering and his discouraging, his assault, his plotting, and his deception, his snares and his tricks, his false desires and his delusion, his trial and his traps, and his factions, his followers, his partisans, his allies, his associates, and all his schemes. O Allah, send blessings upon Muhammad and the progeny of Muhammad, and grant us its standing in prayer and its fasting, and the attainment of hope in it and in its standing, and the completion of that which pleases You from me, with patience and seeking reward, and with faith and certainty; then accept that from me with manifold increases and a great reward, O Lord of the worlds. O Allah, send blessings upon Muhammad and the progeny of Muhammad, and grant me the Hajj and the Umrah, and diligence, strength, and vigor, and turning in penitence and repentance, and nearness and accepted good, and awe and desire, and supplication and humility, and tenderness and a sincere intention, and truthfulness of the tongue, and fear of You, and hope in You, and reliance upon You, and trust in You, and wariness of Your prohibitions, along with righteous speech, and accepted endeavor, and elevated deed, and answered supplication; and do not come between me and...
items.transliteration: bi-al-jannati, wa-hadha shahrun fihi laylatu al-qadri, allati hiya khayrun min alfi shahrin, Allahumma fa-salli 'ala Muhammadin wa-ali Muhammadin, wa-a'inni 'ala siyamihi wa-qiyamihi, wa-sallimhu li wa-sallimni fihi, wa-a'inni 'alayhi bi-afdali 'awnika, wa-waffiqni fihi li-ta'atika, wa-ta'ati rasulika wa-awliya'ika salla Allahu 'alayhim, wa-farrighni fihi li-'ibadatika wa-du'a'ika, wa-tilawati kitabika, wa-'azzim li fihi al-barakata, wa-ahsin li fihi al-'afiyata, wa-asihha fihi badani wa-awsi' li fihi rizqi wa-ikfini fihi ma ahammani wa-istajib fihi du'a'i wa-ballighni fihi raja'i. Allahumma salli 'ala Muhammadin wa-ali Muhammadin, wa-adhhib 'anni fihi al-nu'asa wa-al-kasala, wa-al-sa'mata wa-al-fatrata, wa-al-qaswata wa-al-ghaflata wa-al-ghirrata, wa-jannibni fihi al-'ilala wa-al-asqama, wa-al-humuma wa-al-ahzana, wa-al-a'rada wa-al-amrada, wa-al-khataya wa-al-dhunuba, wa-asrif 'anni fihi al-su'a wa-al-fahsha'a, wa-al-jahda wa-al-bala'a, wa-al-ta'aba wa-al-'ana'a, innaka sami'u al-du'a'i. Allahumma salli 'ala Muhammadin wa-ali Muhammadin, wa-a'idhni fihi min al-shaytani al-rajimi, wa-hamzihi wa-lamzihi, wa-nafthihi wa-nafkhihi, wa-waswasatihi wa-tathbitihi, wa-batshihi wa-kaydihi wa-makrihi, wa-haba'ilihi wa-khuda'ihi, wa-amaniyyihi wa-ghururihi, wa-fitnatihi wa-sharakihi, wa-ahzabihi wa-atba'ihi, wa-ashya'ihi wa-awliya'ihi, wa-shuraka'ihi wa-jami'i maka'idihi. Allahumma salli 'ala Muhammadin wa-ali Muhammadin, wa-arzuqna qiyamahu wa-siyamahu, wa-bulugha al-amali fihi wa-fi qiyamihi, wa-istikmala ma yurdika 'anni sabran wa-ihtisaban, wa-imanan wa-yaqinan, thumma taqabbal dhalika minni bi-al-ad'afi al-kathirati, wa-al-ajri al-'azimi, ya Rabba al-'alamina. Allahumma salli 'ala Muhammadin wa-ali Muhammadin, wa-arzuqni al-hajja wa-al-'umrata, wa-al-ijtihada wa-al-quwwata wa-al-nashata, wa-al-inabata wa-al-tawbata, wa-al-qurbata wa-al-khayra al-maqbula, wa-al-rahbata wa-al-raghbata, wa-al-tadarru'a wa-al-khushu'a, wa-al-riqqata wa-al-niyyata al-sadiqata, wa-sidqa al-lisani, wa-al-wajala minka, wa-al-raja'a laka, wa-al-tawakkula 'alayka, wa-al-thiqata bika, wa-al-wara'a 'an maharimika, ma'a salihi al-qawli, wa-maqbuli al-sa'yi, wa-marfu'i al-'amali, wa-mustajabi al-da'wati, wa-la tahul bayni wa-bayna

items.arabic: شىْ ءٍ مِنْ ذلِكَ بِعَرَضٍ وَلا مَرَضٍ، وَلا هَمٍّ وَلا غَمٍّ وَلا سُقْمٍ، وَلا غَفْلَةٍ وَلا نِسْيانٍ، بَلْ بِالتَّعاهُدِ وَ التَّحَفُّظِ لَكَ وَفيكَ، وَ الرِّعايَةِ لِحَقِّكَ، وَ الْوَفآءِ بَعَهْدِكَ وَ وَعْدِكَ، بِرَحْمَتِكَ يا ارْحَمَ الرَّاحِمينَ، اللهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلى مُحَمَّدٍ وَآلِ مُحَمَّدٍ، وَ اقْسِمْ لى فيهِ افْضَلَ ما تَقْسِمُهُ لِعبادِكَ الصَّالِحينَ، وَ اعْطِنى فيهِ افْضَلَ ما تُعْطى اوْلِيآئَكَ الْمُقَرَّبينَ، مِنَ الرَّحْمَةِ وَالْمَغْفِرَةِ، وَ التَّحَنُّنِ وَ الْإِجابَةِ، وَ الْعَفْوِ وَ الْمَغْفِرَةِ الدَّائِمَةِ، وَ الْعافِيَةِ وَ الْمُعافاةِ، وَ الْعِتْقِ مِنَ النَّارِ وَ الْفَوْزِ بِالْجَنَّةِ، وَخَيْرِ الدُّنْيا وَالْأخِرَةِ، اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلى مُحَمَّدٍ وَآلِ مُحَمَّدٍ، وَ اجْعَلْ دُعآئى فيهِ الَيْكَ واصِلًا، وَرَحْمَتَكَ وَخَيْرَكَ الَىَّ فيهِ نازِلًا، وَعَمَلى فيهِ مَقْبُولًا، وَسَعْيى فيهِ مَشْكُوراً، وَذَنْبى فيهِ مَغْفُوراً، حَتّى يَكُونَ نَصيبى فيهِ الْأَكْثَرَ، وَحَظِّى فيهِ الْأَوْفَرَ، اللهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلى مُحَمَّدٍ وَآلِ مُحَمَّدٍ، وَوَفِّقْنى فيهِ لِلَيْلَةِ الْقَدْرِ عَلى افْضَلِ حالٍ تُحِبُّ انْ يَكُونَ عَلَيْها احَدٌ مِنْ اوْلِيآئِكَ، وَارْضاها لَكَ، ثُمَّ اجْعَلْها لى خَيْراً مِنْ الْفِ شَهْرٍ، وَارْزُقْنى فيها افْضَلَ ما رَزَقْتَ احَداً مِمَّنْ بَلَّغْتَهُ ايَّاها، وَاكْرَمْتَهُ بِها، وَاجْعَلْنى فيها مِنْ عُتَقآئِكَ مِنْ جَهَنَّمَ، وَطُلَقآئِكَ مِنَ النَّارِ، وَسُعَداءِ خَلْقِكَ، بِمَغْفِرَتِكَ وَرِضْوانِكَ يا ارْحَمَ الرَّاحِمينَ، اللهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلى مُحَمَّدٍ وَآلِ مُحَمَّدٍ، وَارْزُقْنا فى شَهْرِنا هذَا الْجِدَّ وَالْإِجْتِهادَ، وَالْقُوَّةَ وَالنَّشاطَ، وَما تُحِبُّ وَتَرْضى اللهُمَّ رَبَّ الْفَجْرِ وَلَيالٍ عَشْرٍ، وَ الشَّفْعِ وَ الْوَتْرِ، وَربَّ شَهْرِ رَمَضانَ، وَما انْزَلْتَ فيهِ مِنَ الْقُرآنِ، وَرَبَّ جَبْرَئيلَ وَميكآئيلَ وَاسْرافيلَ، وَجَميعِ الْمَلائِكَةِ الْمُقَرَّبينَ، وَربَّ ابْراهيمَ وَاسْماعيلَ، وَاسْحقَ وَيَعْقُوبَ، وَربَّ مُوسى وَعيسى وَجميعِ النَّبِيّينَ وَالْمُرْسَلينَ، وَربَّ مُحَمَّدٍ خاتَمِ النَّبِيِّينَ، صَلَواتُكَ عَلَيْهِ وَعَلَيْهِمْ اجْمَعينَ، وَاسْئَلُكَ بِحَقِّكَ عَلَيْهِمْ وَبِحَقِّهِمْ عَلَيْكَ، وَبِحَقِّكَ الْعَظيمِ، لَمَّا صَلَّيْتَ عَلَيْهِ وَآلِهِ وَعَلَيْهِمْ اجْمَعينَ، وَنَظَرْتَ الَىَّ نَظْرَةً رَحيمَةً، تَرْضى بِها عَنّى رِضىً لا تَسْخَطُ
items.english: any of that by affliction or illness, nor by anxiety, nor grief, nor sickness, nor heedlessness, nor forgetfulness, but rather through commitment and preservation for Your sake and in You, and by observing Your right, and fulfilling Your covenant and Your promise, by Your mercy, O Most Merciful of the merciful. O Allah, send blessings upon Muhammad and the progeny of Muhammad, and allot to me in it the best of what You allot to Your righteous servants, and grant me in it the best of what You grant Your near ones among Your friends: of mercy and forgiveness, of tenderness and response, of pardon and everlasting forgiveness, of well-being and protection, of freedom from the Fire and attainment of Paradise, and the good of this world and the Hereafter. O Allah, send blessings upon Muhammad and the progeny of Muhammad, and make my supplication in it reaching You, and Your mercy and Your goodness in it descending upon me, and my deeds in it accepted, and my effort in it appreciated, and my sin in it forgiven, so that my share in it becomes the greatest and my portion in it the most abundant. O Allah, send blessings upon Muhammad and the progeny of Muhammad, and grant me success in it for the Night of Decree in the best state that You love for any of Your friends to be in, and which is most pleasing to You. Then make it for me better than a thousand months, and grant me in it the best of what You have granted anyone whom You have enabled to reach it and honored through it. And include me in it among those You have emancipated from Hell, those You have released from the Fire, and the most fortunate of Your creation, through Your forgiveness and Your pleasure, O Most Merciful of the merciful. O Allah, send blessings upon Muhammad and the progeny of Muhammad, and grant us in this month of ours diligence and exertion, and strength and vitality, and what You love and are pleased with. O Allah, Lord of the dawn and the ten nights, and the even and the odd; and Lord of the month of Ramadan and what You sent down in it of the Quran; and Lord of Jibra’il, Mika’il, and Israfil, and all the near angels; and Lord of Ibrahim, Isma’il, Ishaq, and Ya’qub; and Lord of Musa, ‘Isa, and all the Prophets and Messengers; and Lord of Muhammad, the Seal of the Prophets—Your blessings be upon him and upon them all. And I ask You by Your right over them and by their right over You, and by Your Great Right, that You send blessings upon him and his progeny and upon them all, and that You look upon me with a merciful gaze, by which You are pleased with me—a pleasure after which You will never be displeased.
items.transliteration: shay'in min dhalika bi-'aradin wa-la maradin, wa-la hammin wa-la ghammin wa-la suqmin, wa-la ghaflatin wa-la nisyanin, bal bi-al-ta'ahudi wa-al-tahaffuzi laka wa-fika, wa-al-ri'ayati li-haqqika, wa-al-wafa'i bi-'ahdika wa-wa'dika, bi-rahmatika ya arhama al-rahimina, Allahumma salli 'ala Muhammadin wa-ali Muhammadin, wa-aqsim li fihi afdala ma taqsimuhu li-'ibadika al-salihina, wa-a'tini fihi afdala ma tu'ti awliya'aka al-muqarrabina, min al-rahmati wa-al-maghfirati, wa-al-tahannuni wa-al-ijabati, wa-al-'afwi wa-al-maghfirati al-da'imati, wa-al-'afiyati wa-al-mu'afati, wa-al-'itqi min al-nari wa-al-fawzi bi-al-jannati, wa-khayri al-dunya wa-al-akhirati, Allahumma salli 'ala Muhammadin wa-ali Muhammadin, wa-ij'al du'a'i fihi ilayka wasilan, wa-rahmataka wa-khayraka ilayya fihi nazilan, wa-'amali fihi maqbulan, wa-sa'yi fihi mashkuran, wa-dhanbi fihi maghfuran, hatta yakuna nasibi fihi al-akthara, wa-hazzi fihi al-awfara, Allahumma salli 'ala Muhammadin wa-ali Muhammadin, wa-waffiqni fihi li-laylati al-qadri 'ala afdali halin tuhibbu an yakuna 'alayha ahadun min awliya'ika, wa-ardaha laka, thumma ij'alha li khayran min alfi shahrin, wa-arzuqni fiha afdala ma razaqta ahadan mimman ballaghtahu iyaha, wa-akramtahu biha, wa-ij'alni fiha min 'utaqa'ika min jahannama, wa-tulaqa'ika min al-nari, wa-su'ada'i khalqika, bi-maghfiratika wa-ridwanika ya arhama al-rahimina, Allahumma salli 'ala Muhammadin wa-ali Muhammadin, wa-arzuqna fi shahrina hadha al-jidda wa-al-ijtihada, wa-al-quwwata wa-al-nashata, wa-ma tuhibbu wa-tarda, Allahumma Rabba al-fajri wa-layalin 'ashrin, wa-al-shaf'i wa-al-watri, wa-Rabba shahri Ramadana, wa-ma anzalta fihi min al-Qur'ani, wa-Rabba Jabra'ila wa-Mika'ila wa-Israfila, wa-jami'i al-mala'ikati al-muqarrabina, wa-Rabba Ibrahima wa-Isma'ila, wa-Ishaqa wa-Ya'quba, wa-Rabba Musa wa-'Isa wa-jami'i al-nabiyyina wa-al-mursalina, wa-Rabba Muhammadin khatami al-nabiyyina, salawatuka 'alayhi wa-'alayhim ajma'ina, wa-as'aluka bi-haqqika 'alayhim wa-bi-haqqihim 'alayka, wa-bi-haqqika al-'azimi, lamma sallayta 'alayhi wa-alihi wa-'alayhim ajma'ina, wa-nazarta ilayya nazratan rahimatan, tarda biha 'anni ridan la taskhatu
