items.arabic: عَلَىَّ بَعْدَهُ ابَداً، وَاعْطَيْتَنى جَميعَ سُؤْلى وَرَغْبَتى وَامْنِيَّتى وَارادَتى وَصَرَفْتَ عَنّى ما اكْرَهُ وَاحْذَرُ، وَاخافُ عَلى نَفْسى وَما لا اخافُ، وَعَنْ اهْلى وَمالى وَاخْوانى وَذُرِّيَّتى اللهُمَّ الَيْكَ فَرَرْنا مِنْ ذُنُوبِنا فاوِنا تآئِبينَ، وَتُبْ عَلَيْنا مُسْتَغْفِرينَ، وَاغْفِرْ لَنا مُتَعوِّذينَ، وَاعِذْنا مُسْتَجيرينَ، وَاجِرْنا مُسْتَسْلِمينَ، وَلا تَخْذُلْنا راهِبينَ، وَآمِنَّا راغِبينَ، وَشَفِّعْنا سآئِلينَ، وَاعْطِنا انَّكَ سَميعُ الدُّعآءِ، قَريبٌ مُجيبٌ، اللهُمَّ انْتَ رَبِّى وَانَا عَبْدُكَ، وَاحَقُّ مَنْ سَئَلَ الْعَبْدُ رَبَّهُ، وَلَمْ يَسْئَلِ الْعِبادُ مِثْلَكَ كَرَماً وَجُوداً، يا مَوْضِعَ شَكْوَى السَّائِلينَ، وَيا مُنْتَهى حاجَةِ الرَّاغِبينَ، وَيا غِياثَ الْمُسْتَغيثينَ، وَيا مُجيبَ دَعْوَةِ الْمُضْطَرّينَ، وَيا مَلْجَا الْهارِبينَ، وَيا صَريخَ الْمُسْتَصْرِخينَ، وَيا رَبَّ الْمُسْتَضْعَفينَ، وَيا كاشِفَ كَرْبِ الْمَكْرُوبينَ، وَيا فارِجَ هَمِّ الْمَهْمُومينَ، وَيا كاشِفَ الْكَرْبِ الْعَظيمِ، يا اللَّهُ يا رَحْمنُ يا رَحيمُ، يا ارْحَمَ الرَّاحِمينَ، صَلِّ عَلى مُحَمَّدٍ وَآلِ مُحَمَّدٍ، وَاغْفِرْ لى ذُنُوبى وَعُيُوبى وَاسآئَتى وَظُلْمى وَجُرْمى وَاسْرافى عَلى نَفْسى وَارْزُقْنى مِنْ فَضْلِكَ وَرَحْمَتِكَ، فَانَّهُ لا يَمْلِكُها غَيْرُكَ، وَاعْفُ عَنّى وَاغْفِرْ لى كُلَّ ما سَلَفَ مِنْ ذُنُوبى وَاعْصِمْنى فيما بَقِىَ مِنْ عُمْرى وَاسْتُرْ عَلَىَّ وَعَلى والِدىَّ وَوُلْدى وَقَرابَتى وَاهْلِ حُزانَتى وَمَنْ كانَ مِنّى بِسَبيلٍ مِنَ الْمُؤْمِنينَ وَالْمُؤْمِناتِ فى الدُّنْيا وَالْأخِرَةِ، فَانَّ ذلِكَ كُلَّهُ بِيَدِكَ، وَانْتَ واسِعُ الْمَغْفِرَةِ، فَلا تُخَيِّبْنى يا سَيِّدى وَلا تَرُدَّ عَلَىَّ دُعآئى وَلا يَدى الى نَحْرى حَتّى تَفْعَلَ ذلِكَ بى وَتَسْتَجيبَ لى جَميعَ ما سَئَلْتُكَ، وَتَزيدَنى مِنْ فَضْلِكَ، فَانَّكَ عَلى كُلِّ شَىْ ءٍ قَديرٌ، وَنَحْنُ الَيْكَ راغِبُونَ، اللهُمَّ لَكَ الْأَسْمآءُ الْحُسْنى وَالْأَمْثالُ الْعُلْيا، وَالْكِبْرِيآءُ وَالْألاءُ، اسْئَلُكَ بِاسْمِكَ بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمنِ الرَّحيمِ، انْ كُنْتَ قَضَيْتَ فى هذِهِ اللَّيْلَةِ تَنَزُّلَ الْمَلائِكَةِ وَالرُّوحِ فيها، انْ تُصَلِّىَ عَلى مُحَمَّدٍ وَآلِ مُحَمَّدٍ، وَانْ تَجْعَلَ اسْمى فِى
items.english: ...ever upon me after it; and grant me all my requests, my desires, my wishes, and my intentions, and turn away from me what I dislike and what I am wary of, and what I fear for myself and what I do not fear, and [away] from my family, my wealth, my brothers, and my progeny. O Allah, to You we have fled from our sins, so give us refuge as penitents; and accept our repentance as seekers of forgiveness; and forgive us as seekers of refuge; and grant us refuge as seekers of protection; and protect us as those who submit; and do not forsake us while we are in awe; and grant us security while we are hopeful; and grant us intercession as petitioners; and give to us, for indeed You are the Hearer of supplication, Near and Responsive. O Allah, You are my Lord and I am Your servant, and the most worthy of whom a servant asks is his Lord; and the servants have never asked anyone like You in generosity and bounty. O Place of complaint for the petitioners! O Ultimate Goal of the need of the hopeful! O Succor of those who seek aid! O Responder to the call of the distressed! O Refuge of the fugitives! O Helper of those who cry for help! O Lord of the oppressed! O Dispeller of the distress of the afflicted! O Reliever of the anxiety of the grieved! O Dispeller of the great distress! O Allah, O Compassionate, O Merciful! O Most Merciful of the merciful! Send blessings upon Muhammad and the progeny of Muhammad, and forgive me my sins, my defects, my wrongdoings, my injustice, my crimes, and my excesses against myself; and grant me from Your grace and Your mercy, for indeed none possesses them but You. And pardon me and forgive me all my past sins, and protect me for the remainder of my life, and cover [the faults of] me, my parents, my children, my relatives, those dear to me, and whoever is associated with me among the faithful men and women in this world and the Hereafter; for indeed all of that is in Your hand, and You are Vast in forgiveness. So do not disappoint me, O my Master, and do not reject my supplication, nor return my hands empty to my neck until You have done that for me and responded to me in all that I have asked of You, and increased me from Your grace; for indeed You are Powerful over all things, and to You we turn in hope. O Allah, to You belong the Most Beautiful Names, the Highest Examples, Grandeur, and Bounties. I ask You by Your Name—In the Name of Allah, the Compassionate, the Merciful—if You have decreed in this night the descent of the angels and the Spirit therein, to send blessings upon Muhammad and the progeny of Muhammad, and to place my name among...
items.transliteration: 'alayya ba'dahu abadan, wa-a'taytani jami'a su'li wa-raghbati wa-umniyyati wa-iradati wa-sarafta 'anni ma akrahu wa-ahdharu, wa-akhafu 'ala nafsi wa-ma la akhafu, wa-'an ahli wa-mali wa-ikhwani wa-dhurriyyati. Allahumma ilayka fararna min dhunubina fa-awina ta'ibina, wa-tub 'alayna mustaghfirina, wa-ighfir lana muta'awwidhina, wa-a'idhna mustajirina, wa-ajirna mustaslimina, wa-la takhdhulna rahibina, wa-aminna raghibina, wa-shaffi'na sa'ilina, wa-a'tina innaka sami'u al-du'a'i, qaribun mujibun. Allahumma anta rabbi wa-ana 'abduka, wa-ahaqqu man sa'ala al-'abdu rabbahu, wa-lam yas'ali al-'ibadu mithlaka karaman wa-judan. Ya mawdi'a shakwa al-sa'ilina, wa-ya muntaha hajati al-raghibina, wa-ya ghiyatha al-mustaghithina, wa-ya mujiba da'wati al-mudtarrina, wa-ya malja'a al-haribina, wa-ya sarikha al-mustasrikhina, wa-ya Rabba al-mustad'afina, wa-ya kashifa karbi al-makrubina, wa-ya farija hammi al-mahmumina, wa-ya kashifa al-karbi al-'azimi, ya Allahu ya Rahmanu ya Rahimu, ya arhama al-rahimina, salli 'ala Muhammadin wa-ali Muhammadin, wa-ighfir li dhunubi wa-'uyubi wa-isa'ati wa-zulmi wa-jurmi wa-israfi 'ala nafsi wa-arzuqni min fadlika wa-rahmatika, fa-innahu la yamlikuha ghayruka, wa-fu 'anni wa-ighfir li kulla ma salafa min dhunubi wa-i'simni fima baqiya min 'umri wa-ustur 'alayya wa-'ala walidayya wa-wuldi wa-qarabati wa-ahli huzanati wa-man kana minni bi-sabilin min al-mu'minina wa-al-mu'minati fi al-dunya wa-al-akhirati, fa-inna dhalika kullahu bi-yadika, wa-anta wasi'u al-maghfirati, fa-la tukhayyibni ya sayyidi wa-la tarudda 'alayya du'a'i wa-la yadi ila nahri hatta taf'ala dhalika bi wa-tastajiba li jami'a ma sa'altuka, wa-tazidani min fadlika, fa-innaka 'ala kulli shay'in qadirun, wa-nahnu ilayka raghibuna. Allahumma laka al-asma'u al-husna wa-al-amthalu al-'ulya, wa-al-kibriya'u wa-al-ala'u, as'aluka bi-ismika Bismi Allahi al-Rahmani al-Rahimi, in kunta qadayta fi hadhihi al-laylati tanazzula al-mala'ikati wa-al-ruhi fiha, an tusalliya 'ala Muhammadin wa-ali Muhammadin, wa-an taj'ala ismi fi

items.arabic: السُّعَدآءِ، وَرُوحى مَعَ الشُّهَدآءِ، وَاحْسانى فى عِلِّيّينَ، وَاسآئَتى مَغْفُورَةً، وَانْ تَهَبَ لى يَقيناً تُباشِرُ بِهِ قَلْبى وَايماناً لا يَشُوبُهُ شَكٌّ، وَرِضىً بِما قَسَمْتَ لى وَآتِنى فى الدُّنْيا حَسَنَةً، وَفِى الأخِرَةِ حَسَنَةً، وَقِنى عَذابَ النَّارِ، وَانْ لَمْ تَكُنْ قَضَيْتَ فى هذِهِ اللَّيْلَةِ تَنَزُّلَ الْمَلئِكَةِ وَالرُّوحِ فيها، فَاخِّرْنى الى ذلِكَ، وَارْزُقْنى فيها ذِكْرَكَ وَشُكْرَكَ، وَطاعَتَكَ وَحُسْنَ عِبادَتِكَ، وَصَلِّ عَلى مُحَمَّدٍ وَآلِ مُحَمَّدٍ بِافْضَلِ صَلَواتِكَ، يا ارْحَمَ الرَّاحِمينَ، يا احَدُ يا صَمَدُ، يا رَبَّ مُحَمَّدٍ اغْضَبِ الْيَوْمَ لِمُحَمَّدٍ وَلِأَبْرارِ عِتْرَتِهِ، وَاقْتُلْ اعْدائَهُمْ بَدَداً، وَاحْصِهِمْ عَدَداً، وَلا تَدَعْ عَلى ظَهْرِ الأَرْضِ مِنْهُمْ احَداً، وَلا تَغْفِرْ لَهُمْ ابَداً، يا حَسَنَ الصُّحْبَةِ، يا خَليفَةَ النَّبِيّينَ، انْتَ ارْحَمُ الرَّاحِمينَ، الْبَدى ءُ الْبَديعُ، الَّذى لَيْسَ كَمِثْلِكَ شَىْ ءٌ، وَالدَّآئِمُ غَيْرُ الْغافِلِ، وَالْحَىُّ الَّذى لا يَمُوتُ، انْتَ كُلَّ يَوْمٍ فى شَاْنٍ، انْتَ خَليفَةُ مُحَمَّدٍ، وَناصِرُ مُحَمَّدٍ، وَمُفَضِّلُ مُحَمَّدٍ، اسْئَلُكَ انْ تَنْصُرَ وَصِىَّ مُحَمَّدٍ، وَخَليفَةَ مُحَمَّدٍ، وَالْقآئِمَ بِالْقِسْطِ مِنْ اوْصِيآءِ مُحَمَّدٍ، صَلَواتُكَ عَلَيْهِ وَعَلَيْهِمْ، اعْطِفْ عَلَيْهِمْ نَصْرَكَ، يا لا الهَ الَّا انْتَ، بِحَقِّ لا الهَ إلَّاانْتَ، صَلِّ عَلى مُحَمَّدٍ وَآلِ مُحَمَّدٍ، وَاجْعَلْنى مَعَهُمْ فِى الدُّنْيا وَالْأخِرَةِ، وَاجْعَلْ عاقِبَةَ امْرى الى غُفْرانِكَ وَرَحْمَتِكَ، يا ارْحَمَ الرَّاحِمينَ، وَكَذلِكَ نَسَبْتَ نَفْسَكَ يا سَيِّدى بِاللُّطْفِ، بَلى انَّكَ لَطيفٌ، فَصَلِّ عَلى مُحَمَّدٍ وَآلِ مُحَمَّدٍ، وَالْطُفْ بى لِما تَشآءُ، اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلى مُحَمَّدٍ وَآلِ مُحَمَّدٍ، وَارْزُقْنِى الْحَجَّ وَالْعُمْرَةَ فى عامِنا هذا، وَتَطَوَّلْ عَلَىَّ بِجَميعِ حَوآئِجى لِلْأخِرَةِ وَالدُّنْيا* ثم ثلاث مرات تقول: اسْتَغْفِرُ اللَّهَ رَبِّى وَاتُوبُ الَيْهِ، انَّ رَبِّى قَريبٌ مُجيبٌ، اسْتَغْفِرُ اللَّهَ رَبِّى وَاتُوبُ الَيْهِ، انَّ رَبّى رَحيمٌ وَدُودٌ، اسْتَغْفِرُ اللَّهَ رَبِّى وَاتُوبُ الَيْهِ، انَّهُ كانَ غَفَّاراً، اللهُمَّ اغْفِرْ لى انَّكَ ارْحَمُ الرَّاحِمينَ، رَبِّ انّى عَمِلْتُ سُوءاً وَظَلَمْتُ نَفْسى فَاغْفِرْ لى انَّهُ لا يَغْفِرُ الذُّنُوبَ الَّا انْتَ، اسْتَغْفِرُ اللَّهَ الَّذى لا الهَ الَّا هُوَ الْحَىُ
items.english:
...among the blissful, and my soul with the martyrs, and my good deeds in the highest of heights, and my misdeeds forgiven. And that You grant me a certainty that touches my heart, and a faith unmixed with doubt, and contentment with what You have apportioned for me. And grant me good in this world and good in the Hereafter, and protect me from the punishment of the Fire. And if You have not decreed in this night the descent of the angels and the Spirit within it, then delay me until that occurs, and grant me within it Your remembrance, Your gratitude, Your obedience, and the excellence of Your worship. And send blessings upon Muhammad and the progeny of Muhammad with the best of Your blessings, O Most Merciful of the merciful. O One, O Eternal Refuge, O Lord of Muhammad! Be wrathful today for the sake of Muhammad and the righteous of his kindred; slay their enemies utterly, and count them by number, and do not leave any one of them upon the face of the earth, and never forgive them. O Best Companion, O Successor of the Prophets! You are the Most Merciful of the merciful. The Originator, the Inimitable, there is nothing like unto You; the Everlasting, the Unheedless; the Ever-Living Who does not die; You are every day in a new state. You are the Guardian of Muhammad, the Helper of Muhammad, and the One Who favored Muhammad. I ask You to aid the successor of Muhammad, the vicegerent of Muhammad, and the upholder of justice from the successors of Muhammad—Your blessings be upon him and upon them. Direct Your victory toward them, O You, there is no god but You! By the right of "There is no god but You," send blessings upon Muhammad and the progeny of Muhammad, and place me with them in this world and the Hereafter, and make the end of my affairs lead to Your forgiveness and Your mercy, O Most Merciful of the merciful. And likewise You have described Yourself, my Master, with subtlety; indeed, You are All-Subtle. So send blessings upon Muhammad and the progeny of Muhammad, and be subtle with me in whatever You will. O Allah, send blessings upon Muhammad and the progeny of Muhammad, and grant me the Hajj and the Umrah in this year of ours, and favor me with all my needs for the Hereafter and this world.

Then say three times: 

I seek forgiveness from Allah, my Lord, and I turn to Him in repentance; surely my Lord is Near, Responsive. I seek forgiveness from Allah, my Lord, and I turn to Him in repentance; surely my Lord is Merciful, All-Loving. I seek forgiveness from Allah, my Lord, and I turn to Him in repentance; surely He is ever-forgiving. O Allah, forgive me; surely You are the Most Merciful of the merciful. My Lord, indeed I have done evil and wronged myself, so forgive me, for none forgives sins except You. I seek forgiveness from Allah, other than Whom there is no god, the Ever-Living...
items.transliteration: Al-su'ada'i, wa-ruhi ma'a al-shuhada'i, wa-ihsani fi 'illiyyina, wa-isa'ati maghfuratan, wa-an tahaba li yaqinan tubashiru bihi qalbi wa-imanan la yashubuhu shakkun, wa-ridan bi-ma qasamta li wa-atini fi al-dunya hasanatan, wa-fi al-akhirati hasanatan, wa-qini 'adhaba al-nari, wa-an lam takun qadayta fi hadhihi al-laylati tanazzula al-mala'ikati wa-al-ruhi fiha, fa-akhkhirni ila dhalika, wa-arzuqni fiha dhikraka wa-shukraka, wa-ta'ataka wa-husna 'ibadatika, wa-salli 'ala Muhammadin wa-ali Muhammadin bi-afdali salawatika, ya arhama al-rahimina, ya Ahadu ya Samadu, ya Rabba Muhammadin ighdab al-yawma li-Muhammadin wa-li-abrari 'itratihi, wa-uqtul a'da'ahum badadan, wa-ahsihum 'adadan, wa-la tada' 'ala zahri al-ardi minhum ahadan, wa-la taghfir lahum abadan, ya hasana al-suhbati, ya khalifata al-nabiyyina, anta arhamu al-rahimina, al-badi'u al-badi'u, alladhi laysa ka-mithlika shay'un, wa-al-da'imu ghayru al-ghafili, wa-al-hayyu alladhi la yamutu, anta kulla yawmin fi sha'nin, anta khalifatu Muhammadin, wa-nasiru Muhammadin, wa-mufaddilu Muhammadin, as'aluka an tansura wasiyya Muhammadin, wa-khalifata Muhammadin, wa-al-qa'ima bi-al-qisti min awsiya'i Muhammadin, salawatuka 'alayhi wa-'alayhim, a'tif 'alayhim nasraka, ya la ilaha illa anta, bi-haqqi la ilaha illa anta, salli 'ala Muhammadin wa-ali Muhammadin, wa-ij'alni ma'ahum fi al-dunya wa-al-akhirati, wa-ij'al 'aqibata amri ila ghufranika wa-rahmatika, ya arhama al-rahimina, wa-kadhalika nasabta nafsaka ya sayyidi bi-al-lutfi, bala innaka latifun, fa-salli 'ala Muhammadin wa-ali Muhammadin, wa-ultuf bi li-ma tasha'u, Allahumma salli 'ala Muhammadin wa-ali Muhammadin, wa-arzuqni al-hajja wa-al-'umrata fi 'amina hadha, wa-tatawwal 'alayya bi-jami'i hawa'iji li-al-akhirati wa-al-dunya. Thumma thalatha marratin taqulu: Astaghfiru Allaha rabbi wa-atubu ilayhi, inna rabbi qaribun mujibun, astaghfiru Allaha rabbi wa-atubu ilayhi, inna rabbi rahimun wadudun, astaghfiru Allaha rabbi wa-atubu ilayhi, innahu kana ghaffaran, Allahumma ighfir li innaka arhamu al-rahimina, rabbi inni 'amiltu su'an wa-zalamtu nafsi fa-ighfir li innahu la yaghfiru al-dhunuba illa anta, astaghfiru Allaha alladhi la ilaha illa huwa al-hayyu.

وَارْزُقْنى فيها ذِكْرَكَ وَشُكْرَكَ، وَطاعَتَكَ وَحُسْنَ عِبادَتِكَ، وَصَلِّ عَلى مُحَمَّدٍ وَآلِ مُحَمَّدٍ بِافْضَلِ صَلَواتِكَ، يا ارْحَمَ الرَّاحِمينَ، يا احَدُ يا صَمَدُ، يا رَبَّ مُحَمَّدٍ اغْضَبِ الْيَوْمَ لِمُحَمَّدٍ وَلِأَبْرارِ عِتْرَتِهِ، وَاقْتُلْ اعْدائَهُمْ بَدَداً، وَاحْصِهِمْ عَدَداً، وَلا تَدَعْ عَلى ظَهْرِ الأَرْضِ مِنْهُمْ احَداً، وَلا تَغْفِرْ لَهُمْ ابَداً، يا حَسَنَ الصُّحْبَةِ، يا خَليفَةَ النَّبِيّينَ، انْتَ ارْحَمُ الرَّاحِمينَ، الْبَدى ءُ الْبَديعُ، الَّذى لَيْسَ كَمِثْلِكَ شَىْ ءٌ، وَالدَّآئِمُ غَيْرُ الْغافِلِ، وَالْحَىُّ الَّذى لا يَمُوتُ، انْتَ كُلَّ And that You grant me a certainty that touches my heart, and a faith unmixed with doubt, and contentment with what You have apportioned for me. And grant me good in this world and good in the Hereafter, and protect me from the punishment of the Fire. Manifest Your wrath today for the sake of Muhammad and the righteous ones of his progeny; destroy their enemies completely, count them by number, leave not a single one of them upon the face of the earth, and never forgive them. O He of beautiful companionship! O Successor of the Prophets! You are the Most Merciful of the merciful. The Originator, the Incomparable, the One whom there is nothing like; the Eternal who is never heedless, and the Ever-Living who does not die. Each day You are in a new state. You are the Successor of Muhammad, the Supporter of Muhammad, and the One who favored Muhammad. I ask You to aid the legatee of Muhammad, the successor of Muhammad, and the one who establishes justice among the legatees of Muhammad—Your blessings be upon him and upon them. Bestow Your victory upon them, O You besides Whom there is no god, by the right of "there is no god but You." Send blessings upon Muhammad and the progeny of Muhammad, and place me with them in this world and the Hereafter, and let the end of my affair lead to Your forgiveness and Your mercy, O Most Merciful of the merciful. I seek forgiveness from Allah, my Lord, and I turn to Him in repentance; indeed, my Lord is Near, Responsive. I seek forgiveness from Allah, my Lord, and I turn to Him in repentance; indeed, He is ever All-Forgiving.

items.arabic: الْقَيُّومُ، الْحَليمُ الْعَظيمُ الْكَريمُ، الْغَفَّارُ لِلذَّنْبِ الْعَظيمِ، وَاتُوبُ الَيْهِ، اسْتَغْفِرُ اللَّهَ انَّ اللَّهَ كانَ غَفُوراً رَحيماً.
items.english: the Self-Subsisting, the Forbearing, the Magnificent, the Generous, the All-Forgiver of the great sin; and I turn to Him in repentance. I seek forgiveness from Allah; indeed, Allah is Ever-Forgiving, Most Merciful.
items.transliteration: Al-Qayyumu, al-Halimu al-'Azimu al-Karimu, al-Ghaffaru li-al-dhanbi al-'azimi, wa-atubu ilayhi, astaghfiru Allaha inna Allaha kana ghafuran rahiman.

items.arabic: ثمّ تقول: اللَّهُمَّ إنّى اسْئَلُكَ انْ تُصلِّىَ عَلى مُحَمَّدٍ وَآلِ مُحَمَّدٍ، وَانْ تَجْعَلَ فيما تَقْضى وَتُقَدِّرُ مِنَ الْأَمْرِ الْعَظيمِ الْمَحْتُومِ فى لَيْلَةِ الْقَدْرِ، مِنَ الْقَضآءِ الَّذى لا يُرَدُّ وَلا يُبَدَّلُ، انْ تَكْتُبَنى مِنْ حُجَّاجِ بَيْتِكَ الْحَرامِ، الْمَبْرُورِ حَجُّهُمْ، الْمَشْكُورِ سَعْيُهُمْ، الْمَغْفُورِ ذُنُوبُهُمْ، الْمُكَفَّرِ عَنْهُمْ سَيِّئاتُهُمْ، وَانْ تَجْعَلَ فيما تَقْضى وَتُقَدِّرُ، انْ تُطيلَ عُمْرى وَتُوَسِّعَ فى رِزْقى وَتُؤَدِّىَ عَنّى امانَتى وَدَيْنى آمينَ رَبَّ الْعالَمينَ، اللهُمَّ اجْعَلْ لى مِنْ امْرى فَرَجاً وَمَخْرَجاً، وَارْزُقْنى مِنْ حَيْثُ احْتَسِبُ وَمِنْ حَيْثُ لا احْتَسِبُ، وَاحْرُسْنى مِنْ حَيْثُ احْتَرِسُ وَمِنْ حَيْثُ لا احْتَرِسُ، وَصَلِّ عَلى مُحَمَّدٍ وَآلِ مُحَمَّدٍ، وَسَلِّمْ كَثيراً .
items.english: Then you say: O Allah, I ask You to send blessings upon Muhammad and the progeny of Muhammad, and that You include among what You decree and ordain of the great and inevitable matter on the Night of Decree—of the decree that is neither rescinded nor changed—that You enroll me among the pilgrims of Your Sacred House, whose Hajj is accepted, whose striving is appreciated, whose sins are forgiven, and whose evil deeds are expiated. And that You include among what You decree and ordain that You prolong my life, expand my provision, and fulfill my trusts and my debts on my behalf. Amen, O Lord of the worlds. O Allah, grant me relief and a way out in my affairs, and provide for me from whence I expect and from whence I do not expect, and guard me from where I am cautious and from where I am not cautious, and send blessings upon Muhammad and the progeny of Muhammad, and grant them abundant peace.
items.transliteration: Thumma taqulu: Allahumma inni as'aluka an tusalliya 'ala Muhammadin wa-ali Muhammadin, wa-an taj'ala fima taqdi wa-tuqaddiru min al-amri al-'azimi al-mahtumi fi laylati al-qadri, min al-qada'i alladhi la yuraddu wa-la yubaddalu, an taktubani min hujjaji baytika al-harami, al-mabruri hajjuhum, al-mashkuri sa'yuhum, al-maghfuri dhunubuhum, al-mukaffari 'anhum sayyi'atuhum, wa-an taj'ala fima taqdi wa-tuqaddiru, an tutila 'umri wa-tuwassi'a fi rizqi wa-tu'addiya 'anni amanati wa-dayni amina Rabba al-'alamina, Allahumma ij'al li min amri farajan wa-makhrajan, wa-arzuqni min haythu ahtasibu wa-min haythu la ahtasibu, wa-uhrusni min haythu ahtarisu wa-min haythu la ahtarisu, wa-salli 'ala Muhammadin wa-ali Muhammadin, wa-sallim kathiran.

items.english: Glory be to Allah, the Originator of souls; Glory be to Allah, the Fashioner; Glory be to Allah, the Creator of all pairs; Glory be to Allah, the Maker of the darknesses and the light; Glory be to Allah, the Splitter of the grain and the pit; Glory be to Allah, the Creator of all things; Glory be to Allah, the Creator of what is seen and what is not seen; Glory be to Allah, as much as the ink of His words; Glory be to Allah, the Lord of the worlds. Glory be to Allah, the All-Hearing, than Whom nothing is more hearing; He hears from above His Throne what is beneath the seven earths, and He hears what is in the darknesses of the land and the sea, and He hears the moaning and the complaint, and He hears the secret and what is more hidden, and He hears the whisperings of the breasts, and no voice deafens His hearing. Glory be to Allah, the Originator of souls; Glory be to Allah.
items.transliteration: Subhana Allahi bari'i al-nasami, subhana Allahi al-musawwiri, subhana Allahi khaliqi al-azwaji kulliha, subhana Allahi ja'ili al-zulumati wa-al-nuri, subhana Allahi faliqi al-habbi wa-al-nawa, subhana Allahi khaliqi kulli shay'in, subhana Allahi khaliqi ma yura wa-ma la yura, subhana Allahi midada kalimatihi, subhana Allahi Rabbi al-'alamina, subhana Allahi al-Sami'i alladhi laysa shay'un asma'a minhu, yasma'u min fawqi 'arshihi ma tahta sab'i aradina, wa-yasma'u ma fi zulumati al-barri wa-al-bahri, wa-yasma'u al-anina wa-al-shakwa, wa-yasma'u al-sirra wa-akhfa, wa-yasma'u wasawisa al-suduri, wa-la yusimmu sam'ahu sawtun, subhana Allahi bari'i al-nasami, subhana Allahi.

items.arabic: الْقَيُّومُ، الْحَليمُ الْعَظيمُ الْكَريمُ، الْغَفَّارُ لِلذَّنْبِ الْعَظيمِ، وَاتُوبُ الَيْهِ، اسْتَغْفِرُ اللَّهَ انَّ اللَّهَ كانَ غَفُوراً رَحيماً.

items.arabic: الْمُصَوِّرِ، سُبْحانَ اللَّهِ خالِقِ الْأَزْواجِ كُلِّها، سُبْحانَ اللَّهِ جاعِلِ الظُّلُماتِ وَالنُّورِ، سُبْحانَ اللَّهِ فالِقِ الْحَبِّ وَالنَّوى سُبْحانَ اللَّهِ خالِقِ كُلِّ شَىْ ءٍ، سُبْحانَ اللَّهِ خالِقِ ما يُرى وَما لا يُرى سُبْحانَ اللَّهِ مِدادَ كَلِماتِهِ، سُبْحانَ اللَّهِ رَبِّ الْعالَمينَ، سُبْحانَ اللَّهِ الْبَصيرِ الَّذى لَيْسَ شَىْ ءٌ ابْصَرَ مِنْهُ، يُبْصِرُ مِنْ فَوْقِ عَرْشِهِ ما تَحْتَ سَبْعِ ارَضينَ، وَيُبْصِرُ ما فى ظُلُماتِ الْبَرِّ وَالْبَحْرِ، لا تُدْرِكُهُ الْأبْصارُ وَهُوَ يُدْرِكُ الْأَبْصارَ، وَهُوَ اللَّطيفُ الْخَبيرُ، لا تُغْشى بَصَرَهُ الظُّلْمَةُ، وَلا يُسْتَتَرُ مِنْهُ بِسِتْرٍ، وَلا يُوارى مِنْهُ جِدارٌ، وَلا يَغيبُ عَنْهُ بَرٌّ وَلا بَحْرٌ، وَلا يَكِنُّ مِنْهُ جَبَلٌ ما فى اصْلِهِ، وَلا قَلْبٌ ما فيهِ، وَلا جَنْبٌ ما فى قَلْبِهِ، وَلا يَسْتَتِرُ مِنْهُ صَغيرٌ وَلا كَبيرٌ، وَلا يَسْتَخْفى مِنْهُ صَغيرٌ لِصِغَرِهِ، وَلا يَخْفى عَلَيْهِ شَىْ ءٌ فِى الْأَرْضِ وَلا فِى السَّمآءِ، هُوَ الَّذى يُصَوِّرُكُمْ فِى الْأَرْحامِ كَيْفَ يَشآءُ، لا الهَ الَّا هُوَ الْعَزيزُ الْحَكيمُ* سُبْحانَ اللَّهِ بارِئِ النَّسَمِ، سُبْحانَ اللَّهِ الْمُصَوِّرِ، سُبْحانَ اللَّهِ خالِقِ الْأَزْواجِ كُلِّها، سُبْحانَ اللَّهِ جاعِلِ الظُّلُماتِ وَالنُّورِ، سُبْحانَ اللَّهِ فالِقِ الْحَبِّ وَالنَّوى سُبْحانَ اللَّهِ خالِقِ كُلِّ شَىْ ءٍ، سُبْحانَ اللَّهِ خالِقِ ما يُرى وَما لا يُرى سُبْحانَ اللَّهِ مِدادَ كَلِماتِهِ، سُبْحانَ اللَّهِ رَبِّ الْعالَمينَ، سُبْحانَ اللَّهِ الَّذى يُنْشِئُ السَّحابَ الثِّقالَ، وَيُسَبِّحُ الرَّعْدُ بِحَمْدِهِ، وَالْمَلائِكَةُ مِنْ خيفَتِهِ، وَيُرْسِلُ الصَّواعِقَ فَيُصيبُ بِها مَنْ يَشآءُ، يَعْزُبُ عَنْهُ مِثْقالُ ذَرَّةٍ فِى الْأَرْضِ وَلا فِى السَّمآءِ، وَلا اصْغَرُ مِنْ ذلِكَ، وَلا اكْبَرُ الَّا فى كِتابٍ مُبينٍ* سُبْحانَ اللَّهِ بارِئِ النَّسَمِ، سُبْحانَ اللَّهِ الْمُصَوِّرِ، Glory be to Allah, the All-Seeing, than Whom nothing is more seeing; He sees from above His Throne what is beneath the seven earths, and He sees what is in the darknesses of the land and the sea. Visions perceive Him not, but He perceives all visions; and He is the All-Subtle, the All-Aware. Darkness does not shroud His sight, nor is He concealed by any veil, nor does any wall hide anything from Him. Neither land nor sea is absent from Him; no mountain can conceal what is at its base, nor any heart what is within it, nor any side what is in its heart. He is the One Who fashions you in the wombs however He wills; there is no god but He, the All-Mighty, the All-Wise.

items.arabic: كَلِماتِهِ، سُبْحانَ اللَّهِ رَبِّ الْعالَمينَ، سُبْحانَ اللَّهِ الَّذى يَعْلَمُ ما تَحْمِلُ كُلُّ انْثى وَما تَغيْضُ الْأَرْحامُ وَما تَزْدادُ، وَكُلُّ شَىْ ءٍ عِنْدَهُ بِمِقْدارٍ، عالِمُ الْغَيْبِ وَالشَّهادَةِ، الْكَبِيرُ الْمُتَعالُ، سَوآءٌ مِنْكُمْ مَنْ اسَرَّ الْقَوْلَ وَمَنْ جَهَرَ بِهِ، وَمَنْ هُوَ مُسْتَخْفٍ بِاللَّيْلِ وَسارِبٌ بِالنَّهارِ، لَهُ مُعَقِّباتٌ مِنْ بَيْنِ يَدَيْهِ وَمِنْ خَلْفِهِ، يَحْفَظُونَهُ مِنْ امْرِ اللَّهِ، سُبْحانَ اللَّهِ الَّذى يُميتُ الْأَحْيآءَ وَيُحْيِى الْمَوْتى وَيَعْلَمُ ما تَنْقُصُ الْأَرْضُ مِنْهُمْ، وَيُقِرُّ فِى الْأَرْحامِ ما يَشآءُ الى اجَلٍ مُسَمّىً* سُبْحانَ اللَّهِ بارِئِ النَّسَمِ، سُبْحانَ اللَّهِ الْمُصَوِّرِ، سُبْحانَ اللَّهِ خالِقِ الْأَزْواجِ كُلِّها، سُبْحانَ اللَّهِ جاعِلِ الظُّلُماتِ وَالنُّورِ، سُبْحانَ اللَّهِ فالِقِ الْحَبِّ وَالنَّوى سُبْحانَ اللَّهِ خالِقِ كُلِّ شَىْ ءٍ، سُبْحانَ اللَّهِ خالِقِ ما يُرى وَما لا يُرى سُبْحانَ اللَّهِ مِدادَ كَلِماتِهِ، سُبْحانَ اللَّهِ رَبِّ الْعالَمينَ، سُبْحانَ اللَّهِ مالِكِ الْمُلْكِ، تُؤْتِى الْمُلْكَ مَنْ تَشآءُ، وَتَنْزِعُ الْمُلْكَ مِمَّنْ تَشآءُ، وَتُعِزُّ مَنْ تَشآءُ، وَتُذِلُّ مَنْ تَشآءُ، بِيَدِكَ الْخَيْرُ، انَّكَ عَلى كُلِّ شَىْ ءٍ قَديرٌ، بارِئِ النَّسَمِ، سُبْحانَ اللَّهِ الْمُصَوِّرِ، سُبْحانَ اللَّهِ خالِقِ الْأَزْواجِ كُلِّها، سُبْحانَ اللَّهِ جاعِلِ الظُّلُماتِ وَالنُّورِ، سُبْحانَ اللَّهِ فالِقِ الْحَبِّ وَالنَّوى سُبْحانَ اللَّهِ خالِقِ كُلِّ شَىْ ءٍ، سُبْحانَ اللَّهِ خالِقِ ما يُرى وَما لا يُرى سُبْحانَ اللَّهِ مِدادَ كَلِماتِهِ، سُبْحانَ اللَّهِ رَبِّ الْعالَمينَ، سُبْحانَ اللَّهِ الَّذى عِنْدَهُ مَفاتِحُ الْغَيْبِ لا يَعْلَمُها الَّا هُوَ، وَيَعْلَمُ ما فِى الْبَرِّ وَالْبَحْرِ، وَما تَسْقُطُ مِنْ وَرَقَةٍ الَّا يَعْلَمُها، وَلا حَبَّةٍ فى ظُلُماتِ الْأَرْضِ، وَلا رَطْبٍ وَلا يابِسٍ الَّا فى كِتابٍ مُبينٍ* items.arabic: ما يُرى وَما لايُرى سُبْحانَ اللَّهِ مِدادَ كَلِماتِهِ، سُبْحانَ اللَّهِ رَبِّ الْعالَمينَ، سُبْحانَ اللَّهِ الَّذى لا يُحْصى مِدْحَتَهُ الْقآئِلُونَ، وَلا يَجْزى بالائِهِ الشَّاكِرُونَ الْعابِدُونَ، وَهُوَ كَما قالَ وَفَوْقَ ما يَقُولُ الْقائلُونَ، وَاللَّهُ سُبْحانَهُ كَما اثْنى عَلى نَفْسِهِ، وَلا يُحيطُونَ بِشَىْ ءٍ مِنْ عِلْمِهِ الَّا بِما شآءَ، وَسِعَ كُرْسِيُّهُ السَّماواتِ وَالْأَرْضَ، وَلا يَؤُدُهُ حِفْظُهُما وَهُوَ الْعَلِىُّ الْعَظيمُ* سُبْحانَ اللَّهِ بارِئِ النَّسَمِ، سُبْحانَ اللَّهِ الْمُصَوِّرِ، سُبْحانَ اللَّهِ خالِقِ الْأَزْواجِ كُلِّها، سُبْحانَ اللَّهِ الْأَرْضِ وَمايَخْرُجُ مِنْها، عَمَّا يَنْزِلُ مِنَ السَّمآءِ وَما يَعْرُجُ فيها، وَلا يَشْغَلُهُ ما يَنْزِلُ مِنَ السَّمآءِ وَما يَعْرُجُ فيها، عَمَّا يَلِجُ فِى الْأَرْضِ وَما يَخْرُجُ مِنْها، وَلا يَشْغَلُهُ عِلْمُ شَىْ ءٍ عَنْ عِلْمِ شَىْ ءٍ، وَلا يَشْغَلُهُ خَلْقُ شَىْ ءٍ عَنْ خَلْقِ شَىْ ءٍ، وَلا حِفْظُ شَىْ ءٍ عَنْ حِفْظِ شَىْ ءٍ، وَلا يُساويهِ شَىْ ءٌ، وَلا يَعْدِلُهُ شَىْ ءٌ، لَيْسَ كَمِثْلِهِ شَىْ ءٌ، وَهُوَ السَّميعُ الْبَصيرُ* سُبْحانَ اللَّهِ بارِئِ النَّسَمِ، سُبْحانَ اللَّهِ الْمُصَوِّرِ، سُبْحانَ اللَّهِ خالِقِ الْأَزْواجِ كُلِّها، سُبْحانَ اللَّهِ جاعِلِ الظُّلُماتِ وَالنُّورِ، سُبْحانَ اللَّهِ فالِقِ الْحَبِّ وَالنَّوى سُبْحانَ اللَّهِ خالِقِ كُلِّ شَىْ ءٍ، سُبْحانَ اللَّهِ خالِقِ ما يُرى وَما لا يُرى سُبْحانَ اللَّهِ مِدادَ كَلِماتِهِ، سُبْحانَ اللَّهِ رَبِّ الْعالَمينَ، سُبْحانَ اللَّهِ فاطِرِ السَّماواتِ وَالْأَرْضِ، جاعِلِ الْمَلائِكَةِ رُسُلًا اولى اجْنِحَةٍ، مَثْنى وَثُلاثَ وَرُباعَ، يَزيدُ فِى الْخَلْقِ ما يَشآءُ، انَّ اللَّهَ عَلى كُلِّ شَىْ ءٍ قَديرٌ، ما يَفْتَحِ اللَّهُ لِلنَّاسِ مِنْ رَحْمَةٍ فَلا مُمْسِكَ لَها، وَما يُمْسِكْ فَلا مُرْسِلَ لَهُ مِنْ بَعْدِهِ، وَهُوَ الْعَزيزُ الْحَكيمُ* سُبْحانَ اللَّهِ بارِئِ النَّسَمِ، سُبْحانَ

...what is seen and what is not seen; Glory be to Allah, as much as the ink of His words; Glory be to Allah, Lord of the worlds; Glory be to Allah, Whose praise the speakers cannot count, and Whose bounties the thankful worshippers cannot repay; and He is as He has said and above what the speakers say; and Allah—glory be to Him—is as He has praised Himself; and they encompass nothing of His knowledge except what He wills; His Seat extends over the heavens and the earth, and their preservation tires Him not, and He is the Most High, the Magnificent. 

Glory be to Allah, the Originator of souls; Glory be to Allah, the Fashioner; Glory be to Allah, the Creator of all pairs; Glory be to Allah, the Maker of the darknesses and the light; Glory be to Allah, the Splitter of the grain and the pit; Glory be to Allah, the Creator of all things; Glory be to Allah, the Creator of what is seen and what is not seen; Glory be to Allah, as much as the ink of His words; Glory be to Allah, Lord of the worlds; Glory be to Allah, Who knows what penetrates into the earth and what emerges from it, and what descends from the heaven and what ascends into it; and what penetrates into the earth and what emerges from it does not distract Him from what descends from the heaven and what ascends into it; and what descends from the heaven and what ascends into it does not distract Him from what penetrates into the earth and what emerges from it; and the knowledge of one thing does not distract Him from the knowledge of another; and the creation of one thing does not distract Him from the creation of another; and the preservation of one thing does not distract Him from the preservation of another; and nothing is equal to Him, and nothing is comparable to Him; there is nothing like unto Him, and He is the All-Hearing, the All-Seeing. 

Glory be to Allah, the Originator of souls; Glory be to Allah, the Fashioner; Glory be to Allah, the Creator of all pairs; Glory be to Allah, the Maker of the darknesses and the light; Glory be to Allah, the Splitter of the grain and the pit; Glory be to Allah, the Creator of all things; Glory be to Allah, the Creator of what is seen and what is not seen; Glory be to Allah, as much as the ink of His words; Glory be to Allah, Lord of the worlds; Glory be to Allah, Originator of the heavens and the earth, Maker of the angels as messengers having wings, in twos, threes, and fours; He adds to creation what He wills; indeed, Allah is Powerful over all things. Whatever mercy Allah opens for mankind, none can withhold it; and whatever He withholds, none can release it after Him; and He is the All-Mighty, the All-Wise.

items.arabic: اللَّهِ الْمُصَوِّرِ، سُبْحانَ اللَّهِ خالِقِ الْأَزْواجِ كُلِّها، سُبْحانَ اللَّهِ جاعِلِ الظُّلُماتِ وَالنُّورِ، سُبْحانَ اللَّهِ فالِقِ الْحَبِّ وَالنَّوى سُبْحانَ اللَّهِ خالِقِ كُلِّ شَىْ ءٍ، سُبْحانَ اللَّهِ خالِقِ ما يُرى وَما لا يُرى سُبْحانَ اللَّهِ مِدادَ كَلِماتِهِ، سُبْحانَ اللَّهِ رَبِّ الْعالَمينَ، سُبْحانَ اللَّهِ الَّذى يَعْلَمُ ما فِى السَّماواتِ وَما فِى الْأَرْضِ، ما يَكوُنُ مِنْ نَجْوى ثَلاثَةٍ الَّا هُوَ رابِعُهُمْ، وَلا خَمْسَةٍ الَّا هُوَ سادِسُهُمْ، وَلا ادْنى مِنْ ذلِكَ وَلا اكْثَرَ الَّا هُوَ مَعَهُمْ ايْنَما كانُوا، ثُمَّ يُنَبِّئُهُمْ بِما عَمِلُوا يَوْمَ الْقِيامَةِ، انَّ اللَّهَ بِكُلِّ شَىْ ءٍ عَليمٌ .
items.english: Allah, the Fashioner; Glory be to Allah, the Creator of all pairs; Glory be to Allah, the Maker of the darknesses and the light; Glory be to Allah, the Splitter of the grain and the pit; Glory be to Allah, the Creator of all things; Glory be to Allah, the Creator of what is seen and what is not seen; Glory be to Allah, as much as the ink of His words; Glory be to Allah, Lord of the worlds; Glory be to Allah, Who knows what is in the heavens and what is in the earth; there is no private conversation of three but He is their fourth, nor of five but He is their sixth, nor of less than that nor of more but He is with them wherever they may be; then He will inform them of what they did on the Day of Resurrection; indeed, Allah is All-Knowing of everything.
items.transliteration: Allahi al-Musawwiri, subhana Allahi khaliqi al-azwaji kulliha, subhana Allahi ja'ili al-zulumati wa-al-nuri, subhana Allahi faliqi al-habbi wa-al-nawa subhana Allahi khaliqi kulli shay'in, subhana Allahi khaliqi ma yura wa-ma la yura subhana Allahi midada kalimatihi, subhana Allahi rabbi al-'alamina, subhana Allahi alladhi ya'lamu ma fi al-samawati wa-ma fi al-ardi, ma yakunu min najwa thalathatin illa huwa rabi'uhum, wa-la khamsatin illa huwa sadisuhum, wa-la adna min dhalika wa-la akthara illa huwa ma'ahum aynama kanu, thumma yunabbi'uhum bi-ma 'amilu yawma al-qiyamati, inna Allaha bi-kulli shay'in 'alimun.

items.arabic: 3. أن يقرأ هذه الصلوات كلّ يوم من شهر رمضان:
items.english: 3. To recite these prayers every day of the month of Ramadan:
items.transliteration: 3. An yaqra'a hadhihi al-salawati kulla yawmin min shahri Ramadana:

items.arabic: انَّ اللَّهَ وَمَلائِكَتَهُ يُصَلُّونَ عَلَى النَّبِىِّ، يا أَيُّهَا الَّذينَ آمَنُوا صَلُّوا عَلَيْهِ وَسَلِّمُوا تَسْليماً، لَبَّيْكَ يا رَبِّ وَسَعْدَيْكَ وَسُبْحانَكَ، اللهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلى مُحَمَّدٍ وَآلِ مُحَمَّدٍ، وَبارِكْ عَلى مُحَمَّدٍ وَآلِ مُحَمَّدٍ، كَما صَلَّيْتَ وَبارَكْتَ عَلى ابْراهيمَ وَآلِ ابْراهيمَ، انَّكَ حَميدٌ مَجيدٌ، اللَّهُمَّ ارْحَمْ مُحَمَّداً وَآلَ مُحَمَّدٍ، كَما رَحِمْتَ ابْراهيمَ وآلَ ابْراهيمَ، انَّكَ حَميدٌ مَجيدٌ، اللَّهُمَّ سَلِّمْ عَلى مُحَمَّدٍ وَآلِ مُحَمَّدٍ، كَما سَلَّمْتَ عَلى نُوحٍ فِى الْعالَمينَ، [اللَّهُمَّ امْنُنْ عَلى مُحَمَّدٍ وَآلِ مُحَمَّدٍ، كَما مَنَنْتَ عَلى مُوسى وَهرُونَ، اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلى مُحَمَّدٍ وَآلِ مُحَمَّدٍ، كَما شَرَّفْتَنا بِهِ ، اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلى مُحَمَّدٍ وَآلِ مُحَمَّدٍ، كَما هَدَيْتَنا بِهِ، اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلى مُحَمَّدٍ وَآلِ مُحَمَّدٍ، وَابْعَثْهُ مَقاماً مَحْمُوداً يَغْبِطُهُ بِهِ الْأَوَّلُونَ وَالْأخِرُونَ، عَلى مُحَمَّدٍ وَآلِهِ السَّلامُ كُلَّما طَلَعَتْ شَمْسٌ اوْ غَرَبَتْ، عَلى مُحَمَّدٍ وَآلِهِ السَّلامُ كُلَّما طَرَفَتْ عَيْنٌ اوْ بَرَقَتْ، عَلى مُحَمَّدٍ وَآلِهِ السَّلامُ كُلَّما ذُكِرَ السَّلامُ، عَلى مُحَمَّدٍ وَآلِهِ السَّلامُ كُلَّما سَبَّحَ اللَّهَ مَلَكٌ اوْ قَدَّسَهُ، السَّلامُ عَلى مُحَمَّدٍ وَآلِهِ فِى الْأَوَّلينَ، وَالسَّلامُ عَلى مُحَمَّدٍ وَآلِهِ
items.english: Indeed, Allah and His angels send blessings upon the Prophet; O you who believe, send blessings upon him and salute him with a worthy salutation. At Your service, O Lord, and at Your command, and Glory be to You! O Allah, send blessings upon Muhammad and the progeny of Muhammad, and bless Muhammad and the progeny of Muhammad, as You sent blessings and blessed Ibrahim and the progeny of Ibrahim; indeed, You are All-Praiseworthy, All-Glorious. O Allah, have mercy on Muhammad and the progeny of Muhammad, as You had mercy on Ibrahim and the progeny of Ibrahim; indeed, You are All-Praiseworthy, All-Glorious. O Allah, send peace upon Muhammad and the progeny of Muhammad, as You sent peace upon Nuh among the worlds. [O Allah, bestow favor upon Muhammad and the progeny of Muhammad, as You bestowed favor upon Musa and Harun. O Allah, send blessings upon Muhammad and the progeny of Muhammad, as You honored us through him. O Allah, send blessings upon Muhammad and the progeny of Muhammad, as You guided us through him. O Allah, send blessings upon Muhammad and the progeny of Muhammad, and raise him to a praised station which the first and the last will envy. Peace be upon Muhammad and his progeny whenever a sun rises or sets; peace be upon Muhammad and his progeny whenever an eye blinks or glitters; peace be upon Muhammad and his progeny whenever peace is mentioned; peace be upon Muhammad and his progeny whenever an angel glorifies Allah or sanctifies Him. Peace be upon Muhammad and his progeny among the first [generations], and peace be upon Muhammad and his progeny...
items.transliteration: Inna Allaha wa-mala'ikatahu yusalluna 'ala al-nabiyyi, ya ayyuha al-ladhina amanu sallu 'alayhi wa-sallimu tasliman, labbayka ya rabbi wa-sa'dayka wa-subhanaka, Allahumma salli 'ala Muhammadin wa-ali Muhammadin, wa-barik 'ala Muhammadin wa-ali Muhammadin, kama sallayta wa-barakta 'ala Ibrahima wa-ali Ibrahima, innaka hamidun majidun, Allahumma irham Muhammadan wa-ala Muhammadin, kama rahimta Ibrahima wa-ala Ibrahima, innaka hamidun majidun, Allahumma sallim 'ala Muhammadin wa-ali Muhammadin, kama sallamta 'ala Nuhin fi al-'alamina, [Allahumma amnun 'ala Muhammadin wa-ali Muhammadin, kama mananta 'ala Musa wa-Haruna, Allahumma salli 'ala Muhammadin wa-ali Muhammadin, kama sharraftana bihi, Allahumma salli 'ala Muhammadin wa-ali Muhammadin, kama hadaytana bihi, Allahumma salli 'ala Muhammadin wa-ali Muhammadin, wa-ib'ath-hu maqaman mahmudan yaghbituhu bihi al-awwaluna wa-al-akhiruna, 'ala Muhammadin wa-alihi al-salamu kullama tala'at shamsun aw gharabat, 'ala Muhammadin wa-alihi al-salamu kullama tarafat 'aynun aw baraqat, 'ala Muhammadin wa-alihi al-salamu kullama dhukira al-salamu, 'ala Muhammadin wa-alihi al-salamu kullama sabbaha Allaha malakun aw qaddasahu, al-salamu 'ala Muhammadin wa-alihi fi al-awwalina, wa-al-salamu 'ala Muhammadin wa-alihi

items.arabic: فِى الْأخِرينَ، وَالسَّلامُ عَلى مُحَمَّدٍ وَآلِهِ فِى الدُّنْيا وَالأخِرَةِ، اللَّهُمَّ رَبَّ الْبَلَدِ الْحَرامِ، وَرَبَّ الرُّكْنِ وَالْمَقامِ، وَرَبَّ الْحِلِّ وَالْحَرامِ، ابْلِغْ مُحَمَّداً نَبِيَّكَ عَنَّا السَّلامَ، اللهُمَّ اعْطِ مُحَمَّداً مِنَ الْبَهآءِ وَالنَّضْرَةِ، وَالسُّرُورِ وَالْكَرامَةِ، وَالْغِبْطَةِ وَالْوَسيلَةِ، وَالْمَنْزِلَةِ وَالْمَقامِ، وَالشَّرَفِ وَالرِّفْعَةِ، وَالشَّفاعَةِ عِنْدَكَ يَوْمَ الْقِيامَةِ، افْضَلَ ما تُعْطى احَداً مِنْ خَلْقِكَ، وَاعْطِ مُحَمَّداً فَوْقَ ما تُعْطِى الْخَلائِقَ مِنَ الْخَيْرِ، اضْعافاً كَثيرَةً لا يُحْصيها غَيْرُكَ، اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلى مُحَمَّدٍ وَآلِ مُحَمَّدٍ، اطْيَبَ وَاطْهَرَ، وَازْكى وَانْمى وَافْضَلَ ما صَلَّيْتَ عَلى احَدٍ مِنَ الْأَوَّلينَ وَالْأخِرينَ، وَعَلى احَدٍ مِنْ خَلْقِكَ يا ارْحَمَ الرَّاحِمينَ، اللهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلى عَلىٍّ اميرِ الْمُؤْمِنينَ، وَوالِ مَنْ والاهُ، وَعادِ مَنْ عاداهُ، وَضاعِفِ الْعَذابَ عَلى مَنْ شَرِكَ فى دَمِهِ، اللهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلى فاطِمَةَ بِنْتِ نَبيِّكَ items.english: among the later generations; and peace be upon Muhammad and his progeny in this world and the Hereafter. O Allah, Lord of the Sacred City, and Lord of the Pillar and the Station, and Lord of the lawful and the forbidden, convey to Muhammad, Your Prophet, greetings of peace from us. O Allah, grant Muhammad radiance and beauty, joy and honor, delight and the Means, and the status and the station, and the nobility and the loftiness, and the intercession with You on the Day of Resurrection, the best of what You grant to anyone from Your creation. And grant Muhammad more than the good You grant to the creatures, many folds over that none but You can count. O Allah, send blessings upon Muhammad and the progeny of Muhammad, the most pleasant, the purest, the most refined, the most increasing, and the most excellent of what You have sent as blessings upon anyone from the former and the later generations, and upon anyone from Your creation, O Most Merciful of the merciful. O Allah, send blessings upon Ali, the Commander of the Faithful; and befriend the one who befriends him, and be the enemy of the one who is his enemy, and double the punishment upon the one who shared in shedding his blood. items.arabic: مَنْ عاداهُ، وَضاعِفِ الْعَذابَ عَلى مَنْ ظَلَمَهُ، اللهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى الْحَسَنِ بْنِ عَلِىٍّ امامِ الْمُسْلِمينَ، وَوالِ مَنْ والاهُ، وَعادِ مَنْ عاداهُ، وَضاعِفِ الْعَذابَ عَلى مَنْ ظَلَمَهُ، اللهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى الْخَلَفِ مِنْ بَعْدِهِ امامِ الْمُسْلِمينَ، وَوالِ مَنْ والاهُ، وَعادِ مَنْ عاداهُ، [وَعَجِّلْ فَرَجَهُ ، اللهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى الْقاسِمِ وَالطَّاهِرِ ابْنَىْ نَبِيِّكَ، اللهُمَ صَلِّ عَلَى رُقَيَّةَ بِنْتِ نَبِيِّكَ، وَالْعَنْ مَنْ آذى نَبِيَّكَ فيها، اللهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى امِّ كُلْثُومَ بِنْتِ نَبِيِّكَ، وَالْعَنْ مَنْ آذى نَبِيَّكَ فيها، اللهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى ذُرِّيَّةِ نَبِيِّكَ، اللهُمَّ اخْلُفْ نَبِيَّكَ فى اهْلِ بَيْتِهِ، اللهُمَّ مَكِّنْ لَهُمْ فِى الْأَرْضِ، اللهُمَّ اجْعَلْنا مِنْ عَدَدِهِمْ وَمَدَدِهِمْ، وَانْصارِهِمْ عَلىَ الْحَقِّ فِى السِّرِّ وَالْعَلانِيَةِ، اللَّهُمَّ اطْلُبْ بِذَحْلِهِمْ وَوِتْرِهِمْ وَدِمآئِهِمْ، وَكُفَّ عَنَّا وَعَنْهُمْ وَعَنْ كُلِّ مُؤْمِنٍ وَمُؤْمِنَةٍ بَاْسَ كُلِّ باغٍ وَطاغٍ، وَكُلِّ دآبَّةٍ انْتَ آخِذٌ بِناصِيَتِها، انَّكَ اشَدُّ بَاْساً وَاشَدُّ تَنْكيلًا .
items.english: whoever is his enemy, and double the punishment upon whoever oppressed him. O Allah, send blessings upon al-Hasan ibn Ali, the Imam of the Muslims, and befriend whoever befriends him, and be the enemy of whoever is his enemy, and double the punishment upon whoever oppressed him. O Allah, send blessings upon the Successor after him, the Imam of the Muslims, and befriend whoever befriends him, and be the enemy of whoever is his enemy, and hasten his relief. O Allah, send blessings upon al-Qasim and al-Tahir, the two sons of Your Prophet. O Allah, send blessings upon Ruqayyah, the daughter of Your Prophet, and curse whoever harmed Your Prophet through her. O Allah, send blessings upon Umm Kulthum, the daughter of Your Prophet, and curse whoever harmed Your Prophet through her. O Allah, send blessings upon the progeny of Your Prophet. O Allah, succeed Your Prophet among his Household. O Allah, establish them firmly in the earth. O Allah, make us among their number and their support, and their helpers upon the truth, in secret and in public. O Allah, seek redress for their grievances, their unavenged blood-debts, and their blood; and withhold from us, and from them, and from every believing man and believing woman, the might of every transgressor and tyrant, and every creature whose forelock You hold. Indeed, You are Stronger in might and More Severe in punishment.
items.transliteration: man 'adahu, wa-da'ifi al-'adhaba 'ala man zalamahu, Allahumma salli 'ala al-Hasani bni 'Aliyyin imami al-muslimina, wa-wali man walahu, wa-'adi man 'adahu, wa-da'ifi al-'adhaba 'ala man zalamahu, Allahumma salli 'ala al-khalafi min ba'dihi imami al-muslimina, wa-wali man walahu, wa-'adi man 'adahu, [wa-'ajjil farajahu], Allahumma salli 'ala al-Qasimi wa-al-Tahiri ibnay nabiyyika, Allahumma salli 'ala Ruqayyata binti nabiyyika, wa-al'an man adha nabiyyaka fiha, Allahumma salli 'ala Ummi Kulthuma binti nabiyyika, wa-al'an man adha nabiyyaka fiha, Allahumma salli 'ala dhurriyyati nabiyyika, Allahumma ikhluf nabiyyaka fi ahli baytihi, Allahumma makkin lahum fi al-ardi, Allahumma ij'alna min 'adadihim wa-madadihim, wa-ansarihim 'ala al-haqqi fi al-sirri wa-al-'alaniyati, Allahumma itlub bi-dhahlihim wa-witrihim wa-dima'ihim, wa-kuffa 'anna wa-'anhum wa-'an kulli mu'minin wa-mu'minatin ba'sa kulli baghin wa-taghin, wa-kulli dabbatin anta akhidhun bi-nasiyatiha, innaka ashaddu ba'san wa-ashaddu tankilan.

items.arabic: قال السيّد ابن طاووس ثمّ تقول: يا عُدَّتى فى كُرْبَتى وَيا صاحِبى فى شِدَّتى وَيا وَلِيّى فى نِعْمَتى وَيا غايَتى فى رَغْبَتى انْتَ السَّاتِرُ عَوْرَتى وَالْمُؤْمِنُ رَوْعَتى وَالْمُقيلُ عَثْرَتى فَاغْفِرْ لى خَطيئَتى يا ارْحَمَ الرَّاحِمينَ* وتقول:
items.english: Sayyid Ibn Tawus said, then you say: O my Support in my distress, O my Companion in my hardship, O my Guardian in my blessing, and O my Ultimate Goal in my desire. You are the Concealer of my faults, the Provider of security in my fear, and the One who overlooks my lapses; so forgive me my sin, O Most Merciful of the merciful. And you say:
items.transliteration: Qala al-Sayyid ibn Tawusin thumma taqulu: Ya 'uddati fi kurbati wa-ya sahibi fi shiddati wa-ya waliyyi fi ni'mati wa-ya ghayati fi raghbati anta al-satiru 'awrati wa-al-mu'minu raw'ati wa-al-muqilu 'athrati fa-ighfir li khati'ati ya arhama al-rahimina wa-taqulu:

items.arabic: اللهُمَّ انّى ادْعُوكَ لِهَمٍّ لا يُفَرِّجُهُ غَيْرُكَ، وَلِرَحْمَةٍ لا تُنالُ الَّا بِكَ، وَلِكَرْبٍ لا يَكْشِفُهُ الَّا انْتَ، وَلِرَغْبَةٍ لا تُبْلَغُ الّا بِكَ، وَلِحاجَةٍ لا يَقْضيها الَّا انْتَ، اللهُمَّ فَكَما كانَ مِنْ شَاْنِكَ ما اذِنْتَ لى بِهِ مِنْ مَسْئَلَتِكَ، وَرَحِمْتَنى بِهِ مِنْ ذِكْرِكَ، فَلْيَكُنْ مِنْ شَاْنِكَ سَيِّدِى الْإِجابَةُ لى فيما دَعَوْتُكَ، وَعَوآئِدُ الْإِفْضالِ فيما رَجَوْتُكَ، وَالنَّجاةُ مِمَّا فَزِعْتُ الَيْكَ فيهِ، فَانْ لَمْ اكُنْ اهْلًا انْ ابْلُغَ رَحْمَتَكَ، فَانَّ رَحْمَتَكَ اهْلٌ انْ تَبْلُغَنى وَتَسَعَنى وَانْ لَمْ اكُنْ لِلْإِجابَةِ اهْلًا فَانْتَ اهْلُ الْفَضْلِ، وَرَحْمَتُكَ
items.english: O Allah, I call upon You for an anxiety that none can relieve but You, and for a mercy that cannot be attained except through You, and for a distress that none can dispel except You, and for a desire that cannot be reached except through You, and for a need that none can fulfill except You. O Allah, just as it was Your way that You permitted me to ask of You and showed me mercy by [allowing] me to remember You, let it be Your way, my Master, to respond to me in what I have called upon You for, and to grant me the recurring favors of Your grace in what I have hoped from You, and salvation from that which I have fled to You for refuge. For if I am not worthy of reaching Your mercy, then Your mercy is worthy of reaching me and encompassing me; and if I am not worthy of a response, then You are the One worthy of bestowing grace, and Your mercy...
items.transliteration: Allahumma inni ad'uka li-hammin la yufarrijuhu ghayruka, wa-li-rahmatin la tunalu illa bika, wa-li-karbin la yakshifuhu illa anta, wa-li-raghbatin la tublaghu illa bika, wa-li-hajatin la yaqdiha illa anta, Allahumma fa-kama kana min sha'nika ma adhinta li bihi min mas'alatika, wa-rahimtani bihi min dhikrika, fa-lyakun min sha'nika sayyidi al-ijabatu li fima da'awtuka, wa-'awa'idu al-ifdali fima rajawtuka, wa-al-najatu mimma fazi'tu ilayka fihi, fa-in lam akun ahlan an ablugha rahmataka, fa-inna rahmataka ahlun an tablughani wa-tasa'ani, wa-in lam akun lil-ijabati ahlan fa-anta ahlu al-fadli, wa-rahmatuka.

items.english: ...whoever is his enemy, and double the punishment upon whoever oppressed him. O Allah, send blessings upon al-Hasan ibn Ali, the Imam of the Muslims, and befriend whoever befriends him, and be the enemy of whoever is his enemy, and double the punishment upon whoever oppressed him. O Allah, send blessings upon the Successor after him, the Imam of the Muslims, and befriend whoever befriends him, and be the enemy of whoever is his enemy, [and hasten his relief]. O Allah, send blessings upon al-Qasim and al-Tahir, the two sons of Your Prophet. O Allah, send blessings upon Ruqayyah, the daughter of Your Prophet, and curse whoever harmed Your Prophet through her. O Allah, send blessings upon Umm Kulthum, the daughter of Your Prophet, and curse whoever harmed Your Prophet through her. O Allah, send blessings upon the progeny of Your Prophet. O Allah, succeed Your Prophet in [the care of] his household. O Allah, establish them firmly in the earth. O Allah, include us among their number, their support, and their helpers for the truth, in secret and in public. O Allah, demand the redress of their grievances, their unavenged wrongs, and their blood; and withhold from us, from them, and from every believing man and woman, the violence of every aggressor and tyrant, and of every creature You hold by its forelock. Indeed, You are the Mightiest in prowess and the most severe in punishment.

O Allah, just as it was of Your affair that You permitted me to ask of You and showered mercy upon me through Your remembrance, let it be of Your affair, my Master, to answer me in what I have called upon You for, and to grant the returning favors in what I have hoped for from You, and salvation from that which I have fled to You for; for if I am not worthy of reaching Your mercy, then Your mercy is worthy of reaching me and encompassing me; and if I am not worthy of an answer, then You are the Lord of grace, and Your mercy...

items.arabic: وَسِعَتْ كُلَّ شَىْ ءٍ، فَلْتَسَعْنى رَحْمَتُكَ، يا الهى يا كَريمُ، اسْئَلُكَ بِوَجْهِكَ الْكَريمِ، انْ تُصَلِّىَ عَلى مُحَمَّدٍ وَاهْلِ بَيْتِهِ، وَانْ تُفَرِّجَ هَمّى وَتَكْشِفَ كَرْبى وَغَمّى وَتَرْحَمَنى بِرَحْمَتِكَ، وَتَرْزُقَنى مِنْ فَضْلِكَ، انَّكَ سَميعُ الدُّعآءِ، قَريبٌ مُجيبٌ .
items.english: ...encompassed all things; so let Your mercy encompass me, O my God, O Generous One. I ask You by Your Noble Face to send blessings upon Muhammad and his Household, and to relieve my anxiety, and dispel my distress and my grief, and have mercy on me by Your mercy, and provide for me from Your bounty; indeed, You are the Hearer of supplications, Near, Responding.
items.transliteration: Wasi'at kulla shay'in, fal-tasa'ni rahmatuka, ya Ilahi ya Karimu, as'aluka bi-wajhika al-karimi, an tusalliya 'ala Muhammadin wa-ahli baytihi, wa-an tufarrija hammi wa-takshifa karbi wa-ghammi wa-tarhamani bi-rahmatika, wa-tarzuqani min fadlika, innaka sami'u al-du'a'i, qaribun mujibun.

items.arabic: 4. وكذلك ورد في الكتب المعتبرة أن تقول كلّ يوم من شهر رمضان:
items.english: 4. Likewise, it has been narrated in reliable books to say every day of the month of Ramadan:
items.transliteration: 4. Wa-kadhalika warada fi al-kutubi al-mu'tabarati an taqula kulla yawmin min shahri Ramadana:

items.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ انّى اسْئَلُكَ مِنْ فَضْلِكَ بِافْضَلِهِ، وَكُلُّ فَضْلِكَ فاضِلٌ، اللَّهُمَّ انّى اسْئَلُكَ بِفَضْلِكَ كُلِّه، اللَّهُمَّ انّى اسْئَلُكَ مِنْ رِزْقِكَ بِاعَمِّهِ، وَكُلُّ رِزْقِكَ عآمٌّ، اللَّهُمَّ انّى اسْئَلُكَ بِرِزْقِكَ كُلِّهِ، اللهُمَّ انّى اسْئَلُكَ مِنْ عَطآئِكَ بِاهْنَأِهِ، وَكُلُّ عَطآئِكَ هَنى ءٌ، اللهُمَّ انّى اسْئَلُكَ بِعَطآئِكَ كُلِّهِ، اللهُمَّ انّى اسْئَلُكَ مِنْ خَيْرِكَ بِاعْجَلِهِ، وَكُلُّ خَيْرِكَ عاجِلٌ، اللهُمَّ انّى اسْئَلُكَ بِخَيْرِكَ كُلِّهِ، اللهُمَّ انّى اسْئَلُكَ مِنْ احْسانِكَ بِاحْسَنِهِ، وَكُلُّ احْسانِكَ حَسَنٌ، اللهُمَّ انّى اسْئَلُكَ بِاحْسانِكَ كُلِّهِ، اللهُمَّ انّى اسْئَلُكَ بِما تُجيبُنى بِهِ حينَ اسْئَلُكَ، فَاجِبْنى يا اللَّهُ، وَصَلِّ عَلى مُحَمَّدٍ وآلِ مُحَمَّدٍ عَبْدِكَ الْمُرْتَضى وَرسُولِكَ الْمُصْطَفى وَامينِكَ وَنَجِيِّكَ دُونَ خَلْقِكَ، وَنَجيبِكَ مِنْ عِبادِكَ، وَنَبِيِّكَ بِالصِّدْقِ وَحَبيبِكَ، وَصَلِّ عَلى رَسُولِكَ، وَخِيَرَتِكَ مِنَ الْعالَمينَ، الْبَشيرِ النَّذيرِ، السِّراجِ الْمُنيرِ، وَعلى اهْلِ بَيْتِهِ الْأَبْرارِالطَّاهِرينَ، وَعَلى مَلائِكَتِكَ الَّذينَ اسْتَخْلَصْتَهُمْ لِنَفْسِكَ، وَحَجَبْتَهُمْ عَنْ خَلْقِكَ، وَعَلى انْبِيآئِكَ الَّذينَ يُنْبِئُونَ عَنْكَ بِالصِّدْقِ، وَعَلى رُسُلِكَ الَّذينَ خَصَصْتَهُمْ بِوَحْيِكَ، وَفَضَّلْتَهُمْ عَلَى الْعالَمينَ بِرِسالاتِكَ، وَعَلى عِبادِكَ الصَّالِحينَ الَّذينَ ادْخَلْتَهُمْ فى رَحْمَتِكَ، الْأَئِمَّةِ الْمُهْتَدينَ الرَّاشِدينَ، وَاوْلِيآئِكَ الْمُطَهَّرينَ، وَعَلى جَبْرَئيلَ وَميكآئيلَ وَاسْرافيلَ وَمَلَكِ الْمَوْتِ، وَمالِكٍ خازِنِ النَّارِ، وَرِضْوانَ خازِنِ الْجِنانِ،
items.english: O Allah, I ask You of Your bounty by its most excellent, and all Your bounty is excellent; O Allah, I ask You by Your bounty in its entirety. O Allah, I ask You of Your provision by its most encompassing, and all Your provision is encompassing; O Allah, I ask You by Your provision in its entirety. O Allah, I ask You of Your gift by its most pleasant, and all Your gifts are pleasant; O Allah, I ask You by Your gift in its entirety. O Allah, I ask You of Your good by its swiftest, and all Your good is swift; O Allah, I ask You by Your good in its entirety. O Allah, I ask You of Your benevolence by its most beautiful, and all Your benevolence is beautiful; O Allah, I ask You by Your benevolence in its entirety. O Allah, I ask You by that with which You answer me when I ask You; so answer me, O Allah! And send blessings upon Muhammad and the progeny of Muhammad, Your well-pleased servant, Your chosen Messenger, Your trustworthy one and Your confidant among Your creation, Your distinguished one among Your servants, Your truthful Prophet, and Your beloved. And send blessings upon Your Messenger, Your choice from among the worlds, the bearer of glad tidings, the warner, and the luminous lamp; and upon his Household, the righteous and pure; and upon Your angels whom You have chosen for Yourself and veiled from Your creation; and upon Your Prophets who inform of You with truth; and upon Your Messengers whom You have singled out for Your revelation and favored over the worlds with Your messages; and upon Your righteous servants whom You have admitted into Your mercy—the guided and rightly-guided Imams and Your purified friends; and upon Jibra'il, Mika'il, Israfil, the Angel of Death, Malik the keeper of the Fire, and Ridwan the keeper of the Gardens.
items.transliteration: Allahumma inni as'aluka min fadlika bi-afdalihi, wa-kullu fadlika fadilun, Allahumma inni as'aluka bi-fadlika kullihi, Allahumma inni as'aluka min rizqika bi-a'ammihi, wa-kullu rizqika 'ammun, Allahumma inni as'aluka bi-rizqika kullihi, Allahumma inni as'aluka min 'ata'ika bi-ahna'ihi, wa-kullu 'ata'ika hani'un, Allahumma inni as'aluka bi-'ata'ika kullihi, Allahumma inni as'aluka min khayrika bi-a'jalihi, wa-kullu khayrika 'ajilun, Allahumma inni as'aluka bi-khayrika kullihi, Allahumma inni as'aluka min ihsanika bi-ahsanihi, wa-kullu ihsanika hasanun, Allahumma inni as'aluka bi-ihsanika kullihi, Allahumma inni as'aluka bi-ma tujibuni bihi hina as'aluka, fa-ajibni ya Allahu, wa-salli 'ala Muhammadin wa-ali Muhammadin 'abdika al-murtada wa-rasulika al-mustafa wa-aminika wa-najiyyika duna khalqika, wa-najibika min 'ibadika, wa-nabiyyika bi-al-sidqi wa-habibika, wa-salli 'ala rasulika, wa-khiyaratika min al-'alamina, al-bashiri al-nadhiri, al-siraji al-muniri, wa-'ala ahli baytihi al-abrari al-tahirina, wa-'ala mala'ikatika alladhina istakhlastahum li-nafsika, wa-hajabtahum 'an khalqika, wa-'ala anbiya'ika alladhina yunbi'una 'anka bi-al-sidqi, wa-'ala rusulika alladhina khasastahum bi-wahyika, wa-faddaltahum 'ala al-'alamina bi-risalatika, wa-'ala 'ibadika al-salihina alladhina adkhaltahum fi rahmatika, al-aimmati al-muhtadina al-rashidina, wa-awliya'ika al-mutahharina, wa-'ala Jabra'ila wa-Mika'ila wa-Israfila wa-malaki al-mawti, wa-Malikin khazini al-nari, wa-Ridwana khazini al-jinani,

items.arabic: وَسِعَتْ كُلَّ شَىْ ءٍ، فَلْتَسَعْنى رَحْمَتُكَ، يا الهى يا كَريمُ، اسْئَلُكَ بِوَجْهِكَ الْكَريمِ، انْ تُصَلِّىَ عَلى مُحَمَّدٍ وَاهْلِ بَيْتِهِ، وَانْ تُفَرِّجَ هَمّى وَتَكْشِفَ كَرْبى وَغَمّى وَتَرْحَمَنى بِرَحْمَتِكَ، وَتَرْزُقَنى مِنْ فَضْلِكَ، انَّكَ سَميعُ الدُّعآءِ، قَريبٌ مُجيبٌ .
items.english: encompassed all things; so let Your mercy encompass me, O my God, O Generous One. I ask You by Your Noble Face to send blessings upon Muhammad and his Household, and to relieve my anxiety, and dispel my distress and my grief, and have mercy on me by Your mercy, and provide for me from Your bounty; indeed, You are the Hearer of prayer, Near and Responsive.
items.transliteration: Wasi'at kulla shay'in, fal-tasa'ni rahmatuka, ya Ilahi ya Karimu, as'aluka bi-wajhika al-karimi, an tusalliya 'ala Muhammadin wa-ahli baytihi, wa-an tufarrija hammi wa-takshifa karbi wa-ghammi wa-tarhamani bi-rahmatika, wa-tarzuqani min fadlika, innaka sami'u al-du'a'i, qaribun mujibun.

items.english: O Allah, I ask You of Your bounty by its most excellent, and all Your bounty is excellent; O Allah, I ask You by Your bounty in its entirety. O Allah, I ask You of Your provision by its most encompassing, and all Your provision is encompassing; O Allah, I ask You by Your provision in its entirety. O Allah, I ask You of Your gift by its most pleasant, and all Your gifts are pleasant; O Allah, I ask You by Your gift in its entirety. O Allah, I ask You of Your goodness by its speediest, and all Your goodness is speedy; O Allah, I ask You by Your goodness in its entirety. O Allah, I ask You of Your benevolence by its best, and all Your benevolence is good; O Allah, I ask You by Your benevolence in its entirety. O Allah, I ask You by that with which You respond to me when I ask You, so respond to me, O Allah; and send blessings upon Muhammad and the progeny of Muhammad, Your well-pleased servant, Your chosen Messenger, Your trustee and Your confidant above Your creation, Your distinguished one among Your servants, Your Prophet with truth, and Your beloved. And send blessings upon Your Messenger, Your choice from the worlds, the bearer of glad tidings, the warner, the luminous lamp; and upon his Household, the righteous, the pure. And upon Your angels whom You have purified for Yourself and veiled from Your creation; and upon Your prophets who inform of You with truth; and upon Your messengers whom You have singled out for Your revelation and preferred over the worlds with Your messages; and upon Your righteous servants whom You have admitted into Your mercy, the rightly-guided and directing Imams, and Your purified friends; and upon Jibrail, Mikhail, Israfil, the Angel of Death, Malik the keeper of the Fire, and Ridwan the keeper of the Gardens.
items.transliteration: Allahumma inni as'aluka min fadlika bi-afdalihi, wa-kullu fadlika fadilun, Allahumma inni as'aluka bi-fadlika kullihi, Allahumma inni as'aluka min rizqika bi-a'ammihi, wa-kullu rizqika 'ammun, Allahumma inni as'aluka bi-rizqika kullihi, Allahumma inni as'aluka min 'ata'ika bi-ahna'ihi, wa-kullu 'ata'ika hani'un, Allahumma inni as'aluka bi-'ata'ika kullihi, Allahumma inni as'aluka min khayrika bi-a'jalihi, wa-kullu khayrika 'ajilun, Allahumma inni as'aluka bi-khayrika kullihi, Allahumma inni as'aluka min ihsanika bi-ahsanihi, wa-kullu ihsanika hasanun, Allahumma inni as'aluka bi-ihsanika kullihi, Allahumma inni as'aluka bi-ma tujibuni bihi hina as'aluka, fa-ajibni ya Allahu, wa-salli 'ala Muhammadin wa-ali Muhammadin 'abdika al-murtada wa-rasulika al-mustafa wa-aminika wa-najiyyika duna khalqika, wa-najibika min 'ibadika, wa-nabiyyika bi-al-sidqi wa-habibika, wa-salli 'ala rasulika, wa-khiyaratika min al-'alamina, al-bashiri al-nadhiri, al-siraji al-muniri, wa-'ala ahli baytihi al-abrari al-tahirina, wa-'ala mala'ikatika alladhina istakhlastahum li-nafsika, wa-hajabtahum 'an khalqika, wa-'ala anbiya'ika alladhina yunbi'una 'anka bi-al-sidqi, wa-'ala rusulika alladhina khasastahum bi-wahyika, wa-faddaltahum 'ala al-'alamina bi-risalatika, wa-'ala 'ibadika al-salihina alladhina adkhaltahum fi rahmatika, al-a'immati al-muhtadina al-rashidina, wa-awliya'ika al-mutahharina, wa-'ala Jabra'ila wa-Mika'ila wa-Israfila wa-malaki al-mawti, wa-Malikin khazini al-nari, wa-Ridwana khazini al-jinani.

items.arabic: وَرُوحِ الْقُدُسِ، وَالرُّوحِ الْأَمينِ، وَحَمَلَةِ عَرْشِكَ الْمُقَرَّبينَ، وَعَلى الْمَلَكَيْنِ الْحافِظَيْنِ عَلَىَّ بِالصَّلاةِ، الَّتى تُحِبُّ انْ يُصَلِّىَ بِها عَلَيْهِمْ اهْلُ السَّماواتِ وَاهْلُ الْأَرَضينَ، صَلاةً طَيِّبَةً كَثيرةً، مُبارَكَةً زاكِيَةً نامِيَةً، ظاهِرَةً باطِنَةً، شَريفَةً فاضِلَةً، تُبَيِّنُ بِها فَضْلَهُمْ عَلَى الْأَوَّلينَ وَالْأخِرينَ، اللهُمَّ وَاعْطِ مُحَمَّداً الْوَسيلَةَ، وَالشَّرَفَ وَالْفَضيلَةَ، وَاجْزِهِ خَيْرَ ما جَزَيْتَ نَبِيّاً عَنْ امَّتِهِ، اللهُمَّ وَاعْطِ مُحَمَّداً صَلَّى اللَّهُ عَلَيْهِ وَآلِهِ، مَعَ كُلِّ زُلْفَةٍ زُلْفَةً، وَمَعَ كُلِّ وَسيلَةٍ وَسيلَةً، وَمَعَ كُلِّ فَضيلَةٍ فَضيلَةً، وَمَعَ كُلِّ شَرَفٍ شَرَفاً، تُعْطى مُحَمَّداً وَ الَهُ يَوْمَ الْقِيامَةِ، افْضَلَ ما اعْطَيْتَ احَداً مِنَ الْأَوَّلينَ وَالْأخِرينَ، اللهُمَّ وَاجْعَلْ مُحَمَّداً صَلَّى اللَّهُ عَلَيْهِ وَآلِهِ، ادْنَى الْمُرْسَلينَ مِنْكَ مَجْلِساً، وَافْسَحَهُمْ فِى الْجَنَّةِ عِنْدَكَ مَنْزِلًا، وَاقْرَبَهُمْ الَيْكَ وَسيلَةً، وَاجْعَلْهُ اوَّلَ شافِعٍ، وَاوَّلَ مُشَفَّعٍ، وَاوَّلَ قآئِلٍ، وَانْجَحَ سائِلٍ، وَابْعَثْهُ الْمَقامَ الْمَحْمُودَ الَّذى يَغْبِطُهُ بِهِ الْأَوَّلُونَ وَالْأخِرُونَ، يا ارْحَمَ الرَّاحِمينَ، وَاسْئَلُكَ انْ تُصَلِّىَ عَلى مُحَمَّدٍ وَآلِ مُحَمَّدٍ، وَانْ تَسْمَعَ صَوْتى وَتُجيبَ دَعْوَتى وَتَجاوَزَ عَنْ خَطيئَتى وَتَصْفَحَ عَنْ ظُلْمى وَتُنْجِحَ طَلِبَتى وَتَقْضِىَ حاجَتى وَتُنْجِزَ لى ما وَعَدْتَنى وَتُقيلَ عَثْرَتى [وَتَقْبَلَ مِنّى وَتَغْفِرَ ذُنُوبى وَتَعْفُوَ عَنْ جُرْمى وَتَقَبَّلَ عَمَلى وَلا تُعْرِضَ عَنّى وَتَرْحَمَنى وَلا تُعَذِّبَنى وَتُعافِيَنى وَلا تَبْتَلِيَنى وَتَرْزُقَنى مِنَ الرِّزْقِ اطْيَبَهُ وَاوْسَعَهُ، وَلا تَحْرِمَنى يا رَبِّ، وَاقْضِ عَنّى دَيْنى وَضَعْ عَنّى وِزْرى وَلا تُحَمِّلْنى ما لا طاقَةَ لى بِهِ يامَوْلاىَ، وَادْخِلْنى فى كُلِّ خَيْرٍ ادْخَلْتَ فيهِ مُحَمَّداً وَ الَ مُحَمَّدٍ، وَاخْرِجْنى مِنْ كُلِّ سُوءٍ اخْرَجْتَ مِنْهُ مُحَمَّداً وَآلَ مُحَمَّدٍ، صَلَواتُكَ عَلَيْهِ وَعَلَيْهِمْ اجْمَعينَ، وَالسَّلامُ عَلَيْهِ وَعَلَيْهِمْ، وَرَحْمَةُ اللَّهِ وَبَرَكاتُهُ* ثم قل ثلاثاً: اللهُمَّ انّى ادْعُوكَ كَما امَرْتَنى فَاسْتَجِبْ لى كَما وَعَدْتَنى
items.english:
and the Holy Spirit, and the Trustworthy Spirit, and the near-stationed bearers of Your Throne; and upon the two angels guarding me, with the blessing that You love for the inhabitants of the heavens and the inhabitants of the earths to bless them with—a blessing that is pleasant and abundant, blessed, pure, increasing, manifest and hidden, noble and excellent, by which You manifest their merit over the former and the latter generations. O Allah, grant Muhammad the Means, the honor, and the excellence, and reward him with the best of what You have rewarded a prophet on behalf of his community. O Allah, grant Muhammad—may Allah bless him and his progeny—with every proximity further proximity, and with every means further means, and with every excellence further excellence, and with every honor further honor, which You grant to Muhammad and his progeny on the Day of Resurrection, more excellent than what You have granted to anyone among the former and the latter generations. O Allah, and make Muhammad—may Allah bless him and his progeny—the closest of the Messengers to You in assembly, the most spacious of them in station within Paradise in Your presence, and the nearest of them to You in means; and make him the first intercessor, the first whose intercession is accepted, the first speaker, and the most successful petitioner; and raise him to the Praiseworthy Station for which the former and the latter generations envy him. O Most Merciful of the merciful! I ask You to send blessings upon Muhammad and the progeny of Muhammad, and to hear my voice, answer my supplication, overlook my sin, pardon my wrongdoing, grant my request, fulfill my need, accomplish for me what You have promised me, overlook my lapse, accept from me, forgive my sins, pardon my offense, accept my deed, not turn away from me, have mercy on me, not punish me, grant me well-being, not try me with trials, provide me with the purest and most expansive of provision, and not deprive me, O Lord; settle my debt for me, remove my burden from me, and do not charge me with that which I have no strength to bear, O my Master; and admit me into every good into which You admitted Muhammad and the progeny of Muhammad, and take me out of every evil from which You took out Muhammad and the progeny of Muhammad—Your blessings be upon him and all of them, and peace be upon him and upon them, and the mercy of Allah and His blessings.

Then say three times: O Allah, I call upon You just as You commanded me, so answer me just as You promised me.
items.transliteration: Wa-ruhi al-qudusi, wa-al-ruhi al-amini, wa-hamalati 'arshika al-muqarrabina, wa-'ala al-malakayni al-hafizayni 'alayya bi-al-salati, allati tuhibbu an yusalliya biha 'alayhim ahlu al-samawati wa-ahlu al-aradina, salatan tayyibatan kathiratan, mubarakatan zakiyatan namiyatan, zahiratan batinatan, sharifatan fadilatan, tubayyinu biha fadlahum 'ala al-awwalina wa-al-akhirina, Allahumma wa-a'ti Muhammadan al-wasilata, wa-al-sharafa wa-al-fadilata, wa-ijzihi khayra ma jazayta nabiyyan 'an ummatihi, Allahumma wa-a'ti Muhammadan salla Allahu 'alayhi wa-alihi, ma'a kulli zulfatin zulfatan, wa-ma'a kulli wasilatin wasilatan, wa-ma'a kulli fadilatin fadilatan, wa-ma'a kulli sharafin sharafan, tu'ti Muhammadan wa-alahu yawma al-qiyamati, afdala ma a'tayta ahadan min al-awwalina wa-al-akhirina, Allahumma wa-ij'al Muhammadan salla Allahu 'alayhi wa-alihi, adna al-mursalina minka majlisan, wa-afsahahum fi al-jannati 'indaka manzilan, wa-aqrabahum ilayka wasilatan, wa-ij'alhu awwala shafi'in, wa-awwala mushaffa'in, wa-awwala qa'ilin, wa-anjaha sa'ilin, wa-ab'ath-hu al-maqama al-mahmuda alladhi yaghbituhu bihi al-awwaluna wa-al-akhiruna, ya arhama al-rahimina, wa-as'aluka an tusalliya 'ala Muhammadin wa-ali Muhammadin, wa-an tasma'a sawti wa-tujiba da'wati wa-tajawaza 'an khati'ati wa-tasfaha 'an zulmi wa-tunjaha talibati wa-taqdiya hajati wa-tunjiza li ma wa'adtani wa-tuqila 'athrati [wa-taqbala minni wa-taghfira dhunubi wa-ta'fuwa 'an jurmi wa-taqabbala 'amali wa-la tu'rida 'anni wa-tarhamani wa-la tu'adh-dhibani wa-tu'afiyani wa-la tabtaliyani wa-tarzuqani min al-rizqi atyabahu wa-awsa'ahu, wa-la tahrimni ya rabbi, wa-aqdi 'anni dayni wa-da' 'anni wizri wa-la tuhammilni ma la taqata li bihi ya mawlaya, wa-adkhilni fi kulli khayrin adkhalta fihi Muhammadan wa-ala Muhammadin, wa-akhrijni min kulli su'in akhrajta minhu Muhammadan wa-ala Muhammadin, salawatuka 'alayhi wa-'alayhim ajma'ina, wa-al-salamu 'alayhi wa-'alayhim, wa-rahmatu Allahi wa-barakatuhu* thumma qul thalathan: Allahumma inni ad'uka kama amartani fa-astajib li kama wa'adtani.

items.arabic: وَرُوحِ الْقُدُسِ، وَالرُّوحِ الْأَمينِ، وَحَمَلَةِ عَرْشِكَ الْمُقَرَّبينَ، وَعَلى الْمَلَكَيْنِ الْحافِظَيْنِ عَلَىَّ بِالصَّلاةِ، الَّتى تُحِبُّ انْ يُصَلِّىَ بِها عَلَيْهِمْ اهْلُ السَّماواتِ وَاهْلُ الْأَرَضينَ، صَلاةً طَيِّبَةً كَثيرةً، مُبارَكَةً زاكِيَةً نامِيَةً، ظاهِرَةً باطِنَةً، شَريفَةً فاضِلَةً، تُبَيِّنُ بِها فَضْلَهُمْ عَلَى الْأَوَّلينَ وَالْأخِرينَ، اللهُمَّ وَاعْطِ مُحَمَّداً الْوَسيلَةَ، وَالشَّرَفَ وَالْفَضيلَةَ، وَاجْزِهِ خَيْرَ ما جَزَيْتَ نَبِيّاً عَنْ امَّتِهِ، اللهُمَّ وَاعْطِ مُحَمَّداً صَلَّى اللَّهُ عَلَيْهِ وَآلِهِ، مَعَ كُلِّ زُلْفَةٍ زُلْفَةً، وَمَعَ كُلِّ وَسيلَةٍ وَسيلَةً، وَمَعَ كُلِّ فَضيلَةٍ فَضيلَةً، وَمَعَ كُلِّ شَرَفٍ شَرَفاً، تُعْطى مُحَمَّداً وَ الَهُ يَوْمَ الْقِيامَةِ، افْضَلَ ما اعْطَيْتَ احَداً مِنَ الْأَوَّلينَ وَالْأخِرينَ، اللهُمَّ وَاجْعَلْ مُحَمَّداً صَلَّى اللَّهُ عَلَيْهِ وَآلِهِ، ادْنَى الْمُرْسَلينَ مِنْكَ مَجْلِساً، وَافْسَحَهُمْ فِى الْجَنَّةِ عِنْدَكَ مَنْزِلًا، وَاقْرَبَهُمْ الَيْكَ وَسيلَةً، وَاجْعَلْهُ اوَّلَ شافِعٍ، وَاوَّلَ مُشَفَّعٍ، وَاوَّلَ قآئِلٍ، وَانْجَحَ سائِلٍ، وَابْعَثْهُ الْمَقامَ الْمَحْمُودَ الَّذى يَغْبِطُهُ بِهِ الْأَوَّلُونَ وَالْأخِرُونَ، يا ارْحَمَ الرَّاحِمينَ، وَاسْئَلُكَ انْ تُصَلِّىَ عَلى مُحَمَّدٍ وَآلِ مُحَمَّدٍ، وَانْ تَسْمَعَ صَوْتى وَتُجيبَ دَعْوَتى وَتَجاوَزَ عَنْ خَطيئَتى وَتَصْفَحَ عَنْ ظُلْمى وَتُنْجِحَ طَلِبَتى وَتَقْضِىَ حاجَتى وَتُنْجِزَ لى ما وَعَدْتَنى وَتُقيلَ عَثْرَتى [وَتَقْبَلَ مِنّى وَتَغْفِرَ ذُنُوبى وَتَعْفُوَ عَنْ جُرْمى وَتَقَبَّلَ عَمَلى وَلا تُعْرِضَ عَنّى وَتَرْحَمَنى وَلا تُعَذِّبَنى وَتُعافِيَنى وَلا تَبْتَلِيَنى وَتَرْزُقَنى مِنَ الرِّزْقِ اطْيَبَهُ وَاوْسَعَهُ، وَلا تَحْرِمَنى يا رَبِّ، وَاقْضِ عَنّى دَيْنى وَضَعْ عَنّى وِزْرى وَلا تُحَمِّلْنى ما لا طاقَةَ لى بِهِ يامَوْلاىَ، وَادْخِلْنى فى كُلِّ خَيْرٍ O Allah, grant Muhammad the Means, the honor, and the excellence, and reward him with the best reward You have ever granted a prophet on behalf of his nation. O Allah, grant Muhammad (may Allah bless him and his progeny), with every nearness a nearness, and with every means a means, and with every excellence an excellence, and with every honor an honor, granting Muhammad and his progeny on the Day of Resurrection the most excellent of what You have granted anyone from the first and the last. O Allah, make Muhammad (may Allah bless him and his progeny) the closest of the Messengers to You in assembly, and the one with the most spacious abode near You in Paradise, and the nearest of them to You in means; and make him the first intercessor, the first whose intercession is accepted, the first speaker, and the most successful petitioner. And raise him to the Praiseworthy Station for which the first and the last envy him, O Most Merciful of the merciful. I ask You to send blessings upon Muhammad and the progeny of Muhammad, and to hear my voice, answer my supplication, overlook my mistake, pardon my wrongdoing, make my request successful, fulfill my need, accomplish for me what You have promised me, overlook my lapse, accept from me, forgive my sins, pardon my offense, accept my deed, not turn away from me, have mercy on me, not punish me, grant me well-being, not put me to trial, and provide me with the purest and most extensive provision; and do not deprive me, O Lord; and settle my debt for me, remove my burden from me, and do not charge me with that which I have no strength to bear, O my Master. Then say three times: O Allah, I call upon You just as You have commanded me, so answer me just as You have promised me.

items.arabic: * ثم قل: اللَّهُمَّ انّى اسْئَلُكَ قَليلًا مِنْ كَثيرٍ، مَعَ حاجَةٍ بى الَيْهِ عَظيمَةٍ، وَغِناكَ عَنْهُ قَديمٌ، وَهُوَ عِنْدى كَثيرٌ، وَهُوَ عَلَيْكَ سَهْلٌ يَسيرٌ، فَامْنُنْ عَلَىَّ بِهِ، انَّكَ عَلى كُلِّ شَىْ ءٍ قَديرٌ، امينَ رَبَّ الْعالَمينَ .
items.english: Then say: O Allah, I ask You for a little from much, while my need for it is great, and Your independence from it is eternal; it is much to me, while for You it is easy and simple. So bestow it upon me; indeed, You have power over all things. Amen, Lord of the worlds.
items.transliteration: Thumma qul: Allahumma inni as'aluka qalilan min kathirin, ma'a hajatin bi ilayhi 'azimatin, wa-ghinaka 'anhu qadimun, wa-huwa 'indi kathirun, wa-huwa 'alayka sahlun yasirun, fa-amnun 'alayya bihi, innaka 'ala kulli shay'in qadirun, amina rabba al-'alamina.

items.arabic: 5. روى الشيخ المفيد رحمه الله في المقنعة عن الثقة الجليل عليّ بن مهزيار عن الإمام محمّد التقيّ عليه السلام أنّه يستحبّ أن تكثر من هذا الدعاء في شهر رمضان ليله ونهاره من أوّله إلى آخره:
items.english: 5. Al-Shaykh al-Mufid (may Allah have mercy on him) narrated in *al-Muqni‘ah* on the authority of the noble and trustworthy ‘Ali ibn Mahziyar, from Imam Muhammad al-Taqi (peace be upon him), that it is recommended to frequently recite this supplication during the month of Ramadan, throughout its nights and days, from its beginning to its end:
items.transliteration: 5. Rawa al-Shaykhu al-Mufidu rahimahu Allahu fi al-Muqni'ati 'an al-thiqati al-jalili 'Aliyyi bni Mahziyarin 'an al-Imami Muhammadin al-Taqiyyi 'alayhi al-salamu annahu yustahabbu an tukthira min hadha al-du'a'i fi shahri Ramadana laylihi wa-naharihi min awwalihi ila akhirihi:

items.arabic: يا ذَا الَّذى كانَ قَبْلَ كُلِّ شَىْ ءٍ، ثُمَّ خَلَقَ كُلَّ شَىْ ءٍ، ثُمَّ يَبْقى وَيَفْنى كُلُّ شَىْ ءٍ، يا ذَا الَّذى لَيْسَ كَمِثْلِهِ شَىْ ءٌ، وَيا ذَا الَّذى لَيْسَ فِى السَّماواتِ الْعُلى وَلا فِى الْأَرَضينَ السُّفْلى وَلا فَوْقَهُنَّ وَلا تَحْتَهُنَّ، وَلا بَيْنَهُنَّ الهٌ يُعْبَدُ غَيْرُهُ، لَكَ الْحَمْدُ حَمْداً لا يَقْوى عَلى احْصآئِهِ الَّا انْتَ، فَصَلِّ عَلى مُحَمَّدٍ وَآلِ مُحَمِّدٍ، صَلاةً لا يَقْوى عَلى احْصآئِها الّا انْتَ .
items.english: O He who was before all things, then created all things, then remains while all things perish; O He, the like of whom there is nothing; and O He, besides whom there is no god worshipped in the high heavens, nor in the lowly earths, nor above them, nor beneath them, nor between them. To You belongs praise—praise that none has the power to count except You; so send blessings upon Muhammad and the progeny of Muhammad, a blessing that none has the power to count except You.
items.transliteration: Ya dha alladhi kana qabla kulli shay'in, thumma khalaqa kulla shay'in, thumma yabqa wa-yafna kullu shay'in, ya dha alladhi laysa ka-mithlihi shay'un, wa-ya dha alladhi laysa fi al-samawati al-'ula wa-la fi al-aradina al-sufla wa-la fawqahunna wa-la tahtahunna, wa-la baynahunna ilahun yu'badu ghayruhu, laka al-hamdu hamdan la yaqwa 'ala ihsa'ihi illa anta, fa-salli 'ala Muhammadin wa-ali Muhammadin, salatan la yaqwa 'ala ihsa'iha illa anta.

items.arabic: 6. روى الكفعمي في البلد الأمين وفي المصباح عن كتاب اختيار السيّد ابن باقي أنّ من قرأ هذا الدعاء في كلّ يوم من رمضان غفر اللَّه له ذنوباً كثيرة:
items.english: 6. Al-Kaf‘ami narrated in *al-Balad al-Amin* and in *al-Misbah* from the book *Ikhtiyar* of Sayyid Ibn Baqi that whoever recites this supplication on every day of Ramadan, Allah will forgive them many sins:
items.transliteration: 6. Rawa al-Kaf'amiyyu fi al-Baladi al-Amini wa-fi al-Misbahi 'an kitabi Ikhtyari al-Sayyidi ibni Baqin anna man qara'a hadha al-du'a'a fi kulli yawmin min Ramadana ghafara Allahu lahu dhunuban kathiratan:

items.arabic: اللهُمَّ رَبَّ شَهْرِ رَمَضانَ، الَّذى انْزَلْتَ فيهِ الْقُرْآنَ، وَافْتَرَضْتَ عَلى عِبادِكَ فيهِ الصِّيامَ، وَارْزُقْنى حَجَّ بَيْتِكَ الْحَرامِ فى هذَا الْعامِ وَفى كُلِّ عامٍ، وَاغْفِرْ لِىَ الذُّنُوبَ الْعِظامَ، فَانَّهُ لا يَغْفِرُها غَيْرُكَ يا ذَا الْجَلالِ وَالْإِكْرامِ .- چ چ-
items.english: O Allah, Lord of the month of Ramadan, in which You sent down the Quran and enjoined fasting upon Your servants therein; grant me the pilgrimage to Your Sacred House in this year and in every year, and forgive me my great sins, for indeed, none forgives them except You, O Possessor of Majesty and Honor.
items.transliteration: Allahumma rabba shahri Ramadana, alladhi anzalta fihi al-Qur'ana, wa-iftaradta 'ala 'ibadika fihi al-siyama, wa-urzuqni hajja baytika al-harami fi hadha al-'ami wa-fi kulli 'amin, wa-ighfir liya al-dhunuba al-'izama, fa-innahu la yaghfiruha ghayruka ya dha al-jalali wa-al-ikrami.

items.arabic: 7. قال الشيخ المفيد في المقنعة: ومن سننه (شهر رمضان المبارك) الصلاة على رسول اللَّه صلى الله عليه و آله في كلّ يوم مائة مرّة وما زاد على ذلك فهو أفضل .
items.english: 7. Al-Shaykh al-Mufid said in *al-Muqni‘ah*: And among its [the blessed month of Ramadan's] recommended practices is sending blessings upon the Messenger of Allah, peace be upon him and his progeny, one hundred times every day, and whatever exceeds that is more excellent.
items.transliteration: 7. Qala al-Shaykhu al-Mufidu fi al-Muqni'ati: Wa-min sunanihi (shahri Ramadana al-mubaraki) al-salatu 'ala rasuli Allahi salla Allahu 'alayhi wa-alihi fi kulli yawmin mi'ata marratin wa-ma zada 'ala dhalika fa-huwa afdalu.

items.arabic: * ثم قل: اللَّهُمَّ انّى اسْئَلُكَ قَليلًا مِنْ كَثيرٍ، مَعَ حاجَةٍ بى الَيْهِ عَظيمَةٍ، وَغِناكَ عَنْهُ قَديمٌ، وَهُوَ عِنْدى كَثيرٌ، وَهُوَ عَلَيْكَ سَهْلٌ يَسيرٌ، فَامْنُنْ عَلَىَّ بِهِ، انَّكَ عَلى كُلِّ شَىْ ءٍ قَديرٌ، امينَ رَبَّ الْعالَمينَ .
items.english: Then say: O Allah, I ask You for a little from much, while my need for it is great, and Your independence from it is eternal; it is much to me, while for You it is easy and simple. So bestow it upon me; indeed, You have power over all things. Amen, Lord of the worlds.
items.transliteration: Thumma qul: Allahumma inni as'aluka qalilan min kathirin, ma'a hajatin bi ilayhi 'azimatin, wa-ghinaka 'anhu qadimun, wa-huwa 'indi kathirun, wa-huwa 'alayka sahlun yasirun, fa-amnun 'alayya bihi, innaka 'ala kulli shay'in qadirun, amina rabba al-'alamina.

items.arabic: 5. روى الشيخ المفيد رحمه الله في المقنعة عن الثقة الجليل عليّ بن مهزيار عن الإمام محمّد التقيّ عليه السلام أنّه يستحبّ أن تكثر من هذا الدعاء في شهر رمضان ليله ونهاره من أوّله إلى آخره:
items.english: 5. Al-Shaykh al-Mufid (may Allah have mercy on him) narrated in *al-Muqni‘ah* on the authority of the noble and trustworthy ‘Ali ibn Mahziyar, from Imam Muhammad al-Taqi (peace be upon him), that it is recommended to frequently recite this supplication during the month of Ramadan, throughout its night and day from its beginning to its end:
items.transliteration: 5. Rawa al-Shaykhu al-Mufidu rahimahu Allahu fi al-Muqni'ati 'an al-thiqati al-jalili 'Aliyyi bni Mahziyarin 'an al-Imami Muhammadin al-Taqiyyi 'alayhi al-salamu annahu yustahabbu an tukthira min hadha al-du'a'i fi shahri Ramadana laylahu wa-naharahu min awwalihi ila akhirihi:

items.arabic: يا ذَا الَّذى كانَ قَبْلَ كُلِّ شَىْ ءٍ، ثُمَّ خَلَقَ كُلَّ شَىْ ءٍ، ثُمَّ يَبْقى وَيَفْنى كُلُّ شَىْ ءٍ، يا ذَا الَّذى لَيْسَ كَمِثْلِهِ شَىْ ءٌ، وَيا ذَا الَّذى لَيْسَ فِى السَّماواتِ الْعُلى وَلا فِى الْأَرَضينَ السُّفْلى وَلا فَوْقَهُنَّ وَلا تَحْتَهُنَّ، وَلا بَيْنَهُنَّ الهٌ يُعْبَدُ غَيْرُهُ، لَكَ الْحَمْدُ حَمْداً لا يَقْوى عَلى احْصآئِهِ الَّا انْتَ، فَصَلِّ عَلى مُحَمَّدٍ وَآلِ مُحَمِّدٍ، صَلاةً لا يَقْوى عَلى احْصآئِها الّا انْتَ .
items.english: O He who was before all things, then created all things, then remains while all things perish; O He, the like of whom there is nothing; and O He, besides whom there is no god worshipped in the high heavens, nor in the lowly earths, nor above them, nor beneath them, nor between them. To You belongs praise—a praise that none has the power to count except You; so send blessings upon Muhammad and the progeny of Muhammad, a blessing that none has the power to count except You.
items.transliteration: Ya dha alladhi kana qabla kulli shay'in, thumma khalaqa kulla shay'in, thumma yabqa wa-yafna kullu shay'in, ya dha alladhi laysa ka-mithlihi shay'un, wa-ya dha alladhi laysa fi al-samawati al-'ula wa-la fi al-aradina al-sufla wa-la fawqahunna wa-la tahtahunna, wa-la baynahunna ilahun yu'badu ghayruhu, laka al-hamdu hamdan la yaqwa 'ala ihsa'ihi illa anta, fa-salli 'ala Muhammadin wa-ali Muhammadin, salatan la yaqwa 'ala ihsa'iha illa anta.

items.arabic: 6. روى الكفعمي في البلد الأمين وفي المصباح عن كتاب اختيار السيّد ابن باقي أنّ من قرأ هذا الدعاء في كلّ يوم من رمضان غفر اللَّه له ذنوباً كثيرة:
