items.arabic: ذكرت امور في الأعمال الخاصّة لبعض ليالي وأيّام هذا الشهر الشريف:
items.english: Certain matters have been mentioned regarding the specific deeds for some of the nights and days of this noble month:
items.transliteration: Dhukirat umurun fi al-a'mali al-khassati li-ba'di layali wa-ayyami hadha al-shahri al-sharifi:

items.arabic: الليلة الاولى:
items.english: The First Night:
items.transliteration: Al-laylatu al-ula:

items.arabic: وردت عدّة أعمال في هذه الليلة:
items.english: Several deeds have been narrated for this night:
items.transliteration: Waradat 'iddatu a'malin fi hadhihi al-laylati:

items.arabic: 1. الاستهلال الذي أوجبه البعض (واجب كفائيّ).
items.english: 1. Sighting the crescent moon, which some have deemed obligatory (a collective obligation).
items.transliteration: 1. Al-istihlalu alladhi awjabahu al-ba'du (wajibun kifa'iyyun).

items.arabic: إذا رأيْتَ الهِلالَ- طبق رواية الصادق عليه السلام- فاسْتَقْبِلِ القِبْلَةَ وارْفَعْ يَدَيْكَ إلى السَّماءِ وخاطِبِ الهِلالَ وَقُلْ
items.english: When you see the crescent moon—according to a narration from al-Sadiq (peace be upon him)—face the Qiblah, raise your hands toward the sky, address the crescent moon, and say:
items.transliteration: Idha ra'ayta al-hilala - tibqa riwayati al-Sadiqi 'alayhi al-salamu - fa-staqbili al-qiblata wa-irfa' yadayka ila al-sama'i wa-khatibi al-hilala wa-qul

items.arabic: : رَبّى وَرَبُّكَ اللَّهُ رَبُّ الْعالَمينَ، اللهُمَّ اهِلَّهُ عَلَيْنا بِالْأَمْنِ وَالْإِيمانِ، وَالسَّلامَةِ وَالْإِسْلامِ، وَالْمُسارَعَةِ الى ما تُحِبُّ وَتَرْضى اللهُمَّ بارِكْ لَنا فى شَهْرِنا هذا، وَارْزُقْنا خَيْرَهُ وَعَوْنَهُ، وَاصْرِفْ عَنَّا ضُرَّهُ وَشَرَّهُ، وَبَلائَهُ وَفِتْنَتَهُ .
items.english: My Lord and your Lord is Allah, the Lord of the worlds. O Allah, make it dawn upon us with security and faith, safety and Islam, and haste toward that which You love and are pleased with. O Allah, bless us in this month of ours, and grant us its goodness and its aid, and avert from us its harm, its evil, its trials, and its tribulations.
items.transliteration: Rabbi wa-rabbuka Allahu rabbu al-'alamina, Allahumma ahillahu 'alayna bi-al-amni wa-al-imani, wa-al-salamati wa-al-islami, wa-al-musara'ati ila ma tuhibbu wa-tarda, Allahumma barik lana fi shahrina hadha, wa-urzuqna khayrahu wa-'awnahu, wa-asrif 'anna durrahu wa-sharrahu, wa-bala'ahu wa-fitnatahu.

items.arabic: وروي أنّ رسول اللَّه صلى الله عليه و آله كان إذا استهلّ هلال شهر رمضان استقبل القبلة وقال:
items.english: And it has been narrated that when the Messenger of Allah, peace be upon him and his progeny, sighted the crescent moon of the month of Ramadan, he would face the Qiblah and say:
items.transliteration: Wa-ruwiya anna rasula Allahi salla Allahu 'alayhi wa-alihi kana idha istahalla hilala shahri Ramadana istaqbala al-qiblata wa-qala:

items.arabic: اللهُمَّ اهِلَّهُ عَلَيْنا بِالْأَمْنِ والْإِيمانِ، وَالسَّلامَةِ وَالْإِسْلامِ، وَالْعافِيَةِ الْمُجَلَّلَةِ، وَدِفاعِ الْأَسْقامِ، وَالرِّزْقِ الْواسِعِ، وَالْعَوْنِ عَلَى الصَّلاةِ وَالصِّيامِ وَالْقِيامِ، وَتِلاوَةِ الْقُرْآنِ، اللهُمَّ سَلِّمْنا لِشَهْرِ رَمَضانَ، وَتَسَلَّمْهُ مِنَّا، وَسَلِّمْنا فيهِ حَتّى يَنْقَضِىَ عَنَّا شَهْرُ رَمَضانَ، وَقَدْ عَفَوْتَ عَنَّا، وَغَفَرْتَ لَنا وَرَحِمْتَنا .
items.english: O Allah, make it dawn upon us with security and faith, safety and Islam, encompassing wellbeing, the repelling of ailments, and ample provision; and with assistance in prayer, fasting, standing in worship, and recitation of the Quran. O Allah, deliver us to the month of Ramadan, accept it from us, and keep us safe within it, until the month of Ramadan passes from us while You have pardoned us, forgiven us, and had mercy on us.
items.transliteration: Allahumma ahillahu 'alayna bi-al-amni wa-al-imani, wa-al-salamati wa-al-islami, wa-al-'afiyati al-mujallalati, wa-difa'i al-asqami, wa-al-rizqi al-wasi'i, wa-al-'awni 'ala al-salati wa-al-siyami wa-al-qiyami, wa-tilawati al-Qur'ani, Allahumma sallimna li-shahri Ramadana, wa-tasallamhu minna, wa-sallimna fihi hatta yanqadiya 'anna shahru Ramadana, wa-qad 'afawta 'anna, wa-ghafarta lana wa-rahimtana.

items.arabic: وعن الإمام الصادق عليه السلام: «
items.english: And from Imam al-Sadiq (peace be upon him): "
items.transliteration: Wa-'an al-Imami al-Sadiqi 'alayhi al-salamu: "

items.arabic: إذا رَأَيْتَ الهِلالَ فَقُلْ:
items.english: When you see the crescent moon, say:
items.transliteration: Idha ra'ayta al-hilala fa-qul:

items.arabic: اللهُمَّ قَدْ حَضَرَ شَهْرُ رَمَضانَ، وَقَدِ افْتَرَضْتَ عَلَيْنا صِيامَهُ، وَانْزَلْتَ فيهِ الْقُرْآنُ، هُدىً لِلنَّاسِ وَبَيِّناتٍ مِنَ الْهُدى وَالْفُرْقانِ، اللَّهُمَّ اعِنَّا عَلى صِيامِهِ، وَتَقَبَّلْهُ مِنَّا، وَسَلِّمْنا فيهِ، وَ سَلِّمْنا مِنْهُ، وَسَلِّمْهُ لَنا فى يُسْرٍ مِنْكَ وَعافِيَةٍ، انَّكَ عَلى كُلِّ شَىْ ءٍ قَديرٌ، يا رَحْمنُ يا رَحيمُ» .
items.english: O Allah, the month of Ramadan has indeed arrived, and You have enjoined its fasting upon us, and sent down therein the Quran, a guidance for mankind and clear proofs of guidance and the criterion. O Allah, assist us in its fasting, accept it from us, keep us safe during it, deliver us safely through it, and deliver it to us in ease and wellbeing from You; indeed, You have power over all things, O Compassionate One, O Merciful One.
items.transliteration: Allahumma qad hadara shahru Ramadana, wa-qadi iftaradta 'alayna siyamahu, wa-anzalta fihi al-Qur'ana, hudan li-al-nasi wa-bayyinatin mina al-huda wa-al-furqani, Allahumma a'inna 'ala siyamihi, wa-taqabbalhu minna, wa-sallimna fihi, wa-sallimna minhu, wa-sallimhu lana fi yusrin minka wa-'afiyatin, innaka 'ala kulli shay'in qadirun, ya Rahmanu ya Rahimu.

items.english: And it has been narrated that when the Messenger of Allah, peace be upon him and his progeny, sighted the crescent moon of the month of Ramadan, he would face the Qiblah and say:
items.transliteration: Wa-ruwiya anna rasula Allahi salla Allahu 'alayhi wa-alihi kana idha istahalla hilala shahri Ramadana istaqbala al-qiblata wa-qala:

items.arabic: اللهُمَّ اهِلَّهُ عَلَيْنا بِالْأَمْنِ والْإِيمانِ، وَالسَّلامَةِ وَالْإِسْلامِ، وَالْعافِيَةِ الْمُجَلَّلَةِ، وَدِفاعِ الْأَسْقامِ، وَالرِّزْقِ الْواسِعِ، وَالْعَوْنِ عَلَى الصَّلاةِ وَالصِّيامِ وَالْقِيامِ، وَتِلاوَةِ الْقُرْآنِ، اللهُمَّ سَلِّمْنا لِشَهْرِ رَمَضانَ، وَتَسَلَّمْهُ مِنَّا، وَسَلِّمْنا فيهِ حَتّى يَنْقَضِىَ عَنَّا شَهْرُ رَمَضانَ، وَقَدْ عَفَوْتَ عَنَّا، وَغَفَرْتَ لَنا وَرَحِمْتَنا .
items.english: O Allah, make it dawn upon us with security and faith, safety and Islam, encompassing wellbeing, the repelling of ailments, and ample provision; and with assistance in prayer, fasting, standing in worship, and recitation of the Quran. O Allah, deliver us to the month of Ramadan, and accept it from us, and keep us safe during it until the month of Ramadan passes from us, while You have indeed pardoned us, forgiven us, and had mercy upon us.
items.transliteration: Allahumma ahillahu 'alayna bi-al-amni wa-al-imani, wa-al-salamati wa-al-islami, wa-al-'afiyati al-mujallalati, wa-difa'i al-asqami, wa-al-rizqi al-wasi'i, wa-al-'awni 'ala al-salati wa-al-siyami wa-al-qiyami, wa-tilawati al-Qur'ani, Allahumma sallimna li-shahri Ramadana, wa-tasallamhu minna, wa-sallimna fihi hatta yanqadiya 'anna shahru Ramadana, wa-qad 'afawta 'anna, wa-ghafarta lana wa-rahimtana.

items.arabic: وعن الإمام الصادق عليه السلام: «
items.english: And from Imam al-Sadiq (peace be upon him): "
items.transliteration: Wa-'an al-Imami al-Sadiqi 'alayhi al-salamu: "

items.arabic: إذا رَأَيْتَ الهِلالَ فَقُلْ:
items.english: When you see the crescent moon, say:
items.transliteration: Idha ra'ayta al-hilala fa-qul:

items.arabic: اللهُمَّ قَدْ حَضَرَ شَهْرُ رَمَضانَ، وَقَدِ افْتَرَضْتَ عَلَيْنا صِيامَهُ، وَانْزَلْتَ فيهِ الْقُرْآنُ، هُدىً لِلنَّاسِ وَبَيِّناتٍ مِنَ الْهُدى وَالْفُرْقانِ، اللَّهُمَّ اعِنَّا عَلى صِيامِهِ، وَتَقَبَّلْهُ مِنَّا، وَسَلِّمْنا فيهِ، وَ سَلِّمْنا مِنْهُ، وَسَلِّمْهُ لَنا فى يُسْرٍ مِنْكَ وَعافِيَةٍ، انَّكَ عَلى كُلِّ شَىْ ءٍ قَديرٌ، يا رَحْمنُ يا رَحيمُ» .
items.english: O Allah, the month of Ramadan has indeed arrived, and You have enjoined its fasting upon us, and sent down therein the Quran, a guidance for mankind and clear proofs of guidance and the criterion. O Allah, assist us in its fasting, accept it from us, keep us safe during it, deliver us safely through it, and deliver it safely to us in ease from You and wellbeing; indeed, You have power over all things, O Beneficent, O Merciful.
items.transliteration: Allahumma qad hadara shahru Ramadana, wa-qadi iftaradta 'alayna siyamahu, wa-anzalta fihi al-Qur'ana, hudan li-al-nasi wa-bayyinatin mina al-huda wa-al-furqani, Allahumma a'inna 'ala siyamihi, wa-taqabbalhu minna, wa-sallimna fihi, wa-sallimna minhu, wa-sallimhu lana fi yusrin minka wa-'afiyatin, innaka 'ala kulli shay'in qadirun, ya Rahmanu ya Rahimu.

items.arabic: 3. روى السيّد ابن طاووس أنّ عليّ بن الحسين عليهما السلام مرّ في طريقه يوماً فنظر إلى هلال شهر رمضان فوقف فقال:
items.english: 3. Sayyid Ibn Tawus narrated that ‘Ali ibn al-Husayn (peace be upon them) was passing on his way one day when he looked at the crescent moon of the month of Ramadan, so he stopped and said:
items.transliteration: 3. Rawa al-Sayyidu ibnu Tawusin anna 'Aliyya bna al-Husayni 'alayhima al-salamu marra fi tariqihi yawman fa-nazara ila hilali shahri Ramadana fa-waqafa fa-qala:

items.arabic: ايُّهَا الْخَلْقُ الْمُطيعُ الدَّائِبُ السَّريعُ، الْمُتَرَدِّدُ فى مَنازِلِ التَّقْديرِ، الْمُتَصَرِّفُ فى فَلَكِ التَّدْبيرِ، امَنْتُ بِمَنْ نَوَّرَ بِكَ الظُّلَمَ، وَاوْضَحَ بِكَ الْبُهَمَ، وجَعَلَكَ ايَةً مِنْ اياتِ مُلْكِهِ، وَعَلامَةً مِنْ عَلاماتِ سُلْطانِهِ، فَحَدَّ بِكَ الزَّمانَ، وَامْتَهَنَكَ بِالْكَمالِ وَالنُّقْصانِ، وَالطُّلُوعِ والْأُفُولِ، وَالْإِنارَةِ وَالْكُسُوفِ، فى كُلِّ ذلِكَ انْتَ لَهُ مُطيعٌ، وَالى ارادَتِهِ سَريعٌ، سُبْحانَهُ ما اعْجَبَ ما دَبَّرَ فى امْرِكَ، وَالْطَفَ ما صَنَعَ فى شَاْنِكَ، جَعَلَك مِفْتاحَ شَهْرٍ حادِثٍ، لِأَمْرٍ حادِثٍ، فَاسْئَلُ اللَّهَ رَبِّى وَرَبَّكَ، وَخالِقى وَخالِقَكَ، وَمُقَدِّرى وَمُقَدِّرَكَ، وَمُصَوِّرى وَمُصَوِّرَكَ، انْ يُصَلِّىَ عَلى مُحَمَّدٍ وَآلِ مُحَمَّدٍ، وَانْ يَجْعَلَكَ هِلالَ بَرَكةٍ لا تَمْحَقُهَا الْأَيَّامُ، وَطَهارَةٍ لا تُدَنِّسُهَا الْأثامُ، هِلالَ امْنٍ مِنَ الأفاتِ، وَسَلامَةٍ مِنَ السَّيِّئاتِ، هِلالَ سَعْدٍ لا نَحْسَ فيهِ، وَيُمْنٍ لا نَكَدَ مَعَهُ، وَيُسْرٍ لا يُمازِجُهُ عُسْرٌ، وَخَيْرٍ لا يَشُوبُهُ شَرٌّ، هِلالَ امْنٍ وَايمانٍ، وَنِعْمَةٍ وَاحْسانٍ، وَسَلامَةٍ وَاسْلامٍ، اللهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلى مُحَمَّدٍ وَآلِ مُحَمَّدٍ، وَاجْعَلْنا مِنْ ارْضى مَنْ طَلَعَ عَلَيْهِ، وَازْكى مَنْ نَظَرَ الَيْهِ، وَاسْعَدَ مَنْ تَعَبَّدَ لَكَ فيهِ، وَوَفِّقْنَا اللهُمَّ فيهِ لِلطَّاعَةِ وَالتَّوْبَةِ، وَاعْصِمْنا فيهِ مِنَ الْاثامِ وَالْحَوْبَةِ، وَاوْزِعْنا فيهِ شُكْرَ النِّعْمَةِ، وَالْبِسْنا فيهِ جُنَنَ الْعافِيَةِ، وَاتْمِمْ عَلَيْنا بِاسْتِكْمالِ طاعَتِكَ فيهِ الْمِنَّةَ، انَّكَ انْتَ الْمَنَّانُ الْحَميدُ، وَصَلَّى اللَّهُ عَلى مُحَمَّدٍ وَآلِهِ الطَّيِّبينَ، وَاجْعَلْ لَنا فيهِ عَوْناً مِنْكَ عَلى ما نَدَبْتَنا الَيْهِ مِنْ مُفْتَرَضِ طاعَتِكَ، وَتَقَبَّلْها، انَّكَ الْأَكْرَمُ مِنْ كُلِّ كَريمٍ، وَالْأَرْحَمُ مِنْ كُلِّ رَحيمٍ، امينَ امينَ رَبَّ الْعالَمينَ .
items.english: O obedient creature, industrious and swift, frequenting the stations of destiny, moving in the sphere of governance! I have faith in Him who illuminated the darkness through you, made clear the uncertainties through you, and made you a sign among the signs of His kingdom and a mark among the marks of His sovereignty. He defined time through you, and tasked you with waxing and waning, rising and setting, illumination and eclipse. In all of that, you are obedient to Him and swift toward His will. Glory be to Him! How wondrous is what He has ordained in your affair, and how subtle is what He has wrought in your condition! He has made you the key to a new month for a new matter. So I ask Allah, my Lord and your Lord, my Creator and your Creator, my Ordainer and your Ordainer, and my Shaper and your Shaper, that He send blessings upon Muhammad and the progeny of Muhammad, and that He make you a crescent of blessing which the days do not efface, and of purity which sins do not defile; a crescent of security from afflictions and safety from evils; a crescent of fortune in which there is no ill-omen, of prosperity with which there is no distress, of ease unmixed with hardship, and of good untainted by evil; a crescent of security and faith, favor and excellence, and safety and Islam. O Allah, bless Muhammad and the progeny of Muhammad, and make us among the most satisfied of those upon whom it has risen, the purest of those who have looked upon it, and the most fortunate of those who have worshipped You during it. O Allah, grant us success therein for obedience and repentance, protect us therein from sins and offenses, inspire us therein to give thanks for the favor, clothe us therein in the shields of wellbeing, and complete Your favor upon us by the perfection of Your obedience therein; indeed, You are the All-Bounteous, the All-Praiseworthy. And may Allah bless Muhammad and his pure progeny. And grant us therein aid from You in that which You have exhorted us toward of Your obligatory obedience, and accept it; for indeed, You are the most Generous of all who are generous, and the most Merciful of all who are merciful. Amen, Amen, Lord of the worlds.
items.transliteration: Ayyuha al-khalqu al-muti'u al-da'ibu al-sari'u, al-mutaraddidu fi manazili al-taqdiri, al-mutasarrifu fi falaki al-tadbiri, amantu bi-man nawwara bika al-zulama, wa-awdaha bika al-buhama, wa-ja'alaka ayatan min ayati mulkihi, wa-'alamatan min 'alamati sultanihi, fa-hadda bika al-zamana, wa-imtahanaka bi-al-kamali wa-al-nuqsani, wa-al-tulu'i wa-al-ufuli, wa-al-inarati wa-al-kusufi, fi kulli dhalika anta lahu muti'un, wa-ila iradatihi sari'un, subhanahu ma a'jaba ma dabbara fi amrika, wa-altafa ma sana'a fi shanika, ja'alaka miftaha shahrin hadithin, li-amrin hadithin, fa-as'alu Allaha rabbi wa-rabbaka, wa-khaliqi wa-khaliqaka, wa-muqaddiri wa-muqaddiraka, wa-musawwiri wa-musawwiraka, an yusalliya 'ala Muhammadin wa-ali Muhammadin, wa-an yaj'alaka hilala barakatin la tamhaquha al-ayyamu, wa-taharatin la tudannisuha al-athamu, hilala amnin mina al-afati, wa-salamatin mina al-sayyi'ati, hilala sa'din la nahsa fihi, wa-yumnin la nakada ma'ahu, wa-yusrin la yumazijuhu 'usrun, wa-khayrin la yashubuhu sharrun, hilala amnin wa-imanin, wa-ni'matin wa-ihsanin, wa-salamatin wa-islamin, Allahumma salli 'ala Muhammadin wa-ali Muhammadin, wa-ij'alna min arda man tala'a 'alayhi, wa-azka man nazara ilayhi, wa-as'ada man ta'abbada laka fihi, wa-waffiqna Allahumma fihi li-al-ta'ati wa-al-tawbati, wa-i'simna fihi mina al-athami wa-al-hawbati, wa-awzi'na fihi shukra al-ni'mati, wa-albisna fihi junana al-'afiyati, wa-atmim 'alayna bi-istikmali ta'atika fihi al-minnata, innaka anta al-mannanu al-hamidu, wa-salla Allahu 'ala Muhammadin wa-alihi al-tayyibina, wa-ij'al lana fihi 'awnan minka 'ala ma nadabtana ilayhi min muftaradi ta'atika, wa-taqabbalha, innaka al-akramu min kulli karimin, wa-al-arhamu min kulli rahimin, amina amina rabba al-'alamina.

items.english: O obedient creature, industrious and swift, frequenting the stations of destiny, moving in the sphere of governance! I have faith in Him who illuminated the darkness through you, made clear the uncertainties through you, and made you a sign among the signs of His kingdom and a mark among the marks of His authority. So He defined time through you, and humbled you through completion and deficiency, rising and setting, and luminosity and eclipse. In all of that, you are obedient to Him and swift to His will. Glory be to Him! How wonderful is what He has ordained in your affair, and how subtle is what He has wrought in your condition! He made you the key to a new month for a new matter. So I ask Allah, my Lord and your Lord, my Creator and your Creator, my Ordainer and your Ordainer, and my Shaper and your Shaper, that He bless Muhammad and the progeny of Muhammad, and that He make you a crescent of blessing that the days do not diminish and of purity that sins do not defile; a crescent of security from afflictions and safety from evils; a crescent of felicity in which there is no ill-omen and of prosperity with which there is no hardship, of ease that is not mixed with difficulty and of good that is not tainted by evil; a crescent of security and faith, and of favor and excellence, and of safety and Islam. O Allah, bless Muhammad and the progeny of Muhammad, and make us among the most pleased of those upon whom it has risen, the purest of those who have looked upon it, and the most fortunate of those who have worshipped You during it. And grant us success, O Allah, during it for obedience and repentance, and protect us during it from sins and offenses, and inspire us during it to give thanks for Your favor, and clothe us during it in the shields of wellbeing, and complete the favor upon us by the perfecting of Your obedience therein; indeed, You are the All-Bounteous, the All-Praiseworthy. And may Allah bless Muhammad and his pure progeny, and grant us during it assistance from You for that which You have invited us to of Your obligatory obedience, and accept it; indeed, You are the Noblest of all who are noble and the Most Merciful of all who are merciful. Amen, Amen, Lord of the worlds.
items.transliteration: Ayyuha al-khalqu al-muti'u al-da'ibu al-sari'u, al-mutaraddidu fi manazili al-taqdiri, al-mutasarrifu fi falaki al-tadbiri, amantu bi-man nawwara bika al-zulama, wa-awdaha bika al-buhama, wa-ja'alaka ayatan min ayati mulkihi, wa-'alamatan min 'alamati sultanihi, fa-hadda bika al-zamana, wa-imtahanaka bi-al-kamali wa-al-nuqsani, wa-al-tulu'i wa-al-ufuli, wa-al-inarati wa-al-kusufi, fi kulli dhalika anta lahu muti'un, wa-ila iradatihi sari'un, subhanahu ma a'jaba ma dabbara fi amrika, wa-altafa ma sana'a fi shanika, ja'alaka miftaha shahrin hadithin, li-amrin hadithin, fa-as'alu Allaha rabbi wa-rabbaka, wa-khaliqi wa-khaliqaka, wa-muqaddiri wa-muqaddiraka, wa-musawwiri wa-musawwiraka, an yusalliya 'ala Muhammadin wa-ali Muhammadin, wa-an yaj'alaka hilala barakatin la tamhaquha al-ayyamu, wa-taharatin la tudannisuha al-athamu, hilala amnin mina al-afati, wa-salamatin mina al-sayyi'ati, hilala sa'din la nahsa fihi, wa-yumnin la nakada ma'ahu, wa-yusrin la yumazijuhu 'usrun, wa-khayrin la yashubuhu sharrun, hilala amnin wa-imanin, wa-ni'matin wa-ihsanin, wa-salamatin wa-islamin, Allahumma salli 'ala Muhammadin wa-ali Muhammadin, wa-ij'alna min arda man tala'a 'alayhi, wa-azka man nazara ilayhi, wa-as'ada man ta'abbada laka fihi, wa-waffiqna Allahumma fihi li-al-ta'ati wa-al-tawbati, wa-i'simna fihi mina al-athami wa-al-hawbati, wa-awzi'na fihi shukra al-ni'mati, wa-albisna fihi junana al-'afiyati, wa-atmim 'alayna bi-istikmali ta'atika fihi al-minnata, innaka anta al-Mannanu al-Hamidu, wa-salla Allahu 'ala Muhammadin wa-alihi al-tayyibina, wa-ij'al lana fihi 'awnan minka 'ala ma nadabtana ilayhi min muftaradi ta'atika, wa-taqabbalha, innaka al-akramu min kulli karimin, wa-al-arhamu min kulli rahimin, amina amina rabba al-'alamina.

items.arabic: 9. أن يرفع يديه إذا فرغ من صلاة المغرب ويدعو بهذا الدعاء المرويّ عن الإمام الجواد عليه السلام:
items.english: 9. To raise one’s hands upon finishing the Maghrib prayer and recite this supplication narrated from Imam al-Jawad (peace be upon him):
items.transliteration: 9. An yarfa'a yadayhi idha faragha min salati al-maghribi wa-yad'uwa bi-hadha al-du'a'i al-marwiyyi 'an al-Imami al-Jawadi 'alayhi al-salamu:

items.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ يا مَنْ يَمْلِكُ التَّدْبيرَ، وَهُوَ عَلى كُلِّ شَىْ ءٍ قَديرٌ، يا مَنْ يَعْلَمُ خائِنَةَ الْأَعْيُنِ وَما تُخْفِى الصُّدُورُ، وَتُجِنُّ الضَّميرُ، وَهُوَ اللَّطيفُ الْخَبيرُ، اللَّهُمَّ اجْعَلْنا مِمَّنْ نَوى فَعَمِلَ، وَلاتَجْعَلْنا مِمَّنْ شَقِىَ فَكَسِلَ، وَلا مِمَّنْ هُوَ عَلى غَيْرِ عَمَلٍ يَتَّكِلُ، اللَّهُمَّ صَحِّحْ ابْدانَنا مِنَ الْعِلَلِ، وَاعِنَّا عَلى مَا افْتَرَضْتَ عَلَيْنا مِنَ الْعَمَلِ، حَتّى يَنْقَضِىَ عَنَّا شَهْرُكَ هذا، وَقَدْ ادَّيْنا مَفْرُوضَكَ فيهِ عَلَيْنا، اللهُمَّ اعِنَّا عَلى صِيامِهِ، وَوَفِّقْنا لِقِيامِهِ، وَنَشِّطْنا فيهِ لِلصَّلاةِ، وَلا تَحْجُبْنا مِنَ الْقِرآئَةِ، وَسَهِّلْ لَنا فيهِ ايتآءَ الزَّكاةِ، اللهُمَّ لا تُسَلِّطْ عَلَيْنا وَصَباً وَلا تَعَباً، وَلا سَقَماً وَلا عَطَباً، اللهُمَّ ارْزُقْنا الْإِفْطارَ مِنْ رِزْقِكَ الْحَلالِ، اللَّهُمَّ سَهِّلْ لَنا فيهِ ما قَسَمْتَهُ مِنْ رِزْقِكَ، وَيَسِّرْ ما قَدَّرْتَهُ مِنْ امْرِكَ، وَاجْعَلْهُ حَلالًا طَيِّباً، نَقِيّاً مِنَ الْأثامِ، خالِصاً مِنَ الْأصارِ وَالْأَجْرامِ، اللهُمَّ لا تُطْعِمْنا الَّا طَيِّباً غَيْرَ خَبيثٍ وَلا حَرامٍ، وَاجْعَلْ رِزْقَكَ لَنا حَلَالًا لا يَشُوبُهُ دَنَسٌ وَلا اسْقامٌ، يا مَنْ عِلْمُهُ بِالسِّرِّ كَعِلْمِهِ بالْأَعْلانِ، يا مُتَفَضِّلًا عَلى عِبادِهِ بِالْإِحْسانِ، يا مَنْ هُوَ عَلى كُلِّ شَىْ ءٍ قَديرٌ، وَبِكُلِّ شَىْ ءٍ عَليمٌ خَبيرٌ، الْهِمْنا ذِكْرَكَ، وَجَنِّبْنا
items.english: O Allah, O Possessor of governance, and He has power over all things. O He who knows the treachery of the eyes and what the hearts conceal and what the conscience hides; and He is the Most Subtle, the All-Aware. O Allah, make us among those who intended and thus acted, and make us not among those who were wretched and thus grew lazy, nor among those who rely without action. O Allah, heal our bodies from ailments, and assist us in the deeds You have made obligatory upon us, until this month of Yours passes from us and we have fulfilled what You enjoined upon us therein. O Allah, assist us in its fasting, grant us success in its standing in worship, invigorate us during it for prayer, do not veil us from recitation, and make easy for us during it the giving of Zakat. O Allah, do not let chronic illness, fatigue, sickness, or ruin overcome us. O Allah, grant us to break our fast from Your lawful provision. O Allah, make easy for us during it what You have apportioned of Your provision, facilitate what You have decreed of Your command, and make it lawful, goodly, pure from sins, and free from burdens and transgressions. O Allah, feed us not except that which is goodly, neither foul nor forbidden, and make Your provision for us lawful, untainted by impurity or ailments. O He whose knowledge of the secret is like His knowledge of the manifest; O Bestower of favors upon His servants through excellence; O He who is powerful over all things, and is All-Knowing and All-Aware of all things; inspire us with Your remembrance, and keep us away from...
items.transliteration: Allahumma ya man yamliku al-tadbira, wa-huwa 'ala kulli shay'in qadirun, ya man ya'lamu kha'inata al-a'yuni wa-ma tukhfi al-suduru, wa-tujinnu al-damiru, wa-huwa al-latifu al-khabiru, Allahumma ij'alna mimman nawa fa-'amila, wa-la taj'alna mimman shaqiya fa-kasila, wa-la mimman huwa 'ala ghayri 'amalin yattakilu, Allahumma sahhih abdanana mina al-'ilali, wa-a'inna 'ala ma iftaradta 'alayna mina al-'amali, hatta yanqadiya 'anna shahruka hadha, wa-qad addayna mafrudaka fihi 'alayna, Allahumma a'inna 'ala siyamihi, wa-waffiqna li-qiyamihi, wa-nashshitna fihi li-al-salati, wa-la tahjubna mina al-qira'ati, wa-sahhil lana fihi ita'a al-zakati, Allahumma la tusallit 'alayna wasaban wa-la ta'aban, wa-la saqaman wa-la 'ataban, Allahumma urzuqna al-iftara min rizqika al-halali, Allahumma sahhil lana fihi ma qasamtahu min rizqika, wa-yassir ma qaddartahu min amrika, wa-ij'alhu halalan tayyiban, naqiyyan mina al-athami, khalisan mina al-asari wa-al-ajrami, Allahumma la tut'imna illa tayyiban ghayra khabithin wa-la haramin, wa-ij'al rizqaka lana halalan la yashubuhu danasun wa-la asqamun, ya man 'ilmuhu bi-al-sirri ka-'ilmihi bi-al-a'lani, ya mutafaddilan 'ala 'ibadihi bi-al-ihsani, ya man huwa 'ala kulli shay'in qadirun, wa-bi-kulli shay'in 'alimun khabirun, alhimna dhikraka, wa-jannibna

items.arabic: عُسْرَكَ، وَانِلْنا يُسْرَكَ، وَاهْدِنا لِلرَّشادِ، وَوَفِّقْنا لِلسَّدادِ، وَاعْصِمْنا مِنَ الْبَلايا، وَصُنَّا مِنَ الْأَوْزارِ وَالْخَطايا، يا مَنْ لا يَغْفِرُ عَظيمَ الذُّنُوبِ غَيْرُهُ، وَلا يَكْشِفُ السُّوءَ الَّا هُوَ، يا ارْحَمَ الرَّاحِمينَ، وَاكْرَمَ الْأَكْرَمينَ، صَلِّ عَلى مُحَمَّدٍ وَاهْلِ بَيْتِهِ الطَّيِّبينَ، وَاجْعَلْ صِيامَنا مَقْبُولًا، وَبِالْبِرِّ وَالتَّقْوى مَوْصُولًا، وَكَذلِكَ فَاجْعَلْ سَعْيَنا مَشْكُوراً، [وَحَوْبَنا مَغْفُوراً] وَقِيامَنا مَبْرُوراً، وَقُرانَنا مَرْفُوعاً، وَدُعآئَنا مَسْمُوعاً، وَاهْدِنا لِلْحُسْنى وَجَنِّبْنَاالْعُسْرى وَيَسِّرْنا لِلْيُسْرى وَاعْلِ لَنَاالدَّرَجاتِ، وَضاعِفْ لَنا الْحَسَناتِ، وَاقْبَلْ مِنَّا الصَّوْمَ وَالصَّلاةَ، وَاسْمَعْ مِنَّا الدَّعَواتِ، وَاغْفِرْ لَنَا الْخَطيئاتِ، وَتَجاوَزْ عَنَّا السَّيِّئاتِ، وَاجْعَلْنا مِنَ الْعامِلينَ الْفائِزينَ، وَلا تَجْعَلْنا مِنَ الْمَغْضُوبِ عَلَيْهِمْ وَلَا الضَّآلّينَ، حَتّى يَنْقَضِىَ شَهْرُ رَمَضانَ عَنَّا، وَقَدْ قَبِلْتَ فيهِ صِيامَنا وَقِيامَنا، وَزَكَّيْتَ فيهِ اعْمالَنا، وَغَفَرْتَ فيهِ ذُنُوبَنا، وَاجْزَلْتَ فيهِ مِنْ كُلِّ خَيْرٍ نَصيبَنا، فَانَّكَ الْإِلهُ الْمُجيبُ، وَالرَّبُّ الْقَريبُ، وَانْتَ بِكُلِّ شَىْ ءٍ مُحيطٌ .
items.english: ...Your hardship, and grant us Your ease; guide us to right conduct, and grant us success in correctness. Protect us from calamities, and safeguard us from burdens and mistakes. O He besides whom none forgives great sins, and none removes evil except He; O Most Merciful of the merciful, O Most Generous of the generous. Bless Muhammad and his pure Ahl al-Bayt, and make our fasting accepted and joined with righteousness and piety. Likewise, make our striving appreciated, our sins forgiven, our standing in worship virtuous, our recitation of the Quran elevated, and our supplication heard. Guide us to the best, keep us away from hardship, and ease our way to ease. Raise our ranks, multiply our good deeds, accept from us the fasting and the prayer, hear from us the supplications, forgive us the mistakes, and overlook our evil deeds. Make us among the successful doers, and make us not among those who have evoked anger nor of those who are astray, until the month of Ramadan passes from us while You have accepted our fasting and our standing therein, purified our deeds, forgiven our sins, and made abundant our portion of every good. Indeed, You are the Responsive God, the Near Lord, and You encompass all things.
items.transliteration: 'usraka, wa-anilna yusraka, wa-ihdina li-al-rashadi, wa-waffiqna li-al-sadadi, wa-i'simna mina al-balaya, wa-sunna mina al-awzari wa-al-khataya, ya man la yaghfiru 'adhima al-dhunubi ghayruhu, wa-la yakshifu al-su'a illa huwa, ya arhama al-rahimina, wa-akrama al-akramina, salli 'ala Muhammadin wa-ahli baytihi al-tayyibina, wa-ij'al siyamana maqbulan, wa-bi-al-birri wa-al-taqwa mawsulan, wa-kadhalika fa-ij'al sa'yana mashkuran, [wa-hawbana maghfuran] wa-qiyamana mabruran, wa-qur'anana marfu'an, wa-du'a'ana masmu'an, wa-ihdina li-al-husna wa-jannibna al-'usra wa-yassirna li-al-yusra wa-a'li lana al-darajati, wa-da'if lana al-hasanati, wa-iqbal minna al-sawma wa-al-salata, wa-isma' minna al-da'awati, wa-ighfir lana al-khati'ati, wa-tajawaz 'anna al-sayyi'ati, wa-ij'alna mina al-'amilina al-fa'izina, wa-la taj'alna mina al-maghdubi 'alayhim wa-la al-dallina, hatta yanqadiya shahru Ramadana 'anna, wa-qad qabilta fihi siyamana wa-qiyamana, wa-zakkayta fihi a'malana, wa-ghafarta fihi dhunubana, wa-ajzalta fihi min kulli khayrin nasibana, fa-innaka al-ilahu al-mujibu, wa-al-rabbu al-qaribu, wa-anta bi-kulli shay'in muhitun.

items.arabic: 10. أن يدعو بهذا الدعاء المأثور عن الإمام الصادق عليه السلام:
items.english: 10. To recite this supplication narrated from Imam al-Sadiq (peace be upon him):
items.transliteration: 10. An yad'uwa bi-hadha al-du'a'i al-ma'thuri 'an al-Imami al-Sadiqi 'alayhi al-salamu:

items.arabic: اللهُمَّ رَبَّ شَهْرِ رَمَضانَ، مُنَزِّلَ الْقُرْآنِ، هذا شَهْرُ رَمَضانَ، الَّذى انْزَلْتَ فيهِ الْقُرْآنَ، وَانْزَلْتَ فيهِ آياتٍ بَيِّناتٍ مِنَ الْهُدى وَالْفُرْقانِ، اللهُمَّ ارْزُقْنا صِيامَهُ، وَاعِنَّا عَلى قِيامِهِ، اللَّهُمَّ سَلِّمْهُ لَنا وَسَلِّمْنا فيهِ، وَسَلِّمْهُ مِنَّا فى يُسْرٍ مِنْكَ وَمُعافاةٍ، وَاجْعَلْ فيما تَقْضى وَتُقَدِّرُ مِنَ الْأَمْرِ الْمَحْتُومِ، وَفيما تَفْرُقُ مِنَ الْأَمْرِ الْحَكيمِ فى لَيْلَةِالْقَدْرِ، مِنَ الْقَضآءِ الَّذى لا يُرَدُّ وَلا يُبَدَّلُ، انْ تَكْتُبَنى مِنْ حُجَّاجِ بَيْتِكَ الْحَرامِ، الْمَبْرُورِ حَجُّهُمْ، الْمَشْكُورِ سَعْيُهُمْ، الْمَغْفُورِ ذُنُوبُهُمْ، الْمُكَفَّرِ عَنْهُمْ سَيِّئاتُهُمْ، وَاجْعَلْ فيما تَقْضى وَتُقَدِّرُ، انْ تُطيلَ عُمْرى وَتُوَسِّعَ عَلىَّ مِنَ الرِّزْقِ الْحَلالِ .
items.english: O Allah, Lord of the month of Ramadan, Revealer of the Quran; this is the month of Ramadan, in which You sent down the Quran, and You sent down therein clear proofs of guidance and the criterion. O Allah, grant us its fasting, and assist us in its standing in worship. O Allah, deliver it to us, keep us safe during it, and accept it from us in ease from You and wellbeing. And include among that which You decree and ordain of the inevitable matter, and among that which You distinguish of the wise matter on the Night of Ordainment—of the decree that is neither reversed nor changed—that You record me among the pilgrims of Your Sacred House, whose pilgrimage is accepted, whose striving is appreciated, whose sins are forgiven, and whose evil deeds are expiated. And include among that which You decree and ordain, that You prolong my life and expand for me of the lawful provision.
items.transliteration: Allahumma rabba shahri Ramadana, munazzila al-Qur'ani, hadha shahru Ramadana, alladhi anzalta fihi al-Qur'ana, wa-anzalta fihi ayatin bayyinatin mina al-huda wa-al-furqani, Allahumma urzuqna siyamahu, wa-a'inna 'ala qiyamihi, Allahumma sallimhu lana wa-sallimna fihi, wa-sallimhu minna fi yusrin minka wa-mu'afatin, wa-ij'al fima taqdi wa-tuqaddiru mina al-amri al-mahtumi, wa-fima tafruqu mina al-amri al-hakimi fi laylati al-qadri, mina al-qada'i alladhi la yuraddu wa-la yubaddalu, an taktubani min hujjaji baytika al-harami, al-mabruri hajjuhum, al-mashkuri sa'yuhum, al-maghfuri dhunubuhum, al-mukaffari 'anhum sayyi'atuhum, wa-ij'al fima taqdi wa-tuqaddiru, an tutila 'umri wa-tuwassi'a 'alayya mina al-rizqi al-halali.

items.english: 10. To recite this supplication narrated from Imam al-Sadiq (peace be upon him):
items.transliteration: 10. An yad'uwa bi-hadha al-du'a'i al-ma'thuri 'an al-Imami al-Sadiqi 'alayhi al-salamu:

items.english: O Allah, Lord of the month of Ramadan, Revealer of the Quran; this is the month of Ramadan in which You sent down the Quran, and You sent down therein clear proofs of guidance and the criterion. O Allah, grant us its fasting and assist us in its standing in worship. O Allah, deliver it to us, deliver us safely through it, and receive it safely from us in ease and well-being from You. And ordain, among what You decree and destine of the inevitable matter, and what You distinguish of the wise command on the Night of Destiny—of the decree that is neither revoked nor changed—that You record me among the pilgrims of Your Sacred House, whose Hajj is accepted, whose effort is appreciated, whose sins are forgiven, and whose evil deeds are expiated. And ordain, among what You decree and destine, that You prolong my life and expand for me the lawful provision.

items.arabic: 11. أن يدعو بالدعاء الرابع والأربعين من الصحيفة السجادية فهو متعلّق بهذه الليلة.
items.english: 11. To recite the forty-fourth supplication from al-Sahifah al-Sajjadiyyah, for it pertains to this night.
items.transliteration: 11. An yad'uwa bi-al-du'a'i al-rabi'i wa-al-arba'ina mina al-Sahifati al-Sajjadiyyati fa-huwa muta'alliqun bi-hadhihi al-laylati.

items.arabic: 12. ينبغي الإكثار من تلاوة القرآن إذا دخل شهر رمضان وروي أنّ الإمام الصادق عليه السلام كان يدعو بهذا الدعاء قبل أن يتلو القرآن:
items.english: 12. One should increase the recitation of the Quran when the month of Ramadan begins, and it is narrated that Imam al-Sadiq (peace be upon him) used to recite this supplication before reciting the Quran:
items.transliteration: 12. Yanbaghi al-iktharu min tilawati al-Qur'ani idha dakhala shahru Ramadana wa-ruwiya anna al-Imama al-Sadiqa 'alayhi al-salamu kana yad'uwa bi-hadha al-du'a'i qabla an yatluwa al-Qur'ana:

items.arabic: اللهُمَّ انّى اشْهَدُ انَّ هذا كِتابُكَ الْمُنْزَلُ مِنْ عِنْدِكَ عَلى رَسُولِكَ، مُحَمَّدِ بْنِ عَبْدِاللَّهِ، صَلَّى اللَّهُ عَلَيْهِ وَآلِهِ، وَكَلامُكَ النَّاطِقُ عَلى لِسانِ نَبِيِّكَ، جَعَلْتَهُ هادِياً مِنْكَ الى خَلْقِكَ، وَحَبْلًا مُتَّصِلًا فيما بَيْنَكَ وَبَيْنَ عِبادِكَ، اللهُمَّ انّى نَشَرْتُ عَهْدَكَ وَكِتابَكَ، اللهُمَّ فَاجْعَلْ نَظَرى فيهِ عِبادَةً، وَقِرآئَتى فيهِ فِكْراً، وَفِكْرى فيهِ اعْتِباراً، وَاجْعَلْنى مِمَّنِ اتَّعَظَ بِبَيانِ مَواعِظِكَ فيهِ، وَاجْتَنَبَ مَعاصيكَ، وَلا تَطْبَعْ عِنْدَ قِرائَتى عَلى سَمْعى وَلا تَجْعَلْ عَلى بَصَرى غِشاوَةً، وَلا تَجْعَلْ قِرائَتى قِرائَةً لا تَدَبُّرَ فيها، بَلِ اجْعَلْنى اتَدَبَّرُ اياتِهِ وَاحْكامَهُ، آخِذاً بِشَرايِعِ دينِكَ، وَلا تَجْعَلْ نَظَرى فيهِ غَفْلَةً، وَلا قِرائَتى هَذَراً، انَّكَ انْتَ الرَّؤُوفُ الرَّحيمُ.
items.english: O Allah, indeed I bear witness that this is Your Book revealed from You upon Your Messenger, Muhammad ibn ‘Abdullah (may Allah bless him and his family), and Your articulate Word upon the tongue of Your Prophet. You have made it a guide from You to Your creation, and a connected rope between You and Your servants. O Allah, I have spread open Your covenant and Your Book; O Allah, so make my looking at it an act of worship, my recitation of it a reflection, and my reflection upon it a lesson. Make me among those who take heed from the clarification of Your exhortations therein and avoid disobedience to You. Do not seal my hearing during my recitation, nor place a veil over my vision. Do not make my recitation one without contemplation; rather, make me contemplate its verses and its rulings, adhering to the laws of Your religion. Do not make my looking at it heedlessness, nor my recitation a babble; indeed, You are the Clement, the Merciful.
items.transliteration: Allahumma inni ashhadu anna hadha kitabuka al-munzalu min 'indika 'ala rasulika, Muhammadi bni 'Abdillahi, salla Allahu 'alayhi wa-alihi, wa-kalamuka al-natiqu 'ala lisani nabiyyika, ja'altahu hadiyan minka ila khalqika, wa-hablan muttasilan fima baynaka wa-bayna 'ibadika, Allahumma inni nashartu 'ahdaka wa-kitabaka, Allahumma fa-ij'al nadhari fihi 'ibadatan, wa-qira'ati fihi fikran, wa-fikri fihi i'tibaran, wa-ij'alni mimmani itta'adha bi-bayani mawa'idhika fihi, wa-ijtanaba ma'asika, wa-la tatba' 'inda qira'ati 'ala sam'i wa-la taj'al 'ala basari ghishawatan, wa-la taj'al qira'ati qira'atan la tadabbura fiha, bali ij'alni atadabbaru ayatihi wa-ahkamahu, akhidhan bi-sharayi'i dinika, wa-la taj'al nadhari fihi ghaflatan, wa-la qira'ati hadharan, innaka anta al-ra'ufu al-rahimu.

items.arabic: ويقول بعد فراغه من تلاوته:
items.english: And he says after finishing its recitation:
items.transliteration: Wa-yaqulu ba'da faraghihi min tilawatihi:

items.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ انّى قَدْ قَرَأْتُ ما قَضَيْتَ مِنْ كِتابِكَ، الَّذى انْزَلْتَهُ عَلى نَبِيِّكَ الصَّادِقِ، صَلَّى اللَّهُ عَلَيْهِ وَآلِهِ، فَلَكَ الْحَمْدُ رَبَّنا، اللَّهُمَّ اجْعَلْنى مِمَّنْ يُحِلُّ حَلالَهُ، وَيُحَرِّمُ حَرامَهُ، وَيُؤْمِنُ بِمُحْكَمِهِ وَمُتَشابِهِهِ، وَاجْعَلْهُ لى انْساً فى قَبْرى وَانْساً فى حَشْرى وَاجْعَلْنى مِمَّنْ تُرْقيهِ بِكُلِّ ايَةٍ قَرَأَها دَرَجَةً فى اعْلى عِلِّيّينَ، امينَ رَبَّ الْعالَمينَ .
items.english: O Allah, I have indeed recited what You have decreed of Your Book, which You revealed upon Your truthful Prophet (may Allah bless him and his family). So to You be praise, our Lord. O Allah, make me among those who treat its lawful as lawful and its prohibited as prohibited, and believe in its decisive and its allegorical verses. And make it a source of comfort for me in my grave and a source of comfort at my resurrection. And make me among those whom You elevate by every verse they recite a degree in the highest of ‘Illiyyin. Amen, Lord of the worlds.
items.transliteration: Allahumma inni qad qara'tu ma qadayta min kitabika, alladhi anzaltahu 'ala nabiyyika al-Sadiqi, salla Allahu 'alayhi wa-alihi, fa-laka al-hamdu rabbana, Allahumma ij'alni mimman yuhillu halalahu, wa-yuharrimu haramahu, wa-yu'minu bi-muhkamihi wa-mutashabihihi, wa-ij'alhu li unsan fi qabri wa-unsan fi hashri wa-ij'alni mimman turqihi bi-kulli ayatin qara'aha darajatan fi a'la 'Illiyyina, amina rabba al-'alamina.

items.arabic: اليوم الأوّل من شهر رمضان: وردت فيه أعمال منها:
items.english: The first day of the month of Ramadan: several deeds have been narrated for it, including:
items.transliteration: Al-yawmu al-awwalu min shahri Ramadana: waradat fihi a'malun minha:

items.arabic: 1. الغسل .
items.english: 1. The ritual bath.
items.transliteration: 1. Al-ghuslu.

items.arabic: 2. يغسل بماء الورد .
items.english: 2. To wash with rose water.
items.transliteration: 2. Yaghsilu bi-ma'i al-wardi.

items.arabic: 11. أن يدعو بالدعاء الرابع والأربعين من الصحيفة السجادية فهو متعلّق بهذه الليلة.
items.english: 11. To recite the forty-fourth supplication from al-Sahifah al-Sajjadiyyah, for it pertains to this night.
items.transliteration: 11. An yad'uwa bi-al-du'a'i al-rabi'i wa-al-arba'ina mina al-Sahifati al-Sajjadiyyati fa-huwa muta'alliqun bi-hadhihi al-laylati.

items.arabic: 12. ينبغي الإكثار من تلاوة القرآن إذا دخل شهر رمضان وروي أنّ الإمام الصادق عليه السلام كان يدعو بهذا الدعاء قبل أن يتلو القرآن:
items.english: 12. One should increase the recitation of the Quran when the month of Ramadan begins, and it is narrated that Imam al-Sadiq (peace be upon him) used to recite this supplication before reciting the Quran:

And do not make my looking into it heedlessness, nor my recitation a mere babbling. Indeed, You are the Kind, the Merciful.

items.arabic: اليوم الأوّل من شهر رمضان: وردت فيه أعمال منها:
items.english: The first day of the month of Ramadan: several deeds have been narrated for it, including:
items.transliteration: Al-yawmu al-awwalu min shahri Ramadana: waradat fihi a'malun minha:

items.arabic: 1. الغسل .
items.english: 1. The ritual bath.
items.transliteration: 1. Al-ghuslu.

items.arabic: 2. يغسل بماء الورد .
items.english: 2. To wash with rose water.
items.transliteration: 2. Yaghsilu bi-ma'i al-wardi.

items.arabic: 3. أن يصلّي ركعتين يقرأ في الاولى
items.english: 3. To pray two rak‘ahs, reciting in the first:
items.transliteration: 3. An yusalliya rak'atayni yaqra'u fi al-ula.

items.arabic: الحمد
items.english: al-Hamd
items.transliteration: al-Hamda

items.arabic: وسورة «
items.english: and Surah “
items.transliteration: wa-surata "

items.arabic: إنَّا فَتَحْنَا
items.english: al-Fath.
items.transliteration: Inna fatahna

items.arabic: » وفي الثانية
items.english: and in the second:
items.transliteration: wa-fi al-thaniyati

items.arabic: الحَمْدُ
items.english: al-Hamd
items.transliteration: al-Hamdu

items.arabic: وما شاء من السور ليدرأ اللَّه عنه كلّ سوء ويكون في حفظ اللَّه إلى العام القادم .
items.english: and whatever surahs he wishes, so that Allah may avert from him every evil and he may remain under the protection of Allah until the following year.
items.transliteration: wa-ma sha'a mina al-suwari li-yadra'a Allahu 'anhu kulla su'in wa-yakuna fi hifdhi Allahi ila al-'ami al-qadimi.

items.arabic: 4. أن يؤدّي ركعتي صلاة أوّل الشهر كما مضى (ص 396)، والصدقة بعدهما .
items.english: 4. To perform the two-rak‘ah prayer of the beginning of the month as previously mentioned (p. 396), and to give charity after them.
items.transliteration: 4. An yu'addiya rak'atay salati awwali al-shahri kama mada (s. 396), wa-al-sadaqata ba'dahuma.

items.arabic: 5. أن يقول إذا طلع الفجر:
items.english: 5. To say when dawn breaks:
items.transliteration: 5. An yaqula idha tala'a al-fajru:

items.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ قَدْ حَضَرَ شَهْرُ رَمَضانَ، وَقَدِ افْتَرَضْتَ عَلَيْنا صِيامَهُ، وَانْزَلْتَ فيهِ الْقُرآنَ، هُدىً لِلنَّاسِ وَبَيِّناتٍ مِنَ الْهُدى وَالْفُرْقانِ، اللَّهُمَّ اعِنَّا عَلى صِيامِهِ، وَتَقَبَّلْهُ مِنَّا، وَتَسَلَّمْهُ مِنَّا، وَسَلِّمْهُ لَنا فى يُسْرٍ مِنْكَ وَعافِيَةٍ، انَّكَ عَلى كُلِّ شَىْ ءٍ قَديرٌ .
items.english: O Allah, the month of Ramadan has indeed arrived, and You have made its fasting obligatory upon us, and You sent down the Quran therein, as a guidance for mankind and clear proofs of guidance and the criterion. O Allah, assist us in its fasting, accept it from us, receive it from us, and deliver it to us in ease from You and well-being; indeed, You have power over all things.
items.transliteration: Allahumma qad hadara shahru Ramadana, wa-qadi iftaradta 'alayna siyamahu, wa-anzalta fihi al-Qur'ana, hudan li-al-nasi wa-bayyinatin mina al-huda wa-al-furqani, Allahumma a'inna 'ala siyamahi, wa-taqabbalhu minna, wa-tasallamhu minna, wa-sallimhu lana fi yusrin minka wa-'afiyatin, innaka 'ala kulli shay'in qadirun.

items.arabic: 6. قال العلّامة المجلسي في زاد المعاد: روى الكليني والطوسي وغيرهما بسند صحيح عن الإمام موسى الكاظم عليه السلام: «
items.english: 6. Al-’Allamah al-Majlisi said in Zad al-Ma‘ad: Al-Kulayni, al-Tusi, and others narrated through an authentic chain of narration from Imam Musa al-Kadhim (peace be upon him): “

items.arabic: ادْعُ بِهذَا الدُّعاءِ فِي شَهْرِ رَمَضانَ فِي اليَومِ الأوَّلِ
items.english: Recite this supplication on the first day of the month of Ramadan:
items.transliteration: Id'u bi-hadha al-du'a'i fi shahri Ramadana fi al-yawmi al-awwali

items.arabic: »، وقال: «
items.english: ”, and he said: “
items.transliteration: , wa-qala:

items.arabic: مَنْ دَعا اللَّهَ خِلْواً مِن شَوائِبِ الأغْراضِ الفَاسِدَةِ والرِّياءِ لَمْ تُصِبْهُ فِي ذَلِكَ العام فِتْنَةٌ ولا ضَلَالَةٌ ولا آفَةٌ تَضُرُّ دِيْنَهُ أو بَدَنَهُ وَصَانَهُ اللَّهُ مِنْ شَرِّ مَا يَحْدُثُ في ذلِكَ العَامِ مِنَ البَلايَا
items.english: Whoever supplicates Allah free from the taints of corrupt motives and ostentation shall not be afflicted in that year by any trial, misguidance, or blight that harms his religion or his body, and Allah shall safeguard him from the evil of the calamities that occur in that year.
items.transliteration: Man da'a Allaha khilwan min shawa'ibi al-aghradi al-fasidati wa-al-riya'i lam tusibhu fi dhalika al-'ami fitnatun wa-la dalalatun wa-la afatun tadurru dinahu aw badanahu wa-sanahu Allahu min sharri ma yahduthu fi dhalika al-'ami mina al-balaya.

items.arabic: ». وهو هذا الدعاء:
items.english: .” And it is this supplication:
items.transliteration: . Wa-huwa hadha al-du'a'u:

items.arabic: اللهُمَّ انّى اسْئَلُكَ بِاسْمِكَ الَّذى دانَ لَهُ كُلُّ شَىْ ءٍ، وَبِرَحْمَتِكَ الَّتى وَسِعَتْ كُلَّ شَىْ ءٍ، وَبِعَظَمَتِكَ الَّتى تَواضَعَ لَها كُلُّ شَىْ ءٍ، وَبِعِزَّتِكَ الَّتى قَهَرْتَ كُلَّ شَىْ ءٍ، وَبِقُوَّتِكَ الَّتى خَضَعَ لَها كُلُّ شَىْ ءٍ، وَبِجَبَرُوتِكَ الَّتى غَلَبَتْ كُلَّ شَىْ ءٍ، وَبِعِلْمِكَ الَّذى احاطَ بِكُلِّ شَىْ ءٍ، يا نُورُ يا قُدُّوسُ، يا اوَّلَ قَبْلَ كُلِّ شَىْ ءٍ، وَباقِىَ بَعْدَ كُلِّ شَىْ ءٍ، يااللَّهُ يارَحْمنُ، صَلِّ عَلى مُحَمَّدٍ وَآلِ مُحَمَّدٍ، وَاغْفِرْ لِىَ الذُّنُوبَ الَّتى تُغَيِّرُ النِّعَمَ، وَاغْفِرْ لِىَ الذُّنُوبَ الَّتى تُنْزِلُ النِّقَمَ، وَاغْفِرْلِىَ الذُّنُوبَ الَّتى تَقْطَعُ الرَّجآءَ، وَاغْفِرْ لِىَ الذُّنُوبَ الَّتى تُديلُ الْأَعْدآءَ، وَاغْفِرْ لِىَ الذُّنُوبَ الَّتى تَرُدُّ الدُّعآءَ، وَاغْفِرْ لِىَ الذُّنُوبَ الَّتى يُسْتَحَقُّ بِها نُزُولُ الْبَلاءِ، وَاغْفِرْ لِىَ الذُّنُوبَ الَّتى تَحْبِسُ غَيْثَ السَّمآءِ، وَاغْفِرْ لِىَ الذُّنُوبَ الَّتى تَكْشِفُ الْغِطآءَ، وَاغْفِرْلِىَ الذُّنُوبَ الَّتى
items.english: O Allah, indeed I ask You by Your Name to which everything has submitted, and by Your mercy which encompasses everything, and by Your greatness to which everything has humbled itself, and by Your might through which You have conquered everything, and by Your power to which everything has yielded, and by Your majesty which has prevailed over everything, and by Your knowledge which has encompassed everything. O Light, O All-Holy! O First before everything, and the Lasting after everything! O Allah, O All-Beneficent, bless Muhammad and the family of Muhammad, and forgive me the sins that alter blessings, and forgive me the sins that bring down retributions, and forgive me the sins that sever hope, and forgive me the sins that empower the enemies, and forgive me the sins that repel supplication, and forgive me the sins through which the descent of affliction is deserved, and forgive me the sins that withhold the rain of the sky, and forgive me the sins that tear away the veil, and forgive me the sins that
items.transliteration: Allahumma inni as'aluka bi-ismika al-ladhi dana lahu kullu shay'in, wa-bi-rahmatika al-lati wasi'at kulla shay'in, wa-bi-'adhamatika al-lati tawada'a laha kullu shay'in, wa-bi-'izzatika al-lati qaharta kulla shay'in, wa-bi-quwwatika al-lati khada'a laha kullu shay'in, wa-bi-jabarutika al-lati ghalabat kulla shay'in, wa-bi-'ilmika al-ladhi ahata bi-kulli shay'in, ya Nuru ya Quddusu, ya Awwala qabla kulli shay'in, wa-baqiya ba'da kulli shay'in, ya Allahu ya Rahmanu, salli 'ala Muhammadin wa-ali Muhammadin, wa-ighfir liya al-dhunuba al-lati tughayyiru al-ni'ama, wa-ighfir liya al-dhunuba al-lati tunzilu al-niqama, wa-ighfir liya al-dhunuba al-lati taqta'u al-raja'a, wa-ighfir liya al-dhunuba al-lati tudilu al-a'da'a, wa-ighfir liya al-dhunuba al-lati taruddu al-du'a'a, wa-ighfir liya al-dhunuba al-lati yustahaqqu biha nuzulu al-bala'i, wa-ighfir liya al-dhunuba al-lati tahbisu ghaytha al-sama'i, wa-ighfir liya al-dhunuba al-lati takshifu al-ghita'a, wa-ighfir liya al-dhunuba al-lati

items.arabic: 3. أن يصلّي ركعتين يقرأ في الاولى
items.english: 3. To pray two rak‘ahs, reciting in the first:
items.transliteration: 3. An yusalliya rak'atayni yaqra'u fi al-ula.

items.arabic: وما شاء من السور ليدرأ اللَّه عنه كلّ سوء ويكون في حفظ اللَّه إلى العام القادم .
items.english: and whatever surahs he wishes, so that Allah may avert from him every evil and he may remain under the protection of Allah until the following year.
items.transliteration: wa-ma sha'a mina al-suwari li-yadra'a Allahu 'anhu kulla su'in wa-yakuna fi hifdhi Allahi ila al-'ami al-qadimi.

items.arabic: 4. أن يؤدّي ركعتي صلاة أوّل الشهر كما مضى (ص 396)، والصدقة بعدهما .
items.english: 4. To perform the two-rak‘ah prayer of the beginning of the month as previously mentioned (p. 396), and to give charity after them.
items.transliteration: 4. An yu'addiya rak'atay salati awwali al-shahri kama mada (s. 396), wa-al-sadaqata ba'dahuma.

items.arabic: 5. أن يقول إذا طلع الفجر:
items.english: 5. To say when dawn breaks:
items.transliteration: 5. An yaqula idha tala'a al-fajru:

items.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ قَدْ حَضَرَ شَهْرُ رَمَضانَ، وَقَدِ افْتَرَضْتَ عَلَيْنا صِيامَهُ، وَانْزَلْتَ فيهِ الْقُرآنَ، هُدىً لِلنَّاسِ وَبَيِّناتٍ مِنَ الْهُدى وَالْفُرْقانِ، اللَّهُمَّ اعِنَّا عَلى صِيامِهِ، وَتَقَبَّلْهُ مِنَّا، وَتَسَلَّمْهُ مِنَّا، وَسَلِّمْهُ لَنا فى يُسْرٍ مِنْكَ وَعافِيَةٍ، انَّكَ عَلى كُلِّ شَىْ ءٍ قَديرٌ .
items.english: O Allah, the month of Ramadan has indeed arrived, and You have made its fasting obligatory upon us, and You sent down the Quran therein, as a guidance for mankind and clear proofs of guidance and the criterion. O Allah, assist us in its fasting, accept it from us, receive it from us, and deliver it to us in ease and well-being from You; indeed, You have power over all things.
items.transliteration: Allahumma qad hadara shahru Ramadana, wa-qadi iftaradta 'alayna siyamahu, wa-anzalta fihi al-Qur'ana, hudan li-al-nasi wa-bayyinatin mina al-huda wa-al-furqani, Allahumma a'inna 'ala siyamahi, wa-taqabbalhu minna, wa-tasallamhu minna, wa-sallimhu lana fi yusrin minka wa-'afiyatin, innaka 'ala kulli shay'in qadirun.

items.arabic: 6. قال العلّامة المجلسي في زاد المعاد: روى الكليني والطوسي وغيرهما بسند صحيح عن الإمام موسى الكاظم عليه السلام: «
items.english: 6. Al-’Allamah al-Majlisi said in Zad al-Ma‘ad: Al-Kulayni, al-Tusi, and others narrated through an authentic chain of narration from Imam Musa al-Kadhim (peace be upon him): “
items.transliteration: 6. Qala al-'Allamatu al-Majlisi fi Zadi al-Ma'adi: rawa al-Kulayni wa-al-Tusi wa-ghayruhuma bi-sanadin sahihin 'an al-Imami Musa al-Kadhimi 'alayhi al-salamu: "

items.arabic: ادْعُ بِهذَا الدُّعاءِ فِي شَهْرِ رَمَضانَ فِي اليَومِ الأوَّلِ
items.english: Recite this supplication on the first day of the month of Ramadan:
items.transliteration: Id'u bi-hadha al-du'a'i fi shahri Ramadana fi al-yawmi al-awwali

items.arabic: مَنْ دَعا اللَّهَ خِلْواً مِن شَوائِبِ الأغْراضِ الفَاسِدَةِ والرِّياءِ لَمْ تُصِبْهُ فِي ذَلِكَ العام فِتْنَةٌ ولا ضَلَالَةٌ ولا آفَةٌ تَضُرُّ دِيْنَهُ أو بَدَنَهُ وَصَانَهُ اللَّهُ مِنْ شَرِّ مَا يَحْدُثُ في ذلِكَ العَامِ مِنَ البَلايَا
items.english: Whoever supplicates Allah free from the taints of corrupt motives and ostentation shall not be afflicted in that year by any trial, misguidance, or blight that harms his religion or his body, and Allah shall safeguard him from the evil of the calamities that occur in that year.
items.transliteration: Man da'a Allaha khilwan min shawa'ibi al-aghradi al-fasidati wa-al-riya'i lam tusibhu fi dhalika al-'ami fitnatun wa-la dalalatun wa-la afatun tadurru dinahu aw badanahu wa-sanahu Allahu min sharri ma yahduthu fi dhalika al-'ami mina al-balaya.

items.english: O Allah, indeed I ask You by Your Name to which everything has submitted, and by Your mercy which encompasses everything, and by Your greatness to which everything has humbled itself, and by Your might through which You have conquered everything, and by Your power to which everything has yielded, and by Your omnipotence which has overcome everything, and by Your knowledge which encompasses everything, O Light, O All-Holy, O First before everything, and O Everlasting after everything, O Allah, O All-Merciful, bless Muhammad and the progeny of Muhammad, and forgive me the sins that alter blessings, and forgive me the sins that bring down tribulations, and forgive me the sins that sever hope, and forgive me the sins that empower the enemies, and forgive me the sins that cause supplication to be rejected, and forgive me the sins that merit the descent of affliction, and forgive me the sins that withhold the rain of the sky, and forgive me the sins that tear away the veil, and forgive me the sins that
items.transliteration: Allahumma inni as'aluka bi-ismika al-ladhi dana lahu kullu shay'in, wa-bi-rahmatika al-lati wasi'at kulla shay'in, wa-bi-'adhamatika al-lati tawada'a laha kullu shay'in, wa-bi-'izzatika al-lati qaharta kulla shay'in, wa-bi-quwwatika al-lati khada'a laha kullu shay'in, wa-bi-jabarutika al-lati ghalabat kulla shay'in, wa-bi-'ilmika al-ladhi ahata bi-kulli shay'in, ya Nuru ya Quddusu, ya awwala qabla kulli shay'in, wa-baqiya ba'da kulli shay'in, ya Allahu ya Rahmanu, salli 'ala Muhammadin wa-ali Muhammadin, wa-ighfir liya al-dhunuba al-lati tughayyiru al-ni'ama, wa-ighfir liya al-dhunuba al-lati tunzilu al-niqama, wa-ighfir liya al-dhunuba al-lati taqta'u al-raja'a, wa-ighfir liya al-dhunuba al-lati tudilu al-a'da'a, wa-ighfir liya al-dhunuba al-lati taruddu al-du'a'a, wa-ighfir liya al-dhunuba al-lati yustahaqqu biha nuzulu al-bala'i, wa-ighfir liya al-dhunuba al-lati tahbisu ghaytha al-sama'i, wa-ighfir liya al-dhunuba al-lati takshifu al-ghita'a, wa-ighfir liya al-dhunuba al-lati

items.arabic: تُعَجِّلُ الْفَنآءَ، وَاغْفِرْ لِىَ الذُّنُوبَ الَّتى تُورِثُ النَّدَمَ، وَاغْفِرْ لِىَ الذُّنُوبَ الَّتى تَهْتِكُ الْعِصَمَ، وَالْبِسْنى دِرْعَكَ الْحَصينَةَ الَّتى لا تُرامُ، وَعافِنى مِنْ شَرِّ ما احاذِرُ بِاللَّيْلِ وَالنَّهارِ فى مُسْتَقْبَلِ سَنَتى هذِهِ، اللهُمَّ رَبَّ السَّمواتِ السَّبْعِ، وَرَبَّ الْأَرَضينَ السَّبْعِ، وَما فيهِنَّ وَما بَيْنَهُنَّ، وَرَبَّ الْعَرْشِ الْعَظيمِ، وَرَبَّ السَّبْعِ الْمَثانى وَالْقُرْآنِ الْعَظيمِ، وَرَبَّ اسْرافيلَ وَميكآئيلَ وَجَبْرَئيلَ، وَرَبَّ مُحَمَّدٍ صَلَّى اللَّهُ عَلَيْهِ وَآلِهِ، سَيِّدِ الْمُرْسَلينَ، وَخاتَمِ النَّبِيّينَ، اسْئَلُكَ بِكَ وَبِما سَمَّيْتَ بِهِ نَفْسَكَ، يا عَظيمُ انْتَ الَّذى تَمُنُّ بِالْعَظيمِ، وَتَدْفَعُ كُلَّ مَحْذُورٍ، وَتُعْطى كُلَّ جَزِيلٍ، وَتُضاعِفُ الْحَسَناتِ بِالْقَليلِ وَبِالْكَثيرِ، وَتَفْعَلُ ما تَشآءُ يا قَديرُ، يا اللَّهُ يا رَحْمنُ، صَلِّ عَلى مُحَمَّدٍ وَاهْلِ بَيْتِهِ، وَالْبِسْنى فى مُسْتَقْبَلِ سَنَتى هذِهِ سِتْرَكَ، وَنَضِّرْ وَجْهى بِنُورِكَ، وَاحِبَّنى بِمَحبَّتِكَ، وَبَلِّغْنى رِضْوانَكَ وَشَريفَ كَرامَتِكَ، وَجَسيمَ عَطِيَّتِكَ، وَاعْطِنى مِنْ خَيْرِ ما عِنْدَكَ، وَمِنْ خَيْرِ ما انْتَ مُعْطيهِ احَداً مِنْ خَلْقِكَ، وَالْبِسْنى مَعَ ذلِكَ عافِيَتَكَ، يا مَوْضِعَ كُلِّ شَكْوى وَيا شاهِدَ كُلِّ نَجْوى وَيا عالِمَ كُلِّ خَفِيَّةٍ، وَيا دافِعَ ما تَشآءُ مِنْ بَلِيَّةٍ، يا كَريمَ الْعَفْوِ، يا حَسَنَ التَّجاوُزِ، تَوَفَّنى عَلى مِلَّةِ ابْراهيمَ وَفِطْرَتِهِ، وَعَلى دينِ مُحَمَّدٍ صَلَّى اللَّهُ عَلَيْهِ وَآلِهِ وَسُنَّتِهِ، وَعَلى خَيْرِ الْوَفاةِ، فَتَوَفَّنى مُوالِياً لِأَوْلِيآئِكَ، وَمُعادِياً لِأَعْدآئِكَ، اللهُمَّ وَجَنِّبْنى فى هذِهِ السَّنَةِ كُلَّ عَمَلٍ اوْ قَوْلٍ اوْ فِعْلٍ يُباعِدُنى مِنْكَ، وَاجْلُبْنى الَى كُلِّ عَمَلٍ اوْ قَوْلٍ اوْ فِعْلٍ يُقَرِّبُنى مِنْكَ فى هذِهِ السَّنَةِ، يا ارْحَمَ الرَّاحِمينَ، وَامْنَعْنى مِنْ كُلِّ عَمَلٍ اوْ قَوْلٍ اوْ فِعْلٍ يَكُونُ مِنّى اخافُ ضَرَرَ عاقِبَتِهِ، وَاخافُ مَقْتَكَ ايَّاىَ عَلَيْهِ حِذارَ انْ تَصْرِفَ وَجْهَكَ الْكَريمَ عَنّى فَاسْتَوجِبَ بِهِ نَقْصاً مِنْ حَظٍّ لى عِنْدَكَ، يا رَؤُفُ يا رَحيمُ، اللهُمَّ اجْعَلْنى فى مُسْتَقْبَلِ سَنَتى هذِهِ فى حِفْظِكَ، وَفى جِوارِكَ وَفى كَنَفِكَ، وَجَلِّلْنى سِتْرَ عافِيَتِكَ، وَهَبْ لى كَرامَتَكَ، عَزَّ جارُكَ، وَجَلَّ ثَنآؤُكَ،
items.english: hasten annihilation, and forgive me the sins that result in regret, and forgive me the sins that tear away the protections, and clothe me in Your fortified armor that cannot be breached, and grant me well-being from the evil of what I fear by night and day in this upcoming year of mine. O Allah, Lord of the seven heavens and Lord of the seven earths and whatever is in them and whatever is between them, and Lord of the Great Throne, and Lord of the seven oft-repeated verses and the Great Quran, and Lord of Israfil, Mikail, and Jibrail, and Lord of Muhammad, peace and blessings of Allah be upon him and his family, the master of the messengers and the seal of the prophets. I ask You by You and by that which You have named Yourself—O Great One, You are the One who bestows the great, averts every danger, and grants every abundant gift, and You multiply good deeds through the little and the much, and You do whatever You will, O All-Powerful. O Allah, O All-Beneficent, bless Muhammad and his family, and clothe me in this upcoming year of mine with Your concealment, and brighten my face with Your light, and love me with Your love, and cause me to reach Your pleasure, Your noble honor, and Your immense gift; and give me from the best of what is with You and from the best of what You give to anyone of Your creation, and clothe me along with that with Your well-being. O locus of every complaint, O witness of every secret conversation, O Knower of every hidden thing, O Averter of whatever affliction You will, O Generous in pardoning, O Beautiful in overlooking, cause me to die upon the creed of Ibrahim and his innate nature, and upon the religion of Muhammad, peace and blessings of Allah be upon him and his family, and his Sunnah, and upon the best of deaths; so cause me to die as a friend to Your friends and an enemy to Your enemies. O Allah, and keep me away in this year from every deed, word, or action that distances me from You, and draw me to every deed, word, or action that brings me closer to You in this year, O Most Merciful of the merciful. And prevent me from every deed, word, or action proceeding from me whose harmful consequence I fear, and for which I fear Your loathing of me, out of caution lest You turn Your noble Face away from me and I thereby deserve a decrease in my portion with You, O Kind, O Merciful. O Allah, place me in this upcoming year of mine under Your protection, in Your proximity, and under Your shelter; and cover me with the concealment of Your well-being, and grant me Your honor. Mighty is Your protection and exalted is Your praise.
items.transliteration: tu'ajjilu al-fana'a, wa-aghfir liya al-dhunuba al-lati turithu al-nadama, wa-aghfir liya al-dhunuba al-lati tahtiku al-'isama, wa-albisni dir'aka al-hasinata al-lati la turamu, wa-'afini min sharri ma uhadhiru bi-al-layli wa-al-nahari fi mustaqbali sanati hadhihi, Allahumma rabba al-samawati al-sab'i, wa-rabba al-aradina al-sab'i, wa-ma fihinna wa-ma baynahunna, wa-rabba al-'arshi al-'adhimi, wa-rabba al-sab'i al-mathani wa-al-Qur'ani al-'adhimi, wa-rabba Israfila wa-Mika'ila wa-Jibra'ila, wa-rabba Muhammadin salla Allahu 'alayhi wa-alihi, sayyidi al-mursalina, wa-khatami al-nabiyyina, as'aluka bika wa-bima sammayta bihi nafsaka, ya 'Adhimu anta al-ladhi tamunnu bi-al-'adhimi, wa-tadfa'u kulla mahdhurin, wa-tu'ti kulla jazilin, wa-tuda'ifu al-hasanati bi-al-qalili wa-bi-al-kathiri, wa-taf'alu ma tasha'u ya Qadiru, ya Allahu ya Rahmanu, salli 'ala Muhammadin wa-ahli baytihi, wa-albisni fi mustaqbali sanati hadhihi sitraka, wa-naddir wajhi bi-nurika, wa-ahibbani bi-mahabbatika, wa-ballighni ridwanaka wa-sharifa karamatika, wa-jasima 'atiyyatika, wa-a'tini min khayri ma 'indaka, wa-min khayri ma anta mu'tihi ahadan min khalqika, wa-albisni ma'a dhalika 'afiyataka, ya mawdi'a kulli shakwa wa-ya shahida kulli najwa wa-ya 'alima kulli khafiyyatin, wa-ya dafi'a ma tasha'u min baliyyatin, ya Karima al-'afwi, ya Hasana al-tajawuzi, tawaffani 'ala millati Ibrahima wa-fitratihi, wa-'ala dini Muhammadin salla Allahu 'alayhi wa-alihi wa-sunnatihi, wa-'ala khayri al-wafati, fa-tawaffani muwaliyan li-awliya'ika, wa-mu'adiyan li-a'da'ika, Allahumma wa-jannibni fi hadhihi al-sanati kulla 'amalin aw qawlin aw fi'lin yuba'iduni minka, wa-ajlubni ila kulli 'amalin aw qawlin aw fi'lin yuqarribuni minka fi hadhihi al-sanati, ya arhama al-rahimina, wa-amna'ni min kulli 'amalin aw qawlin aw fi'lin yakunu minni akhafu darara 'aqibatihi, wa-akhafu maqtaka iyyaya 'alayhi hidhara an tasrifa wajhaka al-karima 'anni fa-astawjiba bihi naqsan min haddhin li 'indaka, ya Ra'ufu ya Rahimu, Allahumma ij'alni fi mustaqbali sanati hadhihi fi hifdhika, wa-fi jiwarika wa-fi kanafika, wa-jallilni sitra 'afiyatika, wa-hab li karamataka, 'azza jaruka, wa-jalla thana'uka,

items.arabic: تُعَجِّلُ الْفَنآءَ، وَاغْفِرْ لِىَ الذُّنُوبَ الَّتى تُورِثُ النَّدَمَ، وَاغْفِرْ لِىَ الذُّنُوبَ الَّتى تَهْتِكُ الْعِصَمَ، وَالْبِسْنى دِرْعَكَ الْحَصينَةَ الَّتى لا تُرامُ، وَعافِنى مِنْ شَرِّ ما احاذِرُ بِاللَّيْلِ وَالنَّهارِ فى مُسْتَقْبَلِ سَنَتى هذِهِ، اللهُمَّ رَبَّ السَّمواتِ السَّبْعِ، وَرَبَّ الْأَرَضينَ السَّبْعِ، وَما فيهِنَّ وَما بَيْنَهُنَّ، وَرَبَّ الْعَرْشِ الْعَظيمِ، وَرَبَّ السَّبْعِ الْمَثانى وَالْقُرْآنِ الْعَظيمِ، وَرَبَّ اسْرافيلَ وَميكآئيلَ وَجَبْرَئيلَ، وَرَبَّ مُحَمَّدٍ صَلَّى اللَّهُ عَلَيْهِ وَآلِهِ، سَيِّدِ الْمُرْسَلينَ، وَخاتَمِ النَّبِيّينَ، اسْئَلُكَ بِكَ وَبِما سَمَّيْتَ بِهِ نَفْسَكَ، يا عَظيمُ انْتَ الَّذى تَمُنُّ بِالْعَظيمِ، وَتَدْفَعُ كُلَّ مَحْذُورٍ، وَتُعْطى كُلَّ جَزِيلٍ، وَتُضاعِفُ الْحَسَناتِ بِالْقَليلِ وَبِالْكَثيرِ، وَتَفْعَلُ ما تَشآءُ يا قَديرُ، يا اللَّهُ يا رَحْمنُ، صَلِّ عَلى مُحَمَّدٍ وَاهْلِ بَيْتِهِ، وَالْبِسْنى فى مُسْتَقْبَلِ سَنَتى هذِهِ سِتْرَكَ، وَنَضِّرْ وَجْهى بِنُورِكَ، وَاحِبَّنى بِمَحبَّتِكَ، وَبَلِّغْنى رِضْوانَكَ وَشَريفَ كَرامَتِكَ، وَجَسيمَ عَطِيَّتِكَ، وَاعْطِنى مِنْ خَيْرِ ما عِنْدَكَ، وَمِنْ خَيْرِ ما انْتَ مُعْطيهِ احَداً مِنْ خَلْقِكَ، وَالْبِسْنى مَعَ ذلِكَ عافِيَتَكَ، يا مَوْضِعَ كُلِّ شَكْوى وَيا شاهِدَ كُلِّ نَجْوى وَيا عالِمَ كُلِّ خَفِيَّةٍ، وَيا دافِعَ ما تَشآءُ مِنْ بَلِيَّةٍ، يا كَريمَ الْعَفْوِ، يا حَسَنَ التَّجاوُزِ، تَوَفَّنى عَلى مِلَّةِ ابْراهيمَ وَفِطْرَتِهِ، وَعَلى دينِ مُحَمَّدٍ صَلَّى اللَّهُ عَلَيْهِ وَآلِهِ وَسُنَّتِهِ، وَعَلى خَيْرِ الْوَفاةِ، فَتَوَفَّنى مُوالِياً لِأَوْلِيآئِكَ، وَمُعادِياً لِأَعْدآئِكَ، اللهُمَّ وَجَنِّبْنى فى هذِهِ السَّنَةِ كُلَّ عَمَلٍ اوْ قَوْلٍ اوْ فِعْلٍ يُباعِدُنى مِنْكَ، وَاجْلُبْنى الَى كُلِّ عَمَلٍ اوْ قَوْلٍ اوْ فِعْلٍ يُقَرِّبُنى مِنْكَ فى هذِهِ السَّنَةِ، يا ارْحَمَ الرَّاحِمينَ، وَامْنَعْنى مِنْ كُلِّ عَمَلٍ اوْ قَوْلٍ اوْ فِعْلٍ يَكُونُ مِنّى اخافُ ضَرَرَ عاقِبَتِهِ، وَاخافُ مَقْتَكَ ايَّاىَ عَلَيْهِ حِذارَ انْ تَصْرِفَ وَجْهَكَ الْكَريمَ عَنّى فَاسْتَوجِبَ بِهِ نَقْصاً مِنْ حَظٍّ لى عِنْدَكَ، يا رَؤُفُ يا رَحيمُ، اللهُمَّ اجْعَلْنى فى مُسْتَقْبَلِ سَنَتى هذِهِ فى حِفْظِكَ، وَفى جِوارِكَ وَفى كَنَفِكَ، وَجَلِّلْنى سِتْرَ عافِيَتِكَ، وَهَبْ لى كَرامَتَكَ، عَزَّ جارُكَ، وَجَلَّ ثَنآؤُكَ،
items.english: ...hasten annihilation, and forgive me the sins that result in regret, and forgive me the sins that tear away the protections, and clothe me in Your fortified armor that cannot be breached, and grant me well-being from the evil of what I fear by night and day in this upcoming year of mine. O Allah, Lord of the seven heavens, and Lord of the seven earths and what is in them and what is between them, and Lord of the Great Throne, and Lord of the seven oft-repeated [verses] and the Great Quran, and Lord of Israfil, Mikail, and Jibrail, and Lord of Muhammad (peace be upon him and his family), the master of the messengers and the seal of the prophets, I ask You by You and by that which You have named Yourself, O Great One! You are the One who bestows the great, and averts every danger, and grants every abundant gift, and multiplies good deeds by the little and the much, and You do whatever You will, O All-Powerful! O Allah, O Most Merciful, bless Muhammad and his Ahl al-Bayt, and clothe me in this upcoming year of mine with Your covering, and brighten my face with Your light, and love me with Your love, and make me reach Your pleasure and Your noble honor and Your immense gift, and give me of the best of what is with You and of the best of what You give to any of Your creation, and clothe me along with that in Your well-being; O Recourse for every complaint, O Witness of every secret conversation, O Knower of every hidden thing, O Averter of whatever affliction You will, O Generous in pardon, O Excellent in overlooking, cause me to die upon the creed of Ibrahim and his innate nature, and upon the religion of Muhammad (peace be upon him and his family) and his Sunnah, and upon the best state of death; cause me to die as a friend to Your friends and an enemy to Your enemies. O Allah, keep me away in this year from every deed, word, or action that distances me from You, and draw me toward every deed, word, or action that brings me closer to You in this year, O Most Merciful of the merciful, and prevent me from every deed, word, or action of mine whose harmful consequence I fear, and for which I fear Your loathing of me—lest You turn Your Noble Face away from me, and I thereby deserve a decrease in my portion with You, O Compassionate, O Merciful! O Allah, place me in this upcoming year of mine in Your protection, in Your neighborhood, and in Your care, and wrap me in the covering of Your well-being, and bestow Your honor upon me; Your protégé is mighty, and Your praise is exalted,

items.arabic: وَلا الهَ غَيْرُكَ، اللهُمَّ اجْعَلْنى تابِعاً لِصالِحى مَنْ مَضى مِنْ اوْلِيآئِكَ، وَالْحِقْنى بِهِمْ، وَاجْعَلْنى مُسَلِّماً لِمَنْ قالَ بِالصِّدْقِ عَلَيْكَ مِنْهُمْ، وَاعُوذُ بِكَ اللهُمَّ انْ تُحيطَ بى خَطيئَتى وَظُلْمى وَاسْرافى عَلى نَفْسى وَاتِّباعى لِهَواىَ، وَاشْتِغالى بِشَهَواتى فَيَحُولُ ذلِكَ بَيْنى وَبَيْنَ رَحْمَتِكَ وَرِضْوانِكَ، فَاكُونُ مَنْسِيّاً عِنْدَكَ، مُتَعَرِّضاً لِسَخَطِكَ وَنِقْمَتِكَ، اللهُمَّ وَفِّقْنى لِكُلِّ عَمَلٍ صالِحٍ تَرْضى بِهِ عَنّى وَقَرِّبْنى الَيْكَ زُلْفى اللَّهُمَّ كَما كَفَيْتَ نَبِيَّكَ مُحَمَّداً صَلَّى اللَّهُ عَلَيْهِ وَآلِهِ هَوْلَ عَدُوِّهِ، وَفَرَّجْتَ هَمَّهُ، وَكَشَفْتَ غَمَّهُ، وَصَدَقْتَهُ وَعْدَكَ، وَانْجَزْتَ لَهُ عَهْدَكَ، اللَّهُمَّ فَبِذلِكَ فَاكْفِنى هَوْلَ هذِهِ السَّنَةِ، وَآفاتِها وَاسْقامَها، وَفِتْنَتَها وَشُرُورَها وَاحْزانَها، وَضيقَ الْمَعاشِ فيها، وَبَلِّغْنى بِرَحْمَتِكَ كَمالَ الْعافِيَةِ، بِتَمامِ دَوامِ النِّعْمَةِ عِنْدى الى مُنْتَهى اجَلى اسْئَلُكَ سُؤالَ مَنْ اسآءَ وَظَلَمَ، وَاسْتَكانَ وَاعْتَرَفَ، وَاسْئَلُكَ انْ تَغْفِرَ لى ما مَضى مِنَ الذُّنُوبِ الَّتى حَصَرَتْها حَفَظَتُكَ، وَاحْصَتْها كِرامُ مَلائِكَتِكَ عَلَىَّ، وَانْ تَعْصِمَنى الهى مِنَ الذُّنُوبِ فيما بَقِىَ مِنْ عُمْرى الى مُنْتَهى اجَلى يا اللَّهُ يا رَحْمنُ يا رَحيمُ، صَلِّ عَلَى مُحمَّدٍ وَآلِ مُحَمَّدٍ وَاهْلِ بَيْتِ مُحَمَّدٍ، وَ اتِنى كُلَّ ما سَئَلْتُكَ وَرَغِبْتُ الَيْكَ فيهِ، فَانَّكَ امَرْتَنى بِالدُّعاءِ، وَتَكَفَّلْتَ لى بِالْإِجابَةِ، يا ارْحَمَ الرَّاحِمينَ .
items.english: and there is no god but You. O Allah, make me a follower of the righteous among Your friends who have passed away, and join me with them; and make me submissive to those among them who spoke the truth concerning You. I seek refuge in You, O Allah, lest my sin, my wrongdoing, my excess against myself, my following of my desires, and my preoccupation with my lusts encompass me, thereby intervening between me and Your mercy and Your pleasure, such that I become forgotten by You, exposed to Your wrath and Your vengeance. O Allah, grant me success in every righteous deed by which You are pleased with me, and draw me near to You in close proximity. O Allah, just as You sufficed Your Prophet Muhammad (may Allah bless him and his family) against the terror of his enemy, relieved his anxiety, removed his grief, fulfilled Your promise to him, and accomplished Your covenant for him; O Allah, so by that, suffice me against the terror of this year, its blights, its illnesses, its trials, its evils, its sorrows, and the hardship of livelihood therein. Through Your mercy, cause me to attain perfect well-being, with the complete continuity of favor upon me until the end of my life. I ask You with the entreaty of one who has done evil and wronged himself, who is humbled and has confessed. I ask You to forgive me my past sins which Your guardians have recorded and Your noble angels have enumerated against me; and that You protect me, my God, from sins for the remainder of my life until the end of my term. O Allah, O All-Beneficent, O All-Merciful, bless Muhammad, the family of Muhammad, and the Ahl al-Bayt of Muhammad; and grant me all that I have asked of You and desired from You, for You have commanded me to supplicate and have guaranteed me the response, O most Merciful of the merciful.
items.transliteration: wa-la ilaha ghayruka, Allahumma ij'alni tabi'an li-salihi man mada min awliya'ika, wa-alhiqni bihim, wa-ij'alni musalliman li-man qala bi-al-sidqi 'alayka minhum, wa-a'udhu bika Allahumma an tuhita bi khati'ati wa-dhulmi wa-israfi 'ala nafsi wa-ittiba'i li-hawaya, wa-ishtighali bi-shahawati fa-yahulu dhalika bayni wa-bayna rahmatika wa-ridwanika, fa-akunu mansiyyan 'indaka, muta'arridan li-sakhatika wa-niqmatika, Allahumma waffiqni li-kulli 'amalin salihin tarda bihi 'anni wa-qarribni ilayka zulfa. Allahumma kama kafayta nabiyyaka Muhammadan salla Allahu 'alayhi wa-alihi hawla 'aduwwihi, wa-farrajta hammahu, wa-kashafta ghammahu, wa-sadaqtahu wa'daka, wa-anjazta lahu 'ahdaka, Allahumma fa-bi-dhalika fa-ikfini hawla hadhihi al-sanati, wa-afatiha wa-asqamaha, wa-fitnataha wa-shururaha wa-ahzanaha, wa-diqa al-ma'ashi fiha, wa-ballighni bi-rahmatika kamala al-'afiyati, bi-tamami dawami al-ni'mati 'indi ila muntaha ajali as'aluka su'ala man asa'a wa-dhalama, wa-istakana wa-i'tarafa, wa-as'aluka an taghfira li ma mada mina al-dhunubi al-lati hasaratha hafadhatuka, wa-ahsatha kiramu mala'ikatika 'alayya, wa-an ta'simani ilahi mina al-dhunubi fima baqiya min 'umri ila muntaha ajali ya Allahu ya Rahmanu ya Rahimu, salli 'ala Muhammadin wa-ali Muhammadin wa-ahli bayti Muhammadin, wa-atini kulla ma sa'altuka wa-raghibtu ilayka fihi, fa-innaka amartani bi-al-du'a'i, wa-takaffalta li bi-al-ijabati, ya arhama al-rahimina.

footnote_refs.title: زاد المعاد: ص 101- / 105؛ إقبال الأعمال: ص 45( باختلاف يسير).

items.arabic: ومن المناسب الدعاء به أوّل السنة القمرية والشمسية بقصد القربة المطلقة.
items.english: It is appropriate to recite this supplication at the beginning of the lunar and solar years with the intention of absolute proximity.
items.transliteration: Wa-mina al-munasibi al-du'a'u bi-hi awwala al-sanati al-qamariyati wa-al-shamsiyati bi-qasdi al-qurbati al-mutlaqati.

items.arabic: الليلة الثالثة عشرة:
items.english: The thirteenth night:
items.transliteration: al-Laylatu al-thalithata 'ashrata:

items.arabic: هي اولى الليالي البيض وفيها ثلاثة أعمال:
items.english: It is the first of the White Nights, and in it are three acts:
items.transliteration: Hiya ula al-layali al-bidu wa-fiha thalathatu a'malin:

items.arabic: 1. الغسل .
items.english: 1. Ghusl.
items.transliteration: 1. al-ghuslu.

items.arabic: 2. الصلاةأربع ركعات في كلّ ركعةالحمد مرّة والتوحيد خمساًوعشرين مرّة (كلّ ركعتين بسلام) .
items.english: 2. To pray four rak‘ahs, in each rak‘ah reciting al-Hamd once and al-Tawhid twenty-five times (every two rak‘ahs with a salutation).
items.transliteration: 2. al-Salatu arba'u rak'atin fi kulli rak'atin al-Hamdu marratan wa-al-Tawhidu khamsan wa-'ishrina marratan (kullu rak'atayni bi-salamin).

items.arabic: وَلا الهَ غَيْرُكَ، اللهُمَّ اجْعَلْنى تابِعاً لِصالِحى مَنْ مَضى مِنْ اوْلِيآئِكَ، وَالْحِقْنى بِهِمْ، وَاجْعَلْنى مُسَلِّماً لِمَنْ قالَ بِالصِّدْقِ عَلَيْكَ مِنْهُمْ، وَاعُوذُ بِكَ اللهُمَّ انْ تُحيطَ بى خَطيئَتى وَظُلْمى وَاسْرافى عَلى نَفْسى وَاتِّباعى لِهَواىَ، وَاشْتِغالى بِشَهَواتى فَيَحُولُ ذلِكَ بَيْنى وَبَيْنَ رَحْمَتِكَ وَرِضْوانِكَ، فَاكُونُ مَنْسِيّاً عِنْدَكَ، مُتَعَرِّضاً لِسَخَطِكَ وَنِقْمَتِكَ، اللهُمَّ وَفِّقْنى لِكُلِّ عَمَلٍ صالِحٍ تَرْضى بِهِ عَنّى وَقَرِّبْنى الَيْكَ زُلْفى اللَّهُمَّ كَما كَفَيْتَ نَبِيَّكَ مُحَمَّداً صَلَّى اللَّهُ عَلَيْهِ وَآلِهِ هَوْلَ عَدُوِّهِ، وَفَرَّجْتَ هَمَّهُ، وَكَشَفْتَ غَمَّهُ، وَصَدَقْتَهُ وَعْدَكَ، وَانْجَزْتَ لَهُ عَهْدَكَ، اللَّهُمَّ فَبِذلِكَ فَاكْفِنى هَوْلَ هذِهِ السَّنَةِ، وَآفاتِها وَاسْقامَها، وَفِتْنَتَها وَشُرُورَها وَاحْزانَها، وَضيقَ الْمَعاشِ فيها، وَبَلِّغْنى بِرَحْمَتِكَ كَمالَ الْعافِيَةِ، بِتَمامِ دَوامِ النِّعْمَةِ عِنْدى الى مُنْتَهى اجَلى اسْئَلُكَ سُؤالَ مَنْ اسآءَ وَظَلَمَ، وَاسْتَكانَ وَاعْتَرَفَ، وَاسْئَلُكَ انْ تَغْفِرَ لى ما مَضى مِنَ الذُّنُوبِ الَّتى حَصَرَتْها حَفَظَتُكَ، وَاحْصَتْها كِرامُ مَلائِكَتِكَ عَلَىَّ، وَانْ تَعْصِمَنى الهى مِنَ الذُّنُوبِ فيما بَقِىَ مِنْ عُمْرى الى مُنْتَهى اجَلى يا اللَّهُ يا رَحْمنُ يا رَحيمُ، صَلِّ عَلَى مُحمَّدٍ وَآلِ مُحَمَّدٍ وَاهْلِ بَيْتِ مُحَمَّدٍ، وَ اتِنى كُلَّ ما سَئَلْتُكَ وَرَغِبْتُ الَيْكَ فيهِ، فَانَّكَ امَرْتَنى بِالدُّعاءِ، وَتَكَفَّلْتَ لى بِالْإِجابَةِ، يا ارْحَمَ الرَّاحِمينَ .
items.english: and there is no god but You. O Allah, make me a follower of the righteous among Your friends who have passed away, and join me with them; and make me submissive to those among them who spoke the truth concerning You. I seek refuge in You, O Allah, lest my sin, my wrongdoing, my excess against myself, my following of my whims, and my preoccupation with my desires encompass me, such that they stand between me and Your mercy and Your good pleasure, and thus I become forgotten by You, exposed to Your wrath and Your vengeance. O Allah, grant me success in every righteous deed by which You are pleased with me, and bring me near to You in close proximity. O Allah, just as You sufficed Your Prophet Muhammad (peace be upon him and his family) against the terror of his enemy, and relieved his anxiety, and removed his grief, and fulfilled Your promise to him, and accomplished Your covenant for him, O Allah, so by that, suffice me against the terror of this year, its blights, its ailments, its trials, its evils, and its sorrows, and the hardship of livelihood therein; and through Your mercy, cause me to reach the perfection of well-being, by the completion of the permanence of the blessing with me until the end of my life. I ask You with the asking of one who has done evil and wronged himself, and has become humble and confessed; and I ask You to forgive me my past sins which Your guardians have recorded and Your noble angels have counted against me, and to protect me, O my God, from sins in what remains of my life until the end of my term. O Allah, O All-Beneficent, O All-Merciful, bless Muhammad and the family of Muhammad and the Household of Muhammad, and grant me all that I have asked You and desired from You; for indeed You have commanded me to supplicate, and You have guaranteed me the response, O most Merciful of the merciful.
items.transliteration: wa-la ilaha ghayruka, Allahumma ij'alni tabi'an li-salihi man mada min awliya'ika, wa-alhiqni bihim, wa-ij'alni musalliman li-man qala bi-al-sidqi 'alayka minhum, wa-a'udhu bika Allahumma an tuhita bi khati'ati wa-dhulmi wa-israfi 'ala nafsi wa-ittiba'i li-hawaye, wa-ishtighali bi-shahawati fa-yahulu dhalika bayni wa-bayna rahmatika wa-ridwanika, fa-akunu mansiyyan 'indaka, muta'arridan li-sakhatika wa-niqmatika, Allahumma waffiqni li-kulli 'amalin salihin tardha bi-hi 'anni wa-qarribni ilayka zulfa, Allahumma kama kafayta nabiyyaka Muhammadan salla Allahu 'alayhi wa-alihi hawla 'aduwwihi, wa-farrajta hammahu, wa-kashafta ghammahu, wa-sadaqtahu wa'daka, wa-anjazta lahu 'ahdaka, Allahumma fa-bi-dhalika fa-ikfini hawla hadhihi al-sanati, wa-afatiha wa-asqamaha, wa-fitnataha wa-shururaha wa-ahzanaha, wa-diqa al-ma'ashi fiha, wa-ballighni bi-rahmatika kamala al-'afiyati, bi-tamami dawami al-ni'mati 'indi ila muntaha ajali, as'aluka su'ala man asa'a wa-dhalama, wa-stakana wa-i'tarafa, wa-as'aluka an taghfira li ma mada mina al-dhunubi al-lati hasaratha hafadhatuka, wa-ahsatha kiramu mala'ikatika 'alayya, wa-an ta'simani ilahi mina al-dhunubi fima baqiya min 'umri ila muntaha ajali, ya Allahu ya Rahmanu ya Rahimu, salli 'ala Muhammadin wa-ali Muhammadin wa-ahli bayti Muhammadin, wa-atini kulla ma sa'altuka wa-raghibtu ilayka fihi, fa-innaka amartani bi-al-du'a'i, wa-takaffalta li bi-al-ijabati, ya arhama al-rahimina.

items.arabic: ومن المناسب الدعاء به أوّل السنة القمرية والشمسية بقصد القربة المطلقة.
items.english: It is appropriate to recite this supplication at the beginning of the lunar and solar years with the intention of absolute proximity.
items.transliteration: Wa-mina al-munasibi al-du'a'u bi-hi awwala al-sanati al-qamariyati wa-al-shamsiyati bi-qasdi al-qurbati al-mutlaqati.

items.english: The thirteenth night:
items.transliteration: al-Laylatu al-thalithata 'ashrata:

items.arabic: هي اولى الليالي البيض وفيها ثلاثة أعمال:
items.english: It is the first of the White Nights, and in it are three acts:
items.transliteration: Hiya ula al-layali al-bidu wa-fiha thalathatu a'malin:

items.arabic: 1. الغسل .
items.english: 1. Ghusl.

items.arabic: 2. الصلاةأربع ركعات في كلّ ركعةالحمد مرّة والتوحيد خمساًوعشرين مرّة (كلّ ركعتين بسلام) .
items.english: 2. To pray four rak‘ahs, in each rak‘ah reciting al-Hamd once and al-Tawhid twenty-five times (every two rak‘ahs with a salutation).

items.arabic: 3. صلاة ركعتين، مرّ مثلها في الليلة الثالثة عشرة من شهري رجب وشعبان تقرأ في كلّ ركعة منهما بعد الفاتحة سورة

items.transliteration: 3. Salatu rak'atayni, marra mithluha fi al-laylati al-thalithata 'ashrata min shahray Rajaba wa-Sha'bana tuqra'u fi kulli rak'atin minhuma ba'da al-Fatihati surata

items.arabic: يس وتَبارَكَ والمُلك والتّوحيد .

items.transliteration: Ya-Sin wa-Tabaraka wa-al-Mulka wa-al-Tawhida.

items.arabic: 4. يقرأ دعاء المجير في الليالي الثالثة عشرة والرابعة عشرة والخامسة عشرة والذي مضى في قسم الأدعية المعروفة (ص 87).
items.english: 4. To recite Du‘a al-Mujir on the thirteenth, fourteenth, and fifteenth nights, which was previously mentioned in the section of well-known supplications (p. 87).

items.english: To pray four rak‘ahs (every two rak‘ahs with a salutation) as previously mentioned regarding the thirteenth night.
items.transliteration: Yusalli arba'a rak'atin (kullu rak'atayni bi-salamin) kama mada fi al-laylati al-thalithata 'ashrata.

items.arabic: هذه ليلة مباركة وفيها أعمال:
items.english: This is a blessed night, and in it are acts:
items.transliteration: Hadhihi laylatun mubarakatun wa-fiha a'malun:

items.arabic: 1. الغسل .
items.english: 1. Ghusl.
items.transliteration: 1. al-ghuslu.

items.arabic: 2. الصلاة ستّ ركعات يقرأ في كلّ ركعة
items.english: 2. To pray six rak‘ahs, reciting in each rak‘ah
items.transliteration: 2. al-Salatu sittu rak'atin yuqra'u fi kulli rak'atin.

items.arabic: الحَمْدُ ويس والمُلْك والتَّوحيد .
