items.arabic: العنكبوت والروم
items.english: al-Ankabut and al-Rum
items.transliteration: al-Ankabuti wa-al-Rumi.

items.arabic: ، قال الإمام الصادق عليه السلام: «
items.english: , Imam al-Sadiq, peace be upon him, said: “
items.transliteration: , Qala al-Imamu al-Sadiqu 'alayhi al-salamu: "

items.arabic: مَنْ قَرَأ سُورَتَي العَنْكَبُوتِ والرُّومِ فِي شَهْرِ رَمَضانَ لَيْلَةَ ثَلاثٍ وَعِشْرِينَ فَهُوَ واللَّهِ مِنْ أهْلِ الجَنَّةِ» .
items.english: “Whoever recites the two Surahs of al-Ankabut and al-Rum in the month of Ramadan on the twenty-third night, he is—by Allah—among the people of Paradise.”
items.transliteration: Man qara'a suratay al-'Ankabuti wa-al-Rumi fi shahri Ramadana laylata thalathin wa-'ishrina fa-huwa wa-Allahi min ahli al-jannati."

items.arabic: 4. يدعو بهذا الدعاء:
items.english: 4. Reciting this supplication:
items.transliteration: 4. Yad'u bi-hadha al-du'a'i:

items.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ امْدُدْ لى فى عُمْرى وَاوْسِعْ لى فى رِزْقى وَاصِحَّ لى جِسْمى وَبَلِّغْنى امَلى وَانْ كُنْتُ مِنَ الْأَشْقِيآءِ فَامْحُنى مِنَ الْأَشْقِيآءِ، وَاْكتُبْنى مِنَ السُّعَدآءِ، فَانَّكَ قُلْتَ فى كِتابِكَ الْمُنْزَلِ عَلى نَبِيِّكَ الْمُرْسَلِ، صَلَواتُكَ عَلَيْهِ وَآلِهِ، يَمْحُو اللَّهُ ما يَشآءُ وَيُثْبِتُ، وَعِنْدَهُ امُّ الْكِتابِ .
items.english: O Allah, extend my life for me, expand my sustenance for me, grant health to my body, and let me attain my hope. And if I am among the wretched, then erase me from the wretched and record me among the felicitous; for indeed, You have said in Your Book revealed to Your sent Prophet—Your blessings be upon him and his family—: “Allah effaces what He wills and establishes, and with Him is the Mother of the Book.”
items.transliteration: Allahumma imdud li fi 'umri wa-awsi' li fi rizqi wa-asihha li jismi wa-ballighni amali wa-in kuntu mina al-ashqiya'i fa-amhuni mina al-ashqiya'i, wa-aktubni mina al-su'ada'i, fa-innaka qulta fi kitabika al-munzali 'ala nabiyyika al-mursali, salawatuka 'alayhi wa-alihi, yamhu Allahu ma yasha'u wa-yuthbitu, wa-'indahu ummu al-kitabi.

items.arabic: 5. يدعو بهذا الدعاء الخاصّ بليلة الثالث والعشرين:
items.english: 5. Reciting this supplication specific to the twenty-third night:
items.transliteration: 5. Yad'u bi-hadha al-du'a'i al-khassi bi-laylati al-thalithi wa-al-'ishrina:

items.arabic: يا رَبَّ لَيْلَةِ الْقَدْرِ وَجاعِلَها خَيْراً مِنْ الْفِ شَهْرٍ، وَرَبَّ اللَّيْلِ وَالنَّهارِ، وَالْجِبالِ وَالْبِحارِ، وَالظُّلَمِ والْأَنْوارِ، وَالْأَرْضِ وَالسَّمآءِ، يا بارِئُ يا مُصَوِّرُ، يا حَنَّانُ يا مَنَّانُ، يا اللَّهُ يا رَحْمنُ، يا اللَّهُ يا قَيُّومُ، يا اللَّهُ يا بَديعُ، يا اللَّهُ يا اللَّهُ يا اللَّهُ، لَكَ الْأَسْمآءُ الْحُسْنى وَالْأَمْثالُ الْعُلْيا، وَالْكِبْرِيآءُ وَالْألاءُ، اسْئَلُكَ انْ تُصَلِّىَ عَلى مُحَمَّدٍ وَآلِ مُحَمَّدٍ، وَانْ تَجْعَلَ اسْمى فى هذِهِ اللَّيْلَةِ فِى السُّعَدآءِ، وَرُوحى مَعَ
items.english: O Lord of the Night of Power and its Appointer as better than a thousand months; and Lord of the night and the day, the mountains and the seas, the darknesses and the lights, and the earth and the heaven. O Originator, O Fashioner; O Most Affectionate, O Bestower of Favors; O Allah, O Most Merciful; O Allah, O Self-Subsisting; O Allah, O Inimitable Creator; O Allah, O Allah, O Allah! To You belong the Most Beautiful Names, the loftiest examples, grandeur, and bounties. I ask You to bless Muhammad and the family of Muhammad, and to place my name on this night among the felicitous, and my soul with
items.transliteration: Ya Rabba laylati al-Qadri wa-ja'ilaha khayran min alfi shahrin, wa-Rabba al-layli wa-al-nahari, wa-al-jibali wa-al-bihari, wa-al-zulami wa-al-anwari, wa-al-ardi wa-al-sama'i, ya Bari'u ya Musawwiru, ya Hannanu ya Mannanu, ya Allahu ya Rahmanu, ya Allahu ya Qayyumu, ya Allahu ya Badi'u, ya Allahu ya Allahu ya Allahu, laka al-asma'u al-husna wa-al-amthalu al-'ulya, wa-al-kibriya'u wa-al-ala'u, as'aluka an tusalliya 'ala Muhammadin wa-ali Muhammadin, wa-an taj'ala ismi fi hadhihi al-laylati fi al-su'ada'i, wa-ruhi ma'a

items.transliteration: 5. Yad'u bi-hadha al-du'a'i al-khassi bi-laylati al-thalithi wa-al-'ishrina:

items.arabic: يا رَبَّ لَيْلَةِ الْقَدْرِ وَجاعِلَها خَيْراً مِنْ الْفِ شَهْرٍ، وَرَبَّ اللَّيْلِ وَالنَّهارِ، وَالْجِبالِ وَالْبِحارِ، وَالظُّلَمِ والْأَنْوارِ، وَالْأَرْضِ وَالسَّمآءِ، يا بارِئُ يا مُصَوِّرُ، يا حَنَّانُ يا مَنَّانُ، يا اللَّهُ يا رَحْمنُ، يا اللَّهُ يا قَيُّومُ، يا اللَّهُ يا بَديعُ، يا اللَّهُ يا اللَّهُ يا اللَّهُ، لَكَ الْأَسْمآءُ الْحُسْنى وَالْأَمْثالُ الْعُلْيا، وَالْكِبْرِيآءُ وَالْألاءُ، اسْئَلُكَ انْ تُصَلِّىَ عَلى مُحَمَّدٍ وَآلِ مُحَمَّدٍ، وَانْ تَجْعَلَ اسْمى فى هذِهِ اللَّيْلَةِ فِى السُّعَدآءِ، وَرُوحى مَعَ
items.english: O Lord of the Night of Power and its Appointer as better than a thousand months; and Lord of the night and the day, the mountains and the seas, the darknesses and the lights, and the earth and the heaven. O Originator, O Fashioner; O Most Affectionate, O Bestower of Favors; O Allah, O Most Merciful; O Allah, O Self-Subsisting; O Allah, O Incomparable Creator; O Allah, O Allah, O Allah. To You belong the Most Beautiful Names, the most sublime examples, grandeur, and bounties. I ask You to bless Muhammad and the family of Muhammad, and to place my name on this night among the felicitous, and my soul with
items.transliteration: Ya Rabba laylati al-Qadri wa-ja'ilaha khayran min alfi shahrin, wa-Rabba al-layli wa-al-nahari, wa-al-jibali wa-al-bihari, wa-al-zulami wa-al-anwari, wa-al-ardi wa-al-sama'i, ya Bari'u ya Musawwiru, ya Hannanu ya Mannanu, ya Allahu ya Rahmanu, ya Allahu ya Qayyumu, ya Allahu ya Badi'u, ya Allahu ya Allahu ya Allahu, laka al-asma'u al-husna wa-al-amthalu al-'ulya, wa-al-kibriya'u wa-al-ala'u, as'aluka an tusalliya 'ala Muhammadin wa-ali Muhammadin, wa-an taj'ala ismi fi hadhihi al-laylati fi al-su'ada'i, wa-ruhi ma'a

items.arabic: الشُّهَدآءِ، وَاحْسانى فى عِلِّيّينَ، وَاسائَتى مَغْفُورَةً، وَانْ تَهَبَ لى يَقيناً تُباشِرُ بِهِ قَلْبى وَايماناً يُذهِبُ الشَّكَّ عَنّى وَتُرْضِيَنى بِما قَسَمْتَ لى وَ اتِنا فِى الدُّنْيا حَسَنَةً، وَفِى الْأخِرَةِ حَسَنَةً، وَقِنا عَذابَ النَّارِ الْحَريقِ، وَارْزُقْنى فيها ذِكْرَكَ وَشُكْرَكَ، وَالرَّغْبَةَ الَيْكَ، وَالْإِنابَةَ والتَّوْبَةَ، والتَّوْفيقَ لِما وَفَّقْتَ لَهُ مُحَمَّداً وَآلَ مُحَمَّدٍ عَلَيْهِمُ السَّلامُ .
items.english: the martyrs, and my good deeds in Illiyyin, and my misdeeds forgiven; and that You grant me a certainty that touches my heart and a faith that removes doubt from me, and make me content with what You have apportioned for me. And grant us good in this world and good in the Hereafter, and protect us from the punishment of the burning Fire. And grant me therein Your remembrance, gratitude to You, longing for You, turning to You, and repentance; and the success for that which You granted success to Muhammad and the family of Muhammad, peace be upon them.
items.transliteration: al-shuhada'i, wa-ihsani fi 'illiyyina, wa-isa'ati maghfuratan, wa-an tahaba li yaqinan tubashiru bihi qalbi wa-imanan yudhibu al-shakka 'anni wa-turdiyani bima qasamta li wa-atina fi al-dunya hasanatan, wa-fi al-akhirati hasanatan, wa-qina 'adhaba al-nari al-hariqi, wa-arzuqni fiha dhikraka wa-shukraka, wa-al-raghbata ilayka, wa-al-inabata wa-al-tawbata, wa-al-tawfiqa lima waffaqta lahu Muhammadan wa-ala Muhammadin 'alayhimu al-salamu.

items.arabic: 6. يدعو بالدعاء المرويّ عن الإمام الصادق عليه السلام:
items.english: 6. Reciting the supplication narrated from Imam al-Sadiq, peace be upon him:
items.transliteration: 6. Yad'u bi-al-du'a'i al-marwiyyi 'an al-Imami al-Sadiqi 'alayhi al-salamu:

items.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ اجْعَلْ فيما تَقْضى وَفيما تُقَدِّرُ مِنَ الْأَمْرِالْمَحْتُومِ، وَفيما تَفْرُقُ مِنَ الْأَمْرِ الْحَكيمِ، فى لَيْلَةِ الْقَدْرِ، مِنَ الْقَضآءِ الَّذى لا يُرَدُّ وَلا يُبَدَّلُ، انْ تَكْتُبَنى مِنْ حُجَّاجِ بَيْتِكَ الْحَرامِ فى عامى هذَا، الْمَبْرُورِ حَجُّهُمْ، الْمَشْكُورِ سَعْيُهُمْ، الْمَغْفُورِ ذُنُوبُهُمْ، الْمُكَفَّرِ عَنْهُمْ سَيِّئاتُهُمْ، وَاجْعَلْ فيما تَقْضى وَتُقَدِّرُ، انْ تُطيلَ عُمْرى وَتُوَسِّعَ لى فى رِزْقى .
items.english: O Allah, grant that among what You decree and ordain of the inevitable matter, and among what You distinguish of the wise matter on the Night of Power—of the decree that is neither overturned nor changed—that You record me among the pilgrims of Your Sacred House in this year of mine, whose pilgrimage is accepted, whose effort is appreciated, whose sins are forgiven, and whose evil deeds are expiated. And grant that among what You decree and ordain, You prolong my life and expand for me my sustenance.
items.transliteration: Allahumma ij'al fima taqdi wa-fima tuqaddiru mina al-amri al-mahtumi, wa-fima tafruqu mina al-amri al-hakimi, fi laylati al-Qadri, mina al-qada'i al-ladhi la yuraddu wa-la yubaddalu, an taktubani min hujjaji baytika al-harami fi 'ami hadha, al-mabruri hajjuhum, al-mashkuri sa'yuhum, al-maghfuri dhunubuhum, al-mukaffari 'anhum sayyi'atuhum, wa-ij'al fima taqdi wa-tuqaddiru, an tutila 'umri wa-tuwassi'a li fi rizqi.

items.arabic: 7. يدعو بالدعاء المرويّ عن الحسن عليه السلام:
items.english: 7. Reciting the supplication narrated from al-Hasan, peace be upon him:
items.transliteration: 7. Yad'u bi-al-du'a'i al-marwiyyi 'an al-Hasani 'alayhi al-salamu:

items.arabic: يا باطِناً فى ظُهُورِهِ، وَيا ظاهِراً فى بُطُونِهِ، وَيا باطِناً لَيْسَ يَخْفى وَيا ظاهِراً لَيْسَ يُرى يا مَوْصُوفاً لا يَبْلُغُ بِكَيْنُونَتِهِ مَوْصُوفٌ، وَلا حَدٌّ مَحْدُودٌ، وَيا غآئِباً غَيْرَ مَفْقُودٍ، وَيا شاهِداً غَيْرَ مَشْهُودٍ، يُطْلَبُ فَيُصابُ، وَلَمْ يَخْلُ مِنْهُ السَّمواتُ وَالْأَرْضُ وَما بَيْنَهُما طَرْفَةَ عَيْنٍ، لا يُدْرَكُ بِكَيْفٍ، وَلا يُؤَيَّنُ بِايْنٍ وَلا بِحَيْثٍ، انْتَ نُورُ النُّورِ، وَرَبُّ الْأَرْبابِ، احَطْتَ بِجَميعِ الْأُمُورِ، سُبْحانَ مَنْ لَيْسَ كَمِثْلِهِ شَىْ ءٌ، وَهُوَ السَّميعُ الْبَصيرُ، سُبْحانَ مَنْ هُوَ هكَذا، وَلا هكَذا غَيْرُهُ .
items.english: O Hidden in His manifestation, and O Manifest in His hiddenness; O Hidden who is not concealed, and O Manifest who is not seen. O Described One whose essence no description can reach, nor any defined limit. O Absent who is not missing, and O Witness who is not witnessed. He is sought and found, and the heavens and the earth and all that is between them are not empty of Him for the blink of an eye. He is not perceived by "how," nor localized by "where" or "place." You are the Light of light and the Lord of lords. You have encompassed all matters. Glory be to Him like whom there is nothing, and He is the All-Hearing, the All-Seeing. Glory be to Him who is thus, and none other than Him is thus.
items.transliteration: Ya batinan fi zuhurihi, wa-ya zahiran fi butunihi, wa-ya batinan laysa yakhfa, wa-ya zahiran laysa yura, ya mawsufan la yablughu bi-kaynunatihi mawsufun, wa-la haddun mahdudun, wa-ya gha'iban ghayra mafqudin, wa-ya shahidan ghayra mashhudin, yutlabu fa-yusabu, wa-lam yakhu minhu al-samawatu wa-al-ardu wa-ma baynahuma tarfata 'aynin, la yudraku bi-kayfin, wa-la yu'ayyanu bi-aynin wa-la bi-haythin, anta nuru al-nuri, wa-rabbu al-arbabi, ahatta bi-jami'i al-umuri, subhana man laysa ka-mithlihi shay'un, wa-huwa al-sami'u al-basiru, subhana man huwa hakadha, wa-la hakadha ghayruhu.

footnote_refs.title: المصدر السابق؛ جاء في بحار الأنوار: ج 95، ص 165 أنّ عليّ بن الحسين عليهما السلام كان يدعو به في ليلة القدر.

items.arabic: الشُّهَدآءِ، وَاحْسانى فى عِلِّيّينَ، وَاسائَتى مَغْفُورَةً، وَانْ تَهَبَ لى يَقيناً تُباشِرُ بِهِ قَلْبى وَايماناً يُذهِبُ الشَّكَّ عَنّى وَتُرْضِيَنى بِما قَسَمْتَ لى وَ اتِنا فِى الدُّنْيا حَسَنَةً، وَفِى الْأخِرَةِ حَسَنَةً، وَقِنا عَذابَ النَّارِ الْحَريقِ، وَارْزُقْنى فيها ذِكْرَكَ وَشُكْرَكَ، وَالرَّغْبَةَ الَيْكَ، وَالْإِنابَةَ والتَّوْبَةَ، والتَّوْفيقَ لِما وَفَّقْتَ لَهُ مُحَمَّداً وَآلَ مُحَمَّدٍ عَلَيْهِمُ السَّلامُ .
items.english: the martyrs, and my good deeds in Illiyyin, and my misdeeds forgiven; and that You grant me a certainty that touches my heart and a faith that removes doubt from me, and make me content with what You have apportioned for me. And grant us good in this world and good in the Hereafter, and protect us from the punishment of the burning Fire; and grant me therein Your remembrance, Your gratitude, the longing for You, turning in penitence, and repentance, and the success for that which You granted success to Muhammad and the family of Muhammad, peace be upon them.
items.transliteration: al-shuhada'i, wa-ihsani fi 'illiyyina, wa-isa'ati maghfuratan, wa-an tahaba li yaqinan tubashiru bihi qalbi wa-imanan yudhibu al-shakka 'anni wa-turdiyani bima qasamta li wa-atina fi al-dunya hasanatan, wa-fi al-akhirati hasanatan, wa-qina 'adhaba al-nari al-hariqi, wa-arzuqni fiha dhikraka wa-shukraka, wa-al-raghbata ilayka, wa-al-inabata wa-al-tawbata, wa-al-tawfiqa lima waffaqta lahu Muhammadan wa-ala Muhammadin 'alayhimu al-salamu.

footnote_refs.title: وردت كلمة« النّار» في مصباح المتهجّد.
الكافي: ج 4، ص 161؛ مصباح المتهجّد: ص 629.

items.arabic: 6. يدعو بالدعاء المرويّ عن الإمام الصادق عليه السلام:
items.english: 6. Reciting the supplication narrated from Imam al-Sadiq, peace be upon him:
items.transliteration: 6. Yad'u bi-al-du'a'i al-marwiyyi 'an al-Imami al-Sadiqi 'alayhi al-salamu:

items.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ اجْعَلْ فيما تَقْضى وَفيما تُقَدِّرُ مِنَ الْأَمْرِالْمَحْتُومِ، وَفيما تَفْرُقُ مِنَ الْأَمْرِ الْحَكيمِ، فى لَيْلَةِ الْقَدْرِ، مِنَ الْقَضآءِ الَّذى لا يُرَدُّ وَلا يُبَدَّلُ، انْ تَكْتُبَنى مِنْ حُجَّاجِ بَيْتِكَ الْحَرامِ فى عامى هذَا، الْمَبْرُورِ حَجُّهُمْ، الْمَشْكُورِ سَعْيُهُمْ، الْمَغْفُورِ ذُنُوبُهُمْ، الْمُكَفَّرِ عَنْهُمْ سَيِّئاتُهُمْ، وَاجْعَلْ فيما تَقْضى وَتُقَدِّرُ، انْ تُطيلَ عُمْرى وَتُوَسِّعَ لى فى رِزْقى .
items.english: O Allah, grant that among what You decree and ordain of the inevitable matter, and among what You distinguish of the wise matter on the Night of Power—of the decree that is neither overturned nor changed—that You record me among the pilgrims of Your Sacred House in this year of mine, whose pilgrimage is accepted, whose efforts are appreciated, whose sins are forgiven, and whose evil deeds are expiated. And grant that among what You decree and ordain, that You extend my life and expand my sustenance for me.
items.transliteration: Allahumma ij'al fima taqdi wa-fima tuqaddiru mina al-amri al-mahtumi, wa-fima tafruqu mina al-amri al-hakimi, fi laylati al-Qadri, mina al-qada'i al-ladhi la yuraddu wa-la yubaddalu, an taktubani min hujjaji baytika al-harami fi 'ami hadha, al-mabruri hajjuhum, al-mashkuri sa'yuhum, al-maghfuri dhunubuhum, al-mukaffari 'anhum sayyi'atuhum, wa-ij'al fima taqdi wa-tuqaddiru, an tutila 'umri wa-tuwassi'a li fi rizqi.

items.arabic: 7. يدعو بالدعاء المرويّ عن الحسن عليه السلام:
items.english: 7. Reciting the supplication narrated from al-Hasan, peace be upon him:
items.transliteration: 7. Yad'u bi-al-du'a'i al-marwiyyi 'an al-Hasani 'alayhi al-salamu:

items.arabic: يا باطِناً فى ظُهُورِهِ، وَيا ظاهِراً فى بُطُونِهِ، وَيا باطِناً لَيْسَ يَخْفى وَيا ظاهِراً لَيْسَ يُرى يا مَوْصُوفاً لا يَبْلُغُ بِكَيْنُونَتِهِ مَوْصُوفٌ، وَلا حَدٌّ مَحْدُودٌ، وَيا غآئِباً غَيْرَ مَفْقُودٍ، وَيا شاهِداً غَيْرَ مَشْهُودٍ، يُطْلَبُ فَيُصابُ، وَلَمْ يَخْلُ مِنْهُ السَّمواتُ وَالْأَرْضُ وَما بَيْنَهُما طَرْفَةَ عَيْنٍ، لا يُدْرَكُ بِكَيْفٍ، وَلا يُؤَيَّنُ بِايْنٍ وَلا بِحَيْثٍ، انْتَ نُورُ النُّورِ، وَرَبُّ الْأَرْبابِ، احَطْتَ بِجَميعِ الْأُمُورِ، سُبْحانَ مَنْ لَيْسَ كَمِثْلِهِ شَىْ ءٌ، وَهُوَ السَّميعُ الْبَصيرُ، سُبْحانَ مَنْ هُوَ هكَذا، وَلا هكَذا غَيْرُهُ .
items.english: O Hidden in His manifestation, and O Manifest in His hiddenness; O Hidden who is not concealed, and O Manifest who is not seen. O Described One whose essence no description can reach, nor any defined limit. O Absent who is not missing, and O Witness who is not witnessed. He is sought and found, and the heavens and the earth and whatever is between them are not devoid of Him for the blink of an eye. He is not perceived by a "how," nor localized by a "where" or a "place." You are the Light of light, and the Lord of lords. You have encompassed all matters. Glory be to Him like whom there is nothing, and He is the All-Hearing, the All-Seeing. Glory be to Him who is thus, and none other than Him is thus.
items.transliteration: Ya batinan fi zuhurihi, wa-ya zahiran fi butunihi, wa-ya batinan laysa yakhfa, wa-ya zahiran laysa yura, ya mawsufan la yablughu bi-kaynunatihi mawsufun, wa-la haddun mahdudun, wa-ya gha'iban ghayra mafqudin, wa-ya shahidan ghayra mashhudin, yutlabu fa-yusabu, wa-lam yakhlu minhu al-samawatu wa-al-ardu wa-ma baynahuma tarfata 'aynin, la yudraku bi-kayfin, wa-la yu'ayyanu bi-aynin wa-la bi-haythin, anta nuru al-nuri, wa-rabbu al-arbabi, ahatta bi-jami'i al-umuri, subhana man laysa ka-mithlihi shay'un, wa-huwa al-sami'u al-basiru, subhana man huwa hakadha, wa-la hakadha ghayruhu.

footnote_refs.title: المصدر السابق؛ جاء في بحار الأنوار: ج 95، ص 165 أنّ عليّ بن الحسين عليهما السلام كان يدعو به في ليلة القدر.

items.arabic: ثمّ تدعو بما تشاء.
items.english: Then supplicate for whatever you wish.
items.transliteration: Thumma tad'u bi-ma tasha'u.

items.arabic: 8. وروي عن المعصومين عليهم السلام الدعاء ليلة الثالث والعشرين من رمضان ساجداً وقائماً وقاعداً وعلى كلّ حال وفي الشهر كلّه وتقول بعد تمجيده تعالى والصلاة على نبيّه صلى الله عليه و آله بالقول: «
items.english: 8. It is narrated from the Infallibles, peace be upon them, to supplicate on the twenty-third night of Ramadan—while prostrating, standing, sitting, and in every state—and throughout the entire month, saying after glorifying Him, the Exalted, and invoking blessings upon His Prophet, peace be upon him and his progeny: “
items.transliteration: 8. Wa-ruwiya 'an al-ma'sumina 'alayhim al-salamu al-du'a'u laylata al-thalithi wa-al-'ishrina min Ramadana sajidan wa-qa'iman wa-qa'idan wa-'ala kulli halin wa-fi al-shahri kullihi wa-taqulu ba'da tamjidihi ta'ala wa-al-salati 'ala nabiyyihi salla Allahu 'alayhi wa-alihi bi-al-qawli: "

items.arabic: الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ وَالصَّلاةُ عَلى رَسُولِ اللَّهِ وَآلِهِ الطَّاهِرينَ
items.english: Praise be to Allah, and blessings be upon the Messenger of Allah and his pure Family.
items.transliteration: Al-hamdu li-llahi wa-al-salatu 'ala Rasuli Allahi wa-alihi al-tahirina.

items.arabic: »: اللهُمَّ كُنْ لِوَلِيِّكَ الْحُجَّةِ بْنِ الْحَسَنِ، صَلَواتُكَ عَلَيْهِ وَعَلى ابآئِهِ، فى هذِهِ السَّاعَةِ، وَفى كُلِّ ساعَةٍ، وَلِيّاً وَحافِظاً، وَقآئِداً وَناصِراً، وَدَليلًا وَعَيْناً، حَتّى تُسْكِنَهُ ارْضَكَ طَوْعاً، وَتُمَتِّعَهُ فيها طَويلًا .
items.english: O Allah, be for Your Wali, al-Hujjah, son of al-Hasan—Your blessings be upon him and upon his forefathers—in this hour and in every hour, a guardian and a protector, a leader and a helper, a guide and a watcher, until You settle him on Your earth willingly and grant him long life therein.
items.transliteration: Allahumma kun li-waliyyika al-Hujjati bni al-Hasani, salawatuka 'alayhi wa-'ala aba'ihi, fi hadhihi al-sa'ati, wa-fi kulli sa'atin, waliyyan wa-hafizan, wa-qa'idan wa-nasiran, wa-dalilan wa-'aynan, hatta tuskinahu ardaka taw'an, wa-tumatti'ahu fiha tawilan.

footnote_refs.title: مصباح المتهجّد: ص 630؛ مصباح الكفعمي: ص 586( باختلاف يسير).

items.arabic: 9. يدعو بهذا الدعاء رافعاً يديه إلى السماء:
items.english: 9. Reciting this supplication while raising his hands toward the heaven:
items.transliteration: 9. Yad'u bi-hadha al-du'a'i rafi'an yadayhi ila al-sama'i:

items.arabic: يا مُدَبِّرَ الْأُمُورِ، يا باعِثَ مَنْ فِى الْقُبُورِ، يا مُجْرِىَ الْبُحُورِ، يا مُلَيِّنَ الْحَدِيدِ لِداوُدَ، صَلِّ عَلى مُحَمَّدٍ وَآلِ مُحَمَّدٍ، وَافْعَلْ بى كَذا وَكَذا. وتسأل حاجتك
items.english: O Director of all affairs; O Resurrector of those in the graves; O Causer of the seas to flow; O Softener of iron for Dawud; bless Muhammad and the family of Muhammad, and do for me such and such. (And ask for your need).
items.transliteration: Ya mudabbira al-umuri, ya ba'itha man fi al-quburi, ya mujriya al-buhuri, ya mulayyina al-hadidi li-Dawuda, salli 'ala Muhammadin wa-ali Muhammadin, wa-if'al bi kadha wa-kadha. Wa-tas'alu hajataka.

items.arabic: اللَّيْلَةَ اللَّيْلَةَ
items.english: Tonight, tonight.
items.transliteration: al-laylata al-laylata.

items.arabic: ، السَّاعَةَ السَّاعَةَ
items.english: This moment, this moment.
items.transliteration: , al-sa'ata al-sa'ata.

items.arabic: وادع به راكعاً وساجداً وقائماً وقاعداً .
items.english: And supplicate with it while bowing, prostrating, standing, and sitting.
items.transliteration: Wa-ud'u bihi raki'an wa-sajidan wa-qa'iman wa-qa'idan.

footnote_refs.title: من لايحضره الفقيه: ج 2، ص 162؛ بحار الأنوار: ج 95، ص 70.

items.arabic: 10. للغسل في هذه الليلة وإحيائها وزيارة الحسين عليه السلام في هذه الليلة والصلاة مائة ركعة فضل كبير.
items.english: 10. There is great merit in performing ghusl on this night, observing its vigil, visiting al-Husayn, peace be upon him, on this night, and praying one hundred rak’ahs.
items.transliteration: 10. Li-al-ghusli fi hadhihi al-laylati wa-ihya'iha wa-ziyarati al-Husayni 'alayhi al-salamu fi hadhihi al-laylati wa-al-salati mi'ati rak'atin fadlun kabirun.

items.arabic: روى الشيخ الطوسي في «التهذيب» عن أبي بصير قال لي الصادق عليه السلام: «
items.english: Al-Shaykh al-Tusi narrated in *al-Tahdhib* from Abu Basir, who said: Al-Sadiq, peace be upon him, said to me: “
items.transliteration: Rawa al-Shaykhu al-Tusiyyu fi «al-Tahdhibi» 'an Abi Basirin qala li al-Sadiqu 'alayhi al-salamu: «

items.arabic: صَلِّ فِي اللَّيْلَةِ الَّتي يُرْجى أنْ تَكُونَ لَيْلَةَ القَدْرِ مائَةَ رَكْعَة تَقْرَأ في كُلِّ رَكْعَةٍ بعد الحَمد «قُل هُوَ اللَّهُ أحَدٌ» عَشْر مَرّات
items.english: Pray one hundred rak’ahs on the night which is hoped to be the Night of Power, reciting in every rak’ah after al-Hamd, Surah al-Ikhlas ten times.”
items.transliteration: Salli fi al-laylati al-lati yurja an takuna laylata al-Qadri mi'ata rak'atin taqra'u fi kulli rak'atin ba'da al-Hamdi «Qul huwa Allahu ahadun» 'ashra marratin.

items.arabic: ». قال: فإن لم أقو عليها قائماً؟ قال: «
items.english: ” He said: “And if I am not strong enough for them standing?” He said: “
items.transliteration: ». Qala: fa-in lam aqwa 'alayha qa'iman? Qala: «

items.arabic: صَلِّها جالساً
items.english: Pray them sitting.
items.transliteration: Salliha jalisan.

items.arabic: ». قلت: فإن لم أقو؟ قال: «
items.english: I said: “And if I am not strong enough?” He said: “
items.transliteration: ». Qultu: fa-in lam aqwa? Qala: «

items.arabic: أدِّها وأنْتَ مُسْتَلْقٍ في فِرَاشِكَ» .
items.english: Perform them while lying in your bed.”
items.transliteration: Addiha wa-anta mustalqin fi firashika».

items.arabic: چ چ-
items.transliteration: cha cha-

items.arabic: 11. يقول المرحوم «العلّامة المجلسيّ» في «زاد المعاد»: «اتلُ القرآن في هذه الليلة مهما تمكّنت، واستفد من أدعية الصحّيفةالسجّادية» وبالأخصّ من دعاء مكارم الأخلاق ودعاء التوبة.
items.english: 11. The late al-Allamah al-Majlisi says in *Zad al-Ma’ad*: “Recite the Qur’an on this night as much as you are able, and benefit from the supplications of *al-Sahifah al-Sajjadiyyah*, especially the Supplication of Noble Moral Traits and the Supplication of Repentance.”
items.transliteration: 11. Yaqulu al-marhumu «al-'Allamatu al-Majlisiyyu» fi «Zadi al-Ma'adi»: «Utlu al-Qur'ana fi hadhihi al-laylati mahma tamakkanta, wa-stafid min ad'iyati al-Sahifati al-Sajjadiyyati» wa-bi-al-akhassi min du'a'i makarimi al-akhlaqi wa-du'a'i al-tawbati.

items.arabic: ثمّ تدعو بما تشاء.
items.english: Then supplicate for whatever you wish.
items.transliteration: Thumma tad'u bi-ma tasha'u.

items.arabic: 8. وروي عن المعصومين عليهم السلام الدعاء ليلة الثالث والعشرين من رمضان ساجداً وقائماً وقاعداً وعلى كلّ حال وفي الشهر كلّه وتقول بعد تمجيده تعالى والصلاة على نبيّه صلى الله عليه و آله بالقول: «

items.transliteration: 8. Wa-ruwiya 'an al-ma'sumina 'alayhim al-salamu al-du'a'u laylata al-thalithi wa-al-'ishrina min Ramadana sajidan wa-qa'iman wa-qa'idan wa-'ala kulli halin wa-fi al-shahri kullihi wa-taqulu ba'da tamjidihi ta'ala wa-al-salati 'ala nabiyyihi salla Allahu 'alayhi wa-alihi bi-al-qawli: «

items.arabic: الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ وَالصَّلاةُ عَلى رَسُولِ اللَّهِ وَآلِهِ الطَّاهِرينَ
items.english: Praise be to Allah, and blessings be upon the Messenger of Allah and his pure Family.
items.transliteration: Al-hamdu li-llahi wa-al-salatu 'ala Rasuli Allahi wa-alihi al-tahirina.

items.arabic: »: اللهُمَّ كُنْ لِوَلِيِّكَ الْحُجَّةِ بْنِ الْحَسَنِ، صَلَواتُكَ عَلَيْهِ وَعَلى ابآئِهِ، فى هذِهِ السَّاعَةِ، وَفى كُلِّ ساعَةٍ، وَلِيّاً وَحافِظاً، وَقآئِداً وَناصِراً، وَدَليلًا وَعَيْناً، حَتّى تُسْكِنَهُ ارْضَكَ طَوْعاً، وَتُمَتِّعَهُ فيها طَويلًا .
items.english: O Allah, be for Your Wali, al-Hujjah, son of al-Hasan—Your blessings be upon him and upon his forefathers—in this hour and in every hour, a guardian and a protector, a leader and a helper, a guide and a watcher, until You settle him on Your earth willingly and grant him long life therein.
items.transliteration: Allahumma kun li-waliyyika al-Hujjati bni al-Hasani, salawatuka 'alayhi wa-'ala aba'ihi, fi hadhihi al-sa'ati, wa-fi kulli sa'atin, waliyyan wa-hafizan, wa-qa'idan wa-nasiran, wa-dalilan wa-'aynan, hatta tuskinahu ardaka taw'an, wa-tumatti'ahu fiha tawilan.

footnote_refs.title: مصباح المتهجّد: ص 630؛ مصباح الكفعمي: ص 586( باختلاف يسير).

items.arabic: 9. يدعو بهذا الدعاء رافعاً يديه إلى السماء:
items.english: 9. Reciting this supplication while raising his hands toward the heaven:
items.transliteration: 9. Yad'u bi-hadha al-du'a'i rafi'an yadayhi ila al-sama'i:

items.arabic: يا مُدَبِّرَ الْأُمُورِ، يا باعِثَ مَنْ فِى الْقُبُورِ، يا مُجْرِىَ الْبُحُورِ، يا مُلَيِّنَ الْحَدِيدِ لِداوُدَ، صَلِّ عَلى مُحَمَّدٍ وَآلِ مُحَمَّدٍ، وَافْعَلْ بى كَذا وَكَذا. وتسأل حاجتك
items.english: O Director of all affairs; O Resurrector of those in the graves; O Causer of the seas to flow; O Softener of iron for Dawud; bless Muhammad and the family of Muhammad, and do for me such and such. (And ask for your need).
items.transliteration: Ya mudabbira al-umuri, ya ba'itha man fi al-quburi, ya mujriya al-buhuri, ya mulayyina al-hadidi li-Dawuda, salli 'ala Muhammadin wa-ali Muhammadin, wa-if'al bi kadha wa-kadha. Wa-tas'alu hajataka.

items.arabic: اللَّيْلَةَ اللَّيْلَةَ
items.english: Tonight, tonight.
items.transliteration: al-laylata al-laylata.

items.arabic: ، السَّاعَةَ السَّاعَةَ
items.english: This moment, this moment.
items.transliteration: , al-sa'ata al-sa'ata.

items.arabic: وادع به راكعاً وساجداً وقائماً وقاعداً .
items.english: And supplicate with it while bowing, prostrating, standing, and sitting.
items.transliteration: Wa-ud'u bihi raki'an wa-sajidan wa-qa'iman wa-qa'idan.

footnote_refs.title: من لايحضره الفقيه: ج 2، ص 162؛ بحار الأنوار: ج 95، ص 70.

items.arabic: 10. للغسل في هذه الليلة وإحيائها وزيارة الحسين عليه السلام في هذه الليلة والصلاة مائة ركعة فضل كبير.
items.english: 10. There is great merit in performing ghusl on this night, observing its vigil, visiting al-Husayn, peace be upon him, on this night, and praying one hundred rak’ahs.
items.transliteration: 10. Li-al-ghusli fi hadhihi al-laylati wa-ihya'iha wa-ziyarati al-Husayni 'alayhi al-salamu fi hadhihi al-laylati wa-al-salati mi'ati rak'atin fadlun kabirun.

items.arabic: روى الشيخ الطوسي في «التهذيب» عن أبي بصير قال لي الصادق عليه السلام: «
items.english: Al-Shaykh al-Tusi narrated in *al-Tahdhib* from Abu Basir, who said: Al-Sadiq, peace be upon him, said to me: “
items.transliteration: Rawa al-Shaykhu al-Tusiyyu fi «al-Tahdhibi» 'an Abi Basirin qala li al-Sadiqu 'alayhi al-salamu: «

items.arabic: صَلِّ فِي اللَّيْلَةِ الَّتي يُرْجى أنْ تَكُونَ لَيْلَةَ القَدْرِ مائَةَ رَكْعَة تَقْرَأ في كُلِّ رَكْعَةٍ بعد الحَمد «قُل هُوَ اللَّهُ أحَدٌ» عَشْر مَرّات
items.english: Pray one hundred rak’ahs on the night which is hoped to be the Night of Power, reciting in every rak’ah after al-Hamd, Surah al-Ikhlas ten times.
items.transliteration: Salli fi al-laylati al-lati yurja an takuna laylata al-Qadri mi'ata rak'atin taqra'u fi kulli rak'atin ba'da al-Hamdi «Qul huwa Allahu ahadun» 'ashra marratin.

items.arabic: ». قال: فإن لم أقو عليها قائماً؟ قال: «
items.english: ” He said: “And if I am not strong enough for them standing?” He said: “
items.transliteration: ». Qala: fa-in lam aqwa 'alayha qa'iman? Qala: «

items.arabic: صَلِّها جالساً
items.english: Pray them sitting.
items.transliteration: Salliha jalisan.

items.arabic: ». قلت: فإن لم أقو؟ قال: «
items.english: ” I said: “And if I am not strong enough?” He said: “
items.transliteration: ». Qultu: fa-in lam aqwa? Qala: «

items.arabic: أدِّها وأنْتَ مُسْتَلْقٍ في فِرَاشِكَ» .
items.english: Perform them while lying in your bed.”
items.transliteration: Addiha wa-anta mustalqin fi firashika».

items.arabic: چ چ-
items.transliteration: cha cha-

items.arabic: 11. يقول المرحوم «العلّامة المجلسيّ» في «زاد المعاد»: «اتلُ القرآن في هذه الليلة مهما تمكّنت، واستفد من أدعية الصحّيفةالسجّادية» وبالأخصّ من دعاء مكارم الأخلاق ودعاء التوبة.
items.english: 11. The late al-Allamah al-Majlisi says in *Zad al-Ma’ad*: “Recite the Qur’an on this night as much as you are able, and benefit from the supplications of *al-Sahifah al-Sajjadiyyah*, especially the Supplication of Noble Moral Traits and the Supplication of Repentance.”
items.transliteration: 11. Yaqulu al-marhumu «al-'Allamatu al-Majlisiyyu» fi «Zadi al-Ma'adi»: «Utlu al-Qur'ana fi hadhihi al-laylati mahma tamakkanta, wa-stafid min ad'iyati al-Sahifati al-Sajjadiyyati» wa-bi-al-akhassi min du'a'i Makarimi al-Akhlaqi wa-du'a'i al-Tawbati.

items.arabic: ويجب احترام ليالي القدر والإنشغال بالدعاء، وقد ورد في أحاديث كثيرة أنّ يوم القدر له من الفضيلة كليله.
items.english: It is incumbent to venerate the Nights of Power and occupy oneself with supplication; it has been narrated in many traditions that the Day of Power possesses merit equal to its night.
items.transliteration: Wa-yajibu ihtiramu layali al-Qadri wa-al-inshighalu bi-al-du'a'i, wa-qad warada fi ahadithin kathiratin anna yawma al-Qadri lahu min al-fadilati ka-laylihi.

items.arabic: ويجب احترام ليالي القدر والإنشغال بالدعاء، وقد ورد في أحاديث كثيرة أنّ يوم القدر له من الفضيلة كليله.
items.english: It is incumbent to venerate the Nights of Power and occupy oneself with supplication; it has been narrated in many traditions that the Day of Power possesses merit equal to its night.
items.transliteration: Wa-yajibu ihtiramu layali al-Qadri wa-al-inshighalu bi-al-du'a'i, wa-qad warada fi ahadithin kathiratin anna yawma al-Qadri lahu min al-fadilati ka-laylihi.

items.title: أدعية الليالي العشر الأخيرة لشهر رمضان المبارك

items.arabic: أدعية هذه الليالي نوعان؛ الأدعية المشتركة لكلّ هذه الليالي يدعى بها في كلّ ليلة من الليالي العشر الأخيرة، والأدعية الخاصّة بكلّ ليلة.
items.english: The supplications of these nights are of two types: the common supplications for all these nights, which are recited on every night of the last ten nights, and the specific supplications for each night.
items.transliteration: Ad'iyatu hadhihi al-layali naw'ani; al-ad'iyatu al-mushtarakatu li-kulli hadhihi al-layali yud'a biha fi kulli laylatin min al-layali al-'ashri al-akhirati, wa-al-ad'iyatu al-khassatu bi-kulli laylatin.

items.arabic: أدعية هذه الليالي نوعان؛ الأدعية المشتركة لكلّ هذه الليالي يدعى بها في كلّ ليلة من الليالي العشر الأخيرة، والأدعية الخاصّة بكلّ ليلة.

items.arabic: 1. روى المرحوم الكليني في الكافي عن الإمام الصادق عليه السلام: «
items.english: The late al-Kulayni narrated in *al-Kafi* from Imam al-Sadiq, peace be upon him: “
items.transliteration: 1. Rawa al-marhumu al-Kulayniyyu fi «al-Kafi» 'an al-Imami al-Sadiqi 'alayhi al-salamu: «

items.arabic: ادْعُ كُلَّ لَيْلَةٍ فِي العَشْرِ الأخِيرَةِ لِشَهْرِ رَمَضانَ بهذا الدُّعاء
items.english: Supplicate on every night of the last ten nights of the month of Ramadan with this supplication:
items.transliteration: Ud'u kulla laylatin fi al-'ashri al-akhirati li-shahri Ramadana bi-hadha al-du'a'i.

items.arabic: »: اعُوذُ بِجَلالِ وَجْهِكَ الْكَريمِ، أنْ يَنْقَضِىَ عَنّى شَهْرُ رَمَضانَ، اوْ يَطْلُعَ الْفَجْرُ مِنْ لَيْلَتى هذِهِ، وَلَكَ قِبَلى ذَنْبٌ اوْ تَبِعَةٌ تُعَذِّبُنى عَلَيْهِ .
items.english: I seek refuge in the Majesty of Your Noble Countenance from the month of Ramadan passing away from me, or the dawn of this night of mine breaking, while there remains against me a sin or a consequence for which You would punish me.
items.transliteration: »: A'udhu bi-jalali wajhika al-karimi, an yanqadiya 'anni shahru Ramadana, aw yatlu'a al-fajru min laylati hadhihi, wa-laka qibali dhanbun aw tabi'atun tu'adhdhibuni 'alayhi.

items.arabic: 2. روى المرحوم الكفعمي في حاشية البلد الأمين أنّ الإمام الصادق عليه السلام كان يدعو عقب كلّ فريضة ونافلة في العشر الأخيرة بهذا الدعاء:
items.english: 2. The late al-Kaf‘ami narrated in the marginalia of *al-Balad al-Amin* that Imam al-Sadiq, peace be upon him, used to supplicate after every obligatory and supererogatory prayer in the last ten nights with this supplication:
items.transliteration: 2. Rawa al-marhumu al-Kaf'amiyyu fi hashiyati al-Baladi al-Amini anna al-Imama al-Sadiqa 'alayhi al-salamu kana yad'u 'aqiba kulli faridatin wa-nafilatin fi al-'ashri al-akhirati bi-hadha al-du'a'i:

items.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ ادِّ عَنَّا حَقَّ ما مَضى مِنْ شَهْرِ رَمَضانَ، وَاغْفِرْلَنا تَقْصيرَنا فيهِ، وَتَسَلَّمْهُ مِنَّا مَقْبُولًا، وَلا تُؤاخِذْنا بِاسْرافِنا عَلى انْفُسِنا، وَاجْعَلْنا مِنَ الْمَرْحُومينَ، وَلا تَجْعَلْنا مِنَ الْمَحْرُومينَ .
items.english: O Allah, fulfill on our behalf the rights of what has passed of the month of Ramadan, forgive us our shortcomings therein, and receive it from us with acceptance. Do not hold us to account for our excesses against our souls, and include us among those who are granted mercy, and do not include us among the deprived.
items.transliteration: Allahumma addi 'anna haqqa ma mada min shahri Ramadana, wa-ghfir lana taqsirana fihi, wa-tasallamhu minna maqbulan, wa-la tu'akhidhna bi-israfina 'ala anfusina, wa-j'alna min al-marhumina, wa-la taj'alna min al-mahrumina.

footnote_refs.title: مفاتيح الجنان: أعمال ليالي العشرة الأخيرة من شهر رمضان.

items.arabic: 3. وروى السيّد ابن طاووس في الاقبال إنّ الإمام الصادق عليه السلام كان يدعو كلّ ليلة في العشر الأخيرة بهذا الدعاء:
items.english: 3. Al-Sayyid Ibn Tawus narrated in *al-Iqbal* that Imam al-Sadiq, peace be upon him, used to supplicate on every night of the last ten nights with this supplication:
items.transliteration: 3. Wa-rawa al-Sayyidu Ibnu Tawusin fi «al-Iqbali» inna al-Imama al-Sadiqa 'alayhi al-salamu kana yad'u kulla laylatin fi al-'ashri al-akhirati bi-hadha al-du'a'i:

items.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ انَّكَ قُلْتَ فِى كِتابِكَ الْمُنْزَلِ، شَهْرُ رَمَضانَ الَّذى انْزِلَ فيهِ الْقُرْانُ، هُدىً
items.english: O Allah, indeed You have said in Your revealed Book: “The month of Ramadan in which was revealed the Qur’an, a guidance...”
items.transliteration: Allahumma innaka qulta fi kitabika al-munzali, shahru Ramadana al-ladhi unzila fihi al-Qur'anu, hudan.

items.arabic: لِلنَّاسِ وَبَيِّناتٍ مِنَ الْهُدى وَالْفُرْقانِ، فَعَظَّمْتَ حُرْمَةَ شَهْرِ رَمَضانَ بِما انْزَلْتَ فيهِ مِنَ الْقُرْانِ، وَخَصَصْتَهُ بِلَيْلَةِ الْقَدْرِ، وَجَعَلْتَها خَيْراً مِنْ الْفِ شَهْرٍ، اللهُمَّ وَهذِهِ ايَّامُ شَهْرِ رَمَضانَ قَدِ انْقَضَتْ، وَلَياليهِ قَدْ تَصَرَّمَتْ، وَقَدْ صِرْتُ يا الهى مِنْهُ الى ما انْتَ اعْلَمُ بِهِ مِنّى وَاحْصى لِعَدَدِهِ مِنَ الْخَلْقِ اجْمَعينَ، فَاسْئَلُكَ بِما سَئَلَكَ بِهِ مَلائِكَتُكَ الْمُقَرَّبُونَ، وَانْبِيآؤُكَ الْمُرْسَلُونَ، وَعِبادُكَ الصَّالِحُونَ، انْ تُصَلِّىَ عَلى مُحَمَّدٍ وَآلِ مُحَمَّدٍ، وَانْ تَفُكَّ رَقَبَتى مِنَ النَّارِ، وَتُدْخِلَنِى الْجَنَّةَ بِرَحْمَتِكَ، وَانْ تَتَفَضَّلَ عَلىَّ بِعَفْوِكَ وَكَرَمِكَ، وَتَتَقَبَّلَ تَقَرُّبى وَتَسْتَجيبَ دُعآئى وَتَمُنَّ عَلَىَّ بِالْأَمْنِ يَوْمَ الْخَوْفِ مِنْ كُلِّ هَوْلٍ اعْدَدْتَهُ لِيَوْمِ الْقِيامَةِ، الهى وَاعُوذُ بِوَجْهِكَ الْكَريمِ، وَبِجَلالِكَ الْعَظيمِ، انْ يَنْقَضِىَ ايَّامُ شَهْرِ رَمَضانَ وَلَياليهِ، وَلَكَ قِبَلى تَبِعَةٌ اوْ ذَنْبٌ تُؤاخِذُنى بِهِ، اوْ خَطيئَةٌ تُريدُ انْ تَقْتَصَّها مِنّى لَمْ تَغْفِرْها لى سَيِّدى سَيِّدى سَيِّدى اسْئَلُكَ يا لا الهَ الَّا انْتَ، اذْ لا الهَ الَّا انْتَ، انْ كُنْتَ رَضيتَ عَنّى فى هذَا الشَّهْرِ، فَازْدَدْ عَنّى رِضاً، وَانْ لَمْ تَكُنْ رَضيتَ عَنّى فَمِنَ الْأنَ فَارْضَ عَنّى يا ارْحَمَ الرَّاحِمينَ، يا اللَّهُ يا احَدُ يا صَمَدُ، يا مَنْ لَمْ يَلِدْ وَلَمْ يُولَدْ، وَلَمْ يَكُنْ لَهُ كُفُواً احَدٌ. وأكثر من قول: يا مُلَيِّنَ الْحَديدِ لِداوُدَ عَلَيْهِ السَّلامُ، يا كاشِفَ الضُّرِّ وَالْكُرَبِ الْعِظامِ عَنْ ايُّوبَ عَلَيْهِ السَّلامُ، اىْ مُفَرِّجَ هَمِّ يَعْقُوبَ عَلَيْهِ السَّلامُ، اىْ مُنَفِّسَ غَمِّ يُوسُفَ عَلَيْهِ السَّلامُ، صَلِّ عَلى مُحَمَّدٍ وَآلِ مُحَمَّدٍ، كَما انْتَ اهْلُهُ انْ تُصَلِّىَ عَلَيْهِمْ اجْمَعينَ، وَافْعَلْ بى ما انْتَ اهْلُهُ، وَلا تَفْعَلْ بى ما انَا اهْلُهُ .
items.english: ...for mankind and clear proofs of guidance and the criterion. Thus, You have magnified the sanctity of the month of Ramadan by what You revealed in it of the Qur’an, and You singled it out with the Night of Power, and made it better than a thousand months. O Allah, these days of the month of Ramadan have indeed passed, and its nights have elapsed, and I have reached, O my God, a state within it that You know better than I, and which You have more precisely counted than all of creation. So I ask You by that which Your proximate angels, Your sent prophets, and Your righteous servants have asked of You: that You send blessings upon Muhammad and the progeny of Muhammad, that You release my neck from the Fire, and admit me into Paradise by Your mercy; that You favor me with Your pardon and Your generosity, accept my seeking of nearness, answer my supplication, and bestow upon me security on the Day of Fear from every terror You have prepared for the Day of Resurrection. My God, I seek refuge in Your Noble Countenance and Your Great Majesty from the days and nights of the month of Ramadan passing away while there remains against me a consequence or a sin for which You would hold me to account, or a transgression for which You intend to penalize me and which You have not forgiven me. My Master, my Master, my Master! I ask You, O He besides whom there is no god—since there is no god but You—that if You are pleased with me in this month, then increase Your pleasure with me; and if You are not pleased with me, then from this moment be pleased with me, O Most Merciful of the merciful! O Allah! O One! O Eternal Refuge! O He who neither begets nor is born, and there is none co-equal to Him!” And frequently say: “O Softener of iron for Dawud, peace be upon him; O Remover of harm and great distress from Ayyub, peace be upon him; O Dispeller of the worry of Ya’qub, peace be upon him; O Reliever of the grief of Yusuf, peace be upon him; send blessings upon Muhammad and the progeny of Muhammad, as You are worthy of blessing them all; and deal with me as You are worthy of dealing, and do not deal with me as I am worthy of being dealt with.”
items.transliteration: li-al-nasi wa-bayyinatin min al-huda wa-al-furqani, fa-'azzamta hurmata shahri Ramadana bi-ma anzalta fihi min al-Qur'ani, wa-khassastahu bi-laylati al-Qadri, wa-ja'altaha khayran min alfi shahrin, Allahumma wa-hadhihi ayyamu shahri Ramadana qad inqadat, wa-layalihu qad tasarramat, wa-qad sirtu ya ilahi minhu ila ma anta a'lamu bihi minni wa-ahsa li-'adadihi min al-khalqi ajma'ina, fa-as'aluka bi-ma sa'alaka bihi mala'ikatuka al-muqarrabuna, wa-anbiya'uka al-mursaluna, wa-'ibaduka al-salihuna, an tusalliya 'ala Muhammadin wa-ali Muhammadin, wa-an tafukka raqabati min al-nari, wa-tudkhilani al-jannata bi-rahmatika, wa-an tatafaddala 'alayya bi-'afwika wa-karamika, wa-tataqabbala taqarrubi wa-tastajiba du'a'i wa-tamunna 'alayya bi-al-amni yawma al-khawfi min kulli hawlin a'dadtahu li-yawmi al-qiyamati, ilahi wa-a'udhu bi-wajhika al-karimi, wa-bi-jalalika al-'azimi, an yanqadiya ayyamu shahri Ramadana wa-layalihu, wa-laka qibali tabi'atun aw dhanbun tu'akhidhuni bihi, aw khatiatun turidu an taqtassaha minni lam taghfir-ha li, sayyidi sayyidi sayyidi as'aluka ya la ilaha illa anta, idh la ilaha illa anta, in kunta radita 'anni fi hadha al-shahri, fa-izdad 'anni ridan, wa-in lam takun radita 'anni fa-min al-ana fa-irda 'anni ya arhama al-rahimina, ya Allahu ya ahadu ya samadu, ya man lam yalid wa-lam yulad, wa-lam yakun lahu kufuwan ahadun. Wa-akthir min qawli: Ya mulayyina al-hadidi li-Dawuda 'alayhi al-salamu, ya kashifa al-durri wa-al-kurabi al-'izami 'an Ayyuba 'alayhi al-salamu, ay mufarrija hammi Ya'quba 'alayhi al-salamu, ay munaffisa ghammi Yusufa 'alayhi al-salamu, salli 'ala Muhammadin wa-ali Muhammadin, kama anta ahluhu an tusalliya 'alayhim ajma'ina, wa-if'al bi ma anta ahluhu, wa-la taf'al bi ma ana ahluhu.

items.english:
...for mankind and clear proofs of guidance and the criterion. Thus, You have magnified the sanctity of the month of Ramadan by what You revealed in it of the Qur’an, and You singled it out with the Night of Power, and made it better than a thousand months. O Allah, these days of the month of Ramadan have indeed passed, and its nights have reached their end; and I have reached, O my God, a state within it which You know better than I, and which You have more accurately recorded than all of creation combined. So I ask You by that which Your archangels, Your sent messengers, and Your righteous servants have asked You: that You send blessings upon Muhammad and the progeny of Muhammad, and that You release my neck from the Fire, admit me into Paradise by Your mercy, bestow Your grace upon me through Your pardon and generosity, accept my seeking of nearness, answer my supplication, and favor me with security on the Day of Fear from every terror You have prepared for the Day of Resurrection. My God, I seek refuge in Your Noble Countenance and Your Great Majesty from the days and nights of the month of Ramadan passing away while there remains against me a consequence or a sin for which You would hold me to account, or a transgression for which You intend to exact retribution from me and which You have not forgiven me. My Master, my Master, my Master! I ask You, O One whom there is no god but You—for there is no god but You—if You are pleased with me in this month, then increase Your pleasure with me; and if You are not pleased with me, then from this very moment be pleased with me, O Most Merciful of the merciful! O Allah! O One! O Eternal Refuge! O He who neither begets nor is born, and there is none co-equal to Him!

And repeat often: O Softener of iron for Dawood, peace be upon him; O Remover of harm and great distress from Ayyub, peace be upon him; O Reliever of the worry of Ya'qub, peace be upon him; O Dispeller of the grief of Yusuf, peace be upon him; bless Muhammad and the progeny of Muhammad as You are worthy of blessing them all; and deal with me as You are worthy of dealing, and do not deal with me as I am deserving of.

items.arabic: دعاء الليلة الثانية والعشرون:
items.english: Supplication for the Twenty-Second Night:
items.transliteration: Du'a'u al-laylati al-thaniyati wa-al-'ishruna:

items.arabic: يا سالِخَ النَّهارِ مِنَ اللَّيْلِ فَاذا نَحْنُ مُظْلِمُونَ، وَمُجْرِىَ الشَّمْسِ لِمُسْتَقَرِّها بِتَقْديرِكَ، يا عَزيزُ يا عَليمُ، وَمُقَدِّرَالْقَمَرِ مَنازِلَ حَتّى عادَ كَالْعُرْجُونِ الْقَديمِ، يا نُورَ كُلِّ نُورٍ، وَمُنْتَهى كُلِّ رَغْبَةٍ، وَوَلِىَّ كُلِّ نِعْمَةٍ، يا اللَّهُ يا رَحْمنُ، يا اللَّهُ يا قُدُّوسُ، يا احَدُ يا واحِدُ يا فَرْدُ، يا اللَّهُ يا اللَّهُ يا اللَّهُ، لَكَ الْأَسْمآءُ الْحُسْنى وَالْأَمْثالُ الْعُلْيا، وَالْكِبْرِياءُ وَالْألاءُ، اسْئَلُكَ انْ تُصَلِّىَ عَلى مُحَمَّدٍ وَاهْلِ بَيْتِهِ، وَانْ تَجْعَلَ اسْمى فى هذِهِ اللَّيْلَةِ فِى السُّعَدآءِ، وَرُوحى مَعَ الشُّهَدآءِ، وَاحْسانى فى عِلِّيّينَ، وَاسآئَتى مَغْفُورَةً، وَانْ تَهَبَ لى يَقيناً تُباشِرُ بِهِ قَلْبى وَايماناً يُذْهِبُ الشَّكَّ عَنّى وَتُرْضِيَنى بِما قَسَمْتَ لى وَ اتِنا فِى الدُّنْيا حَسَنةً، وَفِى الْاخِرَةِ حَسَنَةً، وَقِنا عَذابَ النَّارِ الْحَريقِ، وَارْزُقْنى فيها ذِكْرَكَ وَشُكْرَكَ، وَالرَّغَبَةَ الَيْكَ وَالْإِنابَةَ، وَالتَّوْفيقَ لِما وَفَّقْتَ لَهُ مُحَمَّداً وَآلَ مُحَمَّدٍ عَلَيْهِمُ السَّلامُ .
items.english: O You Who strips the day from the night, so that we are in darkness, and Who causes the sun to run its course to its appointed place by Your decree—O All-Mighty, O All-Knowing—and Who ordained phases for the moon until it returns like an old withered date-stalk. O Light of all light, O Ultimate End of every desire, O Guardian of every blessing! O Allah, O Most Merciful, O Allah, O All-Holy, O One, O Unique, O Singular, O Allah, O Allah, O Allah! To You belong the Most Beautiful Names, the Most Sublime Examples, Greatness, and Bounties. I ask You to bless Muhammad and his Household, and that You place my name on this night among the felicitous, my soul with the martyrs, my good deeds in Illiyyin, and that my misdeeds be forgiven. And grant me a certainty that touches my heart, and a faith that removes doubt from me, and make me content with what You have allotted for me. Grant us good in this world and good in the Hereafter, and protect us from the punishment of the Burning Fire. Grant me therein Your remembrance, gratitude to You, yearning for You, and turning to You in repentance, and the success for that which You granted success to Muhammad and the family of Muhammad, peace be upon them.

items.arabic: دعاء الليلة الرابعة والعشرون:
items.english: Supplication for the Twenty-Fourth Night:
items.transliteration: Du'a'u al-laylati al-rabi'ati wa-al-'ishruna:

items.arabic: يا فالِقَ الْإِصْباحِ، وَجاعِلَ اللَّيْلِ سَكَناً، وَالشَّمْسَ وَالْقَمَرَ حُسْباناً، يا عَزيزُ يا عَليمُ، يا ذَاالْمَنِّ وَالطَّوْلِ، وَالْقُوَّةِ وَالْحَوْلِ، وَالْفَضْلِ والْإِنْعامِ، وَالْجَلالِ وَالْإِكْرامِ، يا اللَّهُ يا رَحْمنُ، يا اللَّهُ يا فَرْدُ يا وِتْرُ، يا اللَّهُ يا ظاهِرُ يا باطِنُ، يا حَىُّ لا الهَ الَّا انْتَ، لَكَ الْأَسْمآءُ الْحُسْنى وَالْأَمْثالُ الْعُلْيا، وَالْكِبْرِيآءُ وَالْألاءُ، اسْئَلُكَ انْ تُصَلِّىَ عَلى مُحَمَّدٍ وَآلِ مُحَمَّدٍ، وَانْ تَجْعَلَ اسْمى فى هذِهِ اللَّيْلَةِ فِى السُّعَدآءِ، وَرُوحى مَعَ الشُّهَدآءِ، وَاحْسانى فى عِلِّيّينَ، وَاسائَتى مَغْفُورَةً، وَانْ تَهَبَ لى يَقيناً تُباشِرُ
items.english: O Splitter of the dawn, and Appointer of the night for rest, and the sun and the moon for reckoning. O All-Mighty, O All-Knowing. O Possessor of favor and bounty, and power and might, and grace and bestowal, and majesty and honor. O Allah, O All-Merciful. O Allah, O Peerless, O Unique. O Allah, O Manifest, O Hidden. O Ever-Living, there is no god but You. To You belong the Most Beautiful Names, the most sublime examples, greatness, and blessings. I ask You to send blessings upon Muhammad and the progeny of Muhammad, and that You place my name on this night among the felicitous, my soul with the martyrs, my good deeds in the highest stations, my misdeeds forgiven, and that You grant me a certainty that stays close...
items.transliteration: Ya faliqa al-isbahi, wa-ja'ila al-layli sakanan, wa-al-shamsa wa-al-qamara husbanan, ya 'Azizu ya 'Alimu, ya dha al-manni wa-al-tawli, wa-al-quwwati wa-al-hawli, wa-al-fadli wa-al-in'ami, wa-al-jalali wa-al-ikrami, ya Allahu ya Rahmanu, ya Allahu ya fardu ya witru, ya Allahu ya zahiru ya batinu, ya hayyu la ilaha illa anta, laka al-asma'u al-husna wa-al-amthalu al-'ulya, wa-al-kibriya'u wa-al-ala'u, as'aluka an tusalliya 'ala Muhammadin wa-ali Muhammadin, wa-an taj'ala ismi fi hadhihi al-laylati fi al-su'ada'i, wa-ruhi ma'a al-shuhada'i, wa-ihsani fi 'illiyyina, wa-isa'ati maghfuratan, wa-an tahaba li yaqinan tubashiru.

items.arabic: دعاء الليلة الثانية والعشرون:
items.english: Supplication for the Twenty-Second Night:
items.transliteration: Du'a'u al-laylati al-thaniyati wa-al-'ishruna:

items.arabic: يا سالِخَ النَّهارِ مِنَ اللَّيْلِ فَاذا نَحْنُ مُظْلِمُونَ، وَمُجْرِىَ الشَّمْسِ لِمُسْتَقَرِّها بِتَقْديرِكَ، يا عَزيزُ يا عَليمُ، وَمُقَدِّرَالْقَمَرِ مَنازِلَ حَتّى عادَ كَالْعُرْجُونِ الْقَديمِ، يا نُورَ كُلِّ نُورٍ، وَمُنْتَهى كُلِّ رَغْبَةٍ، وَوَلِىَّ كُلِّ نِعْمَةٍ، يا اللَّهُ يا رَحْمنُ، يا اللَّهُ يا قُدُّوسُ، يا احَدُ يا واحِدُ يا فَرْدُ، يا اللَّهُ يا اللَّهُ يا اللَّهُ، لَكَ الْأَسْمآءُ الْحُسْنى وَالْأَمْثالُ الْعُلْيا، وَالْكِبْرِياءُ وَالْألاءُ، اسْئَلُكَ انْ تُصَلِّىَ عَلى مُحَمَّدٍ وَاهْلِ بَيْتِهِ، وَانْ تَجْعَلَ اسْمى فى هذِهِ اللَّيْلَةِ فِى السُّعَدآءِ، وَرُوحى مَعَ الشُّهَدآءِ، وَاحْسانى فى عِلِّيّينَ، وَاسآئَتى مَغْفُورَةً، وَانْ تَهَبَ لى يَقيناً تُباشِرُ بِهِ قَلْبى وَايماناً يُذْهِبُ الشَّكَّ عَنّى وَتُرْضِيَنى بِما قَسَمْتَ لى وَ اتِنا فِى الدُّنْيا حَسَنةً، وَفِى الْاخِرَةِ حَسَنَةً، وَقِنا عَذابَ النَّارِ الْحَريقِ، وَارْزُقْنى فيها ذِكْرَكَ وَشُكْرَكَ، وَالرَّغَبَةَ الَيْكَ وَالْإِنابَةَ، وَالتَّوْفيقَ لِما وَفَّقْتَ لَهُ مُحَمَّداً وَآلَ مُحَمَّدٍ عَلَيْهِمُ السَّلامُ .
items.english: O You Who strips the day from the night, so that we are in darkness, and Who causes the sun to run its course to its appointed place by Your decree—O All-Mighty, O All-Knowing—and Who ordained phases for the moon until it returns like an old withered date-stalk. O Light of every light, O Ultimate End of every desire, and O Patron of every blessing. O Allah, O All-Merciful. O Allah, O All-Holy. O Unique, O One, O Peerless. O Allah, O Allah, O Allah. To You belong the Most Beautiful Names, the loftiest examples, grandeur, and bounties. I beseech You to bless Muhammad and his household, and to place my name on this night among the felicitous, my soul with the martyrs, my good deeds in Illiyyin, and let my misdeeds be forgiven. Grant me a certainty that touches my heart, and a faith that removes all doubt from me, and make me content with what You have apportioned for me. Grant us good in this world and good in the Hereafter, and protect us from the punishment of the Burning Fire. Bestow upon me therein Your remembrance, Your gratitude, yearning for You, and turning to You in repentance, and the success to attain that which You granted success to Muhammad and the family of Muhammad, peace be upon them.
items.transliteration: Ya salikha al-nahari mina al-layli fa-idha nahnu muzlimuna, wa-mujriya al-shamsi li-mustaqarriha bi-taqdirika, ya 'Azizu ya 'Alimu, wa-muqaddira al-qamari manazila hatta 'ada ka-al-'urjuni al-qadimi, ya nura kulli nurin, wa-muntaha kulli raghbatin, wa-waliyya kulli ni'matin, ya Allahu ya Rahmanu, ya Allahu ya Quddusu, ya Ahadu ya Wahidu ya Fardu, ya Allahu ya Allahu ya Allahu, laka al-asma'u al-husna wa-al-amthalu al-'ulya, wa-al-kibriya'u wa-al-ala'u, as'aluka an tusalliya 'ala Muhammadin wa-ahli baytihi, wa-an taj'ala ismi fi hadhihi al-laylati fi al-su'ada'i, wa-ruhi ma'a al-shuhada'i, wa-ihsani fi 'illiyyina, wa-isa'ati maghfuratan, wa-an tahaba li yaqinan tubashiru bihi qalbi wa-imanan yudhhibu al-shakka 'anni wa-turdiyani bi-ma qasamta li wa-atina fi al-dunya hasanatan, wa-fi al-akhirati hasanatan, wa-qina 'adhaba al-nari al-hariqi, wa-rzuqni fiha dhikraka wa-shukraka, wa-al-raghbata ilayka wa-al-inabata, wa-al-tawfiqa li-ma waffaqta lahu Muhammadan wa-ala Muhammadin 'alayhimu al-salamu.

items.arabic: بِهِ قَلْبى وَايماناً يُذْهِبُ الشَّكَّ عَنّى وَرِضىً بِما قَسَمْتَ لى وَ اتِنا فِى الدُّنْيا حَسَنَةً، وَ فِى الْأخِرَةِ حَسَنَهً، وَقِنا عَذابَ النَّارِ الْحَريقِ، وَارْزُقْنى فيها ذِكْرَكَ وَشُكْرَكَ، وَالرَّغْبَةَ الَيْكَ، وَالْإنابَةَ وَالتَّوْبَهَ، وَالتَّوْفيقَ لِما وَفَّقْتَ لَهُ مُحَمَّداً وَآلَ مُحَمَّدٍ، صَلَواتُكَ عَلَيْهِ وَعَلَيْهِمْ .

Grant us good in this world and good in the Hereafter, and protect us from the punishment of the burning Fire. Grant me therein Your remembrance, gratitude to You, longing for You, turning to You, repentance, and the success for that which You granted success to Muhammad and the family of Muhammad, Your blessings be upon him and upon them.

items.arabic: دعاء الليلة الخامسة والعشرون:
items.english: Supplication for the Twenty-Fifth Night:
items.transliteration: Du'a'u al-laylati al-khamisati wa-al-'ishruna:

items.arabic: يا جاعِلَ اللَّيْلِ لِباساً، وَالنَّهارِ مَعاشاً، وَالْأَرْضِ مِهاداً، وَالْجِبالِ اوْتاداً، يا اللَّهُ يا قاهِرُ، يا اللَّهُ يا جَبَّارُ، يا اللَّهُ يا سَميعُ، يا اللَّهُ يا قَريبُ، يا اللَّهُ يا مُجيبُ، يا اللَّهُ يا اللَّهُ يا اللَّهُ، لَكَ الْأَسْمآءُ الْحُسْنى وَالْأَمْثالُ الْعُلْيا، وَالْكِبْرِياءُ وَالْألاءُ، اسْئَلُكَ انْ تُصَلِّىَ عَلى مُحَمَّدٍ وَآلِ مُحَمَّدٍ، وَانْ تَجْعَلَ اسْمى فى هذِهِ اللَّيْلَةِ فِى السُّعَدآءِ، وَرُوحى مَعَ الشُّهَدآءِ، وَاحْسانى فى عِلِّيّينَ، وَاسائَتى مَغْفُورَةً، وَانْ تَهَبَ لى يَقيناً تُباشِرُ بِهِ قَلْبى وَايماناً يُذْهِبُ الشَّكَّ عَنّى وَرِضىً بِما قَسَمْتَ لى وَ اتِنا فِى الدُّنْيا حَسَنَةً، وَفِى الْأخِرَةِ حَسَنَةً، وَقِنا عَذابَ النَّارِ الْحَريقِ، وَارْزُقْنى فيها ذِكْرَكَ وَشُكْرَكَ، وَالرَّغْبَةَ الَيْكَ، وَالْإِنابَةَ وَالتَّوْبَةَ، والتَّوْفيقَ لِما وَفَّقْتَ لَهُ مَحَمَّداً وَآلَ مُحَمَّدٍ عَلَيْهِمُ السَّلامُ .
items.english: O Maker of the night as a covering, and the day for livelihood, and the earth as an expanse, and the mountains as pegs. O Allah, O All-Subduer; O Allah, O All-Compeller; O Allah, O All-Hearing; O Allah, O All-Near; O Allah, O Responder. O Allah, O Allah, O Allah. To You belong the Most Beautiful Names, the loftiest examples, greatness, and bounties. I ask You to bless Muhammad and the family of Muhammad, and that You place my name on this night among the felicitous, and my soul with the martyrs, and my good deeds in the Illiyyin, and my misdeeds forgiven. And [I ask You] to grant me a certainty that directly touches my heart, and a faith that removes doubt from me, and contentment with what You have apportioned for me. Grant us good in this world and good in the Hereafter, and protect us from the punishment of the burning Fire. Grant me therein Your remembrance, gratitude to You, longing for You, turning to You, and repentance, and the success for that which You granted success to Muhammad and the family of Muhammad, peace be upon them.
items.transliteration: Ya ja'ila al-layli libasan, wa-al-nahari ma'ashan, wa-al-ardi mihadan, wa-al-jibali awtadan, ya Allahu ya Qahiru, ya Allahu ya Jabbaru, ya Allahu ya Sami'u, ya Allahu ya Qaribu, ya Allahu ya Mujibu, ya Allahu ya Allahu ya Allahu, laka al-asma'u al-husna wa-al-amthalu al-'ulya, wa-al-kibriya'u wa-al-ala'u, as'aluka an tusalliya 'ala Muhammadin wa-ali Muhammadin, wa-an taj'ala ismi fi hadhihi al-laylati fi al-su'ada'i, wa-ruhi ma'a al-shuhada'i, wa-ihsani fi 'illiyyina, wa-isa'ati maghfuratan, wa-an tahaba li yaqinan tubashiru bihi qalbi wa-imanan yudhhibu al-shakka 'anni wa-ridan bi-ma qasamta li, wa-atina fi al-dunya hasanatan, wa-fi al-akhirati hasanatan, wa-qina 'adhaba al-nari al-hariqi, wa-rzuqni fiha dhikraka wa-shukraka, wa-al-raghbata ilayka, wa-al-inabata wa-al-tawbata, wa-al-tawfiqa li-ma waffaqta lahu Muhammadan wa-ala Muhammadin 'alayhimu al-salamu.

items.arabic: دعاء الليلة السادسة والعشرون:
items.english: Supplication for the Twenty-Sixth Night:
items.transliteration: Du'a'u al-laylati al-sadisati wa-al-'ishruna:

items.arabic: يا جاعِلَ اللَّيْلِ وَالنَّهارِ ايَتَيْنِ، يا مَنْ مَحا ايَةَ اللَّيْلِ وَجَعَلَ ايَةَ النَّهارِ مُبْصِرَةً، لِتَبْتَغُوا فَضْلًا مِنْهُ وَرِضْواناً، يا مُفَصِّلَ كُلِّ شَىْ ءٍ تَفْصيلًا، يا ماجِدُ يا وَهَّابُ، يا اللَّهُ يا جَوادُ، يا اللَّهُ يا اللَّهُ يا اللَّهُ، لَكَ الْأَسْمآءُ الْحُسْنى وَالْأَمْثالُ الْعُلْيا، وَالْكِبْرِيآءُ وَالْألاءُ، اسْئَلُكَ انْ تُصَلِّىَ عَلى مُحَمَّدٍ وَآلِ مُحَمدٍ، وَانْ تَجْعَلَ اسْمى فى هذِهِ
items.english: O Maker of the night and the day as two signs; O You Who erased the sign of the night and made the sign of the day giving light, that you may seek bounty from Him and His pleasure; O You Who sets forth everything in distinct detail; O Magnificent, O All-Bestower; O Allah, O Generous; O Allah, O Allah, O Allah. To You belong the Most Beautiful Names, the loftiest examples, majesty, and favors. I ask You to bless Muhammad and the family of Muhammad, and that You place my name in this...
items.transliteration: Ya ja'ila al-layli wa-al-nahari ayatayni, ya man maha ayata al-layli wa-ja'ala ayata al-nahari mubsiratan, li-tabtaghu fadlan minhu wa-ridwanan, ya mufassila kulli shay'in tafsilan, ya Majidu ya Wahhabu, ya Allahu ya Jawadu, ya Allahu ya Allahu ya Allahu, laka al-asma'u al-husna wa-al-amthalu al-'ulya, wa-al-kibriya'u wa-al-ala'u, as'aluka an tusalliya 'ala Muhammadin wa-ali Muhammadin, wa-an taj'ala ismi fi hadhihi

items.arabic: بِهِ قَلْبى وَايماناً يُذْهِبُ الشَّكَّ عَنّى وَرِضىً بِما قَسَمْتَ لى وَ اتِنا فِى الدُّنْيا حَسَنَةً، وَ فِى الْأخِرَةِ حَسَنَهً، وَقِنا عَذابَ النَّارِ الْحَريقِ، وَارْزُقْنى فيها ذِكْرَكَ وَشُكْرَكَ، وَالرَّغْبَةَ الَيْكَ، وَالْإنابَةَ وَالتَّوْبَهَ، وَالتَّوْفيقَ لِما وَفَّقْتَ لَهُ مُحَمَّداً وَآلَ مُحَمَّدٍ، صَلَواتُكَ عَلَيْهِ وَعَلَيْهِمْ .
items.english: ...my heart, and a faith that removes doubt from me, and contentment with what You have apportioned for me. Grant us good in this world and good in the Hereafter, and protect us from the punishment of the burning Fire. Grant me therein Your remembrance, gratitude to You, longing for You, turning to You and repentance, and the success for that which You granted success to Muhammad and the family of Muhammad, Your blessings be upon him and upon them.
items.transliteration: bihi qalbi wa-imanan yudhhibu al-shakka 'anni wa-ridan bi-ma qasamta li, wa-atina fi al-dunya hasanatan, wa-fi al-akhirati hasanatan, wa-qina 'adhaba al-nari al-hariqi, wa-rzuqni fiha dhikraka wa-shukraka, wa-al-raghbata ilayka, wa-al-inabata wa-al-tawbata, wa-al-tawfiqa li-ma waffaqta lahu Muhammadan wa-ala Muhammadin, salawatuka 'alayhi wa-'alayhim.

items.arabic: دعاء الليلة الخامسة والعشرون:
items.english: Supplication for the Twenty-Fifth Night:
items.transliteration: Du'a'u al-laylati al-khamisati wa-al-'ishruna:

items.arabic: يا جاعِلَ اللَّيْلِ لِباساً، وَالنَّهارِ مَعاشاً، وَالْأَرْضِ مِهاداً، وَالْجِبالِ اوْتاداً، يا اللَّهُ يا قاهِرُ، يا اللَّهُ يا جَبَّارُ، يا اللَّهُ يا سَميعُ، يا اللَّهُ يا قَريبُ، يا اللَّهُ يا مُجيبُ، يا اللَّهُ يا اللَّهُ يا اللَّهُ، لَكَ الْأَسْمآءُ الْحُسْنى وَالْأَمْثالُ الْعُلْيا، وَالْكِبْرِياءُ وَالْألاءُ، اسْئَلُكَ انْ تُصَلِّىَ عَلى مُحَمَّدٍ وَآلِ مُحَمَّدٍ، وَانْ تَجْعَلَ اسْمى فى هذِهِ اللَّيْلَةِ فِى السُّعَدآءِ، وَرُوحى مَعَ الشُّهَدآءِ، وَاحْسانى فى عِلِّيّينَ، وَاسائَتى مَغْفُورَةً، وَانْ تَهَبَ لى يَقيناً تُباشِرُ بِهِ قَلْبى وَايماناً يُذْهِبُ الشَّكَّ عَنّى وَرِضىً بِما قَسَمْتَ لى وَ اتِنا فِى الدُّنْيا حَسَنَةً، وَفِى الْأخِرَةِ حَسَنَةً، وَقِنا عَذابَ النَّارِ الْحَريقِ، وَارْزُقْنى فيها ذِكْرَكَ وَشُكْرَكَ، وَالرَّغْبَةَ الَيْكَ، وَالْإِنابَةَ وَالتَّوْبَةَ، والتَّوْفيقَ لِما وَفَّقْتَ لَهُ مَحَمَّداً وَآلَ مُحَمَّدٍ عَلَيْهِمُ السَّلامُ .
items.english: O Maker of the night as a covering, and the day for livelihood, and the earth as an expanse, and the mountains as pegs. O Allah, O All-Subduer; O Allah, O All-Compeller; O Allah, O All-Hearing; O Allah, O All-Near; O Allah, O Responder. O Allah, O Allah, O Allah. To You belong the Most Beautiful Names, the highest parables, grandeur, and bounties. I ask You to bless Muhammad and the family of Muhammad, and to place my name on this night among the felicitous, my soul with the martyrs, my good deeds in the highest stations, and my misdeeds forgiven. And grant me a certainty that touches my heart, and a faith that removes doubt from me, and contentment with what You have apportioned for me. Grant us good in this world and good in the Hereafter, and protect us from the punishment of the burning Fire. Grant me therein Your remembrance, gratitude to You, longing for You, turning to You, and repentance, and the success for that which You granted success to Muhammad and the family of Muhammad, peace be upon them.
items.transliteration: Ya ja'ila al-layli libasan, wa-al-nahari ma'ashan, wa-al-ardi mihadan, wa-al-jibali awtadan, ya Allahu ya Qahiru, ya Allahu ya Jabbaru, ya Allahu ya Sami'u, ya Allahu ya Qaribu, ya Allahu ya Mujibu, ya Allahu ya Allahu ya Allahu, laka al-asma'u al-husna wa-al-amthalu al-'ulya, wa-al-kibriya'u wa-al-ala'u, as'aluka an tusalliya 'ala Muhammadin wa-ali Muhammadin, wa-an taj'ala ismi fi hadhihi al-laylati fi al-su'ada'i, wa-ruhi ma'a al-shuhada'i, wa-ihsani fi 'illiyyina, wa-isa'ati maghfuratan, wa-an tahaba li yaqinan tubashiru bihi qalbi wa-imanan yudhhibu al-shakka 'anni wa-ridan bi-ma qasamta li, wa-atina fi al-dunya hasanatan, wa-fi al-akhirati hasanatan, wa-qina 'adhaba al-nari al-hariqi, wa-rzuqni fiha dhikraka wa-shukraka, wa-al-raghbata ilayka, wa-al-inabata wa-al-tawbata, wa-al-tawfiqa li-ma waffaqta lahu Muhammadan wa-ali Muhammadin 'alayhimu al-salamu.

items.arabic: دعاء الليلة السادسة والعشرون:
items.english: Supplication for the Twenty-Sixth Night:
items.transliteration: Du'a'u al-laylati al-sadisati wa-al-'ishruna:

items.arabic: يا جاعِلَ اللَّيْلِ وَالنَّهارِ ايَتَيْنِ، يا مَنْ مَحا ايَةَ اللَّيْلِ وَجَعَلَ ايَةَ النَّهارِ مُبْصِرَةً، لِتَبْتَغُوا فَضْلًا مِنْهُ وَرِضْواناً، يا مُفَصِّلَ كُلِّ شَىْ ءٍ تَفْصيلًا، يا ماجِدُ يا وَهَّابُ، يا اللَّهُ يا جَوادُ، يا اللَّهُ يا اللَّهُ يا اللَّهُ، لَكَ الْأَسْمآءُ الْحُسْنى وَالْأَمْثالُ الْعُلْيا، وَالْكِبْرِيآءُ وَالْألاءُ، اسْئَلُكَ انْ تُصَلِّىَ عَلى مُحَمَّدٍ وَآلِ مُحَمدٍ، وَانْ تَجْعَلَ اسْمى فى هذِهِ
items.english: O Maker of the night and the day as two signs; O You Who erased the sign of the night and made the sign of the day giving light, that you may seek bounty from Him and His pleasure; O You Who sets forth everything in distinct detail; O Magnificent, O All-Bestower; O Allah, O Generous; O Allah, O Allah, O Allah. To You belong the Most Beautiful Names, the loftiest examples, greatness, and bounties. I ask You to bless Muhammad and the progeny of Muhammad, and to place my name in this
items.transliteration: Ya ja'ila al-layli wa-al-nahari ayatayni, ya man maha ayata al-layli wa-ja'ala ayata al-nahari mubsiratan, li-tabtaghu fadlan minhu wa-ridwanan, ya mufassila kulli shay'in tafsilan, ya Majidu ya Wahhabu, ya Allahu ya Jawadu, ya Allahu ya Allahu ya Allahu, laka al-asma'u al-husna wa-al-amthalu al-'ulya, wa-al-kibriya'u wa-al-ala'u, as'aluka an tusalliya 'ala Muhammadin wa-ali Muhammadin, wa-an taj'ala ismi fi hadhihi

items.arabic: اللَّيْلَةِ فِى السُّعَدآءِ، وَرُوحى مَعَ الشُّهَدآءِ، وَاحْسانى فى عِلِّيّينَ، وَاسآئَتى مَغْفُورَةً، وَانْ تَهَبَ لى يَقيناً تُباشِرُ بِهِ قَلْبى وَايماناً يُذْهِبُ الشَّكَّ عَنّى وَتُرضِيَنى بِما قَسَمْتَ لى وَاتِنا فِى الدُّنْيا حَسَنَةً، وَفِى الْأخِرَةِ حَسَنَةً، وَقِنا عَذابَ النَّارِ الْحَريقِ، وَارْزُقْنى فيها ذِكْرَكَ وَشُكْرَكَ، وَالرَّغْبَةَ الَيْكَ، وَالْإِنابَةَ وَالتَّوْبَةَ، وَالتَّوْفيقَ لِما وَفَّقْتَ لَهُ مُحَمَّداً وَآلَ مُحَمَّدٍ، صَلَّى اللَّهُ عَلَيْهِ وَعَلَيْهِمْ .
items.english: ...this night among the felicitous, and my soul with the martyrs, and my good deeds in ‘Illiyyin, and my misdeeds forgiven; and that You grant me a certainty that directly touches my heart, and a faith that removes doubt from me, and make me content with what You have apportioned for me. Grant us good in this world and good in the Hereafter, and protect us from the punishment of the burning Fire. Grant me therein Your remembrance, gratitude to You, longing for You, turning in penitence and repentance, and the success for that which You granted success to Muhammad and the Progeny of Muhammad, may Allah bless him and them.

items.arabic: دعاء الليلة السابعة والعشرون:
items.english: Supplication for the Twenty-Seventh Night:
items.transliteration: Du'a'u al-laylati al-sabi'ati wa-al-'ishruna:

items.arabic: يا مآدَّ الظِّلِّ وَلَوْ شِئْتَ لَجَعَلْتَهُ ساكِناً، وَجَعَلْتَ الشَّمْسَ عَلَيْهِ دَليلًا، ثُمَّ قَبَضْتَهُ الَيْكَ قَبْضاً يَسيراً، يا ذَا الْجُودِ وَالطَّوْلِ، وَالْكِبْرِيآءِ وَالْألاءِ، لا الهَ إلَّاانْتَ، عالِمُ الْغَيْبِ وَالشَّهادَةِ، الرَّحْمنُ الرَّحيمُ، لا إلهَ إلَّاانْتَ، يا قُدُّوسُ يا سَلامُ، يا مُؤْمِنُ يامُهَيْمِنُ، يا عَزيزُ ياجَبَّارُ يا مُتَكَبِّرُ، يا اللَّهُ يا خالِقُ، يا بارِئُ يا مُصَوِّرُ، يا اللَّهُ يا اللَّهُ يا اللَّهُ، لَكَ الْأَسْمآءُ الْحُسْنى وَالْأَمْثالُ الْعُلْيا، وَالْكِبْرِياءُ وَالْألاءُ، اسْئَلُكَ انْ تُصَلِّىَ عَلى مُحَمَّدٍ وَآلِ مُحَمَّدٍ، وَانْ تَجْعَلَ اسْمى فى هذِهِ اللَّيْلَةِ فِى السُّعَدآءِ، وَرُوحى مَعَ الشُّهَدآءِ، وَاحْسانى فى عِلِّيّينَ، وَاسآئَتى مَغْفُورَةً، وَانْ تَهَبَ لى يَقيناً تُباشِرُ بِهِ قَلْبى وَايماناً يُذْهِبُ الشَّكَّ عَنّى وَتُرْضِيَنى بِما قَسَمْتَ لى واتِنا فِى الدُّنْيا حَسَنَةً، وَفِى الْأخِرَةِ حَسَنَةً، وَقِنا عَذابَ النَّارِ الْحَريقِ، وَارْزُقْنى فيها ذِكْرَكَ وَشُكْرَكَ، وَالرَّغْبَةَ الَيْكَ وَالْإِنابَةَ وَالتَّوْبَةَ، وَالتَّوْفيقَ لِما وَفَّقْتَ لَهُ مَحَمَّداً وَآلَ مُحَمَّدٍ، صَلَّى اللَّهُ عَلَيْهِ وَعَلَيْهِمْ .
items.english: O Extender of the shade—and had You willed, You could have made it still—and You made the sun a guide for it, then You withdrew it to Yourself with an easy withdrawal. O Possessor of generosity and bounty, and majesty and favors. There is no god but You, Knower of the unseen and the seen, the All-Merciful, the All-Compassionate. There is no god but You. O Holy One, O Giver of Peace, O Granter of Security, O Guardian, O All-Mighty, O All-Compeller, O Supreme. O Allah, O Creator, O Maker, O Fashioner. O Allah, O Allah, O Allah. To You belong the Most Beautiful Names, the highest examples, and majesty and favors. I ask You to bless Muhammad and the family of Muhammad, and that You place my name in this night among the felicitous, and my soul with the martyrs, and my good deeds in ‘Illiyyin, and my misdeeds forgiven; and that You grant me a certainty that directly touches my heart, and a faith that removes doubt from me, and make me content with what You have apportioned for me. Grant us good in this world and good in the Hereafter, and protect us from the punishment of the burning Fire. Grant me therein Your remembrance, gratitude to You, longing for You, turning to You, and repentance, and the success for that which You granted success to Muhammad and the family of Muhammad, peace be upon him and upon them.
items.transliteration: Ya madda al-zilli wa-law shi'ta la-ja'altahu sakanan, wa-ja'alta al-shamsa 'alayhi dalilan, thumma qabadtahu ilayka qabdan yasiran, ya dha al-judi wa-al-tawli, wa-al-kibriya'i wa-al-ala'i, la ilaha illa anta, 'alimu al-ghaybi wa-al-shahadati, al-Rahmanu al-Rahimu, la ilaha illa anta, ya Quddusu ya Salamu, ya Mu'minu ya Muhayminu, ya 'Azizu ya Jabbaru ya Mutakabbiru, ya Allahu ya Khaliqu, ya Bari'u ya Musawwiru, ya Allahu ya Allahu ya Allahu, laka al-asma'u al-husna wa-al-amthalu al-'ulya, wa-al-kibriya'u wa-al-ala'u, as'aluka an tusalliya 'ala Muhammadin wa-ali Muhammadin, wa-an taj'ala ismi fi hadhihi al-laylati fi al-su'ada'i, wa-ruhi ma'a al-shuhada'i, wa-ihsani fi 'illiyyina, wa-isa'ati maghfuratan, wa-an tahaba li yaqinan tubashiru bihi qalbi wa-imanan yudhhibu al-shakka 'anni wa-turdiyani bi-ma qasamta li, wa-atina fi al-dunya hasanatan, wa-fi al-akhirati hasanatan, wa-qina 'adhaba al-nari al-hariqi, wa-rzuqni fiha dhikraka wa-shukraka, wa-al-raghbata ilayka wa-al-inabata wa-al-tawbata, wa-al-tawfiqa li-ma waffaqta lahu Muhammadan wa-ali Muhammadin, salla Allahu 'alayhi wa-'alayhim.

items.arabic: دعاء الليلة الثامنة والعشرون:
items.english: Supplication for the Twenty-Eighth Night:
items.transliteration: Du'a'u al-laylati al-thaminati wa-al-'ishruna:

items.arabic: يا خازِنَ اللَّيْلِ فِى الْهَوآءِ، وَخازِنَ النُّورِ فِى السَّمآءِ، وَمانِعَ السَّمآءِ أَنْ تَقَعَ عَلَى
items.english: O Storer of the night in the air, and Storer of the light in the sky, and Withholder of the sky from falling upon
items.transliteration: Ya khazina al-layli fi al-hawa'i, wa-khazina al-nuri fi al-sama'i, wa-mani'a al-sama'i an taqa'a 'ala

items.arabic: اللَّيْلَةِ فِى السُّعَدآءِ، وَرُوحى مَعَ الشُّهَدآءِ، وَاحْسانى فى عِلِّيّينَ، وَاسآئَتى مَغْفُورَةً، وَانْ تَهَبَ لى يَقيناً تُباشِرُ بِهِ قَلْبى وَايماناً يُذْهِبُ الشَّكَّ عَنّى وَتُرضِيَنى بِما قَسَمْتَ لى وَاتِنا فِى الدُّنْيا حَسَنَةً، وَفِى الْأخِرَةِ حَسَنَةً، وَقِنا عَذابَ النَّارِ الْحَريقِ، وَارْزُقْنى فيها ذِكْرَكَ وَشُكْرَكَ، وَالرَّغْبَةَ الَيْكَ، وَالْإِنابَةَ وَالتَّوْبَةَ، وَالتَّوْفيقَ لِما وَفَّقْتَ لَهُ مُحَمَّداً وَآلَ مُحَمَّدٍ، صَلَّى اللَّهُ عَلَيْهِ وَعَلَيْهِمْ .
items.english: ...this night among the felicitous, and my soul with the martyrs, and my good deeds in ‘Illiyyin, and my misdeeds forgiven; and that You grant me a certainty that directly touches my heart, and a faith that removes doubt from me, and make me content with what You have apportioned for me. items.arabic: دعاء الليلة السابعة والعشرون:
items.english: Supplication for the Twenty-Seventh Night:
items.transliteration: Du'a'u al-laylati al-sabi'ati wa-al-'ishruna:

items.arabic: يا مآدَّ الظِّلِّ وَلَوْ شِئْتَ لَجَعَلْتَهُ ساكِناً، وَجَعَلْتَ الشَّمْسَ عَلَيْهِ دَليلًا، ثُمَّ قَبَضْتَهُ الَيْكَ قَبْضاً يَسيراً، يا ذَا الْجُودِ وَالطَّوْلِ، وَالْكِبْرِيآءِ وَالْألاءِ، لا الهَ إلَّاانْتَ، عالِمُ الْغَيْبِ وَالشَّهادَةِ، الرَّحْمنُ الرَّحيمُ، لا إلهَ إلَّاانْتَ، يا قُدُّوسُ يا سَلامُ، يا مُؤْمِنُ يامُهَيْمِنُ، يا عَزيزُ ياجَبَّارُ يا مُتَكَبِّرُ، يا اللَّهُ يا خالِقُ، يا بارِئُ يا مُصَوِّرُ، يا اللَّهُ يا اللَّهُ يا اللَّهُ، لَكَ الْأَسْمآءُ الْحُسْنى وَالْأَمْثالُ الْعُلْيا، وَالْكِبْرِياءُ وَالْألاءُ، اسْئَلُكَ انْ تُصَلِّىَ عَلى مُحَمَّدٍ وَآلِ مُحَمَّدٍ، وَانْ تَجْعَلَ اسْمى فى هذِهِ اللَّيْلَةِ فِى السُّعَدآءِ، وَرُوحى مَعَ الشُّهَدآءِ، وَاحْسانى فى عِلِّيّينَ، وَاسآئَتى مَغْفُورَةً، وَانْ تَهَبَ لى يَقيناً تُباشِرُ بِهِ قَلْبى وَايماناً يُذْهِبُ الشَّكَّ عَنّى وَتُرْضِيَنى بِما قَسَمْتَ لى واتِنا فِى الدُّنْيا حَسَنَةً، وَفِى الْأخِرَةِ حَسَنَةً، وَقِنا عَذابَ النَّارِ الْحَريقِ، وَارْزُقْنى فيها ذِكْرَكَ وَشُكْرَكَ، وَالرَّغْبَةَ الَيْكَ وَالْإِنابَةَ وَالتَّوْبَةَ، وَالتَّوْفيقَ لِما وَفَّقْتَ لَهُ مَحَمَّداً وَآلَ مُحَمَّدٍ، صَلَّى اللَّهُ عَلَيْهِ وَعَلَيْهِمْ .
items.english: O Extender of the shade—and had You willed, You could have made it still—and You made the sun a guide for it, then You withdrew it to Yourself with an easy withdrawal. O Possessor of generosity and bounty, and majesty and favors. There is no god but You, Knower of the unseen and the seen, the All-Merciful, the All-Compassionate. There is no god but You. O Holy, O Giver of Peace, O Granter of Security, O Guardian over all, O All-Mighty, O All-Compeller, O Supreme. O Allah, O Creator, O Maker, O Fashioner. O Allah, O Allah, O Allah. To You belong the Most Beautiful Names and the highest examples, and majesty and favors. I ask You to send blessings upon Muhammad and the family of Muhammad, and that You place my name in this night among the felicitous, and my soul with the martyrs, and my good deeds in ‘Illiyyin, and my misdeeds forgiven; and that You grant me a certainty that directly touches my heart, and a faith that removes doubt from me, and make me content with what You have apportioned for me. items.transliteration: Ya madda al-zilli wa-law shi'ta la-ja'altahu sakanan, wa-ja'alta al-shamsa 'alayhi dalilan, thumma qabadtahu ilayka qabdan yasiran, ya dha al-judi wa-al-tawli, wa-al-kibriya'i wa-al-ala'i, la ilaha illa anta, 'alimu al-ghaybi wa-al-shahadati, al-Rahmanu al-Rahimu, la ilaha illa anta, ya Quddusu ya Salamu, ya Mu'minu ya Muhayminu, ya 'Azizu ya Jabbaru ya Mutakabbiru, ya Allahu ya Khaliqu, ya Bari'u ya Musawwiru, ya Allahu ya Allahu ya Allahu, laka al-asma'u al-husna wa-al-amthalu al-'ulya, wa-al-kibriya'u wa-al-ala'u, as'aluka an tusalliya 'ala Muhammadin wa-ali Muhammadin, wa-an taj'ala ismi fi hadhihi al-laylati fi al-su'ada'i, wa-ruhi ma'a al-shuhada'i, wa-ihsani fi 'illiyyina, wa-isa'ati maghfuratan, wa-an tahaba li yaqinan tubashiru bihi qalbi wa-imanan yudhhibu al-shakka 'anni wa-turdiyani bi-ma qasamta li, wa-atina fi al-dunya hasanatan, wa-fi al-akhirati hasanatan, wa-qina 'adhaba al-nari al-hariqi, wa-rzuqni fiha dhikraka wa-shukraka, wa-al-raghbata ilayka wa-al-inabata wa-al-tawbata, wa-al-tawfiqa li-ma waffaqta lahu Muhammadan wa-ala Muhammadin, salla Allahu 'alayhi wa-'alayhim.

items.english: Supplication for the Twenty-Eighth Night:
items.transliteration: Du'a'u al-laylati al-thaminati wa-al-'ishruna:

items.english: Supplication for the Twenty-Ninth Night:
items.transliteration: Du'a'u al-laylati al-tasi'ati wa-al-'ishruna:

items.arabic: يا مُكَوِّرَ اللَّيْلِ عَلَى النَّهارِ، وَمُكَوِّرَ النَّهارِ عَلَى اللَّيْلِ، يا عَليمُ يا حَكيمُ، يا رَبَّ الْأَرْبابِ، وَسَيِّدَ السَّاداتِ، لا الهَ إلَّاانْتَ، يا اقْرَبَ الَىَّ مِنْ حَبْلِ الْوَريدِ، يا اللَّهُ يا اللَّهُ يا اللَّهُ، لَكَ الْأَسْمآءُ الْحُسْنى وَالْأَمْثالُ الْعُلْيا، وَالْكِبْرِياءُ وَالْألاءُ، اسْئَلُكَ انْ تُصَلِّىَ عَلى مُحَمَّدٍ وَآلِ مُحَمَّدٍ، وَانْ تَجْعَلَ اسْمى فى هذِهِ اللَّيْلَةِ فِى السُّعَدآءِ، وَرُوحى مَعَ الشُّهَدآءِ، وَاحْسانى فى عِلِّيّيِنَ، وَاسآئَتى مَغْفُورَةً، وَانْ تَهَبَ لى يَقيناً تُباشِرُ بِهِ قَلْبى وَايماناً يُذْهِبُ الشَّكَّ عَنّى وَتُرْضِيَنى بِما قَسَمْتَ لى واتِنا فِى الدُّنْيا حَسَنَةً، وَ فِى الأخِرَةِ حَسَنَةً، وَقِنا عَذابَ النَّارِ الْحَريقِ، وَارْزُقْنى فيها ذِكْرَكَ وَشُكْرَكَ، وَالرَّغْبَةَ الَيْكَ، وَالْإِنابَةَ وَالتَّوْبَةَ، وَالتَّوْفيقَ لِما وَفَّقْتَ لَهُ مَحَمَّداً وَآلَ مُحَمَّدٍ، صَلَّى اللَّهُ عَلَيْهِ وَعَلَيْهِمْ .
items.english: O Wrapper of the night over the day, and Wrapper of the day over the night. O All-Knowing, O All-Wise. O Lord of lords and Master of masters. There is no god but You. O Nearer to me than my jugular vein. O Allah, O Allah, O Allah. To You belong the Most Beautiful Names, the most sublime examples, and majesty and favors. I beseech You to bless Muhammad and the family of Muhammad, and to place my name this night among the felicitous, and my soul with the martyrs, and my good deeds in ‘Illiyyin, and my misdeeds forgiven; and that You grant me a certainty that directly touches my heart, and a faith that removes doubt from me, and make me content with what You have apportioned for me. Grant us good in this world and good in the Hereafter, and protect us from the punishment of the burning Fire. Grant me therein Your remembrance, gratitude to You, longing for You, turning to You, and repentance, and the success for that which You granted success to Muhammad and the family of Muhammad, may the blessings of Allah be upon him and upon them.
items.transliteration: Ya mukawwira al-layli 'ala al-nahari, wa-mukawwira al-nahari 'ala al-layli, ya 'Alimu ya Hakimu, ya Rabba al-arbabi, wa-sayyida al-sadati, la ilaha illa anta, ya aqraba ilayya min habli al-waridi, ya Allahu ya Allahu ya Allahu, laka al-asma'u al-husna wa-al-amthalu al-'ulya, wa-al-kibriya'u wa-al-ala'u, as'aluka an tusalliya 'ala Muhammadin wa-ali Muhammadin, wa-an taj'ala ismi fi hadhihi al-laylati fi al-su'ada'i, wa-ruhi ma'a al-shuhada'i, wa-ihsani fi 'illiyyina, wa-isa'ati maghfuratan, wa-an tahaba li yaqinan tubashiru bihi qalbi wa-imanan yudhhibu al-shakka 'anni wa-turdiyani bi-ma qasamta li, wa-atina fi al-dunya hasanatan, wa-fi al-akhirati hasanatan, wa-qina 'adhaba al-nari al-hariqi, wa-rzuqni fiha dhikraka wa-shukraka, wa-al-raghbata ilayka, wa-al-inabata wa-al-tawbata, wa-al-tawfiqa li-ma waffaqta lahu Muhammadan wa-ala Muhammadin, salla Allahu 'alayhi wa-'alayhim.

items.arabic: دعاء الليلة الثلاثون:
items.english: Supplication for the Thirtieth Night:
items.transliteration: Du'a'u al-laylati al-thalathuna:

items.arabic: الْحَمْدُللَّهِ لا شَريكَ لَهُ، الْحَمْدُ للَّهِ كَما يَنْبَغى لِكَرَمِ وَجْهِهِ، وَعِزِّ جَلالِهِ، وَكَما هُوَ اهْلُهُ، يا قُدُّوسُ يا نُورُ، يا نُورَ الْقُدْسِ، يا سُبُّوحُ يا مُنْتَهَى التَّسْبيحِ، يا رَحْمنُ يا فاعِلَ الرَّحْمَةِ، يا اللَّهُ يا عَليمُ يا كَبيرُ، يا اللَّهُ يا لَطيفُ يا جَليلُ، يا اللَّهُ يا سَميعُ يا بَصيرُ، يا اللَّهُ يا اللَّهُ يا اللَّهُ، لَكَ الْأَسْمآءُ الْحُسْنى وَالْأَمْثالُ الْعُلْيا، وَالْكِبْرِيآءُ وَالْألاءُ، اسْئَلُكَ انْ تُصَلِّىَ عَلى مُحَمَّدٍ وَاهْلِ بَيْتِهِ، وَانْ تَجْعَلَ اسْمى فى هذِهِ اللَّيْلَةِ فِى السُّعَدآءِ، وَرُوحى مَعَ الشُّهَدآءِ، وَاحْسانى فى عِلِّيّينَ، وَاسآئَتى مَغْفُورَةً، وَانْ تَهَبَ لى يَقيناً تُباشِرُ بِهِ قَلْبى وَايماناً يُذْهِبُ الشَّكَّ عَنّى وَتُرْضِيَنى بِما قَسَمْتَ لى وَآتِنا فِى الدُّنْيا حَسَنَةً، وَفِى الْأخِرَةِ حَسَنَةً، وَقِنا عَذابَ النَّارِ الْحَريقِ، وَارْزُقْنى فيها ذِكْرَكَ وَشُكْرَكَ، وَالرَّغْبَةَ الَيْكَ، وَالْإِنابَةَ وَالتَّوْبَةَ، وَالتَّوْفيقَ لِما وَفَّقْتَ لَهُ مَحَمَّداً وَ آلَ مُحَمَّدٍ، صَلَّى اللَّهُ عَلَيْهِ وَعَلَيْهِمْ .
items.english: Praise be to Allah, Who has no partner. Praise be to Allah as befits the nobility of His Face and the might of His Majesty, and as He is worthy of. O All-Holy, O Light; O Light of Holiness. O All-Glorified, O Ultimate Object of glorification. O All-Merciful, O Bestower of mercy. O Allah, O All-Knowing, O All-Great. O Allah, O All-Subtle, O Majestic. O Allah, O All-Hearing, O All-Seeing. O Allah, O Allah, O Allah. To You belong the Most Beautiful Names, the most sublime examples, and majesty and favors. I ask You to bless Muhammad and his Household, and that You place my name this night among the felicitous, and my soul with the martyrs, and my good deeds in ‘Illiyyin, and my misdeeds forgiven; and that You grant me a certainty that directly touches my heart, and a faith that removes doubt from me, and make me content with what You have apportioned for me. Grant us good in this world and good in the Hereafter, and protect us from the punishment of the burning Fire. Grant me therein Your remembrance, gratitude to You, longing for You, turning to You, and repentance; and grant me the success for that which You granted success to Muhammad and the family of Muhammad, peace of Allah be upon him and upon them.

items.arabic: ليلة مباركة وردت فيها بعض الأعمال:
items.english: A blessed night for which certain acts of worship have been reported:
items.transliteration: Laylatun mubarakatun waradat fiha ba'du al-a'mali:

items.arabic: 1. الغسل الذي صرّحت به رواية عن الإمام الصادق عليه السلام .
items.english: The ritual bath that has been explicitly stated in a narration from Imam al-Sadiq, peace be upon him.
items.transliteration: Al-ghuslu alladhi sarrahat bihi riwayatun 'an al-Imami al-Sadiqi 'alayhi al-salamu.

items.arabic: 2. الصلاة ثلاثين ركعة (مضت في شرح أعمال ليالي شهر رمضان، ص 481).
items.english: 2. The prayer of thirty rak‘ahs (previously mentioned in the explanation of the acts for the nights of the month of Ramadan, p. 481).
items.transliteration: 2. Al-salatu thalathina rak'atan (madat fi sharhi a'mali layali shahri Ramadana, s. 481).

items.arabic: 3. روي عن زيد بن عليّ عليهما السلام قال: سمعت أبي عليّ بن الحسين عليهما السلام ليلة سبع وعشرين من شهر رمضان يقول من أوّل الليلة إلى آخرها:
items.english: 3. It was narrated from Zayd ibn Ali, peace be upon both of them, that he said: I heard my father Ali ibn al-Husayn, peace be upon both of them, on the twenty-seventh night of the month of Ramadan, saying from the beginning of the night until its end:
items.transliteration: 3. Ruwiya 'an Zaydi bni 'Ali 'alayhima al-salamu qala: sami'tu abi 'Ali bni al-Husayni 'alayhima al-salamu laylata sab'in wa-'ishrina min shahri Ramadana yaqulu min awwali al-laylati ila akhiriha:

items.arabic: اللهُمَّ ارْزُقْنِى التَّجافِىَ عَنْ دارِ الْغُرُورِ، وَالْإِنابَةَ الى دارِ الْخُلُودِ، وَالْإِسْتِعْدادَ لِلْمَوْتِ قَبْلَ حُلُولِ الْفَوْتِ .
items.english: O Allah, grant me the detachment from the abode of delusion, the turning toward the abode of eternity, and the preparation for death before the passing of opportunity.
items.transliteration: Allahumma urzuqni al-tajafiya 'an dari al-ghururi, wa-al-inabata ila dari al-khuludi, wa-al-isti'dada li-al-mawti qabla hululi al-fawti.

footnote_refs.title: إقبال الأعمال: ص 228؛ بحار الأنوار: ج 95، ص 63.

items.arabic: 4. وروي دعاء آخر لهذه الليلة عن النبيّ الأكرم صلى الله عليه و آله وهو مجموعة من آيات القرآن:
items.english: 4. Another supplication for this night has been narrated from the Noble Prophet, peace and blessings be upon him and his progeny, which is a collection of verses from the Quran:
items.transliteration: 4. Wa-ruwiya du'a'un akharu li-hadhihi al-laylati 'an al-nabiyyi al-akrami salla Allahu 'alayhi wa-alihi wa-huwa majmu'atun min ayati al-qur'ani:
