items.arabic: رَبَّنا آمَنّا فَاغْفِرْ لَنا ذُنُوبَنا، وَكَفِّرْ عَنَّا سَيِّئاتِنا، وَتَوَفَّنا مَعَ الْأبْرارِ؛ رَبَّنا وَآتِنا ما وَعَدْتَنا عَلى رُسُلِكَ، وَلا تُخْزِنا يَوْمَ الْقِيامَةِ إِنَّكَ لا تُخْلِفُ الْميعاد. رَبَّنا امَتَّنَا اثْنَتَيْنِ وَأَحْيَيْتَنَا اثْنَتَيْنِ، فَاعْتَرَفْنا بِذُنُوبِنا فَهَل إِلى خُرُوجٍ مِنْ سَبيلٍ. رَبَّنَا اصْرِفْ عَنَّا عَذابَ جَهَنَّمَ، إنَّ عَذابَها كانَ غَراماً. رَبَّنا هَبْ لَنا مِنْ أزْواجِنا وَذُرِّيَّاتِنا قُرَّةَ اعْيُنٍ، وَاجْعَلْنا لِلْمُتَّقينَ اماماً. رَبَّنا عَلَيْكَ تَوَكَّلْنا، وَإلَيْكَ أَنَبْنا وَالَيْكَ الْمَصيرُ.
items.english: Our Lord, we have believed, so forgive us our sins, and expiate from us our misdeeds, and take our souls with the pious. Our Lord, and grant us what You promised us through Your messengers, and do not disgrace us on the Day of Resurrection; indeed, You do not fail in Your promise. Our Lord, You have caused us to die twice and given us life twice, so we have confessed our sins; is there then any way of escape? Our Lord, avert from us the punishment of Hell; indeed, its punishment is an unrelenting torment. Our Lord, grant us from our spouses and our offspring the delight of our eyes, and make us a leader for the God-fearing. Our Lord, in You we have put our trust, and to You we have turned in repentance, and to You is the ultimate return.
items.transliteration: Rabbana amanna fa-ighfir lana dhunubana, wa-kaffir 'anna sayyi'atina, wa-tawaffana ma'a al-abrari; Rabbana wa-atina ma wa'adtana 'ala rusulika, wa-la tukhzina yawma al-qiyamati innaka la tukhlifu al-mi'ada. Rabbana amattana ithnatayni wa-ahyaytana ithnatayni, fa-i'tarafna bi-dhunubina fa-hal ila khurujin min sabilin. Rabbana isrif 'anna 'adhaba jahannama, inna 'adhabaha kana gharaman. Rabbana hab lana min azwajina wa-dhurriyyatina qurrata a'yunin, wa-ij'alna li-al-muttaqina imaman. Rabbana 'alayka tawakkalna, wa-ilayka anabna wa-ilayka al-masiru.

items.arabic: رَبَّنا لا تَجْعَلْنَا فِتْنَةً لِلَّذينَ كَفَرُوا، رَبَّنَا اغْفِرْ لَنا، وَلِإخْوانِنَا الَّذينَ سَبَقُونا بِالْايمانِ، وَلاتَجْعَلْ فِى قُلُوبِنا غِلّاً لِلَّذينَ آمَنُوا، رَبَّنا إِنَّكَ رَؤُفٌ رَحيمٌ .
items.english: Our Lord, make us not a trial for those who disbelieve. Our Lord, forgive us and our brothers who preceded us in faith, and do not put in our hearts any rancor toward those who have believed. Our Lord, indeed You are All-Kind, All-Merciful.
items.transliteration: Rabbana la taj'alna fitnatan li-lladhina kafaru, Rabbana ighfir lana, wa-li-ikhwanina alladhina sabaquna bi-al-imani, wa-la taj'al fi qulubina ghillan li-lladhina amanu, Rabbana innaka ra'ufun rahimun.

items.arabic: رَبَّنا آمَنّا فَاغْفِرْ لَنا ذُنُوبَنا، وَكَفِّرْ عَنَّا سَيِّئاتِنا، وَتَوَفَّنا مَعَ الْأبْرارِ؛ رَبَّنا وَآتِنا ما وَعَدْتَنا عَلى رُسُلِكَ، وَلا تُخْزِنا يَوْمَ الْقِيامَةِ إِنَّكَ لا تُخْلِفُ الْميعاد. رَبَّنا امَتَّنَا اثْنَتَيْنِ وَأَحْيَيْتَنَا اثْنَتَيْنِ، فَاعْتَرَفْنا بِذُنُوبِنا فَهَل إِلى خُرُوجٍ مِنْ سَبيلٍ. رَبَّنَا اصْرِفْ عَنَّا عَذابَ جَهَنَّمَ، إنَّ عَذابَها كانَ غَراماً. رَبَّنا هَبْ لَنا مِنْ أزْواجِنا وَذُرِّيَّاتِنا قُرَّةَ اعْيُنٍ، وَاجْعَلْنا لِلْمُتَّقينَ اماماً. رَبَّنا عَلَيْكَ تَوَكَّلْنا، وَإلَيْكَ أَنَبْنا وَالَيْكَ الْمَصيرُ.
items.english: Our Lord, we have believed, so forgive us our sins, and expiate from us our misdeeds, and take our souls with the pious. Our Lord, and grant us what You promised us through Your messengers, and do not disgrace us on the Day of Resurrection; indeed, You do not fail in Your promise. Our Lord, You have made us die twice and given us life twice, and we have confessed our sins; so is there any way out? Our Lord, avert from us the punishment of Hell; indeed, its punishment is an enduring torment. Our Lord, grant us from our spouses and our offspring the comfort of our eyes, and make us a leader for the God-fearing. Our Lord, in You we have put our trust, and to You we have turned, and to You is the final return.

items.arabic: وهي ليلة كثيرة البركات وفيها أعمال:
items.english: It is a night of many blessings, and in it are acts of worship:
items.transliteration: Wa-hiya laylatun kathiratu al-barakati wa-fiha a'malun:

items.arabic: 1. الغسل .
items.english: 1. The ritual bath.
items.transliteration: 1. Al-ghuslu.

items.arabic: 2. زيارة الحسين عليه السلام .
items.english: 2. The Ziyarah of al-Husayn, peace be upon him.
items.transliteration: 2. Ziyaratu al-Husayni 'alayhi al-salamu.

items.arabic: 3. قراءة
items.english: 3. The recitation
items.transliteration: 3. Qira'atu

items.arabic: سورة الأنعام والكهف ويس .
items.english: of Surah al-An‘am, al-Kahf, and Ya-Sin.
items.transliteration: Surati al-An'ami wa-al-Kahfi wa-Ya-Sin.

items.arabic: 4. يقول مائة مرّة:
items.english: 4. Saying one hundred times:
items.transliteration: 4. Yaqulu mi'ata marratan:

items.arabic: أَسْتَغْفِرُ اللَّهَ وَأَتُوبُ إِلَيْهِ .
items.english: I seek forgiveness from Allah and I turn to Him in repentance.
items.transliteration: Astaghfiru Allaha wa-atubu ilayhi.

items.arabic: 5. أن يدعو بهذا الدعاء الذي رواه الكليني عن الإمام الصادق عليه السلام:
items.english: 5. To recite this supplication which was narrated by al-Kulayni from Imam al-Sadiq, peace be upon him:
items.transliteration: 5. An yad'uwa bi-hadha al-du'a'i alladhi rawahu al-Kulayni 'an al-Imami al-Sadiqi 'alayhi al-salamu:

items.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ هذا شَهْرُ رَمَضانَ، الَّذى انْزَلْتَ فيهِ الْقُرْآنَ وَقَدْ تَصَرَّمَ، وَاعُوذُ بِوَجْهِكَ الْكَريمِ يا رَبِّ انْ يَطْلُعَ الْفَجْرُ مِنْ لَيْلَتى هذِهِ، اوْ يَتَصَرَّمَ شَهْرُ رَمَضانَ، وَلَكَ قِبَلى تَبِعَةٌ اوْ ذَنْبٌ تُريدُ انْ تُعَذِّبَنى بِهِ يَوْمَ الْقاكَ .
items.english: O Allah, this is the month of Ramadan, in which You revealed the Quran, and it has come to an end. I seek refuge in Your Noble Face, O Lord, lest the dawn of this night of mine should rise, or the month of Ramadan should pass away, while there remains against me a consequence or a sin for which You would punish me on the day I meet You.
items.transliteration: Allahumma hadha shahru Ramadana, alladhi anzalta fihi al-qur'ana wa-qad tasarrama, wa-a'udhu bi-wajhika al-karimi ya Rabbi an yatlu'a al-fajru min laylati hadhihi, aw yatasarrama shahru Ramadana, wa-laka qibali tabi'atun aw dhanbun turidu an tu'adhhibani bihi yawma alqaka.

items.arabic: 6. أن يدعو بدعاء: «
items.english: 6. To recite the supplication: "
items.transliteration: 6. An yad'uwa bi-du'a'i: «

items.arabic: يا مُدَبِّرَالْأُمُورِ
items.english: O Director of affairs
items.transliteration: Ya mudabbira al-umuri

items.arabic: » الذي مضى في أعمال الليله الثالثة والعشرين (ص 532).
items.english: ", which was previously mentioned in the acts of the twenty-third night (p. 532).
items.transliteration: » alladhi mada fi a'mali al-laylati al-thalithati wa-al-'ishrina (s. 532).

items.arabic: 7. أن يودّع شهر رمضان بدعوات الوداع التي رواها الأعلام، وأحسنها الدعاء الخامس والأربعون من الصحيفة السجادية.
items.english: 7. To bid farewell to the month of Ramadan with the farewell supplications narrated by prominent scholars, the best of which is the forty-fifth supplication from al-Sahifah al-Sajjadiyyah.
items.transliteration: 7. An yuwaddi'a shahra Ramadana bi-da'awati al-wada'i allati rawaha al-a'lamu, wa-ahsanuha al-du'a'u al-khamisu wa-al-arba'una min al-sahifati al-sajjadiyyati.

items.arabic: روى السيّد ابن طاووس عن الإمام الصادق عليه السلام قال: «
items.english: Sayyid Ibn Tawus narrated from Imam al-Sadiq, peace be upon him, who said: "
items.transliteration: Rawa al-Sayyidu Ibnu Tawusin 'an al-Imami al-Sadiqi 'alayhi al-salamu qala: «

items.arabic: مَنْ وَدّع شَهْرَ رَمَضان فِي آخِرِ لَيْلَةٍ مِنهُ وقال
items.english: Whoever bids farewell to the month of Ramadan on its last night and says:
items.transliteration: Man wadda'a shahra Ramadana fi akhiri laylatin minhu wa-qala

items.arabic: : اللَّهُمَّ لا تَجْعَلْهُ اخِرَ الْعَهْدِ مِنْ صِيامى لِشَهْرِ رَمَضانَ، وَاعُوذُ بِكَ انْ يَطْلُعَ فَجْرُ هذِهِ اللَّيْلَةِ الَّا وَقَدْ غَفَرْتَ لى
items.english: O Allah, do not make this the last of my time of fasting the month of Ramadan; and I seek refuge in You lest the dawn of this night should rise except that You have forgiven me.
items.transliteration: Allahumma la taj'alhu akhira al-'ahdi min siyami li-shahri Ramadana, wa-a'udhu bika an yatlu'a fajru hadhihi al-laylati illa wa-qad ghafarta li.

items.arabic: غَفَرَاللَّهُ لَهُ قَبْلَ أنْ يُصْبِحَ، وَرَزَقَهُ الإنابَةَ إليهِ» .
items.english: Allah will forgive him before he reaches the morning and will grant him turning back to Him in repentance."
items.transliteration: Ghafara Allahu lahu qabla an yusbiha, wa-razaqahu al-inabata ilayhi.»

footnote_refs.title: إقبال الأعمال: ص 256؛ بحار الأنوار: ج 95، ص 181.

items.arabic: وفي رواية اخرى عن جابر بن عبداللَّه الأنصاري قال: دخلت على رسول اللَّه صلى الله عليه و آله في آخر جمعة من شهر رمضان فقال صلى الله عليه و آله لي: «
items.english: And in another narration from Jabir ibn Abdillah al-Ansari, he said: I visited the Messenger of Allah, peace be upon him and his family, on the last Friday of the month of Ramadan, and he, peace be upon him and his family, said to me: "
items.transliteration: Wa-fi riwayatin ukhra 'an Jabiri bni 'Abdillahi al-Ansariyyi qala: dakhaltu 'ala Rasuli Allahi salla Allahu 'alayhi wa-alihi fi akhiri jumu'atin min shahri Ramadana fa-qala salla Allahu 'alayhi wa-alihi li: «

items.arabic: يا جَابِرُ هذِه آخِرُ جُمُعَةٍ مِنْ شَهْرِ رَمَضانَ فَوَدِّعْهُ وَقُلْ:
items.english: O Jabir, this is the last Friday of the month of Ramadan, so bid farewell to it and say:
items.transliteration: Ya Jabiru hadhihi akhiru jumu'atin min shahri Ramadana fa-waddi'hu wa-qul:

items.arabic: اللهُمَّ لا تَجْعَلْهُ اخِرَ الْعَهْدِ مِنْ صِيامِنا ايَّاهُ، فَانْ جَعَلْتَهُ فَاجْعَلْنى مَرْحُوماً، وَلا تَجْعَلْنى مَحْرُوماً».
items.english: O Allah, do not make this the last of our time of fasting it; and if You do make it so, then make me one who is granted mercy, and do not make me one who is deprived.
items.transliteration: Allahumma la taj'alhu akhira al-'ahdi min siyamina iyyahu, fa-in ja'altahu fa-aj'alni marhuman, wa-la taj'alni mahruman.»

items.arabic: وقال صلى الله عليه و آله: «
items.english: And he, peace be upon him and his family, said: "
items.transliteration: Wa-qala salla Allahu 'alayhi wa-alihi: «

items.arabic: فإنَّهُ مَن قالَ ذلِكَ ظَفَرَ بإحدى الحُسْنَيَيْنِ إمّا بُلوغِ شَهرِ رَمَضانَ المُقبِل وإمّا بِغُفْرانِ اللَّهِ ورَحْمَتِه» .
items.english: For indeed, whoever says that will attain one of the two good outcomes: either reaching the coming month of Ramadan, or Allah’s forgiveness and His mercy."
items.transliteration: Fa-innahu man qala dhalika zafara bi-ihda al-husnayayni imma bulughi shahri Ramadana al-muqbili wa-imma bi-ghufrani Allahi wa-rahmatihi.»

footnote_refs.title: إقبال الأعمال: ص 243؛ بحار الأنوار: ج 95، ص 172.

items.arabic: 8. الصلاة عشر ركعات (سلام لكلّ ركعتين).
items.english: 8. To pray ten rak‘ahs (offering the taslim after every two rak‘ahs).
items.transliteration: 8. Al-salatu 'ashru raka'atin (salamun li-kulli rak'atayni).

items.arabic: قال صلى الله عليه و آله: «
items.english: He, peace be upon him and his family, said: "
items.transliteration: Qala salla Allahu 'alayhi wa-alihi: «

items.arabic: مَنْ صَلّى آخِرَ لَيْلَةٍ مِنْ شَهْرِ رَمَضانَ عَشْرَ رَكَعاتٍ يَقْرَأُ فِي كُلِّ رَكْعَةٍ فاتِحَةَ الكِتَابِ مَرَّةً واحِدةً وقُلْ هُوَ اللَّهُ أحَدٌ عَشْرَ مَرّاتٍ ويَقولُ فِي رُكوعِهِ وسُجودهِ عَشْرَ مَرّاتٍ:
items.english: Whoever prays ten rak‘ahs on the last night of the month of Ramadan, reciting in every rak‘ah Fatihat al-Kitab once and ‘Say: He is Allah, the One’ ten times, and says ten times during his ruku‘ and his sujud:
items.transliteration: Man salla akhira laylatin min shahri Ramadana 'ashra raka'atin yaqra'u fi kulli rak'atin fatihata al-kitabi marratan wahidatan wa-qul huwa Allahu ahadun 'ashra marratin wa-yaqulu fi ruku'ihi wa-sujudihi 'ashra marratin:

items.arabic: سُبْحانَ اللَّهِ وَالْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ وَلا الهَ الَّا اللَّهُ وَاللَّهُ اكْبَرُ
items.english: Glory be to Allah, and all praise is due to Allah, and there is no god but Allah, and Allah is the Greatest.
items.transliteration: Subhana Allahi wa-al-hamdu lillahi wa-la ilaha illa Allahu wa-Allahu akbaru.

items.arabic: وَيَتَشَهَّدُ فِي كُلِّ رَكْعَتَيْنِ ثُمَّ يُسَلِّمُ فإذا فَرَغَ مِن آخِرِ عَشْرِ رَكَعَاتٍ وسَلَّم اسْتَغْفَرَ اللَّهَ ألْفَ مَرَّةٍ يقولُ:
items.english: And he recites the *tashahhud* in every two *rak‘ahs* then offers the *taslim*. When he has finished the last of the ten *rak‘ahs* and offered the *taslim*, he seeks forgiveness from Allah one thousand times, saying:
items.transliteration: Wa-yatashahhadu fi kulli rak'atayni thumma yusallimu fa-idha faragha min akhiri 'ashri raka'atin wa-sallama istaghfara Allaha alfa marratin yaqulu:

items.arabic: أَسْتَغْفِرُ اللَّهَ
items.english: I seek forgiveness from Allah.
items.transliteration: Astaghfiru Allaha.

items.arabic: فإذا فَرَغَ مِنَ الاسْتِغْفَارِ سَجَدَ ويَقولُ فِي سُجُودِهِ
items.english: When he has finished seeking forgiveness, he prostrates and says in his prostration:
items.transliteration: Fa-idha faragha mina al-istighfari sajada wa-yaqulu fi sujudihi.

items.arabic: : يا حَىُّ يا قَيُّومُ، يا ذَا الْجَلالِ وَالْإِكْرامِ، يا رَحْمنَ الدُّنْيا وَالْاخِرَةِ وَرَحيمَهُما، يا ارْحَمَ الرَّاحِمينَ، يا الهَ الْأَوَّلينَ وَالْاخِرينَ، اغْفِرْ لَنا ذُنُوبَنا، وَتَقَبَّلْ مِنَّا صَلواتَنا وَصِيامَنا وَقِيامَنا».
items.english: O Ever-Living, O Self-Subsisting, O Lord of Majesty and Honor, O Compassionate One of this world and the Hereafter and the Merciful One of them both, O Most Merciful of the merciful, O God of the first and the last, forgive us our sins, and accept from us our prayers, our fasting, and our standing in worship.
items.transliteration: : Ya Hayyu ya Qayyumu, ya dha al-jalali wa-al-ikrami, ya rahmana al-dunya wa-al-akhirati wa-rahimahuma, ya arhama al-rahimina, ya ilaha al-awwalina wa-al-akhirina, ighfir lana dhunubana, wa-taqabbal minna salawatana wa-siyamana wa-qiyamana.»

items.arabic: 7. أن يودّع شهر رمضان بدعوات الوداع التي رواها الأعلام، وأحسنها الدعاء الخامس والأربعون من الصحيفة السجادية.
items.english: 7. To bid farewell to the month of Ramadan with the farewell supplications narrated by prominent scholars, the best of which is the forty-fifth supplication from al-Sahifah al-Sajjadiyyah.
items.transliteration: 7. An yuwaddi'a shahra Ramadana bi-da'awati al-wada'i allati rawaha al-a'lamu, wa-ahsanuha al-du'a'u al-khamisu wa-al-arba'una min al-sahifati al-sajjadiyyati.

items.arabic: روى السيّد ابن طاووس عن الإمام الصادق عليه السلام قال: «
items.english: Sayyid Ibn Tawus narrated from Imam al-Sadiq, peace be upon him, who said: "
items.transliteration: Rawa al-Sayyidu Ibnu Tawusin 'an al-Imami al-Sadiqi 'alayhi al-salamu qala: «

items.arabic: مَنْ وَدّع شَهْرَ رَمَضان فِي آخِرِ لَيْلَةٍ مِنهُ وقال
items.english: Whoever bids farewell to the month of Ramadan on its last night and says:
items.transliteration: Man wadda'a shahra Ramadana fi akhiri laylatin minhu wa-qala

items.arabic: : اللَّهُمَّ لا تَجْعَلْهُ اخِرَ الْعَهْدِ مِنْ صِيامى لِشَهْرِ رَمَضانَ، وَاعُوذُ بِكَ انْ يَطْلُعَ فَجْرُ هذِهِ اللَّيْلَةِ الَّا وَقَدْ غَفَرْتَ لى
items.english: O Allah, do not make this the last of my time of fasting the month of Ramadan; and I seek refuge in You lest the dawn of this night should rise except that You have forgiven me.
items.transliteration: : Allahumma la taj'alhu akhira al-'ahdi min siyami li-shahri Ramadana, wa-a'udhu bika an yatlu'a fajru hadhihi al-laylati illa wa-qad ghafarta li.

items.arabic: غَفَرَاللَّهُ لَهُ قَبْلَ أنْ يُصْبِحَ، وَرَزَقَهُ الإنابَةَ إليهِ» .
items.english: Allah will forgive him before he reaches the morning and will grant him turning back to Him in repentance."
items.transliteration: Ghafara Allahu lahu qabla an yusbiha, wa-razaqahu al-inabata ilayhi.»

footnote_refs.title: إقبال الأعمال: ص 256؛ بحار الأنوار: ج 95، ص 181.

items.arabic: وفي رواية اخرى عن جابر بن عبداللَّه الأنصاري قال: دخلت على رسول اللَّه صلى الله عليه و آله في آخر جمعة من شهر رمضان فقال صلى الله عليه و آله لي: «
items.english: And in another narration from Jabir ibn Abdillah al-Ansari, he said: I visited the Messenger of Allah, peace be upon him and his family, on the last Friday of the month of Ramadan, and he, peace be upon him and his family, said to me: "
items.transliteration: Wa-fi riwayatin ukhra 'an Jabiri bni 'Abdillahi al-Ansariyyi qala: dakhaltu 'ala Rasuli Allahi salla Allahu 'alayhi wa-alihi fi akhiri jumu'atin min shahri Ramadana fa-qala salla Allahu 'alayhi wa-alihi li: «

items.arabic: يا جَابِرُ هذِه آخِرُ جُمُعَةٍ مِنْ شَهْرِ رَمَضانَ فَوَدِّعْهُ وَقُلْ:
items.english: O Jabir, this is the last Friday of the month of Ramadan, so bid farewell to it and say:
items.transliteration: Ya Jabiru hadhihi akhiru jumu'atin min shahri Ramadana fa-waddi'hu wa-qul:

items.arabic: اللهُمَّ لا تَجْعَلْهُ اخِرَ الْعَهْدِ مِنْ صِيامِنا ايَّاهُ، فَانْ جَعَلْتَهُ فَاجْعَلْنى مَرْحُوماً، وَلا تَجْعَلْنى مَحْرُوماً».
items.english: O Allah, do not make this the last of our time of fasting it; and if You do make it so, then make me one who is granted mercy, and do not make me one who is deprived.
items.transliteration: Allahumma la taj'alhu akhira al-'ahdi min siyamina iyyahu, fa-in ja'altahu fa-aj'alni marhuman, wa-la taj'alni mahruman.»

items.arabic: وقال صلى الله عليه و آله: «
items.english: And he, peace be upon him and his family, said: "
items.transliteration: Wa-qala salla Allahu 'alayhi wa-alihi: «

items.arabic: فإنَّهُ مَن قالَ ذلِكَ ظَفَرَ بإحدى الحُسْنَيَيْنِ إمّا بُلوغِ شَهرِ رَمَضانَ المُقبِل وإمّا بِغُفْرانِ اللَّهِ ورَحْمَتِه» .
items.english: For indeed, whoever says that will attain one of the two good outcomes: either reaching the coming month of Ramadan, or Allah’s forgiveness and His mercy."
items.transliteration: Fa-innahu man qala dhalika zafara bi-ihda al-husnayayni imma bulughi shahri Ramadana al-muqbili wa-imma bi-ghufrani Allahi wa-rahmatihi.»

footnote_refs.title: إقبال الأعمال: ص 243؛ بحار الأنوار: ج 95، ص 172.

items.arabic: 8. الصلاة عشر ركعات (سلام لكلّ ركعتين).
items.english: 8. To pray ten rak‘ahs (offering the taslim after every two rak‘ahs).
items.transliteration: 8. Al-salatu 'ashru raka'atin (salamun li-kulli rak'atayni).

items.arabic: قال صلى الله عليه و آله: «
items.english: He, peace be upon him and his family, said: "
items.transliteration: Qala salla Allahu 'alayhi wa-alihi: «

items.arabic: مَنْ صَلّى آخِرَ لَيْلَةٍ مِنْ شَهْرِ رَمَضانَ عَشْرَ رَكَعاتٍ يَقْرَأُ فِي كُلِّ رَكْعَةٍ فاتِحَةَ الكِتَابِ مَرَّةً واحِدةً وقُلْ هُوَ اللَّهُ أحَدٌ عَشْرَ مَرّاتٍ ويَقولُ فِي رُكوعِهِ وسُجودهِ عَشْرَ مَرّاتٍ:

items.transliteration: Subhana Allahi wa-al-hamdu lillahi wa-la ilaha illa Allahu wa-Allahu akbaru.

items.transliteration: Astaghfiru Allaha.

items.arabic: وقال صلى الله عليه و آله: «
items.english: And he, peace be upon him and his family, said: "
items.transliteration: Wa-qala salla Allahu 'alayhi wa-alihi: «

items.arabic: والّذِي بَعَثَنِي بِالحَقِّ نَبِيّاً أنَّ جَبْرَئِيلَ أخْبَرَنِي عن إسْرافِيلَ عَنْ رَبِّهِ تَبارَكَ وتَعالى أنَّهُ لا يَرْفَعُ رَأْسَهُ مِنَ السُّجودِ حتّى يَغْفِرَ اللَّهُ لَهُ ويَتَقَبَّلَ مِنْهُ شَهْرَ رَمَضانَ ويَتَجاوَزَ عن ذُنوبِهِ ...» .
items.english: By the One Who sent me with the truth as a Prophet, Jibril informed me from Israfil from his Lord, Blessed and Exalted is He, that he does not raise his head from prostration until Allah forgives him, accepts from him the month of Ramadan, and overlooks his sins..."
items.transliteration: Wa-alladhi ba'athani bi-al-haqqi nabiyyan anna Jabra'ila akhbarani 'an Israfila 'an rabbihi tabaraka wa-ta'ala annahu la yarfa'u ra'sahu mina al-sujudi hatta yaghfira Allahu lahu wa-yataqabbala minhu shahra Ramadana wa-yatajawaza 'an dhunubihi ...».

footnote_refs.title: إقبال الأعمال: ص 241؛ بحار الأنوار: ج 95، ص 73.

items.arabic: ورويت هذه الصلاة في ليلة عيد الفطر. وورد في تلك الرواية أنّه يسبّح بالتسبيحات الأربع في الركوع والسجود، وورد في دعاء السجود بعد الصلاة بدل:
items.english: And this prayer has been narrated for the night of Eid al-Fitr. It is mentioned in that narration that one recites the four *tasbihs* during the *ruku‘* and the *sujud*, and it is mentioned in the supplication of the prostration after the prayer, instead of:
items.transliteration: Wa-ruwiyat hadhihi al-salatu fi laylati 'idi al-fitri. Wa-warada fi tilka al-riwayati annahu yusabbihu bi-al-tasbihati al-arba'i fi al-ruku'i wa-al-sujudi, wa-warada fi du'a'i al-sujudi ba'da al-salati badala:

items.arabic: إغْفِرْ لَنا ...
items.english: Forgive us...
items.transliteration: Ighfir lana...

items.arabic: يقول:
items.english: he says:
items.transliteration: Yaqulu:

items.arabic: إغْفِرْ لِى ذُنُوبِى، وَتَقَبَّلْ صَوْمِى وَصَلاتِى وَقِيامِى .
items.english: Forgive me my sins, and accept my fasting, my prayer, and my standing.
items.transliteration: Ighfir li dhunubi, wa-taqabbal sawmi wa-salati wa-qiyami.

footnote_refs.title: إقبال الأعمال: ص 272؛ بحار الأنوار: ج 88، ص 130.

items.arabic: وقال صلى الله عليه و آله: «
items.english: And he, peace be upon him and his family, said: "
items.transliteration: Wa-qala salla Allahu 'alayhi wa-alihi: «

items.arabic: والّذِي بَعَثَنِي بِالحَقِّ نَبِيّاً أنَّ جَبْرَئِيلَ أخْبَرَنِي عن إسْرافِيلَ عَنْ رَبِّهِ تَبارَكَ وتَعالى أنَّهُ لا يَرْفَعُ رَأْسَهُ مِنَ السُّجودِ حتّى يَغْفِرَ اللَّهُ لَهُ ويَتَقَبَّلَ مِنْهُ شَهْرَ رَمَضانَ ويَتَجاوَزَ عن ذُنوبِهِ ...» .

items.english: he says:
items.transliteration: Yaqulu:

items.english: Forgive me my sins, and accept my fasting, my prayer, and my standing.
items.transliteration: Ighfir li dhunubi, wa-taqabbal sawmi wa-salati wa-qiyami.

footnote_refs.title: إقبال الأعمال: ص 272؛ بحار الأنوار: ج 88، ص 130.

items.arabic: بالنظر إلى أنّ ختم القرآن غالباً في هذا اليوم، فينبغي أن يدعى عند الختم بالدعاء الثاني والأربعين من الصحيفة السجادية. كما يمكنه أن يدعو بهذا الدعاء الوجيز عن أميرالمؤمنين عليه السلام:
items.english: Considering that the completion of the Quran often occurs on this day, it is appropriate to supplicate upon completion with the forty-second supplication from al-Sahifah al-Sajjadiyyah. One may also recite this concise supplication from the Commander of the Faithful, peace be upon him:
items.transliteration: Bi-al-nazari ila anna khatma al-Qur'ani ghaliban fi hadha al-yawmi, fa-yanbaghi an yud'a 'inda al-khatmi bi-al-du'a'i al-thani wa-al-arba'ina min al-sahifati al-sajjadiyyati. Kama yumkinuhu an yad'uwa bi-hadha al-du'a'i al-wajizi 'an Amiri al-Mu'minina 'alayhi al-salamu:

items.arabic: اللهُمَّ اشْرَحْ بِالْقُرْآنِ صَدْرى وَاسْتَعْمِلْ بِالْقُرْآنِ بَدَنى وَنَوِّرْ بِالْقُرْآنِ بَصَرى وَاطْلِقْ بِالْقُرْآنِ لِسانى وَاعِنّى عَلَيْهِ ما ابْقَيْتَنى فَانَّهُ لا حَوْلَ وَلا قُوَّةَ الَّا بِكَ .
items.english: O Allah, expand my chest by means of the Quran, and employ my body through the Quran, and illuminate my sight by the Quran, and loosen my tongue through the Quran, and aid me in it so long as You grant me life; for indeed, there is no power and no strength except through You.
items.transliteration: Allahumma ishraḥ bi-al-Qur'ani sadri wa-sta'mil bi-al-Qur'ani badani wa-nawwir bi-al-Qur'ani basari wa-atliq bi-al-Qur'ani lisani wa-a'inni 'alayhi ma abqaytani fa-innahu la hawla wa-la quwwata illa bika.

items.arabic: وكذلك الدعاء المرويّ عن رسول اللَّه صلى الله عليه و آله:
items.english: And likewise the supplication narrated from the Messenger of Allah, peace be upon him and his family:
items.transliteration: Wa-kadhalika al-du'a'u al-marwiyyu 'an Rasuli Allahi salla Allahu 'alayhi wa-alihi:

items.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ انِّى اسْئَلُكَ اخْباتَ الْمُخْبِتينَ، وَاخْلاصَ الْمُوقِنينَ، وَمُرافَقَةَ الْأَبْرارِ، وَاسْتِحْقاقَ حَقائِقِ الْإيمانِ، وَالْغَنيمَةَ مِنْ كُلِّ بِرٍّ، وَالسَّلامَةَ مِنْ كُلِّ اثْمٍ، وَوُجُوبَ رَحْمَتِكَ وَعَزآئِمَ مَغْفِرَتِكَ، وَالْفَوْزَ بِالْجَنَّةِ، وَالنَّجاةَ مِنَ النَّارِ . وقد ذكرنا الدعاء المرويّ عن الإمام الصادق عليه السلام قبل تلاوة القرآن وبعده (ص 517).
items.english: O Allah, I ask You for the humbleness of the submissive, the sincerity of those with certainty, the companionship of the righteous, the attainment of the realities of faith, the gain from every virtue, safety from every sin, the necessity of Your mercy, the firm resolves of Your forgiveness, triumph through Paradise, and salvation from the Fire. And we have mentioned the supplication narrated from Imam al-Sadiq, peace be upon him, before and after the recitation of the Quran (p. 517).
items.transliteration: Allahumma inni as'aluka ikhbata al-mukhbitina, wa-ikhlasa al-muqinina, wa-murafaqata al-abrari, wa-stihqaqa haqa'iqi al-imani, wa-al-ghanimata min kulli birrin, wa-al-salamata min kulli ithmin, wa-wujuba rahmatika wa-'aza'ima maghfiratika, wa-al-fawza bi-al-jannati, wa-al-najata mina al-nari. Wa-qad dhakarna al-du'a'a al-marwiyya 'an al-Imami al-Sadiqi 'alayhi al-salamu qabla tilawati al-Qur'ani wa-ba'dahu (sa 517).

footnote_refs.title: مكارم الأخلاق: ص 342؛ بحار الأنوار: ج 89، ص 206.

items.title: دعاء ختم القرآن في اليوم الأخير من شهر رمضان

items.arabic: بالنظر إلى أنّ ختم القرآن غالباً في هذا اليوم، فينبغي أن يدعى عند الختم بالدعاء الثاني والأربعين من الصحيفة السجادية. كما يمكنه أن يدعو بهذا الدعاء الوجيز عن أميرالمؤمنين عليه السلام:
items.english: Considering that the completion of the Quran often occurs on this day, it is appropriate to supplicate upon completion with the forty-second supplication from al-Sahifah al-Sajjadiyyah. One may also recite this concise supplication from the Commander of the Faithful, peace be upon him:
items.transliteration: Bi-al-nazari ila anna khatma al-Qur'ani ghaliban fi hadha al-yawmi, fa-yanbaghi an yud'a 'inda al-khatmi bi-al-du'a'i al-thani wa-al-arba'ina min al-sahifati al-sajjadiyyati. Kama yumkinuhu an yad'uwa bi-hadha al-du'a'i al-wajizi 'an Amiri al-Mu'minina 'alayhi al-salamu:

items.arabic: اللهُمَّ اشْرَحْ بِالْقُرْآنِ صَدْرى وَاسْتَعْمِلْ بِالْقُرْآنِ بَدَنى وَنَوِّرْ بِالْقُرْآنِ بَصَرى وَاطْلِقْ بِالْقُرْآنِ لِسانى وَاعِنّى عَلَيْهِ ما ابْقَيْتَنى فَانَّهُ لا حَوْلَ وَلا قُوَّةَ الَّا بِكَ .
items.english: O Allah, expand my chest by means of the Quran, and employ my body through the Quran, and illuminate my sight by the Quran, and loosen my tongue through the Quran, and aid me in it so long as You grant me life; for indeed, there is no power and no strength except through You.

items.arabic: صلوات ليالي شهر رمضان: (وبالنظر إلى أنّ أفضل الأعمال في شهر رمضان الصلاة والقرآن وتنطوي هذه الصلوات على العديد من السور القرآنية، فقراءتها في كلّ ليلة غنيمة) ..
items.english: Prayers for the nights of the month of Ramadan: (Considering that the best of deeds in the month of Ramadan are prayer and the Quran, and as these prayers comprise many Quranic *surahs*, reciting them every night is a spiritual gain) ..
items.transliteration: Salawatu layali shahri Ramadana: (Wa-bi-al-nazari ila anna afdala al-a'mali fi shahri Ramadana al-salatu wa-al-Qur'anu wa-tantawi hadhihi al-salawatu 'ala al-'adidi mina al-suwari al-qur'aniyyati, fa-qira'atuha fi kulli laylatin ghanimatun) ..

items.arabic: روي عن ابن عبّاس عن النبيّ صلى الله عليه و آله فضل كبير لصيام كلّ يوم من شهر رمضان المبارك، وذكر لكلّ يوم منه دعاء يخصّه ذو فضل كثير وأجر جزيل، وإليك هذه الأدعية .
items.english: It is narrated from Ibn ‘Abbas from the Prophet (peace be upon him and his family) that there is great merit for fasting each day of the blessed month of Ramadan; he mentioned for each day a specific supplication of great merit and abundant reward. Here are these supplications:
items.transliteration: Ruwiya 'an Ibni 'Abbasin 'an al-Nabiyyi salla Allahu 'alayhi wa-alihi fadlun kabirun li-siyami kulli yawmin min shahri Ramadana al-mubaraki, wa-dhakara li-kulli yawmin minhu du'a'an yakhussuhu dhu fadlin kathirin wa-ajrin jazilin, wa-ilayka hadhihi al-ad'iyata.

items.arabic: دعاء اليوم الأوّل: اللهُمَّ اجْعَلْ صِيامى فيهِ صِيامَ الصَّآئِمينَ، وَقِيامى فيهِ قيامَ الْقآئِمينَ، وَنَبِّهْنى فيهِ عَنْ نَوْمَةِالْغافِلينَ، وَهَبْ لى جُرْمى فيهِ يا الهَ الْعالَمينَ، وَاعْفُ عَنّى يا عافِياً عَنِ الْمُجْرِمينَ اليوم الثاني: اللهُمَّ قَرِّبْنى فيهِ الى مَرْضاتِكَ، وَجَنِّبْنى فيهِ مِنْ سَخَطِكَ وَنَقِماتِكَ، وَوَفِّقْنى فيهِ لِقِرآئَةِ اياتِكَ، بِرَحْمَتِكَ يا ارْحَمَ الرَّاحِمينَ اليوم الثالث: اللهُمَّ ارْزُقْنى فيهِ الذِّهْنَ وَالتَّنْبيهَ، وَباعِدْنى فيهِ مِنَ السَّفاهَةِ وَالتَّمْويهِ، وَاجْعَلْ لى نَصيباً مِنْ كُلِّ خَيْرٍ تُنْزِلُ فيهِ، بِجُودِكَ يا اجْوَدَ الْأَجْوَدينَ اليوم الرابع: اللهُمَّ قَوِّنى فيهِ عَلى اقامَةِ امْرِكَ، وَاذِقْنى فيهِ حَلاوَةَ ذِكْرِكَ، وَاوْزِعْنى فيهِ لِأَدآءِ شُكْرِكَ بِكَرَمِكَ، وَاحْفَظْنى فيهِ بِحِفْظِكَ وَسَتْرِكَ، يا ابْصَرَ النَّاظِرينَ اليوم الخامس: اللهُمَّ اجْعَلْنى فيهِ مِنَ الْمُسْتَغْفِرينَ، وَاجْعَلْنى فيهِ مِنْ عِبادِكَ الصَّالِحينَ اْلقانِتينَ، وَاجْعَلنى فيهِ مِنْ اوْلِيآئِكَ الْمُقَرَّبينَ، بِرَأْفَتِكَ يا ارْحَمَ الرَّاحِمينَ اليوم السادس: اللهُمَّ لا تَخْذُلْنى فيهِ لِتَعَرُّضِ مَعْصِيَتِكَ، وَلاتَضْرِبْنى بِسِياطِ نَقِمَتِكَ، وَزَحْزِحْنى فيهِ مِنْ مُوجِباتِ سَخَطِكَ، بِمَنِّكَ وَاياديكَ، يا مُنْتَهى رَغْبَةِ الرَّاغِبينَ اليوم السابع: اللهُمَّ اعِنّى فيهِ عَلى صِيامِهِ وَقِيامِهِ، وَجَنِّبْنى فيهِ مِنْ هَفَواتِهِ وَ اثامِهِ، وَارْزُقْنى فيهِ ذِكْرَكَ بِدَوامِهِ، بِتَوْفيقِكَ يا هادِىَ الْمُضِلّينَ اليوم الثامن: اللهُمَّ ارْزُقْنى فيهِ رَحْمَةَ الْأَيْتامِ، وَاطْعامَ الطَّعامِ، وَافْشآءَ السَّلامِ، وَصُحْبَةَ الْكِرامِ، بِطَوْلِكَ يا مَلْجَا الْأمِلينَ اليوم التاسع: اللهُمَّ اجْعَلْ لى فيهِ نَصيباً مِنْ رَحْمَتِكَ الْواسِعَةِ، وَاهْدِنى فيهِ لِبَراهينِكَ السَّاطِعَةِ، وَخُذْ بِناصِيَتى الى مَرْضاتِكَ الْجامِعَةِ، بِمَحَبَّتِكَ يا امَلَ الْمُشْتاقينَ اليوم العاشر: اللهُمَّ اجْعَلْنى فيهِ مِنَ الْمُتَوَكِّلينَ عَلَيْكَ، وَاجْعَلْنى فيهِ مِنَ الْفآئِزينَ لَدَيْكَ، وَاجْعَلْنى فيهِ مِنَ الْمُقَرَّبينَ الَيْكَ، بِاحْسانِكَ يا غايَةَ الطَّالِبينَ اليوم الحادي عشر: اللهُمَّ حَبِّبْ الَىَّ فيهِ الْإِحْسانَ، وَكَرِّهْ الَىَّ فيهِ الْفُسُوقَ وَالْعِصْيانَ، وَحَرِّمْ عَلَىَّ فيهِ
items.english:
Supplication for the first day: O Allah, make my fasting in it the fasting of those who truly fast, and my standing [in prayer] in it the standing of those who truly stand, and awaken me in it from the sleep of the heedless, and forgive my transgression in it, O God of the worlds, and pardon me, O Pardoner of the sinners.

The second day: O Allah, bring me closer in it to Your pleasure, and distance me in it from Your anger and Your punishments, and grant me success in it to recite Your verses, by Your mercy, O Most Merciful of the merciful.

The third day: O Allah, grant me in it intelligence and awareness, and keep me away in it from foolishness and deception, and grant me a portion of every good that You send down in it, by Your generosity, O Most Generous of the generous.

The fourth day: O Allah, strengthen me in it to establish Your command, and make me taste in it the sweetness of Your remembrance, and inspire me in it to offer Your thanks by Your nobility, and protect me in it by Your protection and Your concealment, O Most Seeing of those who see.

The fifth day: O Allah, make me in it among those who seek forgiveness, and make me in it among Your righteous, obedient servants, and make me in it among Your close friends, by Your kindness, O Most Merciful of the merciful.

The sixth day: O Allah, do not forsake me in it for exposing myself to Your disobedience, and do not strike me with the whips of Your punishment, and keep me away in it from the causes of Your anger, by Your favor and Your bounties, O Ultimate Desire of those who desire.

The seventh day: O Allah, assist me in it with its fasting and its standing, and keep me away in it from its lapses and sins, and grant me in it Your remembrance continuously, by Your success, O Guide of the astray.

The eighth day: O Allah, grant me in it mercy for the orphans, the feeding of food, the spreading of peace, and the company of the noble, by Your bounty, O Refuge of those who hope.

The ninth day: O Allah, grant me in it a portion of Your vast mercy, and guide me in it toward Your shining proofs, and lead me by my forelock to Your comprehensive pleasure, by Your love, O Hope of the longing.

The tenth day: O Allah, make me in it among those who trust in You, and make me in it among the successful with You, and make me in it among those drawn near to You, by Your benevolence, O Goal of the seekers.

The eleventh day: O Allah, make me love in it benevolence, and make me hate in it wickedness and disobedience, and forbid upon me in it...
items.transliteration: Du'a'u al-yawmi al-awwali: Allahumma ij'al siyami fihi siyama al-sa'imina, wa-qiyami fihi qiyama al-qa'imina, wa-nabbihni fihi 'an nawmati al-ghafilina, wa-hab li jurmi fihi ya ilaha al-'alamina, wa'fu 'anni ya 'afiyan 'ani al-mujrimina. al-Yawmu al-thani: Allahumma qarribni fihi ila mardatika, wa-jannibni fihi min sakhatika wa-naqimatika, wa-waffiqni fihi li-qira'ati ayatika, bi-rahmatika ya arhama al-rahimina. al-Yawmu al-thalithu: Allahumma urzuqni fihi al-dhihna wa-al-tanbiha, wa-ba'idni fihi mina al-safahati wa-al-tamwihi, wa-ij'al li nasiban min kulli khayrin tunzilu fihi, bi-judika ya ajwada al-ajwadina. al-Yawmu al-rabi'u: Allahumma qawwini fihi 'ala iqamati amrika, wa-adhiqni fihi halawata dhikrika, wa-awzi'ni fihi li-ada'i shukrika bi-karamika, wa-ihfazni fihi bi-hifzika wa-sitrika, ya absara al-nazirina. al-Yawmu al-khamisu: Allahumma ij'alni fihi mina al-mustaghfirina, wa-ij'alni fihi min 'ibadika al-salihina al-qanitina, wa-ij'alni fihi min awliya'ika al-muqarrabina, bi-ra'fatika ya arhama al-rahimina. al-Yawmu al-sadisu: Allahumma la takhdhulni fihi li-ta'arrudi ma'siyatika, wa-la tadribni bi-siyati naqimatika, wa-zahzihni fihi min mujibati sakhatika, bi-mannika wa-ayadika, ya muntaha raghbati al-raghibina. al-Yawmu al-sabi'u: Allahumma a'inni fihi 'ala siyamishi wa-qiyamihi, wa-jannibni fihi min hafawatihi wa-athamihi, wa-urzuqni fihi dhikraka bi-dawamihi, bi-tawfiqika ya hadiya al-mudillina. al-Yawmu al-thaminu: Allahumma urzuqni fihi rahmata al-aytami, wa-it'ama al-ta'ami, wa-ifsha'a al-salami, wa-suhbata al-kirami, bi-tawlika ya malja'a al-amilina. al-Yawmu al-tasi'u: Allahumma ij'al li fihi nasiban min rahmatika al-wasi'ati, wa-ihdini fihi li-barahinika al-sati'ati, wa-khudh bi-nasiyati ila mardatika al-jami'ati, bi-mahabbatika ya amala al-mushtaqina. al-Yawmu al-'ashiru: Allahumma ij'alni fihi mina al-mutawakkilina 'alayka, wa-ij'alni fihi mina al-fa'izina ladayka, wa-ij'alni fihi mina al-muqarrabina ilayka, bi-ihsanika ya ghayata al-talibina. al-Yawmu al-hadi 'ashara: Allahumma habbib ilayya fihi al-ihsana, wa-karrih ilayya fihi al-fusuqa wa-al-'isyana, wa-harrim 'alayya fihi.

items.arabic: دعاء اليوم الأوّل: اللهُمَّ اجْعَلْ صِيامى فيهِ صِيامَ الصَّآئِمينَ، وَقِيامى فيهِ قيامَ الْقآئِمينَ، وَنَبِّهْنى فيهِ عَنْ نَوْمَةِالْغافِلينَ، وَهَبْ لى جُرْمى فيهِ يا الهَ الْعالَمينَ، وَاعْفُ عَنّى يا عافِياً عَنِ الْمُجْرِمينَ اليوم الثاني: اللهُمَّ قَرِّبْنى فيهِ الى مَرْضاتِكَ، وَجَنِّبْنى فيهِ مِنْ سَخَطِكَ وَنَقِماتِكَ، وَوَفِّقْنى فيهِ لِقِرآئَةِ اياتِكَ، بِرَحْمَتِكَ يا ارْحَمَ الرَّاحِمينَ اليوم الثالث: اللهُمَّ ارْزُقْنى فيهِ الذِّهْنَ وَالتَّنْبيهَ، وَباعِدْنى فيهِ مِنَ السَّفاهَةِ وَالتَّمْويهِ، وَاجْعَلْ لى نَصيباً مِنْ كُلِّ خَيْرٍ تُنْزِلُ فيهِ، بِجُودِكَ يا اجْوَدَ الْأَجْوَدينَ اليوم الرابع: اللهُمَّ قَوِّنى فيهِ عَلى اقامَةِ امْرِكَ، وَاذِقْنى فيهِ حَلاوَةَ ذِكْرِكَ، وَاوْزِعْنى فيهِ لِأَدآءِ شُكْرِكَ بِكَرَمِكَ، وَاحْفَظْنى فيهِ بِحِفْظِكَ وَسَتْرِكَ، يا ابْصَرَ النَّاظِرينَ اليوم الخامس: اللهُمَّ اجْعَلْنى فيهِ مِنَ الْمُسْتَغْفِرينَ، وَاجْعَلْنى فيهِ مِنْ عِبادِكَ الصَّالِحينَ اْلقانِتينَ، وَاجْعَلنى فيهِ مِنْ اوْلِيآئِكَ الْمُقَرَّبينَ، بِرَأْفَتِكَ يا ارْحَمَ الرَّاحِمينَ اليوم السادس: اللهُمَّ لا تَخْذُلْنى فيهِ لِتَعَرُّضِ مَعْصِيَتِكَ، وَلاتَضْرِبْنى بِسِياطِ نَقِمَتِكَ، وَزَحْزِحْنى فيهِ مِنْ مُوجِباتِ سَخَطِكَ، بِمَنِّكَ وَاياديكَ، يا مُنْتَهى رَغْبَةِ الرَّاغِبينَ اليوم السابع: اللهُمَّ اعِنّى فيهِ عَلى صِيامِهِ وَقِيامِهِ، وَجَنِّبْنى فيهِ مِنْ هَفَواتِهِ وَ اثامِهِ، وَارْزُقْنى فيهِ ذِكْرَكَ بِدَوامِهِ، بِتَوْفيقِكَ يا هادِىَ الْمُضِلّينَ اليوم الثامن: اللهُمَّ ارْزُقْنى فيهِ رَحْمَةَ الْأَيْتامِ، وَاطْعامَ الطَّعامِ، وَافْشآءَ السَّلامِ، وَصُحْبَةَ الْكِرامِ، بِطَوْلِكَ يا مَلْجَا الْأمِلينَ اليوم التاسع: اللهُمَّ اجْعَلْ لى فيهِ نَصيباً مِنْ رَحْمَتِكَ الْواسِعَةِ، وَاهْدِنى فيهِ لِبَراهينِكَ السَّاطِعَةِ، وَخُذْ بِناصِيَتى الى مَرْضاتِكَ الْجامِعَةِ، بِمَحَبَّتِكَ يا امَلَ الْمُشْتاقينَ اليوم العاشر: اللهُمَّ اجْعَلْنى فيهِ مِنَ الْمُتَوَكِّلينَ عَلَيْكَ، وَاجْعَلْنى فيهِ مِنَ الْفآئِزينَ لَدَيْكَ، وَاجْعَلْنى فيهِ مِنَ الْمُقَرَّبينَ الَيْكَ، بِاحْسانِكَ يا غايَةَ الطَّالِبينَ اليوم الحادي عشر: اللهُمَّ حَبِّبْ الَىَّ فيهِ الْإِحْسانَ، وَكَرِّهْ الَىَّ فيهِ الْفُسُوقَ وَالْعِصْيانَ، وَحَرِّمْ عَلَىَّ فيهِ
items.english: Supplication for the first day: O Allah, make my fasting in it the fasting of those who truly fast, and my standing [in prayer] in it the standing of those who truly stand, and awaken me in it from the sleep of the heedless, and forgive my transgression in it, O God of the worlds, and pardon me, O Pardoner of the sinners. The second day: O Allah, draw me near in it to Your pleasure, and distance me in it from Your wrath and punishments, and grant me success in it to recite Your verses, by Your mercy, O most Merciful of the merciful. The third day: O Allah, grant me in it intellect and alertness, and distance me in it from folly and vanity, and ordain for me a share of every good You send down in it, by Your generosity, O most Generous of the generous. The fourth day: O Allah, strengthen me in it to carry out Your command, and make me taste in it the sweetness of Your remembrance, and inspire me in it to give thanks to You by Your nobility, and protect me in it with Your protection and Your concealment, O most Discerning of observers. The fifth day: O Allah, place me in it among those who seek forgiveness, and place me in it among Your righteous, obedient servants, and place me in it among Your close friends, by Your kindness, O most Merciful of the merciful. The sixth day: O Allah, do not abandon me in it due to exposure to Your disobedience, and do not strike me with the whips of Your punishment, and keep me away in it from the causes of Your wrath, by Your grace and Your favors, O ultimate goal of the desires of those who desire. The seventh day: O Allah, assist me in it with its fasting and its standing [in prayer], and distance me in it from its slips and its sins, and grant me in it Your perpetual remembrance, by Your success, O Guide of those who go astray. The eighth day: O Allah, grant me in it mercy towards orphans, the feeding of food, the spreading of peace, and the companionship of the noble, by Your bounty, O Refuge of those who hope. The ninth day: O Allah, ordain for me in it a share of Your vast mercy, and guide me in it to Your shining proofs, and lead me by my forelock to Your comprehensive pleasure, by Your love, O Hope of those who yearn. The tenth day: O Allah, place me in it among those who rely upon You, and place me in it among the successful with You, and place me in it among those brought near to You, by Your excellence, O Goal of the seekers. The eleventh day: O Allah, make good deeds beloved to me in it, and make transgression and disobedience hateful to me in it, and forbid upon me in it
items.transliteration: Du'a'u al-yawmi al-awwali: Allahumma ij'al siyami fihi siyama al-sa'imina, wa-qiyami fihi qiyama al-qa'imina, wa-nabbihni fihi 'an nawmati al-ghafilina, wa-hab li jurmi fihi ya ilaha al-'alamina, wa'fu 'anni ya 'afiyan 'ani al-mujrimina. Al-yawmu al-thani: Allahumma qarribni fihi ila mardatika, wa-jannibni fihi min sakhatika wa-naqimatika, wa-waffiqni fihi li-qira'ati ayatika, bi-rahmatika ya arhama al-rahimina. Al-yawmu al-thalithu: Allahumma arzuqni fihi al-dhihna wa-al-tanbiha, wa-ba'idni fihi mina al-safahati wa-al-tamwihi, wa-ij'al li nasiban min kulli khayrin tunzilu fihi, bi-judika ya ajwada al-ajwadina. Al-yawmu al-rabi'u: Allahumma qawwini fihi 'ala iqamati amrika, wa-adhiqni fihi halawata dhikrika, wa-awzi'ni fihi li-ada'i shukrika bi-karamika, wa-ihfazni fihi bi-hifzika wa-satrika, ya absara al-nazirina. Al-yawmu al-khamisu: Allahumma ij'alni fihi mina al-mustaghfirina, wa-ij'alni fihi min 'ibadika al-salihina al-qanitina, wa-ij'alni fihi min awliya'ika al-muqarrabina, bi-ra'fatika ya arhama al-rahimina. Al-yawmu al-sadisu: Allahumma la takhdhulni fihi li-ta'arrudi ma'siyatika, wa-la tadribni bi-siyati naqimatika, wa-zahzihni fihi min mujibati sakhatika, bi-mannika wa-ayadika, ya muntaha raghbati al-raghibina. Al-yawmu al-sabi'u: Allahumma a'inni fihi 'ala siyamihi wa-qiyamihi, wa-jannibni fihi min hafawatihi wa-athamihi, wa-arzuqni fihi dhikraka bi-dawamihi, bi-tawfiqika ya hadiya al-mudillina. Al-yawmu al-thaminu: Allahumma arzuqni fihi rahmata al-aytami, wa-it'ama al-ta'ami, wa-ifsha'a al-salami, wa-suhbata al-kirami, bi-tawlika ya malja'a al-amilina. Al-yawmu al-tasi'u: Allahumma ij'al li fihi nasiban min rahmatika al-wasi'ati, wa-ihdini fihi li-barahinika al-sati'ati, wa-khudh bi-nasiyati ila mardatika al-jami'ati, bi-mahabbatika ya amala al-mushtaqina. Al-yawmu al-'ashiru: Allahumma ij'alni fihi mina al-mutawakkilina 'alayka, wa-ij'alni fihi mina al-fa'izina ladayka, wa-ij'alni fihi mina al-muqarrabina ilayka, bi-ihsanika ya ghayata al-talibina. Al-yawmu al-hadi 'ashara: Allahumma habbib ilayya fihi al-ihsana, wa-karrih ilayya fihi al-fusuqa wa-al-'isyana, wa-harrim 'alayya fihi.

items.arabic: السَّخَطَ وَالنّيرانَ، بِعَوْنِكَ يا غِياثَ الْمُسْتَغيثينَ اليوم الثاني: اللهُمَّ زَيِّنّى فيهِ بِالسَّتْرِ وَالْعَفافِ، وَاسْتُرْنى فيهِ بِلِباسِ الْقُنُوعِ وَالْكَفافِ، وَاحْمِلْنى فيهِ عَلَى الْعَدْلِ وَالْإِنْصافِ، وَ امِنّى فيهِ مِنْ كُلِّ ما اخافُ، بِعِصْمَتِكَ ياعِصْمَةَ الْخآئِفينَ اليوم الثالث عشر: أَللَّهُمَّ طَهِّرْنِى فيهِ مِنَ الدَّنَسِ وَالْأَقْذارِ، وَصَبِّرْنى فيهِ عَلى كائناتِ الْأقْدارِ، وَوَفِّقْنى فيهِ لِلتُّقى وَصُحْبَةِ الْابْرارِ، بِعَوْنِكَ يا قُرَّةَ عَيْنِ الْمَساكين.* اليوم الرابع عشر: اللَّهُمَّ لا تُؤاخِذْنى فيهِ بِالْعَثَراتِ، وَأَقْلِنِى فيهِ مِنَ الْخَطايا وَالْهَفَواتِ، وَلا تَجْعَلْنى فيهِ غَرَضاً لِلْبَلايا وَالْأفاتِ، بِعِزَّتِكَ يا عِزَّ الْمُسْلِمينَ اليوم الخامس عشر: اللهُمَّ ارْزُقْنى فيهِ طاعَةَالْخاشِعينَ، وَاشْرَحْ فيهِ صَدْرى بِانابَةِ الْمُخْبِتينَ، بِامانِكَ يا امانَ الْخآئِفينَ اليوم السادس عشر: اللهُمَّ وَفِّقْنى فيهِ لِمُوافَقَةِ الْأَبْرارِ، وَجَنِّبْنى فيهِ مُرافَقَةَ الْأَشْرارِ، وَآوِنى فيهِ بِرَحْمَتِكَ الى دارِالْقَرارِ، بِالهِيَّتِكَ يا الهَ الْعالَمينَ اليوم السابع عشر: اللهُمَّ اهْدِنى فيهِ لِصالِحِ الْأَعْمالِ، وَاقْضِ لى فيهِ الْحَوآئِجَ وَالْأمالَ، يا مَنْ لا يَحْتاجُ الَى التَّفْسيرِ وَالسُّؤالِ، يا عالِماً بِما فى صُدُورِ الْعالَمينَ، [صَلِّ عَلى مُحَمَّدٍ وَآلِهِ الطَّاهِرينِ . * اليوم الثامن عشر:
items.english:
...wrath and the [Hell]fire, by Your help, O Succor of those who seek succor.

The second day: O Allah, adorn me in it with concealment and chastity, and clothe me in it with the garment of contentment and sufficiency, and lead me in it toward justice and fairness, and grant me safety in it from all that I fear, by Your protection, O Protector of the fearful.

The thirteenth day: O Allah, purify me in it from filth and impurities, and make me patient in it over the decrees of destiny, and grant me success in it for piety and the company of the righteous, by Your help, O Delight of the eyes of the poor.

The fourteenth day: O Allah, do not take me to task in it for lapses, and excuse me in it from sins and errors, and do not make me in it a target for calamities and afflictions, by Your might, O Might of the Muslims.

The fifteenth day: O Allah, grant me in it the obedience of the humble, and expand my chest in it with the repentance of those who are lowly [before You], by Your security, O Security of the fearful.

The sixteenth day: O Allah, grant me success in it to agree with the righteous, and keep me away in it from the company of the wicked, and give me shelter in it by Your mercy in the Abode of Permanence, by Your Divinity, O God of the worlds.

The seventeenth day: O Allah, guide me in it toward righteous deeds, and fulfill for me in it my needs and hopes, O He who needs no explanation or questioning, O Knower of what is in the chests of [those in] the worlds, [invoke blessings upon Muhammad and his pure family].

The eighteenth day:
items.transliteration: al-sakhata wa-al-nirana, bi-'awnika ya ghiyatha al-mustaghithina. Al-yawmu al-thani: Allahumma zayyinni fihi bi-al-satri wa-al-'afafi, wa-usturni fihi bi-libasi al-qunu'i wa-al-kafafi, wa-ahmilni fihi 'ala al-'adli wa-al-insafi, wa-aminni fihi min kulli ma akhafu, bi-'ismatika ya 'ismata al-kha'ifina. Al-yawmu al-thalitha 'ashara: Allahumma tahhirni fihi mina al-danasi wa-al-aqdhari, wa-sabbirni fihi 'ala ka'inati al-aqdari, wa-waffiqni fihi li-al-tuqa wa-suhbati al-abrari, bi-'awnika ya qurrata 'ayni al-masakina. Al-yawmu al-rabi'a 'ashara: Allahumma la tu'akhidhni fihi bi-al-'atharati, wa-aqilni fihi mina al-khataya wa-al-hafawati, wa-la taj'alni fihi gharadan li-al-balaya wa-al-afati, bi-'izzatika ya 'izza al-muslimina. Al-yawmu al-khamisa 'ashara: Allahumma urzuqni fihi ta'ata al-khashi'ina, wa-ashrah fihi sadri bi-inabati al-mukhbitina, bi-amanika ya amana al-kha'ifina. Al-yawmu al-sadisa 'ashara: Allahumma waffiqni fihi li-muwafaqati al-abrari, wa-jannibni fihi murafaqata al-ashrari, wa-awini fihi bi-rahmatika ila dari al-qarari, bi-ilahiyyatika ya ilaha al-'alamina. Al-yawmu al-sabi'a 'ashara: Allahumma ihdini fihi li-salihi al-a'mali, wa-qdi li fihi al-hawa'ija wa-al-amala, ya man la yahtaju ila al-tafsiri wa-al-su'ali, ya 'aliman bima fi suduri al-'alamina, [salli 'ala Muhammadin wa-alihi al-tahirina]. Al-yawmu al-thamina 'ashara:

footnote_refs.title: وردت هذه الجملة في بحار الأنوار: ج 95، ص 47.

items.arabic: اللهُمَّ نَبِّهْنى فيهِ لِبَرَكاتِ اسْحارِهِ، وَنَوِّرْفيهِ قَلْبى بِضِيآءِ انْوارِهِ، وَخُذْ بِكُلِّ اعْضآئى الَى اتِّباعِ اثارِهِ، بِنُورِكَ يا مُنَوِّرَ قُلُوبِ الْعارِفينَ اليوم التاسع عشر: اللهُمَّ وَفِّرْ فيهِ حَظّى مِنْ بَرَكاتِهِ، وَسَهِّلْ سَبيلى الى خَيْراتِهِ، وَلا تَحْرِمْنى قَبُولَ حَسَناتِهِ، يا هادِياً الَى الْحَقِّ الْمُبينِ اليوم العشرون: اللهُمَّ افْتَحْ لى فيهِ ابْوابَ الْجِنانِ، وَاغْلِقْ عَنّى فيهِ ابْوابَ النّيرانِ، وَوَفِّقْنى فيهِ لِتلاوَةِ الْقُرْآنِ، يا مُنْزِلَ السَّكينَةِ فى قُلُوبِ الْمُؤْمِنينَ اليوم الحادي والعشرون: اللهُمَّ اجْعَلْ لى فيهِ الى مَرْضاتِكَ دَليلًا، وَلا تَجْعَلْ لِلشَّيْطانِ فيهِ عَلَىَّ سَبيلًا، وَاجْعَلِ الْجَنَّةَ لى مَنْزِلًا
items.english:
O Allah, awaken me in it to the blessings of its dawns, and illuminate my heart in it with the radiance of its lights, and lead all my limbs to follow its traces, by Your light, O Illuminator of the hearts of the gnostics.

The nineteenth day: O Allah, make my share of its blessings abundant in it, and ease my path toward its good deeds, and do not deprive me of the acceptance of its virtues, O Guide to the manifest truth.

The twentieth day: O Allah, open for me in it the gates of the Gardens, and close against me in it the gates of the [Hell]fire, and grant me success in it to recite the Qur’an, O Sender of tranquility into the hearts of the believers.

The twenty-first day: O Allah, appoint for me in it a guide toward Your pleasure, and do not grant Satan any way over me in it, and make Paradise an abode for me.
items.transliteration: Allahumma nabbihni fihi li-barakati asharihi, wa-nawwir fihi qalbi bi-diya'i anwarihi, wa-khudh bi-kulli a'da'i ila ittiba'i atharihi, bi-nurika ya munawwira qulubi al-'arifina. Al-yawmu al-tasi'a 'ashara: Allahumma waffir fihi hazzi min barakatihi, wa-sahhil sabili ila khayratihi, wa-la tahrimni qabula hasanatihi, ya hadiyan ila al-haqqi al-mubini. Al-yawmu al-'ishruna: Allahumma iftah li fihi abwaba al-jinani, wa-aghliq 'anni fihi abwaba al-nirani, wa-waffiqni fihi li-tilawati al-Qur'ani, ya munzila al-sakinati fi qulubi al-mu'minina. Al-yawmu al-hadi wa-al-'ishruna: Allahumma ij'al li fihi ila mardatika dalilan, wa-la taj'al li-al-shaytani fihi 'alayya sabilan, wa-ij'al al-jannata li manzilan.

items.arabic: السَّخَطَ وَالنّيرانَ، بِعَوْنِكَ يا غِياثَ الْمُسْتَغيثينَ اليوم الثاني: اللهُمَّ زَيِّنّى فيهِ بِالسَّتْرِ وَالْعَفافِ، وَاسْتُرْنى فيهِ بِلِباسِ الْقُنُوعِ وَالْكَفافِ، وَاحْمِلْنى فيهِ عَلَى الْعَدْلِ وَالْإِنْصافِ، وَ امِنّى فيهِ مِنْ كُلِّ ما اخافُ، بِعِصْمَتِكَ ياعِصْمَةَ الْخآئِفينَ اليوم الثالث عشر: أَللَّهُمَّ طَهِّرْنِى فيهِ مِنَ الدَّنَسِ وَالْأَقْذارِ، وَصَبِّرْنى فيهِ عَلى كائناتِ الْأقْدارِ، وَوَفِّقْنى فيهِ لِلتُّقى وَصُحْبَةِ الْابْرارِ، بِعَوْنِكَ يا قُرَّةَ عَيْنِ الْمَساكين.* اليوم الرابع عشر: اللَّهُمَّ لا تُؤاخِذْنى فيهِ بِالْعَثَراتِ، وَأَقْلِنِى فيهِ مِنَ الْخَطايا وَالْهَفَواتِ، وَلا تَجْعَلْنى فيهِ غَرَضاً لِلْبَلايا وَالْأفاتِ، بِعِزَّتِكَ يا عِزَّ الْمُسْلِمينَ اليوم الخامس عشر: اللهُمَّ ارْزُقْنى فيهِ طاعَةَالْخاشِعينَ، وَاشْرَحْ فيهِ صَدْرى بِانابَةِ الْمُخْبِتينَ، بِامانِكَ يا امانَ الْخآئِفينَ اليوم السادس عشر: اللهُمَّ وَفِّقْنى فيهِ لِمُوافَقَةِ الْأَبْرارِ، وَجَنِّبْنى فيهِ مُرافَقَةَ الْأَشْرارِ، وَآوِنى فيهِ بِرَحْمَتِكَ الى دارِالْقَرارِ، بِالهِيَّتِكَ يا الهَ الْعالَمينَ اليوم السابع عشر: اللهُمَّ اهْدِنى فيهِ لِصالِحِ الْأَعْمالِ، وَاقْضِ لى فيهِ الْحَوآئِجَ وَالْأمالَ، يا مَنْ لا يَحْتاجُ الَى التَّفْسيرِ وَالسُّؤالِ، يا عالِماً بِما فى صُدُورِ الْعالَمينَ، [صَلِّ عَلى مُحَمَّدٍ وَآلِهِ الطَّاهِرينِ . * اليوم الثامن عشر:
items.english:
...wrath and the [Hell]fire, by Your help, O Succor of those who seek succor.

The second day: O Allah, adorn me in it with concealment and chastity, and clothe me in it with the garment of contentment and sufficiency, and lead me in it toward justice and fairness, and grant me safety in it from all that I fear, by Your protection, O Protection of the fearful.

The thirteenth day: O Allah, purify me in it from filth and impurities, and grant me patience in it over the occurrences of the [divine] decrees, and grant me success in it for piety and the company of the righteous, by Your help, O Delight of the eyes of the poor.

The fourteenth day: O Allah, do not take me to task in it for slips, and excuse me in it from mistakes and lapses, and do not make me in it a target for trials and calamities, by Your might, O Might of the Muslims.

The fifteenth day: O Allah, grant me in it the obedience of the humble, and expand my chest in it with the repentance of the submissive, by Your security, O Security of the fearful.

The sixteenth day: O Allah, grant me success in it to be in agreement with the righteous, and keep me away in it from the company of the wicked, and give me refuge in it by Your mercy in the Abode of Stability, by Your Divinity, O God of the worlds.

The seventeenth day: O Allah, guide me in it toward righteous deeds, and fulfill my needs and hopes in it, O He who needs no explanation or questioning, O Knower of what is in the breasts of [the beings of] the worlds, [send blessings upon Muhammad and his pure family].

The eighteenth day:
items.transliteration: al-sakhata wa-al-nirana, bi-'awnika ya ghiyatha al-mustaghithina. Al-yawmu al-thani: Allahumma zayyinni fihi bi-al-satri wa-al-'afafi, wa-usturni fihi bi-libasi al-qunu'i wa-al-kafafi, wa-ahmilni fihi 'ala al-'adli wa-al-insafi, wa-aminni fihi min kulli ma akhafu, bi-'ismatika ya 'ismata al-kha'ifina. Al-yawmu al-thalitha 'ashara: Allahumma tahhirni fihi mina al-danasi wa-al-aqdhari, wa-sabbirni fihi 'ala ka'inati al-aqdari, wa-waffiqni fihi li-al-tuqa wa-suhbati al-abrari, bi-'awnika ya qurrata 'ayni al-masakini. Al-yawmu al-rabi'a 'ashara: Allahumma la tu'akhidhni fihi bi-al-'atharati, wa-aqilni fihi mina al-khataya wa-al-hafawati, wa-la taj'alni fihi gharadan li-al-balaya wa-al-afati, bi-'izzatika ya 'izza al-muslimina. Al-yawmu al-khamisa 'ashara: Allahumma urzuqni fihi ta'ata al-khashi'ina, wa-ishrah fihi sadri bi-inabati al-mukhbitina, bi-amanika ya amana al-kha'ifina. Al-yawmu al-sadisa 'ashara: Allahumma waffiqni fihi li-muwafaqati al-abrari, wa-jannibni fihi murafaqata al-ashrari, wa-awini fihi bi-rahmatika ila dari al-qarari, bi-ilahiyyatika ya ilaha al-'alamina. Al-yawmu al-sabi'a 'ashara: Allahumma ihdini fihi li-salihi al-a'mali, wa-aqdi li fihi al-hawa'ija wa-al-amala, ya man la yahtaju ila al-tafsiri wa-al-su'ali, ya 'aliman bima fi suduri al-'alamina, [salli 'ala Muhammadin wa-alihi al-tahirina]. Al-yawmu al-thamina 'ashara:

footnote_refs.title: وردت هذه الجملة في بحار الأنوار: ج 95، ص 47.

items.arabic: اللهُمَّ نَبِّهْنى فيهِ لِبَرَكاتِ اسْحارِهِ، وَنَوِّرْفيهِ قَلْبى بِضِيآءِ انْوارِهِ، وَخُذْ بِكُلِّ اعْضآئى الَى اتِّباعِ اثارِهِ، بِنُورِكَ يا مُنَوِّرَ قُلُوبِ الْعارِفينَ اليوم التاسع عشر: اللهُمَّ وَفِّرْ فيهِ حَظّى مِنْ بَرَكاتِهِ، وَسَهِّلْ سَبيلى الى خَيْراتِهِ، وَلا تَحْرِمْنى قَبُولَ حَسَناتِهِ، يا هادِياً الَى الْحَقِّ الْمُبينِ اليوم العشرون: اللهُمَّ افْتَحْ لى فيهِ ابْوابَ الْجِنانِ، وَاغْلِقْ عَنّى فيهِ ابْوابَ النّيرانِ، وَوَفِّقْنى فيهِ لِتلاوَةِ الْقُرْآنِ، يا مُنْزِلَ السَّكينَةِ فى قُلُوبِ الْمُؤْمِنينَ اليوم الحادي والعشرون: اللهُمَّ اجْعَلْ لى فيهِ الى مَرْضاتِكَ دَليلًا، وَلا تَجْعَلْ لِلشَّيْطانِ فيهِ عَلَىَّ سَبيلًا، وَاجْعَلِ الْجَنَّةَ لى مَنْزِلًا
items.english:
O Allah, awaken me in it to the blessings of its dawns, and illuminate my heart in it with the radiance of its lights, and lead all my limbs to follow its traces, by Your light, O Illuminator of the hearts of the gnostics.

The nineteenth day: O Allah, make my share of its blessings abundant in it, and make easy my way to its good deeds, and do not deprive me of the acceptance of its good deeds, O Guide to the manifest truth.

The twentieth day: O Allah, open for me in it the gates of the Gardens, and close against me in it the gates of the [Hell]fires, and grant me success in it for the recitation of the Quran, O Sender down of tranquility into the hearts of the believers.

The twenty-first day: O Allah, appoint for me in it a guide to Your pleasure, and do not let *Shaytan* have a way over me in it, and make Paradise a dwelling for me
items.transliteration: Allahumma nabbihni fihi li-barakati asharihi, wa-nawwir fihi qalbi bi-diya'i anwarihi, wa-khudh bi-kulli a'da'i ila ittiba'i atharihi, bi-nurika ya munawwira qulubi al-'arifina. Al-yawmu al-tasi'a 'ashara: Allahumma waffir fihi hazzi min barakatihi, wa-sahhil sabili ila khayratihi, wa-la tahrimni qabula hasanatihi, ya hadiyan ila al-haqqi al-mubini. Al-yawmu al-'ishruna: Allahumma iftah li fihi abwaba al-jinani, wa-aghliq 'anni fihi abwaba al-nirani, wa-waffiqni fihi li-tilawati al-Qur'ani, ya munzila al-sakinati fi qulubi al-mu'minina. Al-yawmu al-hadi wa-al-'ishruna: Allahumma ij'al li fihi ila mardatika dalilan, wa-la taj'al li-l-shaytani fihi 'alayya sabilan, wa-ij'ali al-jannata li manzilan.

items.arabic: وَمَقيلًا، يا قاضِىَ حَوآئِجِ الطَّالِبينَ اليوم الثاني والعشرون: اللهُمَّ افْتَحْ لى فيهِ ابْوابَ فَضْلِكَ، وَانْزِلْ عَلَىَّ فيهِ بَرَكاتِكَ، وَوَفِّقْنى فيهِ لِمُوجِباتِ مَرْضاتِكَ، وَاسْكِنّى فيهِ بُحْبُوحاتِ جَنَّاتِكَ، يا مُجيبَ دَعْوَةِ الْمُضْطَرّينَ اليوم الثالث والعشرون: اللهُمَّ اغْسِلْنى فيهِ مِنَ الذُّنُوبِ، وَطَهِّرْنى فيهِ مِنَ الْعُيُوبِ، وَامْتَحِنْ قَلْبى فيهِ بِتَقْوَى الْقُلُوبِ، يا مُقيلَ عَثَراتِ الْمُذْنِبينَ اليوم الرابع والعشرون: اللَّهُمَّ انّى اسْئَلُكَ فيهِ ما يُرْضيكَ، وَاعُوذُ بِكَ مِمَّا يُؤْذيكَ، وَاسْئَلُكَ التَّوْفيقَ فيهِ لِأَنْ اطيعَكَ وَلا اعْصِيَكَ، يا جَوادَ السَّآئِلينَ اليوم الخامس والعشرون: اللهُمَّ اجْعَلْنى فيهِ مُحِبَّاً لِأَوْلِيآئِكَ، وَمُعادِياً لِأَعْدآئِكَ، مُسْتَنّاً بِسُنَّةِ خاتَمِ انْبِيآئِكَ، يا عاصِمَ قُلُوبِ النَّبِيّينَ اليوم السادس والعشرون: اللهُمَّ اجْعَلْ سَعْيى فيهِ مَشْكُوراً، وَذَنْبى فيهِ مَغْفُوراً، وَعَمَلى فيهِ مَقْبُولًا، وَعَيْبى فيهِ مَسْتُوراً، يا اسْمَعَ السَّامِعينَ اليوم السابع والعشرون: اللهُمَّ ارْزُقْنى فيهِ فَضْلَ لَيْلَةِ الْقَدْرِ، وَصَيِّرْ امُورى فيهِ مِنَ الْعُسْرِ الَى الْيُسْرِ، وَاقْبَلْ مَعاذيرى وَحُطَّ عَنِّى الذَّنْبَ وَالْوِزْرَ، يا رَؤُفاً بِعِبادِهِ الصَّالِحينَ اليوم الثامن والعشرون: اللهُمَّ وَفِّرْ حَظّى فيهِ مِنَ النَّوافِلِ، وَاكْرِمْنى فيهِ بِاحْضارِ الْمَسآئِلِ، وَقَرِّبْ فيهِ وَسيلَتى الَيْكَ مِنْ بَيْنِ الْوَسآئِلِ، يا مَنْ لا يَشْغَلُهُ الْحاحُ الْمُلِحّينَ اليوم التاسع والعشرون: اللهُمَّ غَشِّنى فيهِ بِالرَّحْمَةِ، وَارْزُقْنى فيهِ التَّوْفيقَ وَالْعِصْمَةَ، وَطَهِّرْ قَلْبى مِنْ غَياهِبِ التُّهَمَةِ، يا رَحيماً بِعِبادِهِ الْمُؤْمِنينَ اليوم الثلاثون: اللهُمَّ اجْعَلْ صِيامى فيهِ بِالشُّكْرِ وَالْقَبُولِ، عَلى ما تَرْضاهُ وَيَرْضاهُ الرَّسُولُ، مُحْكَمَةً فُرُوعُهُ بِالْأُصُولِ، بِحَقِّ سَيِّدِنا مُحَمَّدٍ وَآلِهِ الطَّاهِرينَ، وَالْحَمْدُ للَّهِ رَبِّ الْعالَمينَ.
items.english:
...and a place of rest, O Fulfiller of the needs of the seekers.

The twenty-second day: O Allah, open for me in it the gates of Your bounty, and send down upon me in it Your blessings, and grant me success in it to [attain] the causes of Your pleasure, and settle me in it in the midst of Your gardens, O Responder to the call of the distressed.

The twenty-third day: O Allah, wash me in it from sins, and purify me in it from defects, and test my heart in it with the piety of hearts, O Dismisser of the stumbles of the sinners.

The twenty-fourth day: O Allah, I ask You in it for what pleases You, and I seek refuge in You from what displeases You, and I ask You for success in it to obey You and not disobey You, O Most Generous of those who are asked.

The twenty-fifth day: O Allah, make me in it a lover of Your friends, and an enemy to Your enemies, following the *sunnah* of the Seal of Your Prophets, O Guardian of the hearts of the Prophets.

The twenty-sixth day: O Allah, make my striving in it appreciated, and my sin in it forgiven, and my deed in it accepted, and my defect in it concealed, O Most Hearing of those who hear.

The twenty-seventh day: O Allah, grant me in it the merit of *Laylat al-Qadr*, and change my affairs in it from hardship to ease, and accept my excuses and remove from me the sin and the burden, O Most Kind to His righteous servants.

The twenty-eighth day: O Allah, make my share of the supererogatory [prayers] abundant in it, and honor me in it by the fulfillment of requests, and bring my means of approach to You near among [all] means, O One whom the insistence of the persistent does not distract.

The twenty-ninth day: O Allah, shroud me in it with mercy, and grant me in it success and protection, and purify my heart from the darkness of suspicion, O Most Merciful to His believing servants.

The thirtieth day: O Allah, make my fasting in it [worthy of] appreciation and acceptance, according to what pleases You and pleases the Messenger, its branches being strengthened by the foundations, for the sake of our master Muhammad and his pure family; and all praise belongs to Allah, the Lord of the worlds.
items.transliteration: wa-maqilan, ya qadiya hawa'iji al-talibina. Al-yawmu al-thani wa-al-'ishruna: Allahumma iftah li fihi abwaba fadlika, wa-anzil 'alayya fihi barakatika, wa-waffiqni fihi li-mujibati mardatika, wa-askinni fihi buhbuhati jannatika, ya mujiba da'wati al-mudtarrina. Al-yawmu al-thalithu wa-al-'ishruna: Allahumma ighsilni fihi mina al-dhunubi, wa-tahhirni fihi mina al-'uyubi, wa-imtahin qalbi fihi bi-taqwa al-qulubi, ya muqila 'atharati al-mudhnibina. Al-yawmu al-rabi'u wa-al-'ishruna: Allahumma inni as'aluka fihi ma yurdika, wa-a'udhu bika mimma yu'dhika, wa-as'aluka al-tawfiqa fihi li-an uti'aka wa-la a'siyaka, ya jawada al-sa'ilina. Al-yawmu al-khamisu wa-al-'ishruna: Allahumma ij'alni fihi muhibban li-awliya'ika, wa-mu'adiyan li-a'da'ika, mustannan bi-sunnati khatami anbiya'ika, ya 'asima qulubi al-nabiyyina. Al-yawmu al-sadisu wa-al-'ishruna: Allahumma ij'al sa'yi fihi mashkuran, wa-dhanbi fihi maghfuran, wa-'amali fihi maqbulan, wa-'aybi fihi masturan, ya asma'a al-sami'ina. Al-yawmu al-sabi'u wa-al-'ishruna: Allahumma urzuqni fihi fadla laylati al-qadri, wa-sayyir umuri fihi mina al-'usri ila al-yusri, wa-iqbal ma'adhiri wa-hutta 'anni al-dhanba wa-al-wizra, ya ra'ufan bi-'ibadihi al-salihina. Al-yawmu al-thaminu wa-al-'ishruna: Allahumma waffir hazzi fihi mina al-nawafili, wa-akrimni fihi bi-ihdari al-masa'ili, wa-qarrib fihi wasilati ilayka min bayni al-wasa'ili, ya man la yashghaluhu ilhahu al-mulihhina. Al-yawmu al-tasi'u wa-al-'ishruna: Allahumma ghashshini fihi bi-al-rahmati, wa-urzuqni fihi al-tawfiqa wa-al-'ismata, wa-tahhir qalbi min ghayahibi al-tuhamati, ya rahiman bi-'ibadihi al-mu'minina. Al-yawmu al-thalathuna: Allahumma ij'al siyami fihi bi-al-shukri wa-al-qabuli, 'ala ma tardahu wa-yardahu al-rasulu, muhkamatan furu'uhu bi-al-usuli, bi-haqqi sayyidina Muhammadin wa-alihi al-tahirina, wa-al-hamdu lillahi rabbi al-'alamina.

items.arabic: وَمَقيلًا، يا قاضِىَ حَوآئِجِ الطَّالِبينَ اليوم الثاني والعشرون: اللهُمَّ افْتَحْ لى فيهِ ابْوابَ فَضْلِكَ، وَانْزِلْ عَلَىَّ فيهِ بَرَكاتِكَ، وَوَفِّقْنى فيهِ لِمُوجِباتِ مَرْضاتِكَ، وَاسْكِنّى فيهِ بُحْبُوحاتِ جَنَّاتِكَ، يا مُجيبَ دَعْوَةِ الْمُضْطَرّينَ اليوم الثالث والعشرون: اللهُمَّ اغْسِلْنى فيهِ مِنَ الذُّنُوبِ، وَطَهِّرْنى فيهِ مِنَ الْعُيُوبِ، وَامْتَحِنْ قَلْبى فيهِ بِتَقْوَى الْقُلُوبِ، يا مُقيلَ عَثَراتِ الْمُذْنِبينَ اليوم الرابع والعشرون: اللَّهُمَّ انّى اسْئَلُكَ فيهِ ما يُرْضيكَ، وَاعُوذُ بِكَ مِمَّا يُؤْذيكَ، وَاسْئَلُكَ التَّوْفيقَ فيهِ لِأَنْ اطيعَكَ وَلا اعْصِيَكَ، يا جَوادَ السَّآئِلينَ اليوم الخامس والعشرون: اللهُمَّ اجْعَلْنى فيهِ مُحِبَّاً لِأَوْلِيآئِكَ، وَمُعادِياً لِأَعْدآئِكَ، مُسْتَنّاً بِسُنَّةِ خاتَمِ انْبِيآئِكَ، يا عاصِمَ قُلُوبِ النَّبِيّينَ اليوم السادس والعشرون: اللهُمَّ اجْعَلْ سَعْيى فيهِ مَشْكُوراً، وَذَنْبى فيهِ مَغْفُوراً، وَعَمَلى فيهِ مَقْبُولًا، وَعَيْبى فيهِ مَسْتُوراً، يا اسْمَعَ السَّامِعينَ اليوم السابع والعشرون: اللهُمَّ ارْزُقْنى فيهِ فَضْلَ لَيْلَةِ الْقَدْرِ، وَصَيِّرْ امُورى فيهِ مِنَ الْعُسْرِ الَى الْيُسْرِ، وَاقْبَلْ مَعاذيرى وَحُطَّ عَنِّى الذَّنْبَ وَالْوِزْرَ، يا رَؤُفاً بِعِبادِهِ الصَّالِحينَ اليوم الثامن والعشرون: اللهُمَّ وَفِّرْ حَظّى فيهِ مِنَ النَّوافِلِ، وَاكْرِمْنى فيهِ بِاحْضارِ الْمَسآئِلِ، وَقَرِّبْ فيهِ وَسيلَتى الَيْكَ مِنْ بَيْنِ الْوَسآئِلِ، يا مَنْ لا يَشْغَلُهُ الْحاحُ الْمُلِحّينَ اليوم التاسع والعشرون: اللهُمَّ غَشِّنى فيهِ بِالرَّحْمَةِ، وَارْزُقْنى فيهِ التَّوْفيقَ وَالْعِصْمَةَ، وَطَهِّرْ قَلْبى مِنْ غَياهِبِ التُّهَمَةِ، يا رَحيماً بِعِبادِهِ الْمُؤْمِنينَ اليوم الثلاثون: اللهُمَّ اجْعَلْ صِيامى فيهِ بِالشُّكْرِ وَالْقَبُولِ، عَلى ما تَرْضاهُ وَيَرْضاهُ الرَّسُولُ، مُحْكَمَةً فُرُوعُهُ بِالْأُصُولِ، بِحَقِّ سَيِّدِنا مُحَمَّدٍ وَآلِهِ الطَّاهِرينَ، وَالْحَمْدُ للَّهِ رَبِّ الْعالَمينَ.
items.english:
...and a place of rest, O Fulfiller of the needs of the seekers.

The twenty-second day: O Allah, open for me in it the gates of Your bounty, and send down upon me in it Your blessings, and grant me success in it to [attain] the causes of Your pleasure, and settle me in it in the midst of Your gardens, O Answerer of the prayer of the distressed.

The twenty-third day: O Allah, wash me in it from sins, and purify me in it from faults, and test my heart in it with the piety of hearts, O Rescinder of the stumbles of the sinners.

The twenty-fourth day: O Allah, I ask You in it for what pleases You, and I seek refuge in You from what offends You, and I ask You for success in it to obey You and not disobey You, O Generous to those who ask.

The twenty-fifth day: O Allah, make me in it a lover of Your friends, and an enemy to Your enemies, following the *Sunnah* of the Seal of Your Prophets, O Protector of the hearts of the Prophets.

The twenty-sixth day: O Allah, make my striving in it appreciated, and my sin in it forgiven, and my deed in it accepted, and my fault in it concealed, O Best of Hearers.

The twenty-seventh day: O Allah, grant me in it the merit of *Laylat al-Qadr*, and change my affairs in it from hardship to ease, and accept my excuses and remove from me the sin and the burden, O Compassionate to His righteous servants.

The twenty-eighth day: O Allah, make my share of the supererogatory [acts] abundant in it, and honor me in it by the fulfillment of the requests, and bring my means [of approach] to You closer from among all means, O He whom the insistence of the persistent does not distract.

The twenty-ninth day: O Allah, cover me in it with mercy, and grant me in it success and protection [from sin], and purify my heart from the darkness of false accusations, O Merciful to His faithful servants.

The thirtieth day: O Allah, make my fasting in it [worthy] of appreciation and acceptance, according to what pleases You and pleases the Messenger, its branches being firmly connected to the roots, for the sake of our master Muhammad and his pure family, and *al-Hamd* belongs to Allah, the Lord of the worlds.
items.transliteration: wa-maqilan, ya qadiya hawa'iji al-talibina. Al-yawmu al-thani wa-al-'ishruna: Allahumma iftah li fihi abwaba fadlika, wa-anzil 'alayya fihi barakatika, wa-waffiqni fihi li-mujibati mardatika, wa-askinni fihi buhbuhati jannatika, ya mujiba da'wati al-mudtarrina. Al-yawmu al-thalithu wa-al-'ishruna: Allahumma ighsilni fihi mina al-dhunubi, wa-tahhirni fihi mina al-'uyubi, wa-imtahin qalbi fihi bi-taqwa al-qulubi, ya muqila 'atharati al-mudhnibina. Al-yawmu al-rabi'u wa-al-'ishruna: Allahumma inni as'aluka fihi ma yurdika, wa-a'udhu bika mimma yu'dhika, wa-as'aluka al-tawfiqa fihi li-an uti'aka wa-la a'siyaka, ya jawada al-sa'ilina. Al-yawmu al-khamisu wa-al-'ishruna: Allahumma ij'alni fihi muhibban li-awliya'ika, wa-mu'adiyan li-a'da'ika, mustannan bi-sunnati khatami anbiya'ika, ya 'asima qulubi al-nabiyyina. Al-yawmu al-sadisu wa-al-'ishruna: Allahumma ij'al sa'yi fihi mashkuran, wa-dhanbi fihi maghfuran, wa-'amali fihi maqbulan, wa-'aybi fihi masturan, ya asma'a al-sami'ina. Al-yawmu al-sabi'u wa-al-'ishruna: Allahumma urzuqni fihi fadla laylati al-qadri, wa-sayyir umuri fihi mina al-'usri ila al-yusri, wa-iqbal ma'adhiri wa-hutta 'anni al-dhanba wa-al-wizra, ya ra'ufan bi-'ibadihi al-salihina. Al-yawmu al-thaminu wa-al-'ishruna: Allahumma waffir hazzi fihi mina al-nawafili, wa-akrimni fihi bi-ihdari al-masa'ili, wa-qarrib fihi wasilati ilayka min bayni al-wasa'ili, ya man la yashghaluhu ilhahu al-mulihhina. Al-yawmu al-tasi'u wa-al-'ishruna: Allahumma ghashshini fihi bi-al-rahmati, wa-urzuqni fihi al-tawfiqa wa-al-'ismata, wa-tahhir qalbi min ghayahibi al-tuhamati, ya rahiman bi-'ibadihi al-mu'minina. Al-yawmu al-thalathuna: Allahumma ij'al siyami fihi bi-al-shukri wa-al-qabuli, 'ala ma tardahu wa-yardahu al-rasulu, muhkamatan furu'uhu bi-al-usuli, bi-haqqi sayyidina Muhammadin wa-alihi al-tahirina, wa-al-hamdu lillahi rabbi al-'alamina.
